item.text: 'dul ba gzhi// bam po nga drug pa//
thams cad zil gnon thams cad gzigs// thub pa 'jig
rten kun la sman// sred pa thams cad zad pa brnyes//
sbyor ba kun gyi mthar phyin mdzad// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad
rig/ thub chen thams cad mngon par mkhyon// 'khon dang 'jigs pa kun las 'das/
chos kun gyi ni pha rol gshegs// bsam pa kun la mkhas pa po// sred pa thams cad
rab tu bcom// sams can kun la phan dgongs pa// mdud pa thams cad rab tu grol//
bag la nyal kun bcad nas ni// 'ching ba thams cad yang dag bcad// sems can kun gyi mchog rab ste// thub pa chos rnams
ston par mdzad// sems dpa' chen po shes rab che// brtson 'grus chen po grags pa che// chos chen 'od ni chen po pa// chos chen
don gyi pha rol gshegs// klu chen seng ge chen po pa// dge slong chen po dra srong che// shes rab chen po'i ral gri mtshon//nyon mongs
chen po rab tu bcom// stobs dang brtson 'grus rab tu che// brtan pa chen po pha rol gnon// byang chub chen po brnyes pa gang//
dgra chen rnams las rnam par rgyal// nad chen po yi dpyad mdzad pas// bcom ldan sman pa chen po legs// 'dod chags chen
po za'i gnon la// sman chen po ni stsol ba po// 'khor ba chen po'i btsan ban// 'chi ba chen pos bsis rnams la// thugs rjer po/
dang ldan pas// 'ching ba kun las grol bar mdzod// skyes bu chen bo lhachan po// tshogs rnams kyi na tshogs chen ldan// sbyin pa'i mchog ni sbyin
chen po// zhi ba chen po'i go 'phang reg/ sems can mchog ste drang srong mchog/ de bzhin rnam par 'dren mchog brnyes// nyan thos mchog ni phun
sumatshogs// chos kyamchog ni rab ston pa// shin tumanyam par gzhag pa'i mchog/ yon gnas rnams kyi mchog tu'os// rnam par grol ba rnamA
kyi mchog/ mtshan ni mchog rab kun dang ldan// bcom ldan srid las rab tu grol// srid pa 'di gal ba las 'phags pa// srid pa'i 'dred chags
kun nas bcad// srid pa'i sridapo rab tu bcom// chos chen po na bsgoms pas// 'jigs dang 'jigs su rung ba spangs// klu yi rgyal po/
rnams kyi gnas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chan du/ thams cad bya ba byas pa yi// nyan thos rnams kyis mdun byas te// lnga brgya rnams dang thabs gcig tu// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' las
gshegs// chu bo de yi 'gram dag tu// slaba'i mchog ni bzhugs nas ni// rjes su brtsa ba thugs rje can// lus can kun la phan mdzad pas// mtsho la gzigs nas dge slong la//
'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to/ ngas ni sdig pa gang byas dang// nga yi tshig 'di mnyan par gyis// ngas ni sngon gyi tshe rabs su// g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gyur// rang sangs rgyas ni lag
smon to// skyon med la ni skur pa btab// skya bo'i tshogs chen lhags nas su[: ]/thub pa chos kyi yon tan dga'// bcing ba dam pos debacings nas// grong khyer nas na phyung ba dang//
dge sbyong bcing bas dam bcings nas// sdug bsngal gyur te nga yis mthong// de la sAng rdzobaskyod nas kyang// nga nyid kyis ni thar par byas// las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ dmyal ba rnams
su yun ringes 'phangs// slar yang mir ni 'o ngos pa ni/ ngas ni skur pa thob par gyur// donas las kyi lhag mas kyang// nga yi yang srid tha ma la// mu stags rnams kyis mdzes ma'i phur/
yang dag ma yin skur pa btab// nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na// gsang tshig 'dzin cing mang thos pa// bram ze lnga brgya rnams la ni// tshal na gsang tshig brjod pa'i tshe// mngon shes lnga ldan rdzu
'phrul che// na chen drang srong der 'ongs pa// bkur sti byed pa des mthenganas// skyon med la ni skur pa btab// drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ces// ngas ni bram ze'i khye'u la

snyas bram ze'i khye'u rnams nga yi tshig/ thos nas rjes su yi rang zhing// de nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyasi// khyim dang khyim du slong ba na// drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyodacas// skye bo mang po dag la smras/
las kyi rnam par smin bdos// dge slong lnga brgya dag dang yang// mdzes ma kho na'i rgyu las ni// skur pa dag nithib par gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon gyi// nyan thos gyur ba gnas 'jog
bu:/ de tshe dge sbyong de lani// ngas ni ma bden skur pa btab// sdig pa'i las de byas pas na// mi bzad ngan 'gror song nas ni// sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su

myong de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// nga la dram bri rtsa mis 'dare// skya bo'i tshogab ni 'dus pa na// yang dag ma yin sgyur pa pa tab// nor gyi phyir ni skyon med par// ngas ni g.yas khyim nu bo ni// ri
yi gseb tu bcug nas su// ngas ni rdo ba dag gis bstan// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba dag tu yun rings 'phangs// rab tu tsha dang thig nag gi/ sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar gyur//

de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// lha sbyin gyis ni rdo 'phangs te// nga' zhabs kyi mthe bo ni// rdopa'i dum bus rma ya phyung// rgya mtsho yi ni gru bo ches// rgya mtsho la ni 'gro ba na// khru na 'dug pa'i tshong
pa ni mdung thung rnon pos bsad par gyur// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba rnams su mun 'dis 'dzungs// de yi las kyi lhag mas nga'i// zhabs la tshel pa zug par gyur// sngon ni nya pa'i

grong khyer gyi// nya pa'i bur ni gyur pa na// nya rnams gsod par bud pa dang// yid dga' ba ni skyes par gyur// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// ngani dmul bar kun rings 'phangs// rab tutsha dang thig nag
dang : sdug bsngal mang po myong bar gyur// de nas las kyi lhag masani// gang gi tshe na 'phags skyes pos// shAkya rnams ni gsod pan// klad pa mi bzad nad kyis thebs// rnam par gzigs
kyi gsung rab kyi// nyan thos de ngas su smad byas te// byed na nas dag za bar 'os// khyed la 'bras ni mi ragis zhes// ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang// las kyi rnam par smin pa des//
dmyal ba thig nag rnams su na/sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong// de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// dgra mgrar dbyar ni gnas bcas te// bram ze yis ni spyan drangs che// zla ba gsum du nas

dag thos// nga ni sman nga ra gyur ba na/ tshong dpon bu pho 'khrur 'jug tsha// nad kyi sdug bsngal gyur pa la// snyan ma yin pa ngas byin no// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// sdug bsngal mang po nyams su

myong/ de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// de 'dra'i la khru ba'i nad kyis thebs// sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su// ngan mthu can khyad gyur tshe// stobs dag 'gyed par byed pa na/ sa ni byad gyi bu zhig bsad
las kyi rnam par smin pa des// sdugabasngal mang po nyams su myong// de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// 'di na nga yi rgyab srung ngo// sngonani ngan sdong bur gyur pa// dga' skyongal
ni sAs pa ni// mgo rigu ngas mkhong ci zhig bya// 'di la byang chub yod ma yin// ngag gi nyes par sbyod pa dang// las kyi rnam par smin ba des// 'dare yang mare na 'ongs pa na// khyim med par ni rab
byung nas// byang chub mchog ni 'dod pa'i phyir// ltungargyas 'grom du lo drug tu// mchog tu dka' ba spyad pa ngas/ sdug bsngal mang po nyams sumyong// sems can kun gyi rapa mchog gis// chos
kyi dam pa thugs chud nas// sdig pa'i las ni gang mdzad pa// tshogs kyi mchog la bka' stsal to// thams cad zil mnon stobs b.rAs kyis// dge slong dge 'dun gung bzhugs nas// ma dros pa
yi mtsho chen du// nyid kyi 'phrin las lung bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs gcig
tu3 mtsho chen po ma dros par 'phrin las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan nas ma dros pa nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ mnyan yod kyir degs 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzongs na bzhugs so/ ri
dgags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas/ bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ mnyan yod du gshegs nas/ gnyan yod kyi bdag gi khang bzangs kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos/
so// thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song sa zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// de nas ri/
dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen
bo ma dros par/ rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa'i dgra bcom pa lnga brgya gang dag khugs pa dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan
'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gas gnang bar rig nas zhes ba ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsol zin nas phyag btabs te/ lhung bzed khyu bar rig nas zhes

bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sta/ snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la chos dang/
ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gangan las bzhengs te gshegs nas/ gtsug lag

khang du byon pa dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la
ma rdzogs pa yod re/ des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na/ 'on kyang dge 'dun gyi ched du yon ma phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu

zhingagashegs pa na/ grong khyer thigs ba can du byon nas/ grong khyer thigs pa can gyi byang phyogs kyi grong khyer shing sha ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag
rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas zhes bya ba nas shing sha ba'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang/ khyu nas khyur
phrad cing 'dus te/ grong khyer thigs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag
par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas grong khyer thagegs pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gangan
ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gan

bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams lacang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas grong khyer thogs pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom

ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyagabyas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo// de nas yi dgasarus gong sbrul ba pa sbrang ba lta bu

rang skrag sog pa lto ritsam/ kha khab kyi mig cem/ 'bar rang khyi'i bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lcegacig tu gyur pa lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la kun nas yongs su
bskor taM/ 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag 'di dag ni bdag cag gi nye dur gyur pa lags na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse

brtse bar bzung ste/ bdag cag kho na'i ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa dam zhigabacas te/ gal te khyed cag cha byad 'di nyid kyis yon sngo ba byed pa'i tshe 'ong nani/
khyed cag gi ming nas yon kasngo ba bya'o// de rnams kyis gsol ra/ bcom ldan 'das g.yar tshe lags na/ ji ltar mche la gas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe rigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa
ngo tsha med la ngom byed/ ngo tsha ba la ngo mi tsha// 'jigs pa med la 'jags par lta// 'jigs pa la ni mi 'jigs lta// log pa'i lab blangs pas na// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro// ngo tshab la ngo
dang/ ngo tsha med pa ngom tsha// mi 'jigs pa la mi 'jigs lta// 'jigs pa la ni 'jigs lta ba'i/ yang dag lta ba blangs pa yis// sems can rnams ni bde 'gror 'gro// de rnams kyis ga 'a[']
bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta ranam gyi lags so// de nas grong khyer thag pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing gsod nga 'i bza' ba dang/ bca'

ba dag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba nas/ snyan ches dma'ab zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'iphyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// la dgas lnga brgya po de dag 'bras
pa dang/ de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyis/ yi dgas rnams mthong nas 'phros par brtsam pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shegs ldan ngag ci'i
phyir 'bros/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yi dgas 'o narig mchilags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshur shog/ 'di dag ni khyed cag gi nye du yin no// gal te
khyed cag gis gnang na/ ngas 'di rnams kyi gal te khyed cag gis gnang na/ ngas 'de rnams kyi mang gis yon bsngo'o// de rnams kyis gsol pa 1 bcom ldan 'das rung lags so// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ de rnams kyi ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad de/ sbyin pa 'di yis bsadanams gang// de ni yi dgas rjes 'gro zhing// 'di dag yi dgas 'jig rten ni//
nas myur ldang shog/ de yis gos dang skom dang zos// gnas mal rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dus kun tu ni mi zad par// de rnams la ni grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer
pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams 'chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/

gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyimabadag rnams rtog khang du lhags shing tshogs nas/ 'di lta bu'i skabasakyi gtam dag gleng bar u0fb1da de/ kye dge

sbyong go'u ta mni 'dod zhen che zhing/ de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen mab yin no// kha cig gis smras pa// shes ldan dag/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma na 'dod zhen chung zhing/ de'i nyan thos rnams kyang

'dod zhen chung ste/ mu stags can rnams ni de lta ma yin no// de'atsho bram ze smra 'dod kyi sa nga ge zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi sang ges/ khyod
khyer thages pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'dod zhen che 'am/ 'dod zhen chung ba dang/ de'i nyan thos rnams 'dod zhaname'am/ 'dod zhen
chung ba ngas khyed cag yid ches par bya'o// de nas bram ze su 'dod kyi sang ga/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der so ngas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan
go'u ta ma dgo slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/ bdag gis bca' ba bu ram zhig 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze sa 'dod kyi sang ga
la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas bram ze sku 'dod kyi sang gas/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rage nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyispyan snga nas song ngo//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze smra 'dod kyi sa nga ge kun katshol bas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bca' ba bur ma la spun

dungs kyis/ khyed cag las gang gis ji tsam yog pa des de tsam zhig blang bar bya'o// khram ze sla'adod kyisangagu la bu ram 'tshong ba'i khang pa lnga brgya yod pa nas/ des buram gyi khang pa re re nas/ bu ram
gyi snod blangs te/ bu ram gyi snod lnga brgya khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan go'u ta ma bu ram bsdogs lags
yin: nyan thos gyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ longs spyad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag dang lhung bzed bcabs nas/ dgoslong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa
nyid la bzhugs so// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi sang gus bu ram gyi snod gcig blangs te brame par brtsams pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi bar du bums kyang lhag/
pas/ thama' cad de kho na bzhin du 'dug ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyisang ga mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas de dad pa skyes nas phyogs mtha' dag cu sgra bsgrags ba

shes ldan dag dag sbyong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung zhing/ de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin no// de nas des mu stegs can rnams bu ram la longs sod du gzhug pa'i phyir mgron du bos pa dag

de rnams kyis bu dam bag mad par blangs nas/ kha cig gis ni longs spyad do// kha cig gis ni snod bkang nas bor zhing khyer te song ngo// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi song gis smras pa/ skyes bu blun po khyad

cag kho na 'dod zhen che ba yin la/ dge sbyong go'u shul ni 'dod zhen chung zhing/ de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin no zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur
te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der songs phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sku/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cas gsol to// btsun pa legs
par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag ces bya ba nas/ tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shogaces bya ba nas/ dge slong tshun
shogatshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces gsungs pas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ga slong rnamA

labaka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dus sam dus ma yin pa 'am/ na ba 'am/ man bas bu ram la lo saM sbyadapar bu sa/ 'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sna 'dod kyi seng ge ro
myags pa'i dri ma zhim bas/ sams rtsa gcig pa nyide ma thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong ba 'dod kyi sang ge ni/ srid pa tha ma pa yin na/ ci'i phyir bden
ma mthong snyam du dgongs na/ lus rul pa'i dri ma zhim pa las gyur par gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo song la/ dge slong sgras 'dod
kyi seng ge'i gtsug lag khang dri dang/ ma tog gi 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phye ma rnams kyis gtoral/ gnas mal la yang 'dug pas bdug cing/ me tog dri zhim pos brgyan pa'i ma tog gi
gdugs res shige/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal nas/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// ji tsam na de bsod snyoms la song ba de'i bar du/ de'i gtsug lag khang du
song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba de bzhin thams cad byas so// denas tshe dang ldan pa su 'dod kyi seng ge bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/ gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang/ lha'i 'byor
ba mthong nas/ de nas dga' ba'i lad kyis bsod snyoms la longs spyad de/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas/ 'a
mo krung bcas te/ lus drang por bsrang nas/ dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste 'dug pa dang/ dri zhim po mnam nas de'i sams mnyam par gzhag par skyes so// de nas des nyon mongs pa thams
cad sangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas zhes bya ba nas/ mngon du smra bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge/
slong dag pa'i dge slong dang/ nga'i nyan thos sdug pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong smra 'dod kyi sang ga 'di yin no// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom
thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong gzhan rnams ni/ mi phyug pas rnam par grol na/ tshe dang ldan pa smA 'dod kyi sang ge/ sdug pas rnam par grol ba la gzig

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya bstud mar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams nas shi 'phos shing/ de nyid du sdus te/ da ltar gyi srid pa tha ma mi rnams su skyes pa na/
lus rul pa'i dri mnam pas sems rtse gcig pa ma grub pa'o// dri zhim po'i dri mnam nas sams mnyam kha thob nas sdug pas rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to// gal te 'di la thub sa 'di ma byas par gyur

na: drobar gyur pa yang 'dis baspyad par mi 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rjes su gnang// gzhan gang zhig sdug pa 'di lta bu s rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba das rig pa de lta bu bya ste// 'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o/
de nas bcom ldan 'das yul slong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzong gi 'gram na/ khang pa brtsags pa'i
gnas na bzhugs so// yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul slong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ angs pa can du byon nas/
yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang ba cig tu 'dus nas smras pa// shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das yul sbyong byed nas
ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi snga' rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes grag gis/ gal te bdag cag re re nas bcos
ldan 'das spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na ni/ bcom ldan 'dras slar gshegs dang/ gzhan gyi skabs ma red par 'gyur bas/ de la khrims shig bcas te/ ci nas kyang tshogs shing 'dus/
pa khe nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol gyi/ mi gcig pus ni ma yin no zhes de rnams kyis khrims su bca' ba dag byas nas bzhag go/ de'i tsha yangs pa can na bsod nams chen po
dang ldan pa bzhi gnas taM/ nor can dang/ nor can gyi chung ma dang/ nor can gyi bu dang/ nor can gyi mna' ma'o// de dag gi khyim du ni lha dang/ mi rnams kyi yababs par gyur to// de rnams
kyis khrims su bcas pa de ma thos par/ khyim bdag nor can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang yul spong byed nus ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi sa 'u rdzong
gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang yangs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song sa zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga'/
par mdzad nas cang ma gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas khyim bdag nor can stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na de logs su thal mo
sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tusang bdagagi sdum rar gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis naganang bar mdzad
du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas/ khyim nga dag nor can la gnang ngo// de nas khyim bdag nor can gyis/ bcom ldan 'dusacang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhang sa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nus song ngo// de nas ya ngas pa can gyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams yangs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan

'das gang na ba der song sku zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi snyam par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba'i

bar gongom bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas 'dzeg gi bu dag/ ngasngar khyim bdag nor can gyis spyan drangs zin to// de rnams kyis smras po/ shes ldan dag khyim bdaganor can gyis na tshogs/
kyi khrims bcas ba las 'das par byas so// kha cig dag gis smras pa ci lta de 'das par byed: gdon mi za bar des khrims bcas pa ma thos so// 'onakyang bdag cag ngas de ni
skyes bu dam pa yin pas/ gdugs tshod gsol du chug/ bdag cag gse ni gnangs gdugs tshod gsol lo// de nasatshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang/ chos gos
thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ shar sgo nas zhugs pa dang/ ji tsam na gdan ma bshams shing/ zhal zas rnams sta gon ma byas pa mthong nas/ de
nas khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas snying las chung dus gnas sam/ des smras pa/
'phags pa kun dga' bo ni sa de skad gsung/ khyim bdag gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams sta gonan byas pa mthong ngo// 'phags pa khyod chang sgo gang nas zhugs/ khyim bdage shar nas
so3 rna'aphags pa lho nas zhugs shig/ da zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na lha'i gdan bshams shang/ lha'i zhal zas rnams sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang shan tu ngo mtshar skyes
par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag noracan gyi spyan 'dren gyis 3 bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags ngomachis na/ bcom ldan 'das da do'i/
dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs ta lhung bzed rgyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos ma nyan
pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor can gyi chung ma stan las langs te 3 btsom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolato// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs cig tu/ sang bdag gi snyam par gdugs tshod sbyor zhang mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du
gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi chung ma la gnang ngo// gnang nas kyang khyim bdaganyer can la tshes bshad pa mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so//
nor can gyi chung mas kyang zhal zas rnams stagon byas so// de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang/ chos gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim
gang na ba der song sa byin nas/ lho sgo nas zhugs nas/ gdun ma bshams shing/ zhal zas rnams kyang/ nyon mkhyas par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang nor can gyi chung ma la 'di skad ces smras
so2 khyim bdag gi chung ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs na ci snying las chung dus gnas sam/ des skyes pa 3 'phags pa ci ste de skad gsung/ gdan la bshams she'i
zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo// 'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs/ ltonas so// 'phags pa shar nas zhugs shig/ ji tsam na gdan bzang po
bshams shing/ zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mkhrong ngo// mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi chung ma'i spyan 'dren byas/ bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod
gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da do'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcibs te lhung bzed rgyu bar rig

nas: snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos ma nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor can gyi bu stan 'a sa langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang blang sa gcig
tu: sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi bu la gnang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
nor can gyi chung ma la chos bshad ba mdzad nas gshegs so// nor can gyi bus kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag stagon byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar
langs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lho sgo nas zhugs nas/ gdan ma bshams shing/ zhal h+phas sta gon ma byas pa yang mthong ngo//
mthong nas kyang nor can gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag gi bu sangs rgyas la sogs ba dag srid gi dge 'dun spyan drangs na ci snying las chung dus gnas sam/ des smras pa// 'phags
ba ci ste de skadagasung/ gdan ma bshamasashing/ zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa na thong ngo// 'phags pa khyod chapa sgo gang nas zhugs/ lho nas so// 'phags pa nub nas bzhugs shing/ ji
tsam na ba dan bzang po bshams shang/ zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar rgyas par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi bu'i spyan 'dren gyis/ bcom ldan
'das la dus tshod gsol la/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed
gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor can gyi mna' ma snyan las longs te/
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum pa
gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na ) gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung pas nor gyi mna' ma la gnang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
nor can gyi bu la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das gang ba der song sa lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zha
gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
gyis zhes bya ba nas/ cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom
ldan 'das gangan ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dag slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag cag gi sdum
par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gnas 'jog gi bu dag nga sngar nor can gyi mna' mas spyan drangs zan to// de nas
yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams rngam nas smas pa/ shes ldan dag nor can gcig pu la nor yodakyis bdag cag la ma dadam/ ci nas des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slongagi dag
'dun nyi ma re re gdugs tshod gsol zhing/ bdag cag kho nas skabs ma thob par gyur/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gzhan dag gis sbrus pa/ gang ba tsho sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas gshegs par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i khyim rdo ba re re nas bkogs te gzhig go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang chos
gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ nub sgo nas zhugs na/ gdan ma bshams shing/ zhal zas kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo// mthong nas
kyang nor can gyi mna' ma la 'di skad ces smras so// nor can gyi mna' ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs na ci snying las chung dus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags/
pa ci sa de skad gsung/ gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo/ 'phags pa chab sgo gang nas zhugs/ nub nas so// 'phags ba byang nas zhugs shig/ de nas

byang nas zhugs na/ ji tsam na lha'i gdan bshams shing/ lha'i zhal zas sta gon byas pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar rgyas par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi mna' ma'i spyan 'dren gyis/
bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi/
dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas gas kha can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag thams cad 'dus nas/ khyim
bdag nor can gyi sgo na 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag nor can la 'di skadaces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag yangs ba can gyi tshogs rngam nas sgo na 'dug/ de dag gis
khyod la gnod pa byas bar 'gyur du 'od gas/ song la bzod pa gsol cig/ de phyir byung nas bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdagaci khyod gcig pu la nor
yod dam/ gang gi phyir khyed kyis nyan re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/ kho bo cag gis skabs mi rnyed par byed/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag
gis tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa ma thos kyis/ de bas na tshogs kyis bzod par bya ba'i rigs so// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyes bu 'di ni dam pa yin pas/ 'di la bzod
par bya'o zhes/ de rnams bzod par gyur pa dang/ des sbas pa/ gal te de lta na nang du zhugs shage/ de rnams khyim du zhugs pa dang/ gdan bzang po bshams shing zhal zas bsod pa rnams su
gon byas pa yang mthong ngo// mthonganasaMkyang shan tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur nas smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod 'ba' zhig sangs rgyus la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar 'os kyi/
kho bo cag ni ma yin no// des de rnams la rin po che dag byin pa dang/ de rnams kyis ma blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa: rin po ma 'di dag ni rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis/ long/

zhig: de rnams kyis blangs pa las/ gang gis ci 'dra ba blangs pa de'i kha dog de 'dra ba kho nar snang bar gyur to// denas nor can gyi mna' mas sangs rgyus la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhug
pararag nas/ gtsang zhig bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dgags zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur ba' raginas/ snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcos ldan 'dun/

kyi spyan sngar 'dug ga zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can dang 3 nor can gyi chung ma dang/ nor can gyi bu dang/ nor can byi mna' ma rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal

dang khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ gang thos na nor can dang/ nor can gyi chung ma dang/ nor can gyi bu dang/ nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtsa mo nyi shu mtho ba na shes kyi
rdo rdzas bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa da lta bu r/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas/
lan gsum du tshad du brjod pas ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba nas/ bdag cagani mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang 3 dge slong
@#/ @#/ gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang sang bsdos te/ skyabs su mchi/
bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can dang/ nor can gyi chung ma dang/ noracan gyi bu dang/ nobatsanamana' ma rnams lachos dang ldan ng 'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/
yang dgapar 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// 'dul ba gzhi//
bam po nga bdun pa// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nor can dang/ nor can gyi mchis rung

dang/ nor can gyi bu dang/ nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes shang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi dpal nyam/
su myong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di rnams kho nas las rnamasaMbyas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya banas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyideces

bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA ra NA si na/ ma tog 'phrang rgyud mkhan zhig yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cigartse bar byed/ dga' bar
byed 3 dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de lhan cigartsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur sbyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so// des de yang ragis mnyam pa las chung ma blangs so// de dus
phyi zhig na bkren zhang shan tu bkren par gyur nas/ de dang// bu dang/ chung ma dang/ mna' mas brtson pa chen pos 'bad pas// dar yug gcigacig grub nas/ de nas me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan mang

de bgos nas rgyal po la ma rtog 'phrang 'obul/ ma tog 'phreng rgyud kyi chung ma yang de nyidi bgos nas btsun mo la 'bul/ ma toga'aphrang rgyud mkhan gyi bu yang de nyid bgos nas gzhon nu rnamasaM la 'bul/
ma tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma yang de nyid bgos nas rgyal po'i mna' ma rnams la me tog 'phreng 'bul bar byed do// sangs rgyas rnams byung ba med pa na 3 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman
ba dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba/ gnas mal bas mtha' la bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas la gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ nyam
bka'i dus su wA ra NA sir phyin nas/ ma toga'abrang rgyumakhan de'i khyim grong khyer gyi sgo na 'dug pa de'i ldum rar nub mo gnasaM btab ste/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ma tog phung
rgyud mkhan des/ mi'i phung po 'bar blta bu r mtheng nas/ de ngad pa skyes te/ chung ma la smras pa dang/ de yang dad par gyur to// des bu la smras pa dang/ de yang dad par gyur to// des mna'am la
sbas pa dang/ de yang dad par gyur to// de nas de rnams kyis gros bya bar brtsams ba/ bdag cag sang zan ma zes kyang zla/ 'dus la/ rab byung ba ni ba'i bdag nyid can 'di/
bshesagasol lo// de nas nam langs nas/ de rnams kyis de la bsod snyoms phul lo// ma rtog 'phrang rgyud mkhan gyis sbas pa/ bzang mo kho bo'i ris kyi bgo skal gang yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung
ba 'di la dbul lo// des smas pa/ rje'i sras bdag gi yang dbul lo// bus smras pa/ bdag gi yang dbul lo// mna' mas smras pa/ bdag ga yang dbul lo// de nas de rnams 'dulanas/ de la
ras bson to// bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyi chos ston gyi/ tshig gis ma yin pas/ de nas bdag nyid chen po de de rnams la sAri brtse ba'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phags nas ) 'bar ba dang/ gas/
ba dang/ char 'bebs pa dang/ glog 'khyen pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skya bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul lamyur du sems gtod pa yin pas/ yang rtsa nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la
gtugs te/ smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag cag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing/
bdag cag gi khyim du lha dang ma'i g.yang 'bab par gyur cig/ 'di lta bu'i tshosa rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyis par byed kyi/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig

ces byas so// de nas rang sangs rgyas kyis de rnams la snying brtsa bas rdzu 'phrul byas nas/ rgyal po'i khabakyi sAng na phar chas te song ba dang/ de'i grib mas rgyal po'i steng du bab pa dang/ de gdong

bstod de blta bar brtsams pa dang/ bdag nyid chen po de mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag nyid chen po 'dis yang su zhig gi bkren pa'i rtsa ba phyung bar gyur snyam mo// ma tog 'phrad rgyud mkhan de rgyal

bo la me tog 'bul ba'i dus gang yin pa de las theg gtsam zhig yol lo// rgyal po yang ma tog la sdod cing 'dugago/ de nas me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan de rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis bkug pa//

dang : rgyal pos/ de la smras pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis ma tog de rang dus las yol/ res ji ltar gyur pargyas par smras pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos ji snyad gyon pa byin no// dbazhin du ma tog 'phrad rgyud mkhan
gyi chung ma la ni/ btsun mo rnams kyis ji snyad byon pa byin no// ma tog 'phrangargyudamakhan gyi bu lani/ gzhon nu rnams kyis so// ma tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma lani/ rgyal po'i mna'
ma rnamasakyis te/ domathong ba'i chos danyid la nor gyi me tog mngon par grub par gyur te/ dbul bzhud par gyur to// dag slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan
gang yin pa de ni/ nor can 'di nyidi yan no// ma tog 'phreng rgyun mkhan gyi chung mo gang yin pa de ni/ nor tsan gyi chung ma yin no// mo tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu gang yin ba de ni/ nor can
@#/ spyi bu yin no// ma tog 'phrad rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma ni/ nor can gyi mna' ma yin te/ 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing/ smon lam btab pa gang yin ba/
de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ phyug cing nor mang la longs sbyong che ba'i rigs su skyes nus/ khyim du lha dang mi'i g.yang babs par gyur to// nga'i spyan snga nas kyang bden pa mthong bar byas te/
nga rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa// 'di dgagis mnyes par byas kyi/ ma mnyes par ni ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa
rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams lhag
par yang mngon par dad par gyur nas/ stan 'as langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/ bdag cag gis dgung zla gsum dun bza' chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims chadang/ snyun dpyad kyi rkyen snyan dang/ yo byad
rnams 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas/ yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la gnang ngo// de nas yangs pa can gyi
ba khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ stan las langs te dong ngo// de nas

yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcangs te lhung bzed rgyu bar riganas//
snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang
khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las
pa'angs te gshegs so// danyid du nyi ma gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du 'das so// yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang dang khyim bdag rnams kyi 'khor rgya chen po mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas// de rnams

kyi nye du dag zas kyi phyir nyi ma rer zhing 'ong bas/ de dag gis gtsos par gyur nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ bdag cag gi nye du dag skur mchis te/
de rnams la bdag cag gdugs gcig bzhin stsol bas/ khyed cag dang de rnams la khyad par rtsomathogos na/ kye 'phags pa dag bdagacag gis yo byad rnams dbul gyis/ zhal ta kho na mdzod cig/ dag/
slong rnams kyis smras pa// bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o zhas/ dge slong rnams kyis skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

de lta bas na rjes su gnang sta/ dge slong rnams kyis zhal ta bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi zhal ta bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ de rnams kyis zhal ta bya bar brtsams te 3 ji tsam
nasong g.yogs med par thug pa 'tshodapa'i zhal ta byas pa las/ lhas char phab pas/ des ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ stong g.yogs mad par btso bar mi bya'o// sgo khang dang khyams su 'tshed par byed pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang dang khyams su btso bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bas
na: rung ba'i gnas kyi gzhir/ mi rung ba ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ 'di rnams su zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ stangag yogs med pa dang/ sgo khang dang/ khyams dang/ bsro khang
dang/ khrus khang dang/ rgyal po'i gnas dang/ mchod rten gyi gnas dang/ mu stegs can gyi gnas dang/ khyim bdag gi gnas dang// dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngo// gzhi bcu po 'di dag ni
rung ba ma yin pa'i gnas kyigazhi yin te/ de rnams su dge slong gis zas kyi zhal tami bya'o// zhal ta byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sdom ni/ nad bu can dang zas dag dang/
0 ga mar tshus lha ga po dag dang yang// tshal gyi 'bras bu chu rgyas dang// pad+ma'i rtsa dang lug dag go/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mnyan yod na dge slong nad bu can zhig med pa des/
sman pa dris ba/ bzhin bzangs dag kho bo la snyanason cig/ des nad kyi gzhi dras nas sbas pa/ 'phags pa thugapa gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom/
ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo// sman pas smas pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs smacan yin pas/ 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas gnang par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod de/ des skabs de dag slong rnamA
la'o// dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pa thug pa 'thung zhig ces zer na/ sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa
btung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de'i nad g.yog gis thug ma grang mo zhig khyer te byin no//
de nas sman pas 'ongs nas dris pa// 'phags pa khyod bde 'am/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs mi bde'o// ci khyod kyis thug pa ma gsol lam/ 'khrungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig/ grang mo'o//
'phags ba ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// sang ni dron mo gsol cig deng nas de'i nad g.yog gis blangs nas grang mo kho narId nas/ des de bsros te byin no// de nas sman pa 'ongs te de bzhin du
dris ba dang/ des snas pa mi bde'o// ci thug pa la gsol lam ! 'thungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig/ grang mo zhig bsros nas so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig/
bgyis so// de grang ste bsros pa lags kyis 3 sang ni rang bzhin gyis dron por mdzod de gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad g.yog gis// 'bras dang snod sta gon byas nas// gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi/
shing drung zhig tu btso bar brtsams pa la/ de nas khra'i rtag pas de ma rung bar byas pas/ dge slong de thongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis ni/ bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o zhes bka'
stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis ci 'dra ba dang/ ji tsam pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba'i gnas lnga ste/ rtsom pa'i mtha' can dang/ somasagatod pa'i
mtha' can dang/ ba nyal ba lta bu dang/ sbyong pa'i gnas dang/ bsos pa'o// de la rtsom pa'i mtha' can ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag ga byas gnas rtsom ba na/ der thog mar gzhi 'di ni
dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes sems bskyed cing/ tshig tu smras pa sa/ 'di ni rung ba'i gnas rtsom pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// sams gtod ba'i mtha' can la/nga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

dge slong lag gi blas der thog mar rdob 'deg pa na/ nye 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i nges par zung zhig/ nges par/
zung zhig ces bya ba ste/ 'di ni soms gtod pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// ba nyal ba lta bu gang zhen/ gang la sgo tha dad par gsas pa ste/ 'di nib nyal ba lta bu zhes byas/ gnas stong pa gang
zhe na: spangs pa'i gnas te 3 'di ni gnas stong pa zhes bya'o// bskos pa gang zhen/ gsol ba dang/ gnyis kyi las kyis bsos pa'o// dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsko ba ma shes nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par byas pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa la// dge 'dun gyis 'dod na de bsko bar bya'o/
bsko ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN+Di brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang/
dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang satshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang
dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskon/ gal te dag 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad lags pa///
nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste// dge 'dun tsun pa rnam/
gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags ra/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nya 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzhed do/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas
thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ tshadang ldan ba rnams lus gang dag gnas thams cad lags pa//
nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko b.rab zod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhige/ gang dag ma bzod ba dedag nagasungs shig/ dge
'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bgyis lags pa/ nung mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su
bskor lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang du dag 'dun gyi rung ba'i subasos pa der gnyis skabs dbye ste/ mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang mtsho/

kyi nang du zhag lon pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi snga'u rdzong gi 'gram na khang pa brtsigs pa'i gnas nabazhugs so// yangs ba can na sde dpon sang ge zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i nye
'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis/ de'i ched du sha khyer te 'ongs nas/ de yang za bar byed do// gang gi tshe des/ bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ mi za bas khyer te 'ongs na yang dge/
slong rnams la sbyin par byed do// dge slong rnams kyis kyang de dag zos pa dang/ mu stegs can rnams da bar byed/ gzhogs 'byas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ shes ldan dag sde dpon sang ge'i

ched du byas te/ sha khyer te 'ongs na ni/ des de dag ma zos la/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams la byin pa dang/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyis ched du byas pa'i sha ni zes so zhes bya ba'i
skabs de dag slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnas gsum kyis rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes
gsu sa pA/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi ched du byas par mngon sum dumathong ba/ rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ yid ches ba las khyod kyi ched du byas pa

yin no zhes thos pa/ rungab ma yin ba'i risha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ rang nyid kyi blo lasarnam par rtogapa skyas pa/ tshul 'di las ni bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam du rung ba ma yin
ba'i shabaza' khar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no// dge slong dag ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dis bdag gi ched du byed
par mngon sum du ma mthong ba rung ba sha bzung bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dad/ yid ches pa las 'dis khyed kyi ched du byas pa ma yin no zhes thos parung ba'i sha bza' bar
bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa'i tshul las 'di bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no sAn ba ma skyes pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/
gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong dag ltogs par gyur pas/ de rnams glos phab ste 'dug pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
kyis sbas pa/ 'phags pa dag gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i bstan pa la/ ci'i slad du glos phab sa bzhugs shang/ dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par mi mdzad/ de rnams kyis sbas pa chu
ts+tso ga dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ bsod snyoms lto 'grangs par mi radapas/ kho bo cag ltogs te nyam chung bos/ des na glos phab ste 'dug go/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ ci sgyu zhal tshus mi
gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mganang ngo// khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis// bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bu r dge slong rnams kyis gas tshus bza' bar bya ste/
ba 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong rnams la/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/
'phags pa dag 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis bras kyi bya ba byas nas/ bsod sems sngar rnyed pa khyer nas gtsug lag khang du song// de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de
yang bza' bar 'dod na/ 'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// de'i phyir rjes su gnang
sku/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bu 'dod na/ sngar blangs bran to snyam du sams la/ sngar rnyed pa yang bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi
ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la mgron du bos nas/ de rnams
kyis zos pa dang/ bca' ba las lhag ma zhig lus so// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis sbas pa// 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ched du sta gon bgyis pa lags kyis/ snyoms te bzhud/
la phyis gsol cig/ de rnams kyis khyer te dong ngo// dong nas de yang za bar 'dod na/ 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcos
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bu r 'di dag ni sbyin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la
gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis// dge slong rnams zas la mgron du bos
de rnams kyis bres nas/ bca' ba la sogs pa cung zad cig lhag ste 3 dge slong rnams dong ba dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis sbas nga// 'di ni bdag cag gis 'jigs pa dag kho na
la yongs su btang ba la gas te/ 'tshal te mchas la/ khyed kho na la dbul lo zhes/ de rnams kyis te 'ongs pa dang/ dge slong rnams de la yang phu par 'dod na ! 'gyod pa sa ma zos pa'i skabs
de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de'i phyir rjes su gnang// mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bu r/ sngar
yongs su btang ba'o snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya sa/ de la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams
N+NaM kyis nub phyogs kyi tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas/ de rnams kyis las mas ra/ 'di dag ni rnyed dka' ba yin pas/ 'phags pa rnams la dbul lo zhes// de dag gis
dag slong rnams zas zos nas snang ba byas pa rnams la de dag byin pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas zin no zhes 'gyod pas ma zos ba dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams
kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tsha ba com ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams la yon gnas brgyad pa las/ de na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas/ khyed
rnams kyang da ni yon gnas su gyur pa lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhos ni/ cibadag cagag dge ba'i shul brgyags dang bral to/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pa rol tu mchi bar bgyi 'am// de
lta bsan thugs brtse bas bzhes shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// de'i phyi'i rjes su gnang ste/ red dka'
ba yin no snyam bsams nas bza' bar bya sta/ de la 'gyod bar mi bya'o// de la tshul na med pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di dag yin te/ rgun 'brum dang/ bal po so'u dang/ 'brug go dang/ star rgya
dang yon tshadang/ shing tog u ra ma na dang/ shang tog ku ru ma yika dang/ shing tog ni ke tse dang/ shing tog ba b+hu dang/ shang tog sin tsi ka'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod
na'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ dag slonganams zas zos zin pa dang/ chu nas skyes pa dag phulab dang/ dge slong rnams 'dod kyang spang ba byas zin to zhes 'gyod pas ma
zos pa'i skabs de dag slong rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnyed dka' ba A na no snyam du bsams nas bza'
bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la chu nas skyes pa ni 'di dag yin te/ ut+pa la'i rtsa ba dang/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang/ ku mu da'i sa bon dang/ pad+ma'i sa bonano// gleng gzhi ni mnyan
tshod na'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khams ma snyoms pas khrag dang bad kun 'khrugs par gyur to// de'i rim gro byed pa tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa// bdag rang gi gros

ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lanamang du 'am go byas kyi/ lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma drisakyi/ mo la bdagagis dri'o snyam nas/ des sman pa la dris pa 1 bzhin bzangs tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
khrag dang bad kun 'khrugs par gyuran/do'i sman ston cig/ des sas pa/ 'phags pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'om stsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams dang/
gal te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa ngogA ri'i bu la/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba pAl po'i 'o mas ma gro bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam du bsams nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa sa mnyan yod nas/
mi snang bar gyur te/ dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi gnas dang nye bar gyur pa dang/
0 de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis mthong nas smras pa// 'phags pa dgos pa ci zhig gi bu re byon/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs nas/ dre la snyan par/

kha rtsa'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma bstan to// klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na re zhig gzhese shig/ de dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas/ mi'i tshod tsam gyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba
dag bton cing bton cing/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i skyo rar gzur nas/ tshadang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang ngo// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gi bu chen pos
bad+ma'i rtsa ba gagashegs pa la blta bar brtsams ba dang/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis sbas pa/ 'phags pa ci gzigasaM/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag gsol bar bzhed dam/ de cang mi smra bar
'dug pa dang/ sas ba/ 'phags pa bzhud cig dang bskur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen ngo sa/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mas lcang bzed bkang ba khyer nas dal gyis 'bab

kyi 'gram nas ma snang bar byas te/ mnyan yodakyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyir to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab ri'i bus sman pas bstan pa bzhin pa'i rtsa

ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas sos par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis kyang glang po che nag po'i cha byad 'chang la pad+ma'i rtsa ba khur gcig bskur nas/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du songal//
gtsug lag khang gi khyams kyi mdun du zhog la shog cig/ de rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa'i mthus/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du 'od

nas: pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams khyams kyi mdun du bzhag nas/ slar logapayas lam gyi khyad na tshalagyi ba glang mo zhig yod pa dang lhan cig 'dusang da gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na ba grang mo de la sa ba grang phrug
gu gcig 'brangs te 3 'brungs pa'i mod la sang ge'i sgra 'byin no// de nas ba glang mo de skyag pa sa gcin chug ga tor nas/ baglang phug gu bor tu bros so// de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i
shang mkhan zhigegang gi ched du tshal du song ba las/ ba glang phrug gu de mthong nas/ khyim du blangs to/ pasnyan gsos bskyed de/ nor gyis bskyangs pas/ ming nor skyong nor skyong zhes bya
bar grags so// kha cig ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 3 rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nor skyong skyas su bskur ba las/ domanyan yod kyi yul na gnas pa la// skye bos nor gyis bskyangs
pas na/ nor skyong zhes 'don no// pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos zos/ khacig ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kha cig ni dge 'dun la brames pa las 'on kyang
lhag par gyur to// nga nas dge slong rnams kyis sang ba byas nas kyang za 'dod na/ bdag cag gis spang ba byas so zhes ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' bas/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ngo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' ba
yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe grong khyer bzang byed na bsod nams chen por shes par bya ba
drug gnas te/ khyim bdag lug ces bya ba dang/ lug gi chung ma dang/ lug gi bu dang/ lug gi mna' ma dang/ lug gi bran po dang/ lug gi bran mo'o// khyim bdag lug gsod
nams che bar ji ltar shes she na/ gal tobang mdzod stong pa rnams la bltas nas/ mthong ma thag kho nar gang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes so//
lug gi chung ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du sbyor du btses pa ni/ brgya stong gi bzung ba 'byung// lug gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi bu ji lta bu zhe na/ de'i skud pa
la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug la/ das gang gi tsho brgya 'am stong yongs su btang ba de'i tshe/ de bzhin du gang bar 'dug ste/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ lug gi bu ni de lta
bu yin no// lug gi mna' ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du dri sbyar na/ brgya stong khyad par 'gyur te/ lugagi mna' ma ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi bran tho ji lta bu zhe na/ des gang
gitsha zhing la rol gcig rmos pa de'i tshe/ zhing la rol bdun rmos par 'gyur te/ lug gi bra na pho ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi bran mo ji ltar nu bsod nams che bar shes
she na/ de gang gi tsho gang tsam drug kha da'i tshe/ bdun tsam du skyes par 'gyur te/ do ltar na lug gi bran mo bsod nams chu ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi gdul
ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bka' stsal ra/ kun dga' bo sengal/ dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ljongs rgyu zhing/ grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/

khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing/ grong khyer bzang bod du 'dod par spro ba de dag ni chos gos rnams 'dong zhig cis sgo zhig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal/

zhes: tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis// khyed

cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing/ grong khyer bzong byed du 'dong bar snga ba de gzhis gos rnams long zhig/ tshodang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnam
kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyanano// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba/ 'kho re zhi ba/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ljongs rgyu zhing/ grong khyer bzang byed
[/ ]du ba/ shegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du mo ba shul chenapo bstan pa de'i tsha/ mu stags can rnams mtha' 'khob tu dong ba las/ de nas ba cig grong khyer bzang byed du dong
nas gnas pa de rnams kyis/ dge sbyong go'u tu a 'ong ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang red red par gyur nas/ bdag cag ston ni ge sbyong go'u ta mas yul dbus nas phyugs so// de gal
'dir 'ongs na gdon mi za bar bdag cag 'dinas sprugs par 'gyur byis/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo/ trAd rnams rigs kyi khyim dag tu dong nas sas pa chos thob par gyur
cig chos thob par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dag de tsalags/ shos ldan dag bltas zin gyis/ 'gro 'o// ci'i slad du re zhig khyed cag gi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni kho bo cag gis mthong gis/
drisod rgyud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'dong ngo// 'phags pa dag bdag cag la rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma spu gri'i sAr ba 'bebs shing/ du ma
zhig bu mod po dang/ khyim thab med par byed cing khong ngo// 'phags pa dag gal te de lta na gang gi dus kho nar gzhes par bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang laMr bgyi 'am/ bzhugs shig/
ma ba zhud cig/ do rnams kyis smras pa/ ! bdag cag ci ste 'dug/ khyed cag kho bo cag gi nyan du mi btub bo// 'phags pa dag gsungs shage/ mnyan par bgyi'o// de rnams kyis smras pa//
shes ldan dag grong khyar bzad khyed kyi rtsa 'khor gyi skya bo'atshogs thams cad gnas nas phyung la/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du chud cig/ rtswa sngon po rnams ni gangashage/
'dug gnas rnams nishag cig/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni chod cig/ chu rnams ni dug lugs shig/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shag dang/ thams cad
bgyi'o// de nas de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skya bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas bton nas/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du btsud de/ rtsa son po rnams ni bas/ 'dug
gnas rnams ni bshig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni bcad/ chu rnams ni dug blugs so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma
[% ]yin pa byed pa yal bar dor bani bdag gi chum yin te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bsal ba grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogasa' la
mdzad bas/ bla na med pa'i yo shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'adas de 'jigarten thams cad med pa'i yul stong du rgyu zhing gshegs par bya 'am/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
kyi dge 'dunadang thabs gcig tu bde ba la reg par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o snyam nas/ des rlung bgatong ba'i lha'i bu la bso ba/ song la chu dug can rnams skoms shag char pa
'babs pa'i lha'i bu la bso ba/ 'di rnams kyis bsams pa dang/ khyod kyi chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas khong zhige/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi rnams la yang bsgo ba/ khyed kyis grong
khyar bzang spyod kyi nye 'khor du gnas thob cig/ danus rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu sa ni chu dug can rnams bskams so// char pa 'debs pa'i la'i khus ni dar yang chu 'an lag brgyad dang ldan
bas bkang ngo// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang grong khyer bar byed kyi nyi 'khor du gnas ba ta ba nas/ ljongs rnams 'byor zhing rgyas par gyur to// mu stags can rnamA
kyis grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams bas gus nas/ de rnams kyis rtog chen dag ma dgas te/ ljongs rnams ci 'dra ltos shi'o// de rnams dong ba las// lcengs rnams
lhag par lar 'byor zhing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas/ slar 'ongs te gsas ba/ shes ldan dag ljongs rnams 'di lta bu r 'byor zhing rgyas pa ni/ sngon lan 'ga' yang bdag cag gis ma mthong
do mu stags cananAms kyis skyes pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis mthong dam/ re zhig gang zhig sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang sgyur bar byed pa des/ khyad cag sgyur bar mi byed pa
de lta sridi'i skan/ khyed cag gi rnam be thams cad du ba ltas zine ti/ blta ba'i mtha ram byas nas 'gro'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'bags pa dag bzhugs shig/ khyed cig la dge sbyong
[/]@#// go'u tams ci zhig 'gyur mchis// de yang rab tu byung ba lags la/ khyed kyang rab tu byung ba slong zhing 'tsho ba lags na 3 ci des khyed cag gi slong ba bkag par 'gyur snyam
chag/ mu shugs can rnams kyis sa sa pa/ dom zhig bcas te/ gal te khyod cag sus kyang dag sbyong go'u tam la blta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing/ gang zhig 'gro ba de la chad par kar sha pa Najug
cus gcad par khrims 'cha' na 'dug go/ de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrims su bcas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis grong khyar bzong byed du
gshegs nas/ bzad khyed kyi lto gos kyi gnas shig na bzhugs so// de'i sar skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo grong khyer bzad byed du bag mar btang ba der ba'i de la nad dug las/ bcom ldan 'das mun
khung na bzhugs pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'dusangashAkya'i rigs dga' bar mdzad pa/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ni 'di yin te/ gal te 'a di la them
skas ngashig yod nga ra gyur na/ bdag mar me thogs la 'babs pa zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas// them skas zhig la lo// de nas da snyade dga' ba dang/
pa: mgu pa dang/ rab tu dga' bas mar me thogs te them skas las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi no sngar mar ma bzhag nas// zhabs gnyis
pasal mgo bos phyag byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'phag
pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzadade zhes bya ba nas/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod chu khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang/ de la dran re/ nad med par gyur cig ces smos la/ 'di skad ces kyang smos shig/
khyim bdag khyod kyi ched kho nar nga 'dir 'ongs na/ khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bu r bya ba de ci ga rigs sam/ gal te tshogs kyis khrims subaca'
bar byas so zhes smras pa dang/ khyod kyi bu'i skad ba la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des/ gal te brgya 'am stong 'god par gtang na yang gang ba nyid du 'dug cing/ yongs su
zad par mi 'gyur na/ khyod kar sha pa Na drug cu byin nas 'ong mi nus sam zhes sbos shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ bu mo des bcom ldan 'dras kyi ltar mnyan nas chas
ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sus kyang ma tshor ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas ( khyim bdag lug gi gan du song ste phyin pa dang/ smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das
khyod la nad med par gyur cig ces gsung ngo// des smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// khyim bdag la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// khyod kho na'i ched du nga 'dir gshagasan/ khyod sgro bcad nas 'dug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bu r bya ba ci ga rages sam/ des smras pa/ bu mo tshogs kyis khrims
su bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o// gang zhig 'gro na de tshogs kyis kar sha pa Nadrug cu'i da pas gcad do zhes bcas so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi bu'i skadapa' lnga brgyapa'i snod cig btags te 'dug pa des/ gal to brgya 'am stong 'god par gatang na gang ba kho nar 'gyur zhing/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na/ kar sha pa Na/
drugacu byin nas/ khyod 'ong bar mi nus samazhes gsung ngo// des bsams pa/ 'di ni sus kyang mi shes na/ bcom ldan 'das de nithams cad mkhyin ba yin pas 'gro'o snyam nas/ das kar sha pa Na drug
cu sgor bzhag nas/ bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i them skas las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug ga bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang rang bzhin mkhyon nas/ 'phags pa'i
bden pa bzhiso sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ khyim bdag lug gis de khros nas zhes khyab nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i par gong
ma bzhin du'o// des bden ba mtho ngo nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzang byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang/ cig 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs shor bar 'gyur ba lags sam/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// khyim bdag khyod las brten nas phal cher kun gyis thub ba kho nar 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman snga nas song sku/ de khyim du phyin nas grong khyer gyi nang du kar sha pa Na'i phung po bcer te/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa// gang zhig rgyal ba
'dod chags skyon bcom rtsod mad pa// mtshungs pa med ba gas kyi mdog can blta 'dod pa// de ni 'jigs mad snying bas shin tu ngas byos la// myur du dngas shig de ya nor ni kho bos
gzhal// skya bo'i tshogs kyis sbas pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur rim/ des sas pa/ dge bar 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis slas pa// gal te de lta na tshogs
kho nas khrims su bcad pa tshogs kho nas shig tu zad so da/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ do rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa bshig nas 'byung bar brtsams so// de nas phan tshun sdos
pas 'byung bar ma nus pa dang/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes 'dus pa'i skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phangs pas rab dral nas/ srogachags brgya stong phrag du ma kha cig
sku niya mtshan skyes/ kha cigani sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo// de nas skya bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pas ! bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dpag tshad gcig tshun chad
'khor bar 'dug go/ de nas bcos ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan te/ dag slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas// semasacan du ma dag
gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyor par byed pa'i tshes bshad pa mdzad de/ de nas kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang/
bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/// 'dul ba gzhi/
bam po nga brgyad pa// bcom ldan 'das
b+h+yA kyi yun ring zhig tu chos bshad pas/ gdugs tshod kyi dus las yol bar gyur to// khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/
mar dang/ bu ram dang/ hrags dang/ sha kha ra dang/ btung ba dag go/ de nas khyim bdag lug gis gson mkhan dag bkug ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams
myur du sta gon gyis shig/ de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams sta gon byas so// de nas khyim bdag lug gis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin pa'i bca'
ba dang/ dus ma yin pa'i btung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams la so sor bkod/ ri 'or na gnas pa'i skya bo'i/
tshogs de yang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du btul te gshegs pa na/ khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shul gyi snyan brgyags kyi 'od kar sha pa Na ngagabazhes shig/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kar sha pa Na blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma shes nas//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rung ba byed pas so// rung ba byed pa mad nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gyis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/
tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa 3 btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasakyis dge tshul gyis bslab pa'i gzhi bcu par gser dngul ma len pa gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyis
blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyabar 'khor ngas 'chang bar byed pa las dgongs te gsungasakyi/ mi blang
ba ni ma yin te/ de bas na dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'i/ blangs nas bdag gir ni mi bya'o// khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bu ram dag bzhes shog/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim ba 'ag/ dge tshul mdan
dge slong gis zhag bdun par byin gyis bslangs nas/ rang nyid kyis 'khur bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya bar ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal ba/ lag pa gnyis bkrus nas sbyin len byas te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i stang du ngazhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/ dge slong zhig gi mdun du 'dug nas/
tsho dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes ba'i sman 'di bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir/ zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab po zhes/ de skad lan gnyis lan
gsum du brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ ! btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bu ram zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes
gang gsungs ba su zhig gis 'tshal bar bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/ lam du zhugs pa dang/ sbyang ba byas pa dang/ nad pa dang/ drag shos dang lag gi gras
so// dge slong ljongs rgyurachas pa rnams kyis 'bras dang phya dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las/ lam gyis dal nas ba za' bar 'dod nas/ 'gyed pas chu zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams
kyis: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag das zas kyi bya ba byed ma nus pas/ 'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de sbrags
nas bza' bar bya'o// phya rnams gang yin pa de chus bkrus nas bza' bar bya// kha cig zhu bar gyur pa de bkrur ma rung zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ snyug ma'i tshal pas bzhar la chus bkruba'abya'o// 'on kyang zas med par bkru ma nus nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par bsal te/ chu'i
nang du mnyes la btung bar byas nas/ da tshags kyis btsags la bzung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams ze tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad
gcod pa sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag lug dang/ lug ga mchis brang dang/ lug gi bu dang/ lug gi mna' ma dang/ lug gi bran
sogs dang/ lugs ldan tshos las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na de drug bsod nams chen por gyur cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong nas//
'a de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyisakyi/ ma mnyes par ni nam lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyan las rnam
byas shing bsags pa tshogs rid pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma pazhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA rA NA si'i grong khyer du//
rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ de'i tshe wa rA NA si'i grong khyer du ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab pa// thur mas 'tsho ba'i mu ge
chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung pa stan to// mu ge rnam pa gsum ni khra ma tog dang/ rus gong dkar po dang/ thur nas 'tsho ba'o// de la za ma tog ces bya pa ni/ za ma tog
de'i nang du mi rnams kyisi 'bru dag blugs te/ ma 'ongs pa'i sams can rnams kyi ched du bzhag nas/ bdag cab shin 'bru 'dis mi de dag gi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro snyam pa sku 1 'din
ma tog dang 'brel bas zam tog ces bya'o// rus gong dkar po gang zhe na/ dus de nami rnams kyis rus pa dag bsdus nas re zhig btsos te/ jitsam na sab de dag dkar po gyur pa dang/ de nas de'i/
khu ba 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni rus gong dkar po dang 'brel bas rus gong dkar po zhes bya'o// thur mas 'tsho ba gang zhen/ dus de na mi rnams kyis g.yul kyi sar ga nas/ 'khru'i 'dzum bu dag thur/
mas brus nas/ chumang po'i snod du btsos nas byung ba ste/ 'di na thur ma dang 'brel bas thur mas 'tsho ba zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis wArA Na sir dril sgrogs su bcug pa
wArA NA si na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer pa dag nyon cig/ ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab pas 3 za ma tog dang/ rus gongadakar bo dang/ thur mas 'tsho ba'i chu ge
'byung bar lung bstan gyis/ khyad las gang dag la bcu gnyis kyi bza' kha yod pa de rnams ni 'khod cig/ gang dag la med pa de dga'i gar dga' bar dong la/ mu ge med cing lo legs par
gyur nas slar shog cig/ de'i tshe na wArA Na sa na khyim bdag phyug pa 3 nor mang ba/ longs spyod che nga/ 'khor yangs shing rgya che ba zhig yod de/ des mngan bkug ste smras pa/
kyi nang rje kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba lo dra dam/ des smras pa// dpon po mchis so// de de nyid na gnas pa las/ mu ge de lo brgyud ma kho nar byung bas/ de'i
bang mdzod rnams yongs su zad pas/ 'khor gyis bo thams cad shabar gyur te/ bdag nyid dang drug cig lus so// de nas khyim bdag des bang mdzod rnams phyog pa las/ 'bras tre'u chung
gang zhig byung nas/ de chung mas snod du blugs te btsos so// sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba mad pa na 3 rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas
gci'i ga pu dag 'jig rten du byung bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba'i par gongam bzhin du'o// rdzi tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang/ wArA Na sir phyin nas/ snga dro sham thabs
bgos/ lhung bzing dang chos gos thogs te/ wArANA sir bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/ khyim bdag des kyang bza' bar bsdogs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas de Ang rims
bzhin du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/ de'i khyim du phyin to// khyim bdag des de lus mdzes shing sams dang ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bsams pa// 'di bdag gis thos kyang
gdon mi za bar srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gi skal ba rab tu byung ba 'di la sbyin no snyam nas/ des chung ma la gas nga/ bzang mo kho bo'i skal ba ni rab tu byung ba 'di la
dbul lo// des bsams pa/ bdagagi khyim thab mi za na/ bdag gis ci na bza'o snyam nas/ des snyas pa/ rdzo'i sras bdag gi skal ba yang 'di la dngul go/ de bzhin
du bu dang/ mna' ma dang/ bran po dang/ bran mos kyang dpyad nas rang rang gi skal ba longs su btang ste/ de nas de thams cad 'dus nas/ rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms yul go/
0 bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston byas/ tshig gis ni ma yin pas/ des dad pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ 'bar ba dang/
gsal ba dang/ char 'bebs pa dang/ glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skye bo dag ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sams gtod pa ne pas/ shing rtsa nas bcad de
'gyel ba bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/ smon lam ci 'dod par gdab par rtsom ste/ khyim bdag gis smon lam btapaM pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la
bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang mun pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te bang ba dang/ bang mdzod stong ba dag la bltas pa na/ mthong ba de'i mod la gang bar gyur cig/ 'di lta bu'i
chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing/ mi mnyes sngar ma bgyid par gyur cig/ chung mas smon lam btab pa/
bdag gis lon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te gcig gi don du stsod du bcos pa de brgya 'am stong gis zos kyang 1 ji
srid bdag gis sbyor ba ma btang ba'i bar du yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing/ 'di lta ba'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid/
cing 3 ma mnyes par mi bgyidabar gyuracig/ bus smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis
bdag gsaskadapa la lnga brgyaba' snod btags te 'dug pa/ gal te brgya 'am stong 'god par btang yang gang ba nyid du 'dug ste/ longs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing/ 'di lta bu'i chos rnams
kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'bags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing/ mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ mna' mas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yonaganas
dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas par dag ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis// bdag gis gal te gcig gi phyir dri rnams sbyar na/ des brgya 'am stod byugs kyang khri srad sbyor ba ma gtang gi bar du zad
bar mi 'gyur zhing/ 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'dabs khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing/ misaMnyes par mi bgyid par gyuracig/ dran pos
smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas a pa 'di ltadu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dus/ bdag gis gal te zhing rol gcig rmosan rol bdun chos par 'gyur zhing/
'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing/ mi mnyis par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ bran mos smon lam btab pa/
