0 bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te snod bang tsam drus pa gang yin pa des// snod bdun tsam du 'phel bar
gyur zhing/ 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing/ mi mnyes par ma bgyid par gyur cig/ de rnams kyis
de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ rang sangs rgyus bdag nyid chen po de/ de rnams la snying brtse ba'i nga rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang/ ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs sbyin stong gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi
song ste 'dug pa las// de rdzu 'phrul gyis song ba'i grob ma rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi snying du bab nas/ des gyen du blta bar brtsams pa las/ rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas// de 'di snyam du
bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bshol chen pos yang su zhig gi bkrin po'i drungs phyung bar gyur snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag de re ba chen pos mdzod dang bang mdzod rnams la ba las pa
dang 3 ji tsam na gang bar mthong ngo// des chung ma la smras pa// re zhig kho bo'i smon lam ni rdzogs par gyur gyis/ da khyed cag gi blta'o// de nas dran mos 'bras snod gang tsam dus na/
bdun tsam du 'phel bar gyur to// chung mas gcig gi don du snod du btsos pa la de dag thams cad kyis zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug/ nyi 'khor gyi srog chags brgya stong phrag dums zos
kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug go/ de nas khyim bdag des wA rA NA sir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ gshes ldanu dag khyed cag las su zhig ci don du gnyer ba de shog cig/
wArA NA sir sgra gsal ba dang/ sgra chen por byung ba rgyal pos thos nas/ des smras pa// shes ldan dag sgra gsal ba dang/ sgrachen po 'di ci zhigayin/ blon po rnams kyis sbas pa/
lha khyim bdag che ge mo zhig ces bgyi bas mdzod dang bang ba rnams phyi pa lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi tsho 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tsho/ khyim bdag des mdzod dang/
bang ba rnams khru 'am/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag de khug cig/ de rnams kyis bkug pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gang gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe
khyod kyis mdzod dang bang ba rnams kyi bya 'am/ lhasu'i mdzod dang/ bang pa rnams phyo/ 'on kyang de rang kho nas bon sul ba'i 'bras bu de ring nyid du grub lags so// rgyal pos smras pa// de ji lta
bu zhig/ des skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa// khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag nyid chen po de la bsod snyoms phul lam/ lho bdag gis phul la// de yang lhag par dud
N+NaM par gyur nas/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ kyema'o yen rten las byung ba'i// skyon kun rnam par spangs pa'i zhing// de la sa bon btab pa yis// 'bras bu deng nyid thob par gyur// dge slong
dgu ji snyam du sems// khyim bdag dang/ khyim bdag de chung ma dang/ khyim bdag gi bu dang/ khyim bdag gi mna' ma dang/ khyim bdag gi bran lo dang/ khyim bdag gi bran mo gang yin
ba de ni/ khyim bdag lug dang/ lug gi chung ma dang/ lug gi bu dang/ lug gi mna' ma dang/ lug gubran po dang/ lug gi bran mo 'di dag nyid yin no// 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la khyab
byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par snyid pas drug char yang bsod nams chen por gyur cing/ nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong zhing/ rang sangs rgyas bye ba bskya stong bas
ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa du mnyes par byas kyis/ ma mnyes par ni ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na la gcig tu gnag pa'i rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin
la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi no gcig tu dkar ba yin pas zhesakhyu banas/ brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
sdom ni/ ke na'i bu yis btung ba blangs dkazhi'i tshong rdal nas khrug dang// sdug can du ni bca' ba dang// 'khyod dang sbyar ba'i zas dag go/ bcom ldan
'das yul u du ma'i gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe drang srong ko'u na'i bu gnas pa'i yul u du ma'i gnas na 'dug go/ nyin bar ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram raganas so// bcom ldan 'das
kyis ngagongs pa/ das gang du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams la chos bshad na/ der ngas tshogs chung dus drang srong ka na' bu thul bar 'gyur snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan
'das 'di snyam du dgongs te ma la ngas ljang bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bshad na/ der thul bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/ chos nyid
kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tsho/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems
kyis shes par 'gyur bas/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyod pa mdzad bltas na/ bdag cag 'jig rten
skyong ba bzhi rnams khen la chos bshad par bzhed do snyam du rig nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen la bsgo ba/ ltas rtsin song la// rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bcom ldan 'das
kyi gdan shems te/ 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa na sus kyang de'i mdangs phrogs par mi 'gyur bar drang srong kena'i bu'i srungs mgacig kyang skos shig/ des rdzong khudal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du drang srong

ke na'i bu'i srungs ma bzhag nas gnasashom par rtsom pa na/ den skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i tsi co'i sgra byung ba dang/ donas drang srong ka na'i bu catsa'i sgros langs nas/ srungs ma de la dras pa/ co'i sgra
'dici zhig// des smras pa/ ! gdan shom par byed pa'o// ci kho bo'i phyir ram/ khyod kyi phyir nam ban mod kyi/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir An no// khyod 'din zhig la sdod/ khyod
khon srung ngo// ci'i phyir 'byung po mang po 'du bar 'gyur bas so// des sas pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma de su zhig srung bar byed par 'gyur/ des smras pa// bcom ldan 'das de la su zhig srung/
bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa'i spu ngas ma mdzad do// zhes byas pa dang/ drang srong ka na'i khus thos nas cang mi skya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza'asham
thabs mnabs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas/ u du mar bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ u du mar bsod snyoms sbyad nas/ zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms
su blangs nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thubs gcig tu u du ma nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du byon par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dri za du ma'i 'khor
dang/ dri za brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang/ dri za stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang/ dri ba brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang/ lha'i nor bus thub bkang sta/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i nor bu rnams kyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang
dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas/ shar phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ rgyal bo chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum du ma'i 'khor dang/ grul bum brgya phrag du ma'i lo
dang/ grul bum stong phrag du ma' 'khor dang/ grub bul brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang/ lha'i mu tig gis glu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan bcu
la lha'i mu tig gis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas/ lho phyogs su brten te/

'dug go/ rgyal po chen bo mig mi bzang yang klu du ma'i 'khor dang/ klu brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang/ klu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang/ klu brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang/ lha'i ma tog ut+pa la
dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste byin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i ma tog ut+pa la
ts+tsha dang 3 pad+madang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ man da ra ba rnams kyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge

slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas/ nub phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bus kyang gnod sbyin du ma'i 'khor dang/ gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang 3 gnod sbyin
stong phrag du ma 'a 'khor dang/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang/ lha'i dag dang gsar gyis thub bkang sta 3 bcom ldan 'das gang na deng song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i
dbyage dang gsar gyis gtor nas/ bcos ldan 'dus kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun lamadun gyis bltas nas/ byang phyogs su brten
te 'dug go/ de la dbus pa'i gis ni gnyis yin te/ yul 'khor skyong dang/ 'phags skyes po'o// mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ni gnyas nyi/ mig mi bzang dang/ rnam thos kyi bu'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas dbus pa'i tshigs chos bshad na/ gnyis khe nas shes par 'gyur gyi/ gnyis kyis ni mishes la/ gal te mtha'
'khob pa'i tshig gis bshad na/ gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi/ gnyis kyis ni ma shes ba sa/ ma la ngas gnyis la ni dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do// gnyis la ni mthul
'a khob pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do snyam du dgongs nas/ rgyal bo chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus zhig pa dang/ tshor ba gsil bar gyur pa dang/
'du shes 'gag pa dang/ 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi bar gyur pa dang/ rnam par shes pa nub par gyur pa de nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka'
la pa na/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dang/ de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i dri za brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams lo chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de la khyod kyis mthong ba la mthong ba tsam dang/ thos pa dang/ rtogs pa dang/ rnam par shes pa la//
rnam par shes pa tsam du gyis shag/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal ba na/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyesapa dang/ de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams
la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chan po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa// de ltar na rgyal po chen po// a ni ) ma
ni: dab phya/ da rab le/ 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' an no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang/ de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i klu
brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam rjes kyi bu la bka' stsal pa// de ltar na rgyal
po chen po/ mA ShA tu ShA sang shA mA/ sarba tra bi ra TI/ 'di nyidi sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po rnam shes kyi bu dang/ de dang/
skal ba mnyam pa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma chos la chos kyi mig rdul mad cing dri ma dang bral ba skyas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ da ni bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
pa'i dus la khad kyis nyen/ sul bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'/ gal te lha rnams la na na lha rnams bag med pa la dga' ba mang bas yun rang du gnas par mi 'gyur
ro// 'on te mi rnams lan ni mi ni tshe thung ba yin pas/ de bzhin du yun rang du gnas par mi 'gyur gyi// ma la ngas lha dang/ mi rnams dang 2 dge slong 'od srungs la gtad nas

yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o snyam du dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nga 'i bstan pa shar phyogs nas srung/
ba byes shig/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang lho phyogs nas srung ba byas shog/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang 'baka' stsal pa/ rgyal po

chen po khyod kyis kyang nub phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang byang phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ de nas rgyal bo chen po/
bzhi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag gis bsrung ba bgyi lags so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi spyan snga nas dong ba dang/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la bstan pa mtha' dag gi bya ba rnams gtad nas/ tshe dang ldan ba kun dga' bo la yang bka' stsal nga/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang bstan pa'i don gyi bya
ba la brtson par gyis shig///dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis
las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po chen po bzhir gyur cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon gyi tsha rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid tses bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge

slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu rnams kyi mi lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa zhes bya ba nas/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig

rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po na klu gnyis shig gnas la/ dbugs 'byin dang/ dbugs cher 'byin no// shing shal ma brtsegs pa na ya nga nam mkha' lding
gnyis shig yod pa/ 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang/ gtsug gi dbang phyug go/ gang gi tshe dbugs 'byin dang/ dbugs cher 'byin ba/ nyis la/ de gnyis gnod pa byed pa de'i tshe/ de gnyis
sa'i 'og tu 'gro bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ dbugros 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi sun sngar skyabs su song zhing
bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa dang/ de gnyis la nam mkha' lding gas gnod pa bya bar brtsams pa las/ ri rab la rlung dang chu'i shugs bzhin du chugs nas/ slar log pa dang/ de gnyis kyis/

smras pa// shes ldan dag sngon ni kho bo cag gis khyed cag la gnod pa byas na/ sa'i 'og tu 'gro na/ da gang gsan kho po cag khyod dang phrad nas ri rab la rlung dang chu'i shugs bzhin du rdugs nas phyir

ldeg pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yodra/ dbugs 'byin dang// dbugs cher 'byin gyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi

rnams blangs so// de gnyis kyis smras pa// gal te de lta na bdag cagags kyang blang ngo zhes de gnyis de dag dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar dong nas/
de dag phyin pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan snga nas/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bo dag gis tshes de thes nas/ deng ba de dag de gnyis kyis mthong
nas: nam mkha' lding de gnyis kyis ) klu dbugs 'byin dang/ dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la dris pa// 'gro ba pha gi dag su yin/ da gnyis kyis rgyas par smras pa dang/ nam mkha' lding gnyis kyis smras
pa: gal te de ltar na bdag cag gis kyang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs la smon lam gdab bo zhes/ de gnyis
kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs las skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so// dbugs 'byin dang/ dbugs cher 'byin gnyis ni sngar blangs so//
de nas lhan cig 'dus nas// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'di dag gis/ yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan nas bden pa mthong ste/ rang gi gnas su mchis pa de bzhin du/ bdag cagakyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur

cing 3 bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin
gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das des kyang/ de bzhin du rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bdag
cagal chos bangashad de/ bdag cag gis chos de thos nas bden pa mthong sku/ 'di bzhin du rang gi gnas su mchipar gyuracig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// klu dang nam mkha'

lding bzhi po gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po gang dag yin pa 'di dag nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dbugs 'byin gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin no// dbugs cher 'byin
gang yin pa de ni 'phags skyes po yin no// 'groba'i dbang phyug ni mig ma bzang yin no// gtsug gi dbang phyag ni rnam thes kyi bu yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di dag gis ang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs shing/ smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'a jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing/

pa'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo// chos bshad pa de drang srong ke'u na'i bus thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon pa ra dad par gyur to/ de
nas bcom ldan 'das de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ gang thos nas mod la drang srong ki ma'i bus 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs
nas/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do// de nas de rtogs pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ btung ba brgyad po tsotsa'i btung
ba dang 3 chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang/ rgyu shug gi bskyung ba dang/ a shA tha'i partung ba dang/ u dum wa ra'i btung ba dang/ rtsub 'gyur gyi btsung ba dang/ 'bra go'i btung ba dang/ rgyun
gyi btung ba khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa btung bo brgyad po 'di dag ni sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyis bstod/
cing bsngags pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ka na'i bu la thugs brtse bar nye bar dgongs nas// brtung ba brgyad/
bo dag bzhes so// bzhes nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su sbyin len byas/ dus su mnyes/ dus su btsags/ dus su byin gyis
kharlabs na/ dus su longs spyad par bya zhing/ dus ma yin par yang longs spyad par bya la/ nam gyi thun dang po sbal nas na longs spyad par ma bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len
byas la/ dus ma yin par mnyos 3 dus ma yin par btsags/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa na/ longs spyad par mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin lon byas/
0dus su mnyes la/ dus ma yin par btsags/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni longs spyod par mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus ma yin par spyin len byas/ dus ma yin/
par mnyis/ dus ma yin par btsags pa ni/ zas kyi 'og tu yang longs spyad par mi bya la/ nam kyi cha stod 'das na yang longs spyad par mi bya'o// de nas drang srong ka na'i bu stan las langs
taM bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sung bdag gis gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis nuganang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ka na'i bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de
nas drang srong ka na'i bu bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar ragi nas/ stan las langs te song ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyang rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas ma snang bar mdzad de/ dge
slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu u du mar gshegs so// de nas drang srong ka na'i khunam ma langs par u0f8bsa nas 3 nang mi rnams la sbas pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhengs shig/ bzhin bzang
dag longs shig/ shing dag gshogs shig/ ma bus shagi/ zhal zas dag gral par gyis shig/ bkad sa dag byi dor gyis shig/ de'i tshe drang srong ka na'i bu sring mo'i bu drang srong ri bo zhes bya bas
da nyad du ba mo gnas btab pa las/ drang srong ri bos drang srong ka na'i bu nam ma langs par langs nas nang mi rnams la stsa ba thos so// thes nas kyang drang srong ku na'i bu la
'di skad ces so// drang srong ci khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mgron du bos sam/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'a ma tho brang 'khor naganas pa'i spyi bo'i
tshogs sam/ drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs sam/ des sas pa// ri bi lo'i na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mgron du bos pa mung ma yin/ ulam ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo

sbyangs gzugs can snying ba yang ma yin/ pho brang 'khor naganas paskya bo'i tshogs kyang ma yin/ drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod po yongs su rdzogs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas
la sogs pa dge slong gdage 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// des sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas/ ba spu thams cadra zing zhes byed nas/ gus padang bcas pas dris pa//

drang srong sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ ri bo dge sbyong go'u ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las sku dpakha su bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim

med par rab tu byung nas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod do/ ri bo sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni de yin no// ri bos smras pa/ drang srong dge 'dun zhes/
bya ba de ci zhig yin/ drang srong ka ma'i bus sas pa/ ri bo rgyal rigs kyi rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang sku dang kha spu bregs nas gos dur sag bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
med par rab tu byung ba yang yod/ bram ze'i rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs rigs kyi bu rnams lasaM kyang zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegapa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu byung ba de nyad kyi rjes su rab tu byung ba yod de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du/ ri bo 'di ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o// ri bo dge 'dun 'di dang sngar smos pa'isangs/
rgyus te 3 sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di kho bos gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// de nas drang srong ra bes sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas nang par sngar langs te/
'khor lnga ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong sa phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig/
tu 'dug nas/ drang srong ri bos 3 bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu byung ba dang/ bsu na par rdzogs/
par dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o// drang srong ri bo dang 'khor lnga brgyas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu
byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/// 'dul ba gzhi///bam po nga dgu pa//
de nas drang srong ke na'i bus de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rag ces bya ba nas/ bas bas shing ches bar byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
du'o/des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol ba na/ ri bo rab tu byung ba mthong nas 3 nas sbas pa/ ri bo khyed rab tu byung dam/ rab tu byung ngo//
legs par byas so// shin tu legs par byas so// kho tshe yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshodagasol zin nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo// de nas drang srong kon
dus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi dag 'dun la rnam grangs du ma ra gtsang zhing bsod ba'i badra' ba dang bca' ba dag/ rang gi lag nas bskyabs shing tshim par byas so// bcom ldan
'das kyis gsol zin nas 3 phyag bcabs te lhung bzod rgyu bar rig nas/ snyan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jug go de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de
la onabasngo ba dang/ chos bshad pa mdzad nasaM gshegs so// de nas drang srong ke na'i bus rgyu lhag de dag thams cad btang ba'i tshes byas nas/ 'khor lnga brgya dang/ bcom ldan 'das gangan
ba der dong ste phyin ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ drang srong ke ma'i bus/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos bo thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi

spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o// drang srong ke ma'i bus 'khor lnga brgya dang/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob
par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'dras rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong stong pa de dang/ 'bab chu rab tu bzang mo'i 'grim du a ma'i tshal gdugs lta bu r dbyar gnas par zhal gyis

bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram bri ka pha na la dge slong lnga brgya gtad do// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
nyis brgyalnga bcu gtad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pr-inas gdams ngag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sangs te/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//

tshadang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'a gang dag yin pa de dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// skadage
slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa bcos ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni shes rab

chab rnams dang/ modang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni mthu che ba dang rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags na 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa khrom zi ka pa nas gdams ngag thog pa gang lags
pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag lags pa de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu'i gang dag lags la de dag ni rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de ltar dum zad/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ka wi na'i gdams ngag
phag pa gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs med pa'i khams la rab tu bkod/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams dang/ shAri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni

mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas shig na drang srong gnyasi shagi gnas ti 3 so sor 'khor lnga brtse lnga brgya yod do// ji tsam dus gzhan
zhig na de gnyis las gcig nas/ de'i bram ze'i khye'u rnams bla ma dpobral ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ yid mi bdebs gdungs nas phan tshun 'khyan 'khyan nas/ drang srong cig shos de'i drung
du 'ongs pa dang/ des de rnams mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas dris ba/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyi mkhan po de gar song/ gum mo// des bsams pa'o bdag 'das na bram ze'i khye'u
rnams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di dag bsdu bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de rnams dbyags phyung ste bsdus so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de yang
nad kyis thebs par gyur nas/ de'i slob ma mchog gsum bkod pa la/ des gcig la lnga brkya/ gnyis pa lan nyis brgya lnga bcu ! gsum pa la ni nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do// de ni 'chi
ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to// de la lnga brgya gtad pa gang yin pa des ni ji ltar gzugs med pa'i khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go/ nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad pa gang yin pa desani/
ji ltar gzugs kyi khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go/ nyis brgya lnga bcu phog pacig shes kyis ni ji ltar mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog ge/ dge slong/

dag ji snyam du sams/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya gzugs med pa'i khams la 'god pa gang yin pa de na dge slong ka we na 'di nyid yin no// nyis brgya lnga bcu gzugs kyi

khams la rab tu 'god pa gang yin pa ni dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di de yin no/ cig shos kyis nyes brgya lnga bcu mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong hA ri'i bu 'di nyid
yin no// 'on kyang dge slong kA nas gdams ngag khog pa gang lan pa de dag ni dbang po rnon po yin no// mo'u 'gal gyi bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni dbang po 'bring po yin/
no/ shA ri'i bu'i gang yinakha de dag ni dbang bo rtul bo yin no// gal te shA ri'i bus gdams ngag ma thog par gyur na/ de dag gis dro bar gyur pa yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// ke A'i bu ni
ral pa can// ji ltar sangs rgyas khasngags brjod pa// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// thams cad mthun par mnyan par gyis// kana'i bu la khyim du ni// dusaM gcig cig ni ston pa
bo// dpa' chen nyan thos thabs gcig tu// gdugs tshod la na spyan drangs so// ke na'i bu la khyim du ni// zas kyi zhal ta byed pa dag/ bram ze ri bos mthong gyur te// mthong
nas kenu'i bu la dris// bag ma len nam 'on te ci/ rgyal po yul 'khor mgron pos sam// khyod kyi mchod sbyin gyi dus sam// dris pa de ni bdag la smos// bdag na bag ma ma
len la// rgyal bo 'am yul 'khor mgron ma bos// bdag gis sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog/ gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs so// ri bos sangs rgyas sgra shes nas/ yid skyo ba ni
slas gyur te// sangs rgyas de ci ka na'i bu// dris pa de na bdag la sos// kya'i ragis las skyes pa la// ston pa gang zag zla chod yod// de ni chos kun blo ldan pas// de bas sangs
rgyas zhes bya'o// 'dus byas 'jig pa 'gyur ba'i chos// 'das pa sangs rgyas kyis gzigs la/// de bzhin ma 'ongs pa gzigs shing// de ltar byung ba rnams kyang gazigs// mngon
shes bya ba ji snyed pa// de kun rtogs pas thams cad rig/ thams cad mkhyin tsang thams cad gzigs// dbas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// mngon nga ro shes bya mngon shes byas// bsgom
parabya ba rnams kyang bsgoms// spang bar bya rnams sbyangs pas na// de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// gang zhig bltam par gyur pa na// rgya mtsho ra pir bcas pa yi// sa 'di rab tu g.yo
mdzad pa// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis bdud dang nag po yi// rtsa lag zhon bcas bcom nas ni// de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs thob pa// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo//
wArA NA si'i grong bzhud nas// grang gas rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo de bskor ba// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// gang ga'i 'dod chags bcing bas bcings// 'dod
chags zhe sdang gis gdugs pa'i// sems can mang po grol mdzad pa// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhig/ rnam 'dren de ni ji srid na// shAkya'i sras
po 'od mdzad la// de ring nyid nas skyabs su 'gro// tshal stug yod du 'ong ba de// gang na bar na bram ze'i chos// driza'i rgyal po lta bu yi// sangs rgyas bla med mthong bar gyur// na bza'
ngur sbag 'od ldan de/ gser 'od nyi ma'i 'od gzer can// de bzhin gsar ni btso ma yi// gser las gzugs ni byas pa bzhin// sa la shing gi ma tog dang// ka zhi
ka ra'i mi ga 'dra// rin chen sna tshogs spras pa yi// rin chen mchod sdong ji bzhin no// n+ya gro d+ha shing lta bu r ni// chu zheng gab par gyur pa dang// khor yug 'dom gang 'od kyis ni// kun
nas snang ba ngag tu mdzad// rgyal srid sa dang nye dur bcas// 'dod pa kun dga' spangs nas ni// rab tu byung bar mngon byung ba'i// thub pa dben pa rnams la dbyas/ sos dad ldang ba'i
sang ge ni// nags su 'jigs pa med pa ltar// seng ge lta bu r bsnyangs med gsung// bram ze sangs rgyas mkho nga bar 'gyur// zhal 'dzun 'jam nga 'i gsung dang ni/ tshangs pa'i gsung dang
snyan pa'i gsung// rje yi sgra yi gsung lta bu'i// sangs rgyas bram zo mthong bar 'gyur// zla ba dag pa nam mkha' la// rgyu skor rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi//
sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// nyi ma'i 'od gzer dang ldan pa// nam mkha'i ngos la mdzes pa lta'i// sangs rgyas kun dang bral gyur cing// mdzes par bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar khyu

ba'i khyumchog ni// nog dang ldan po'agalog gnas ldan// smyos bu khyu mchog stobs bcu ldan// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho dag ni gting zab pa'i/ chutshan tshad gzung med pa lta'i/
0 sangs rgyas bsam gtan pa yi mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab bla med mthong// nag po'i phyogs las nges byung ba'i// nyam mkha' la gsal ba dang// ma yi phung po 'bar ba lta'i// go'u ta ma sad/
rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'khor los sgyur rgyal po// zham ring byedapa' yongs bskor ltar// de bzhin sngogos pa'i sa sa rgyas ni// dgra bcom rnams kyis mdun byas mdzes// 'dod pa rnams
la dbang sgyur dang// jiltaratshoras chen dbang phyug ltar// stong gsum kyi ni 'jig rten khams/ thug pa dbang ni sgyur bar mdzad// gang blos nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing// sdug bsngal mtsho chen las
sgrol ba// sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang// sdug bsngal kun 'byung gang yin dang// sdug bsngal nyobar zhi ba dang
lam ni yan lag bzhi tshan gnyis// srung rtsis bskol ro lta bu'i// bden pa
dag ni rab tu 'tshed// nor mad rnams la nor sbyin zhing// nad pa rnams kyi dpyad kyang mdzad// gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs gyur pas// skye dgu sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad// mun par gyurar 'a sam
can dang// blun po lam gol rtsub la// bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i// laman drung po rab tu nyon// 'dod chags zhe sdang kun M 'bar bzhin// gti mug rab 'bar skye dgu rnams // ji ltar sprin chen
rnyed dang ma rnyed bde sdug dang// snyadapa dang ni bstod pa dang// grags pa dang ni ma grags pa// chu yis pad+ma bzhin ma gos// srog gcod pa ni rnam spangs te// mkhyen pa la
dga' ma byed// bden pa gsung zhing tshangs par spyod// de ni phra ma spangs pa yin// tshig rtsub dag ni mi gsungazhing// dus su bab par 'jam po gsung// den 'dod la brnab sems med// skya bo
rnams la de sams byams// yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs// ting nge 'dzin stobs stod yul ba// bsam gtan chen po mngon shes drug/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la gshegs// lcad ng mi
yi sgra dag ni// gang mni chags pa sna tshogs gsan// nyon mongasacan nam dge yang rung// pha rol gyi ni sams kyang mkhyen// gang dang gang du sngon gnaswa pa// sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa dang//

sams can 'gro dang 'ong ba yi// 'chi 'pho dang ni skya ba mkhyen// zag pa zad cing mi ldan pas// nyer zhi shin tu mya ngan 'das/[u0f10]dbang po zhi zhing thugs zhi ba// mtshon gang ba zhig tu gnas/// pad+ma'i
rdzong na glang po che// dam pa drug cu lon pa ltar// mthong na ngoms na mi shes pas/ bram ze dga' ba thob ra ra 'gyur// ri bo bcom ldan 'di 'dras// de yi sku ni skyes chen gyi// sum cu rtsa gnyis
mtshan mnga' zhing// gzi brjid me yi phung po bzhin// gang gis lo brgyatshang bar ni// skyob pa'i bsngags pa brjod byas kyang// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pas// des ni mthar phyin mi 'gyur ro//
[j]bram ze gang gi de mthong nga// da e red pa bla namad// gang gis mthong nas skyabs song ba// de yi rnyed pa depas 'phags// bram ze ri bo khrub chen gyi// bstags pa thos nas skyo bar gyur// dben
ba'i sems kyi rtog pa yAs// ka na'i bu la 'di skad smras// mi gyur pa la bdag gis ni// de 'dra'i grags pa thos ma myong// ken 'chad pa dang sbyar nA// da ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso// tshong ba nor dag
don gnyer ltar// khyed kyis nga rgyal rgyal mtshanasdongs// de la bkur sti gus byos dang// bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya yis// slob ma dag gis mdun bdar te// sangs

rgyas bzhugs pa bzang po der// khram ze ri bo stong bar gyur// lha rnams kyi na dga' tshol ltar// ma tog shing ni phun sum tshogs// rnam par dben zhing sgra med cing// bya yi tshogs kyis bstan gyur pa/
mi min gdug pa med rgyu ba// shAkya'i sras kyis bstan ba yis// chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas su ni// de nas bram zes zhugs par gyur// ma dul 'dul ba kha la sbyar// skyes bu dam pamathong nas/
nA ri bo yas ni tshig gsol pa// shes ldan cig snyan mi mnga' 'am// kal bde ka'i sgra dbyangs can// sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'abakAs// ri bo le ni slar gsungs pa// ngal nad ni

yid min te// nyes pa med cing sgrib pa med// the tsem thams cad rnam par bcad// rnam par grol zhing mi ldan pa// nga ni zag med tha ba med// 'jig rten nani rdul med rgyu// gtsang zhing dag la dri nga med//
des na bram ze dgatsang sbya// khon dang 'jigs pa kun las rgyal// ri bo khyod kyang 'ongs pa legs3/ bstan 'di la ni legs par 'dug/ bram ze cig bde 'am khyod// lus
ni ngal bar ma gyur mod// dpa' bo chen po khyod mthong bas// thub pa chen po ltar bde// rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa ltar/ yid rab tu dga' ba las// de dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i gtam//
rim pa bzhin du byas nas ni// de na bram ze 'dzem pa dang// dman pa'i yid kyis 'dug bar gyur// klog pa dang ni gsang tshig 'dzin// ga byed gsum gyi ragi mthar phyir// bram ze ri bo 'dug
nas ni// thub pa'i mtshan la rtog par byed// 'jig rten gyi ni mgon pos// sku la mtshanani sum cu mthong// ljags srab 'a dom sba sbubs nub pa// gnyis la ri bo tsom za// thub pa chen po'i
mtshan rnams la/ the tshom yid gnyis gyur nas ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rigs// bden pa'i mtshan ma yo ngas zhus pa// thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa
gang// go'u tam khyod kyi sku dag la// gnyis ni g.yar sngar ma bag ngo/// mi yi dam pa 'doms kyi ni// sba ba sbubs su nub lags sam// lcags bzang zhes ni bgyi ba yang// ci ga thung ba na lag
ni grang thub chen ba dag gis ci nas kyang// ljags ring globar rgud 'gyur bar// ljags srab myur du ba rkyang mdzod de// bdag ba khri tshom bsal du gsol// rnam par 'dren rnams 'jig rten du//
brgya lam na na lan 'ga' 'byung// u dum wa ra'i me tog pa zhin// thub pa chen po dkonapa lags// sos ka skom ba chang dang ni// bkres pa la ni ga lar zas dang// nad pa snyan la ji lta bar//
ston pa la ni bkur ste bkyed// ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs can// sangs rgyas snyan tsang gsal ba'i bkas// ri bo la ni sar gsungs pa// khram ze the tsom snang bar gyis// lcags kyis sun dang
sAn dag ni// rab tu khebs par lcags rang gsi// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khe bas par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul bzhi la mkhas pa a ke/ rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang bstan mdzad pas// thub pa'i 'doms sba sbubs
nub pa// bram ze ri bos mthong bar gyur// thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams la// the tsom med cing zug chuphyung// sems kyi rtog pa ba dag nas// ri ba yis ni tshig gsol pa// sum cu gnyis dang
dbo bya da rnams // bdag gis bsang tshogi las thos pa// de kun khyer kyi sku 'dil// yongs su rdzogs te ma tshong med// dge dang ldan bas spyod pa bzang// legs par 'khrungs pas blta na sdug/
nyan thos dge 'dun dbyas na ni/ gdugs bdalab ni lta bu r mdzes// dam par bsngags pa khyod la ni// dge sbyong dngos po ci zhig bgyi// mi yi khyu mchog khyod lta bu / (dbud gi yan lag bzhi
dag dang// rin chen bdun dang ldan pa las/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'os// sa bdag rgyal bo mdzad nas ni// sa stong 'khor los sgyur pa mdzod// ri bo pan rgyal po ste// chos kyis
rgyal chen bla na med// ngan sa ya dkyil 'khor 'di'i// chos kyi 'khor lo ster bar byed// nga yi rigs ni rgyal rigs te// nga na dge ba'i rigs las 'khrungs// bdud dpung/
bcas par bcos nas ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa thob// bram ze nga'i dran 'khor la sa// nga yi shes rab blon po yin// brtson 'grus shugs mgyogs rta pho ni// btang na dang la
'byung ba yin// nga yi nor bu dam pa ni// ting 'dzin mun pa gsal byed yin// btang snyoms glang chen dam pa ste// bsgul na dang la rgyug pa yin// chags bcas bud med 'dod pa ltar/ 'bras
ze ngo dga' 'dod pa yin// khram ze nga yi khyim bdag ni// shin tu spyangs nor dam pa yin// nga yi byang chub yan lag bdun// 'jig rten kun 'das rin chen des// long bar gyur cing gnyid log
pa'i// skye dgu 'di dag sa da par bya// phyogs rnams kun nas nga rgyal bas// nga la sbyo ba'i dgra yod min// nyon mongs tshogs rnams 'joms pa yi// 'khor bzhi po dag nga yi sras//
rdzu 'phrul kun dga' phun sum tshogs// lam gyi bzhi mdor sprul pa byas// mdo sa skyas pa'i rabs dag bkram// skyes bu chen po rnams kyis bstan// rnam thar gsum gyi sgo mo can//
dran pa'i srungs ma rnams kyis bsrungs// ngo tsha khrel yod kyis g.yogs pa'i// grong khyer sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis// bstan pa dpa ]tu de bzhin gshegs// rgyal bo nga ni bzhugs nas su// nga
chos kyis ga sul spyad de// chos kyi drachen ba rdungs nas ni// bdud rnams mtha' dag bcom byas te// ngan byang chub phyir dbang bskur// tshad med pa dag rab pa sgoms pa// nga yi rgyan du bdog pa/
An[﹙]tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yis// nyon mongs pa dag rab chu bzlog pha rol rab tu rgol bcom ste// rnam par bcom zhing rnyog med byas// srog chags rnams la 'jig rten 'dir//
snang ba sbyin zhing yang dag sdud// nga na bden par gnas bcas nas// ye shes kyi ni mtshon gyis bcad// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gnas min te// zhi gnas dag ni 'dzin stangs man// tshul khrims
shang rta sgra snyan la// nga yi lhag mthong ba la sbyar// bzod dang des pa'i go bgos nas// lam bsgoms pas na g.yul dor ni// gang gis sgrib pa 'joms pa yi// dbang po lnga yi dong pa dang// gang
gis nyon mongs thug 'jud pa'i// yang dag spyod pa bzhi po yis/ ngas ni dpa' bo'i yul sprad de// chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs nas// bdud dpung bcas par bcom byas te// nga ni byang chub dbang bskur/
ro// rig pas ma gi bcom nas ni// phung po skyo zhing 'jig pa can// g.yul gyi rtsa mo rgal te nga// skye dgu phyag+hAchub phyir sangs rgyas// gang gis skye dgu gnod byed pa// 'jig rten chom rkun
chen po gsum// 'dod chags zhesdang gti mug rnams // de kun ng yis bcom pasan// mngon shes kun gyi stobs byung bas// nga ni dgra bcom yon gnas 'os/ zhing gshin pa la zhugs//
pa/ sbyin sreg rnams kyang len pa yin// brtson 'grus dam pa brtsams nas ni// ngas ni zag pa rnams bcomamo// chu bo che las rgal nas ni// bsgral ba'i phyir ni
gnas pa yin// ji ltar sang ge mcho ba'i stobs// nags su srogs chags dang phrad nas// chung dang 'bring dang chen po'ang rung// de la mtshungs par bstan pa ltar// mi yi seng ge rnam 'dren pa// rdzogs
sangs de bzhin 'jig rten na// byas pa'am 'bring ngam chen po la// mnyam par chos ni ston par mdzad// go'u tam khyod kyis 'di ru ni// nad pa bdag gi the tshom sol// zug rngu 'byin pa rnams dang
ni mig mkhan rnams kyi mchog khyod lags// khyod kyi the tsom pasal bar byas// bram ze khyod ni 'dun par gyis// grags ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams // mthong ba rnyed bar dka' ba sta//
gang zhig 'di na rnyed dka' ba// brgya lam na ni lan 'ga' 'byung// bram ze rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// chos kyi rgyal po bla med yin// de bzhin gshegs la des gsol pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas
zhes bka' stsal te// ma 'dres 'khor la skar mdzadu na// go'u tam ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// khyod kyis 'khor lo bskor ba gang// rjes su mkhas pa skor bgyid pa// ston pa nyid 'khrungs nyan
thos ni// ste dpon dag tu su 'gyur lags// khram ze nga la nyan thos ni// shes rab mtshungs pa'i sras yod pa// nye rgyal zhes ni grags pa po// mang du thos pa shA ri'i bu// mdud pa kun las rnam
grol la// nyer zhi zag pa med yod da// ngas ni 'khor lo gang bskor ba// mkhas pa rjes su skor bar byed// a ma'o sangs rgyas chos dang ni// a ma'o nyan thos phun sum tshogs// a ma'o/
ni chen dam ba gsum// 'jig rten byung ba ngomatshar che// bzang po khyod ni nyan thos su// bdag gis g.yar gyis blang bgyis la// kye ma'o tshes kyi bcud 'tshal nas// shin tu myang n
'das par bgyi// sa mas rtogs rab tu dga' gyur nas// de nas bram ze skyo khyur te// dben pa 'dod pa'i sams kyis ni// 'khor la 'di skad ces sa so// nags na seng ge sgra 'byin ltar/
bsam gtan chen po zug rngu 'byin// spyan dang ldan pas ci gsungs pa// 'di na shes ldan dganyon cig/ gang dag 'dod pa rjes su song// gang dag mi 'dod de dag dang// shes ldan mchog gi
bstan pa la// de rang khe nas rab 'byung ngo// tshangs spyod 'di la legs sdud cing// lam 'di shin tu gom byas na// bag yod ba la gnas pa yi// rab 'byung 'bras bu bcas par 'byung//
gal te khyed cag rab 'byung zhing// sIn bar rdzogs par 'dodon ni// bram zeral ba 'dare bregs te// bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bya// sems rtog rab tu mgu khyur nas// sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar
te8 )bla gos phrag pa gcigagazar nas// bram ze ri bos de gsol pa// bram ze'i khye'u lta ba po// de dag thal sbyar 'khod pa ni// thub chen rab tu 'byung ba dang// bsnyen par rdzogs ba thob par
'tshal// de nas ston pa thugs rje can// drang srong chen po thugs brtse bas// dge slong tshur shog bka' stsal bas// de dag bsnyen par rdzogs bar gyur// shes rab chen po
kakari'i bu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa mo'u 'gal dang// dga' yod gnas brtan ka shi na// spobs pa rtogs bar khong du chud// chu bo bzung kho'i 'bum du ni/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshal khrod du// spobs pa byang
ba'ab gnas brtanagyis// de dag la ni gdams ngag phog/ der ni de la chos kyi gtam// rjes su mthun par de shes nas// ri bo ma thogs rnam grol te// dam pa'i don la rab tu bkod/ do
dag mthong theb bde gyur pas// mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren pa la// rab tu mgu bas phyag byas so// dam pa'i chos dang tshogs gtso dang// rgyal bas
bsngags pa'i bslab ba dang// ting nge 'dzin dang bkod ba dang// bag yod pa la phyag byas go// de bas bdag la phan 'dod pa 'am// bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas// sangs rgyus chos
dang dge 'dun la// bkur sti byas la skyabs su dang// 'di nid nyid gzagos ba yis// 'jig rten na ni skyabs su bsngags// gnod pa rnams kyis skrag pa la// bad ba kun n rab sbyin mdzad/
chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen// sangs rgyas bstan ba tshosakyi ni khadag nyidachen bo mchog gyur la// thar pa 'dod bas rtag tu bstan// ke na'i khu'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
0 ]gde nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs sgyu zhing gshags te/ ka sha'i tshong rdal du byon no// ka shi'i tshong rdal de na/ sngon 'dreg mkhan byed byed la 'ab tu byung ba la dganyig shal/
yod pa las/ dus sbas pa/ pha bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas gtsug lag khang du byon nga/ bcom ldan 'das dang/
dge slong gi dag 'dun sku mnyel gyis/ mal bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nas thug la spyan drang na/ dalarikhyod thug pa sta gon khyod dam/ 'on te dge slong
gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren/ des smras pa/ khyod song la dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs shig/ nga ni thug ba sta gon byed do// des dge slong gi dge 'dun sa na drangs so// de yang ma long zhig thugs
nas: tshong dus su song ba las/ des de na tshong dpon zhig skra dang kha spu ring ba mthong nas/ des de la ma long bstan pa dang/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di lta bu'i mkhyen pa yang mnga' 'am/ des
smyus kha/ yod do// gal te mnga' na thegs shig/ des breg par brtsams pa dang/ khyim bdag gnyis loganas bregs zin ba dang sad do// des snas pa/ 'phags pa bregs lags sam//
khyim bdag khregs zin to// de mdunas smras pa/ 'a bags pa bdag lhag par glo ba dgas/ khyod mchog ci bzhad pa don no// des snas pa/ kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
nas thug la spyan drangs kyis/ nas thug byin cig/ des smras pa/ 'bags pa nas thug lta khyod la cing rung/ bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod ba dag dbul gyis/ bzhud la
spyan drongs shig/ nad med par gyuracig ces smras nas de song ngo// de nas khyim bdag das gtsang zhing bsod pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/
zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag brims pa na/ dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag ngan pa la mgron du bos na/ kha zas pasod pa 'di bdag
cag gis ji ltar klung zhes/ de rnams kyi ma blangs ba'i skabs de dag slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gal te ngan pa la
mgron du bos la/ kha zas bsod pa red na longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos pa/ nyes dmags gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag rigs dang
mthun pa snod thogs pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rang gi bzo bstan par mi bya/ rigs dang mthun pa'i snod kyang bsrol bar mkhya'o// bsrel na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur te/
sngon sman pa yin na/ gceng khab kyi snod bsral ba dang/ sngon la go pa yin na/ ram phyis bsrel ba dang/ bzang mkhan rab tu byung ba khabaral bsul ba ni ma gtogs so// bcom
ldan 'das gyad yul ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srin bu bad pa'i tshul stug po na bzhugs so// sdig canan tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i zhang po byad sna chen po
la gtogs pa 'od ldan zhes bya ba zhig ba/nus pa de shin tu ma dad pa zhig sta/ bcom ldan 'das sdig can gyi spyod yul nas ljongasamyu zhing gshegs te/ sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srin
bu pad pa'atshal stugs po na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ sdig can du byon
nas/ sdig can na srin bu pad ba'i tshul stug po na bzhugs so zhes thos kyis/ gal te bdag cag re res sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na/ gzhan gyis/
skabs mirId par 'gyur bas/ a khrims shig bca' bar bya ste/ bdag cag sus kyang gcig pus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar mi bya zhing/ bdag
cag 'dus pa kho nas gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o// bdag cag las gang zhig gcig pu kho nas gdugs tshod gsol na/ de la tshogs kyis kar sha ba Na drug cu'i chad pas gcad do// de nas
sdig can gyi khyad thams cad 'dus nas 3 bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong sta lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi
gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas sdig can gyi khyad rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi snyam par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig can gyi byad rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo
de nas sdig can gyi khyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas ! bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stan las langs te song ngo// de nas khyad snachen po la gtogs pa 'od
ldan na di nyidi na 'dug pa dang/ de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sbas pa/ 'od ldan khyod dad par gyur tam rtsi/ dus sas pa/ bdag dad par ma gyur
ba'i phyir 'ongs pa lta zhig/ btsun pa de lta lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gyad sta chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang//
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa spyad sachen po gtogs pa 'od ldan 'di ni sangs rgyas la mngon par ma dad/ chos la ma lags/ dge 'dun la ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis ji ltar 'disangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing/ chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
cang mi gsung bas gnad ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gang thos pas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/ chog
dang dge 'dun la mngon bar dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do// de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par
gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ 'od ldan ngasngar sdig can gyi khyada rnams kyis spyan drangs zin to// bcom ldan 'das gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ ji ltar sdig can gyi
gyad rnams btul pa de ltar bdag bgyid do// 'od ldan gal te sdegacan gyi rgyud rnams btub na Na de bzhin du ngas khyod la gnang ngo// de nas gyad snachen po la gtogs/
ba 'od ldan gyis bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ stan las langs te chas nas/ sdig can gyi rgyud rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ sdig can gyi spyod
rnams la 'di skad ces sbas so// shes ldan dag re zhig sdod cig/ bdag gis thog mar bcom ldan 'das dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ de'i 'og tu khyed cag gis/
kyang bcom ldan 'das dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gags tshod gsol na dka' bar mi 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis sa pa/ kho bo cag gis sngar sangs rgyas la sogs ba dge slong gi dge 'dun
spyan drangs zin pas/ kho bo cag mi nyan no// des smas pa/ ji ste mi btub na bca' ba dang btung ba re ra zhade khrim mo// den ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ mi gnang ngo// dad pa
can gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dgu 'di ded ba med pa zhig las 'dis dge 'dun mnga' ba'i yon dgu 'bul bar 'gyur bas gnang ngo zhes/ de rnamasakyis de la gnang ngo// de nas
des ga yos mkhan dge bkug sa bsgo ba/ shes ldan ngag kho bos yo byad thams cad sgyur gyis/ bca' ba gcig pu gang kho nas 'grangs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sta gon gyis shige/ des dri zhim po
sna tshogs kyi rdzas la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yo byad rnams phog pa dang/ de rnams kyis dri zhim po sna tshogasakyis yongs su rgyas pa'i des re re 'grangs par 'gyur ba'i bca' ba gang yin pa dag byas
so// da nas sdig can gyi khyad rnams kyases de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas/ dag srongagi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams ba nyid la bzhugs so zhes byapa'i bar gong ma
bzhin du'o// de nas rgyad snachen po lagatogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba dang btung ba bum par brtsams pa dang/ dge slong rnams 'gyod pas longs ma su da do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba/ yon bdag la blta bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis sdig can gyi khyad rnams la bltas pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyad sna tshan kho la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bdag/
cag bslus lags kyis bzhes shig/ de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba brams pa dang/ de kho nas dge slong rnams 'gangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bgro
ba mdzad de gshags pas/ sdig can gyi khyad rnams kyis zas de dag longs ma spyad par gyur to// nyam gzhan zhig la dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas tshur spyon/ chos tshur spyon/ dge 'dun tshur spyon/ 'di dag snoms shig/ dge slong rnams 'gyod pas ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa: ci kho bo la sbyin nam/ 'od te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la dbul zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te ba com ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams
kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'o zhes snyan badrag gir ma bya'o/ 'on te bdag cag gi sangs rgyas ni khyod nyidi lags so zhes smra na blang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de bzhin du chos 'dod
chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la 'a ma zhes brjod par bya zhing/ dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la 'am zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o// glangagazhi

ni mnyan yod na'o// khyim bdagacig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bgro kha nga la spyan drangs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sa ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ rab
tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma len pa// chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa des bsams pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis nyung du byon pa dang/
gang gis mang du byin pa dang/ gang gis bzang po byon pa dang/ gang gis yid dga' bras las byas pa dang/ gang gis rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad ni bsod
nams kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs kyis/ ma la bdag gis kyang las shig bya'o snyam nas/ des shang gshegs par brtsams pa las/ ji tsam na shang rul pa zhig gi sar
ka nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas// rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa dang/ de dug gi shugs kyis brgyal nas sa la 'gyel te/ lbu bar skyug cing bzhin yang gyur/ migakyang gyur te/
de de ltar sdug bsngal ba/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smyos pa/ shes ldan dug 'di khyim bdag su zhig gi bu yin/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ che ge mo zhig gi'o//
dedag gisaM smras pa// dge sbyongang+gashAkya'i sras mgon med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung gi/ gal te rab tu ma byung bar gyur na 3 nye du rnams kyis 'di dpyad byas pa zhag ces pa'i skabs da
dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// [” ]sman pa la dras la dpyad byos shig/ dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang/
des smras pa/ 'phags pa sbyar ba'i bras gsol cig pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smanang sa
bstan na sbyin par bya'o// dge slong dag gis zas sbyar ba ji lta bu yin pa ma shes nas/ de rnams kyis/ sman pa la dris pa dang/ des smras pa// 'phags pa dag khyed nyad kyi ston
pa bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa// thams cad gzigs pa kho na yin te/ de nyid mkhyen to zhes pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag zas sbyar ba ni/ lci ba dang/ gcin dang 3 thal ba dang sa'o// de la lci ba ni byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i bal
rnams kyi'o// gcin yang de dag kho na'o// thal ba ni shang lnga po/ kan tsa na'i dang/ ka pi ta ka'i dang/ a shA tha'i dang/ u dum wa ra'i dang/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o// sa nas las sor
bzhi'i 'og nas phyung ba'o// 'di ni sbyar ba'i zas yin no// de nas dge slong rnamasakyis tshe dang ldan pa sa ri la bras sbyar ba ban na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams
kyis: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis da las rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags bzung nas kun chub par byas te/
dge slong sa ral bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ dug gsad pa dang/ mtshan gcad pa dang/ sa
bcing bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ mnyan te bgyi'o//'dul ba gzhi/sprubam po drug cu ba//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'atsho rma bya chen po'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta
a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir a le/ mang ga le/ hir skye/ hi ra N+ya gan+d+ha/ b+ha d+ye/ su b+ha tre/ sa man ta b+ha tre/ shwa b+ha dwe/ sarba arba sA d+ha ni/ pA ra nANA sA d+ha ni/ sarba
nat+tha bra sha ma ni/ sarba mngag la sA d+ha ni/ mAn si/ ma hA mA na si/ ad spyod te zu ad sgyu te/ ad cad b+hu te 3 muka te/ mo tsa ni/ mo kAn/ a ra dze 3 bar =/ a mr-i
te: a ma re/ a ma ra Ni/ ba khrid+d+hA sA ra/ pur Na/ puN[u0f10 ]mno'i the/ uka te/ dzI wanati/ sa ri gnod pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ nad thums cad las srungs
shag sAhA/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'chol zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas rma bya chen mo'i rage stags blangs nas dge slong sa ri la bde
legs su 'gyur ba byas pas/ dug med nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la zhus ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyi rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags phan pa dang/ gcig sngas bgyud pa ngo mtshar che lags so// dge slong dag de ltar 'ba' zhig ma
yin te/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang de log par ltung ba'i lus ma khom par gyur pa na/ rag sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos phan pa dang/ gces spras byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon
du drug 'du khakha
byung ba'i ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la// rma bya'i skyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ danang bar rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'dis bde legs su
'gyur ba byas te/ nyin mo bde legs su gnas/ nub kar bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te/ mtshan mo bde legs su gnas so// de dus gzhan zhig na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par chag/
'dod pa rnams la zhon/ chums/ brgyal/ chos/ rab tu rmongs/ rab tu brgyal te/ bag med bas nags kyi rma bya mo rab tu mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu kun dga' rab nas/
kun dga'ir ba dang/ skyed mos chel nas/ skyed mos tshal dang/ ri'i ngos nas/ mi'i ngos nas/ ri'i ngos su rgyu bas/ ji tsam na re'i sar ga zhig tu zhugs pa dang/ de der yun ring
du phyi'i rgol ba/ dgrar gyur pa// 'tsho bar gyur pa/ glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya nas bzung ste/ da cha mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang/ rab tu rmongs pa las dran pa nyid nas 1 rma bya chen mo'i
rig pa 'di kho na yid la byas so// 'di lta sta/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir malo/ grang ga lA/ hi ra N+ya/ hrir ts+tsa gan+d+he/ lha dra/ su b+ha dra/ sa man ta b+ha dra/ bib+ha dra/ sarba a:/
[r/ ]kA ni/ a ra dze/ bar dza/ a kr-i te/ a ma re/ a ma ra Ni/ prany+dzi brah+ma sA re/ pUr Ni/ puN 3 ma nor the/ muka te/ dzI wan ti/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las

srungs shig swA hA/ de rma bya'i rwa chad nas bros so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya'i rgyal po gsar du snang ba zhes bya nga gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ den yang ng la
mgu chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan ba dang/ gces spras byas so// de ltar na khang pa'i rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phun pa dang/ gces spras byas so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
kyis rig sngags kyis dge slong sa ri la ci tsam bde legs su 'gyur ba la gzigs/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/ ji ltar 'das pa'i de yang nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung
ba wA rA NA si'i grong khyer na/ sbrul sngags mkhan zhig yod do// rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig sbrul gyis zin nas de shi ba dang/ sbrul sngags mkhan gyis rig sngags kyis de sos par
byas so// dge slong dag ji sAm du sims/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sprul grags mkhan gang yin pa donong nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni dge slongs ri yin no// sman gyi
gos kyigazhi'i spyi sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gso ras dang// de bzhin kha tshar rang po dang// dbyar ral bar ni rig bya dang// 'chi ba'i dus dang nye dga' )
dang/ rnatha ma dag ni nad pa yin// bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gsum 'dral dang// dbyar gyi ras chen ga ding ba dang// g.yan pa bde gshegs/
mon dar dang// bal dang sha na zar ma'i ras// sdom la/ dum bu sa skyong seng ge dang// de bzhin lAngs bar song ba dang// sems 'phrogs drang srong sa 'tsho dang// a nu
skyong dang 'a jigs med dang// tshong dpon tshung ma rigs skyes dang// san pa yi ni lung dang ni// rdo 'jog dang na bzad byed dang// u dum war gzhal ba dang// da dang rgyal chen skyed mos tshal//
bcom brlag khyad dang bud med sbrul// sa tshu na dang dur khrod dang// langs pa mig dang srin gyi mas// rgyal po'i khab bdun ban lnga dang// 'tsho byed sde tshan bsdus pa yin/
lus 'phags na rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa dang/ rgyus ba dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs la/ skya bo dang mi mang bos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du
'jug go/ de'i blon po dum bu la sogs pa lnga brgya yod pa las/ byon pa'i mchog dum bus chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal srid khyed du 'jug ste/ tha snyad du bya ba lung rigs pas lta bar byed do//
des na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad de'i ngor bltas shang 'dug go/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de dang lhan cig rtsi bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/
de rtsa bar khyed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston nyin bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu zhes bya ba nas/ sa skyong zhes bya bar btags so
zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de yang rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byedapa las khye'u zhig btsas te/ gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ti/ de ni sang ga nas bya bar
btags so// sa skyod dang/ srangage 'am gyis gzhon nur gyur na yang/ blon po'i mchog dum bu ni thog ma nyid nas dpa' zhing pha rol gnon pa gnas lnga la byang pa yin te/ des na blon bo rnams kyi
mchog tu gyur to// gang gi tsho khu'i mthu rgyas pa de'i tshe/ lhag par yang blon po thams cad zil gyis gnan te 'dug ke/ de nas blon po de rnams thub kyis non pas/ mi bzod pa skyes nas/
phan tshun du gros byas te rgyal po'i drung du dong ngo// de nas skabs la bab par rig nas rgyal po la sbas pa/ lha rgyal po la su lags/ des sbas pa/ shes ldan dag gis brtag
cu ci yod/ rgyal bo lta nga yin mod/ gzhan su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ lha rgyal po ni dum bu lags kyi/ lha ma lags so// gal te de 'tshel bar gyur na/ lha rgyal srid
las phyung nas/ rang nyid cod pan bcings te/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa/ das 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan pas/ des na dbyen byed do/
@#/ snya ma mo// ra lag dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal bo blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug pa dang/ blon po'i mchog dum du rgol ba dang/ phyir rgol ba brgya stong gis bodra/

su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de gang bar byas nas 'dug go/ gang gi tshe rgyal srid kyi bya ba byas nas phyir byung ba de'i tsha/ yang rgyal bo'i pho brang de stong par 'dug go/ rgyal
bos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phyir byung bar gyur tam/ blon po rnams kyis glags rnyed nas/ de rnams kyis sbos pa/ gang gi slad du snyan du gsol ba/ lhas sbyan sngar bab
lagras mod/ gal te dum bu 'tshel bar gyur na/ lha rgyal srid las phyung nas/ rang nyid kyis cod pan bcings te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po rnams ni zhwa ltar khu
'khrig za ba yin pas/ des bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du gdon mi za'o snyam nas/ da de la klan ka tshol bar gyur to// 'jig rten ni mdza' ba dang/ mi mdza' ba dang/ b.ram/
yod bas/ ji tsam na gzhan dgags/ dum bu la sgras ba/ khyodal rgyal po klan katshol zhing 'dugagis/ thabs legs par soms shig/ de rtog pa skyes shing/ de dpyod pa la zhugs pa// gang du

'gro/ gal te ma nyan chod du song na ni/ mnyan yod de yang rgyal po'i ma 'a ras yin nga sa/ nyon 'di nyid yo do// de bzhin du wA rA NA si dang/ rgyal po'i khab dang/ tsam pa yang gcig gi dbang du gyur pas/
can 'di 'di nyid yod do// yangs pa can ni tshogs kyi dbang yan tu/ bcu dga' ba gang yin pa de la ni/ nyi shu mi dga' bar 'gyur bas/ ye la ngas pa can du 'gro'o snyam nas/ des yangs pa can
gyi la ci bya rnams la bdag ni khyed cag gi dpung gi bag na 'dug par 'dod do zhes bo nya btang ngo// de rnams kyis gus pa'i tshul gyis la spring ba/ yangs pa can 'di byon pa legs kyis spyon cig/ de
nas blon po'i mchog dum bus/ nye du rnams bos te smras pa ) shes ldan dag bdagan yangs pa can du chas kyi/ khyed cag las gang dag 'di'i dga' ba de dag ni 'dug cig/ gang dag mi 'dod pa dag ni/

sta gon gyis shig dang 'dong ngo// ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed cag gas pa lang dang ma te langs pa can gang na ba der skyongs shig/ zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ yangs pa

can du 'a dong gis gorkyenacig/ de nas skye bo'i tshogs de ltar sta gon byed du bcug nas/ rgyal po'i drung du song sta rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te snes ba/ lhakhagyi ba cung zhig mchis te/ gyad mos tshal du
mchin gzigs su gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ dbazhin byas song zhig/ des skyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas/ nor gces pas shing rta bkang sta/ stong bza' ba dang bca' bas g.yogs nas
song ngo// blon po rnams kyis dum bu bros so zhes bya ba thos nas/ de rnams ranges pa nges par rgyal po'i drung du dong nas smras pa/ lha dum bu ni bros so// rgyal pos smras pa/ dang la/
sumakhug cig/ de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas bsnyags te sbas pa/ dum bu lhas bka' stsal gyis slar log cig/ de snus la/
shesaldan dag khyed cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas/ kye ma'o dum bu shi 'am bros par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa de tshogs chung dus grub kyis dengs shig/ kho bo na bris pa yin no// de
rnams kyis rgyal po'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir/ mda' dang mda' dag 'dres par byas nas/ log ste rgyal bo la snas pa/ lha blon po'i mchog dum bu ni bros so// rgyal pos smras pa// ma leb sa/
so snyam du bsams nas cang ma sla bar 'dug go/ dum bu yang rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin to// de'i tsho yangs pa can na rigs gsum du gnas te/ rigs dang po na ni khang pa rtsage ma bdun stong ba
gam gser las byas so// ris bar ma nA ni khang pa rtsag ma khri bzhi stong ba gam dngul las byas so// ras tha ma na ni khang pa rtsag ma nyi khri chig stong ba gam zangs las byas pa/ de rnams na ni mi
dam pa dang/ bar ma dang/ phal pa rnams ci rigs par gnas so// yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis khrims su bcas te bzhag pa ni/ ris dang bar bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de ni ras dang po nyid
dugator bar byed kyi/ bar mar ma yin/ tha mar ma yin no// bar ma'i gang yin pa de ni ngos dang po dang bar ma la gtong bar byed do// tha ma'i gang yin pa de ni ras gsum char du gtong bar byed do/
bud med rnams ni yangs pa can ma ga togs par/ gzhan du mi gtong zhing mi 'byin no// bud med rin po che ni su la yang mi gtong bar/ tshogs spyi'i yongs su longs spyod pa kho nar byed do//
dum bu ni skyes bu dam pa yin no zhes te/ rasi dang por kha ngam byin nas/ de na gnas par brtsams pa las/ gang gi tshe tshogs 'dus pa de'i tshe/ de bas kyang 'dul ma btub nas/ de la
yangs pa can gyi li tsang rnams kyis smras pa/ ( dum bu khyod ci'i phyir ma 'du/ des snas pa/ 'du ba kho na las bdag la nyes dmigs khyung bas bdag mi 'du'o// yangs pa can pa rnams
kyis smras pa/ dum bu 'dus shig/ 'di'i cas dmigs ci zhig 'byung/ das 'du bar brtsams nas/ blo gros ma byin no// de rnams kyis slas pa// dum bu blo gros byin cig/ des
sa pa/ gang gi phyir blo gros kho nas bdag la nyes dmagag byung bas na/ blobris ni mi sbyin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ blogros phyin cig/ 'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig khyung/ de

tshogs dang lhan cig 'dus nas blo gros kyang byin to// sngon a phos pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams gang su la ba ra rung yig spring bar byed na rtsub po dang bcas par srung bar byed do// gang gi tshe dum
bus blo bris byin pa de'i tshe/ 'jam bo dang bcas par yig snying bor byed do// gang dag la 'jam po dang bcas pa'i yi ge 'ongs bar gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa// shes ldan dag gang
gis na yangs pa can gyi tshogs sngon rtsub pa dang bcas par sring bar byed pa las/ da 'jam po dang bcas par byed par gyur pa la rgyu ci zhig yod/ gzhan dag gis smras
pa/ khyad par yod de/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po'i mchogi dum bu der 'ongs nas/ de dag de'i blo gros bzhin byed de/ des na da ltar 'jam po dang bcas par sring bar byed do// dum bus sa
skyong dang/ song ga khyim phub nas/ song gi rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ dra'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ gos can zhes
bya bar btags so// de ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ khye'u zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ des pha srog dang phral nas/ rang nyid cod phan bcinges te/ rgyal srid byed par 'gyur
ro zhes lung bstan to// de yang rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ nyi gos can
zhes bya bar btags so// de yang ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ bu mtshan rdzogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// sa skyong gdug pa rtsal che ba zhig ngas yangs
pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi skyed mos tshol rnams ma rung bar byas pa dang/ skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis smras po/ yangs pa can gyi la tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po cha yin gyis/
0 de dag gi rgyud mos tshal rnams ma rung bar ma bya zhig ces/ des slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas ! skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis/ dum bu la sbas pa/ khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyi ma la/
tsa byi rnams skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/ li tsa byi 'di dag ni gdug pa rtsa la po che yin pas/ 'di la gnod pa byas su 'ong gis/ 'di slar bzlog cig/ des de bkug
nas smras pa/ bu langs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas/ 'di dag gi spyod mos tshal ma rung bar ma bya zhigi/ de dag gis gnod pa byas sar/ des sbas pa/
yab 'de dag la ni skyed mos tshal mchisan/ bdag cag la ma mchis so// des smras pa/ bu skyed mos tshal gyi don du tshogs la gsol ba gdab bo// des tshogs la gsol ba
btab pa/ bshes ldan dag bdag gi bu gnyis la spyod mos chel ma mchis kyis/ bdag la skyed mos tshal cig thugs dbag mdzad pa'i rigs so// de rnams kyis de dag la spyod
mos tshal rnying pa zhig byin pa las/ de na shing sA la chen po zhig yod de/ de la gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan byed du bcug go/ cig shos kyis ni zhal sros
byas so// dbazhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na ) sa skyong dang/ song ba'i sa la'i tshal na bzhugs zhes brjod do// sa skyong gis
bya ba ma yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas/ li tsa byi rnams snod par byed/ gzhog 'phras byed/ kha zer bar byed do// de nas dum bus bkug sta bsgo ba/ bu khyod tshogs/
'khrug par ma byed par/ ri 'or chag mo zhig tu song la/ der rang gi zhing byas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed cing 'dug cig/ de der song nas rang ga ni khrus kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta bya
bar brtsams so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas/ de rnams kyis blon po'i mchog dum du sde dpon du bcug pa las/ des kyang dus thung ngu zhig tu chos dang
mthun nga sa sde dpon byas nas shi'o// gangs pa can gyi tshogs 'dus nas su zhig sde dpon du gzhug cas byas ba dang/ danas kha cig gis smras pa/ blon po'i mchog dum bus tshogs yongs su bskyangs/
pas na de nyid kyi bu gzhug go/ kha cig gis smras pa// de'i bu sa skyong ni gdug pa rtsal po che zhig sta/ gal te sde dpon du bcug na/ gdon mi za bar tshogs phye bar 'gyur ro// de'i nu bo seng gi
gang yin pa de ni des pa/ 'grogs na bde ba/ tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa zhig pas/ gal te tshogs 'dod na sde dpon du gzhug go/ thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas
seng ge'i gan du song sta/ sang ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no// des sbas pa/ sa skyong ni bdag gi phu bo yan pas de snga dpon du chug cig/ de rnams kyis slas pa// sang ga sde dpon khyod kyi/
rigs brgyud kyi rim pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci/ tshogs gang la 'thung ba des sde dpon bya bar zad mod/ gal te khyod ma 'dod na kho bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde dpon du gzhugago/ des bsams
pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor na/ de ni ma 'os pas ya bkur ro snyam nas des khas blangs pa dang/ de rnams kyis bkur ste chen pos sde dpon du bcug go/ sangs pa/
can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spring ba de la dum bu la sogs pa tshogasakyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'drib las/ gang gi tshe sang gi sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tsho/ sang ga la sogs pa tshogs kyis

bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri bar bya'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ri 'or na sa skyong rang gi zhing las kyi ma b+ha' rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i re 'or gang yin pa der sing nga 'ongs pa dang/ sa skyong gis phyi
ste bklags nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon na Angs pa can gyi tshogs dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'drin/ ngan song gi la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka'
stsal pa zhes 'drin/ ci kho bo'i pho shi 'am/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shi'i[：]da mi bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song sta snyas pa/ bupo nga 'dug bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon byapa ci/
ga rigs sam/ seng ges ji ltar gyur pa de la smras pa dang/ de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas bsams pa// bdag la yangs pa can rnams kyis bkur sti ma yin pa
dbyas kyis/ rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o snyam nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bdag lha'i btsan phag na mchis bar 'tshal lo zhes banyabatang ngo// des de
sring ba/ 'ong ba legs kyis shog cig ces smreng ngo// de rgyal po'i khab tu 'ongs pa dang/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying bos blon po'i mchog tu bcug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/
rgyal bo gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa des skyong gis mthong nas sbas pa/ lha ci'i slad du zhal la phyag gtad/
thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ pa'i btsun mo dag pa shin/ ci'i phyir sams khongs su chudacing mi 'dug/ lha thong shugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag gi nu bo la bu mogazug
dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/ lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis mchis na/ de la gcig la ni pha 'gums pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur/ cig shes la ni mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar

'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ lhu'i tshod du de gang khrid du mchi/ bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bco'i bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'o// de nas sa skyong gas sang ge la spring ba/ rgyal
bogazugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa she nas/ khyod kyi nye ges tsan tshur sgras shagi dang/ btsun mo dam par 'gyur ro/ des de la yi ge lan sang ba/ gar bskor kyang khyod kho na la bdag 'dri
bar zad kyi 2 khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma'i mchog yin pas khyod de shes so// ji ltar tshogs kyis khrims su bcas la/ yangs pa can las gzhan du bu mo mi gtang ngo zhes

bcas mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te skyed mos tshal du sdod cig dang/ kho bos de spyod mos tshal du phyung ba dang/ de'i tshe khyod kyis khrid de song zhig/ de nas sa skyongagi rgyal po la mami
phyag byas nas/ shing rtar zhugs te yangs pa can du song pa las/ rimakyis phyin nas skyed mos tshal du bsdad do// de'i yangs pa can gyi sgo srungs shig shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams su rgyas
pa des/ yangs pa can rnams la bstan pa// bdag ni mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes kyis/ bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la/ mgul par dril sbyongs shig dang/ gal te sangs
pa can rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' zhig 'ongs na/ bdag gis ji tsam du zin pa 'am/ 'bres par gyur pa srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrags par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs
brnyan byas nas mgul pa la dril btags te/ gar dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ gtor ma dang/ ma rtog 'phrongagi yo byad kyis sgo khang du bzhag go/ sa skyong gas seng ge la spring
pa/ kho bo skyed mos tshal na sdod kyis byung zhig/ res yangs pa can gyi tshogs la brtags nas khyim du song ste/ nya gos can la sbas pa/ khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po la byin gyis/
rgyan rnams thogs la skyed mos tshal du byung zhig/ de rgyan rnams 'dogs par brtsams pa dang/ gos can gyis mthong nas/ des smras pa// ci zhig gi phyir rgyan/
rnams 'degs/ kho bo bag mar btang ngo// su zhig la/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la'o// des smras pa// kho mo phu mo yin na/ khyod ci ste ngag mer btang/ gal te de ltar na
khyod rgyan thegs shag/ de yang smra ba las dral gyi spa byung ngo// yangs pa canagyi tshogs 'od rod por gyur te/ bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig yangs ba can du zhugs so// seng ge dngangs pas
nye gos can yin no snyamanas/ gos can khrid de myur ba myur bar phyir byung ba dang/ sa skyong yang dngangs pas/ gas can shing rtar bcug cu song ngo// yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis phyi bzhin/
bsnyags nas/ dodang da rnams su lhan cig 'khrab par bortsams pa dang/ de gnas lnga rnams la byang ba yin pas/ nges la tsar+ya lnga brgya'i gnad du bsnun nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas
khyed cag las lcabargya gnad du bsnun zin gyis/ lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyis slar dngas shag/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ nged cag las sems canagicagakyang bsad pa mad do// go phudacig/
de rnams kyis go phud pa dang/ lnga brgyas lo 'khyol nas srog dang bral bar gyur to// de nas de rnams kyis ma 'din srin po yin no snyam nas sgrug sa bros so// yangs pa can du lhags nas gros bya bar
brtsags pa// shes ldan dag bdag cag kha dag la gzugs canasIng po'i bu rnams lan glon du gzhug gis/ glegs bu la yi ger bris te sgrom bur bcug nas rgya skyegs la rgyus btab nas gzhag go/
zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas bzhag go/ sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal po' khab tu phyin nas skyas ba/ nyegos can bobs shig/ des smras pa/ khu gu bdag ni nyi gos can ma lags te/
bdag ni gos can lags so// khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma gas/ de cang ma sa bar 'dug go/ de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bse rgyal po'i drung du song brgyal bos mthong nas smras
pa sa skyong 'ongs sam/ 'ongs pa lags so// lha bdag mchis lags so// 1 gisA can khrid de 'ongs sam/ lha khrid de mchis kyang mchis la/ khrid de ma mchis kyang ma mchis so//
ci zhig zer/ nye ges canA lags snyam nas/ gos can khridi de mchis so// bltas khrid de shog cig/ de nang du khrid pa dang/ rgyal pos lhag par yang gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshog
ba mabrong nas/ bud med kyi ul gyis khrogs pas mthong ma thag kho nar/ rgyal po chags par gyur nas smyos pa/ shes ldan dag bu pa gsod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas/
gal te nga la bu yod par gyur na/ de btsas ma thag tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o// de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pasan/
lus 'phags ma zhes bya bar grags so// de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// re zhig dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal/
po gzugs can sung po ra rigs kyi phyir byung ba na/ bsti gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig nas so// ji tsam na ri dgas mda' long la btags pas skrag pa
zhig drang srong de'i bsti gnas su zhugs shing 'byung ba rgyal po'i mdas gnad du bsnun no// de nas drang srong de khros nas smras pa/ 'thab krol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti gnas gcan
ga zan gdug pas kyang ga zem par bya bar/ ri dwags skyabs su 'ongs pa khyod kyis gsad dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po la de skad du kha zer ba dang/ dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa// lha 'di
su la g.yar mchi/ rgyal pos smras pa/ nga la yinan/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci yod/ lha de'i chad pa dgum pa lags so// gal te de ltar na ngas
drang srong de yongs su sbyangs so// de gsad par brtsams te/ de gsod pa na smon lam log par btab pa/ rgyal po 'thab krol can 'das bdag nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa gsad par skyes pa
gang du skyes ba der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig/ yang bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di dag ni shin tu sbas pa/ shin tu bsrungs pa// shAn tu btsas pa yin pas/ gal te gzhan du skye ba
blangs na lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par ma 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du smon lam 'dis bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nyis par gyur cig ces byas so// des son lam log par
