btab pas gos can gyi mngal du skyas so// gang gi nyi ma kho na la nyape mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de nyid kyi nyame la khrag gi char bab bo// gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/ a ma'o bdag gis lha'i sgrub
kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing zos kyang tsA ma rung snyam mo// de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang/ rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa las/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ lha 'di
nib tsun mo'i rum du sems can zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lags so// rgyal po sams khongs su chud de 'dug nas/ 'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig gis sel bar 'gyur snyam mo// mkhas
pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa// lha ras kyi bar rtsad shas bltam par bgyis te gsol la/ de nyid btsun mo la stobs mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal pos lus kyi bar shas gang bar byas
pa bgos nas/ bdag nyid gos can la bstabs pa dang/ des rgyab kyi sha yin no snyam nas zos so// de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// yang de'i 'dod pa sbyos pa/ kyema'o

bdag gis lha 'a de khrag kho na 'thungs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos ban lag lnga'i rtsa gtar nas khra ga blud pas/ de 'dod pa de dang yang bral bar gyur to// ji ciman
zla ba dgu tshang ba dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// bcas te gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la yang khrag gi char
bab bo// rgyal pos yang ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa dang/ de rnams kyis smas pa/ lha bstan bcos las ji ltar gda'ab ltar na/ gdon ma 'tshol bar khya'u 'dus lha
! sku tshe dang phral nas/ rang nyid cod pan btsanges te/ rgyal srid bgyid bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams ba/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyal srid kyi ched du 'dus srog dang bral bar byed kyis/

'di'i bdag nyid kyis rgyal srid byin na ci'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed snyam mo// de'i tshe yangs pa canan la ci phyi mang chen zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i spyod mos tshal na a mra'i tshil yod/
pa las/ der glo bur du chu shingagi sdong po zhig skyes ba kun dga' ra ba srung bas mthong ngo// de ma thag kho nar ma tog chags pa dang/ de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la sa pa dang/ des ltas
mkhan rnams bkug nas dris pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lci de bsrung du gsol cig dang/ dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/ de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
khyim bdag ming chen gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes bar gyur te/ skyed mos tshal dar kun nas srungs ma'i mi rnams bkod nas/ nyi ma bgrang ba la zhugs so// rje tsam na zhag bdun/
0 lon pa dang/ rgyadamos tshul de rdo ba dang/ gsag ma dang/ gyo mo rnams bsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shan tu dri zhim po'i thog bor dgu ba shams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang
mang po bras/ ma tog sil mas bkram/ glu dang rol mo'i sgra rnam pa du ma dag dang/ mdza' bo dang/ gnyen bshes kyi bya bas yongs su bskor nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung ma
dang lhan cig byung nas/ gyad mos tshal de na/ da rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed ba las/ chu shing gi sdong bo gas nas/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba// mdzes
pa: blta na sdug pa/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo// de nas ming chen gyis chung ma dam pa la gtad pa dang/ des smras pa/ lha 'di'i ming gdags su gsol/ ming chen
gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'din a ma'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pas/ 'dri'i sa a ma skyong ma zhes bya'o/ ji tsam na khyim bdag ming chen skyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim du song ste/ bu mo a nu
skyong ma bskyod bsrings te zhes bya ba nas/ chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// da slong ba'i ra yul khrung khrung b rnams dang/ shAkya rnams dang/ gzhan yang yul sna tshogs/
naganas ba'i rgyal po dang/ blonapo'i bu dang/ tshong pa dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ded dpon du ma dga'ongs pa dang/ khyim bdag ming chen gyisabasams pa/ gang kho na la ma byin pa de kho na snang/
la/// dgos so// zhag bdun lon na khang pa byul bar bya'o zhes gang smras ba de yang bden te/ sngar ram phyis byas kyang rung/ de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ skyes pa rnams phyir/
byung ba dang/ nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag go zhes gang sbas pa de yang bden te/ 'di smad 'tshong ma'i yin pas/ gal te mi rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang/ nang du 'jug pa brtags na 1 su zhig
di'i khyim du 'jug// de nas tshogs kyis de la mchog lnga byin nas/ tshogs kyis pad bar gyur to// yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis dga' dgur sad pa'i phyir/ de'i khyim du 'jug par
brtsams ba las/ de na kha cig ni yul la chags ches pa'i phyir/ mthong ma tho kho nar 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur to// kha cig gis ni rig pa banas te/ do la 'gas kyang skyes pa'i bya
ba ma byas so// des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni spyis pa ma yin gyis// thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/ des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas s+sas pa//
shes ldan dag gang na rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ phyug po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ tshong pa 'am/ ded dpon ci 'dra ba zhig mthong ba de 'dra ba dag rtsig pa la bris shig/ de rnams kyis ji
ltar ma thong ba bzhin bris pa dang/ de nas a mra skyong ma rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas/ rimo'i 'is rnams la so sor brtags te dris pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'di dag ni gang zhig/ 'di dag ni rgyal
po rab snang ngo// gzhan 'dri gang zhig/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la// gzhan 'di gang zhig/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed do// gzhan 'de gang zhig/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzug
can snying po'o// des de bzhin dus pa dang/ de rnams kyis kyang thams cad sbas so// de nas sa thams cad 'du brtags pa dang/ gzugs snying po la mig chags nas/ des bsams
pa skyes bu 'di lta bu r chu zheng gab pas na/ bdag dang lhan cig dga' dgur sAd par nus so snyam mo// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stang gi
khang bzangs kyigazhur song nas/ blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug nas/ tshul ma yin pa'i gtam snyas pa/ shes ldan dag sus smad 'tshong ma ji lta bu mthong/ sa skyong gis
smras pa/ lha re zhig gzhan lta zhog la/ yangs pa can na smad 'tshong ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyi ba/ shin tu gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi 'chol ba/
lha kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchis so// des smras pa/ sa skyong gal te de lta na yangs pa can du 'dong/ de dang lhan cing dga' dgur spyad do// des smras pa/ lungs pa can gyi li tsa byi
rnams ni yun ring po nas gnod pa bgyid pa/ slar rgol ba/ dgra bo lags pas/ khyod la gnod pa bgyis su mchi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi rnams ni skyes bu'i
bar 'gyur na/ 'on kyang tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pas/ re zhig tshogs la brtag go snyam nas/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te/ shes ldan dag/
bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nyon cig/ bdag gis skyed mos tshal nas bu mo zhig red pa de/ bdag gis bsnyon/ bstod de ba skyed nas/ de bdag gis rang ga rigs brgyud dang 'tsham par/
'ga' zhig la chung mar sbyin na/ tshogs kyis ltos shig/ de rnams kyisasmas pa/ khyim bdag sngon tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa// bud med rin po che mi gtar sa/ tshogs kyis
spyad do zhes bcas pa yin gyis/ re zhig bu mo de ci 'dra ba bltas/ khrid de shog cig/ dus de tshogs kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang/ gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/
tshogs khrims cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgrod de/ kun tu brtag par brtsams nas sbas pa/ khyim bdag 'di ni bud na da ran po cha yin pas tshogs kyis smad kyis/ su la yang mi sbyin no/
de nas khyim bdag ming chen yid mi bde zhing/ rang gi khyim du song nas/ de 'gram pa lag pa gtad de sams khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang/ a ma skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/ yab
ci'i slad du thugs ma dgyes/ bu mo khyed bud mad rin po che mAni no zhes/ tshogs kyis sdud par gyur te/ bdag gi yid la re ba ma rdzogs so// yab khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur tam/ bu
mo sogs na tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa// bud med rin po che ni tshogs kyis smad do zhes bcas la/ khyod kyang bud med rin po che yin pas/ de'i phyir bdag la dbang med do// des smras pa//
ram zhig bcos te gal te bdag la tshogs kyis dam pa lnga zhig stsal na/ bdog gas tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ ris dang por khang pa stsal ba dang/ skyes ba gcig nang du zhugs pa na/
cig shos nang du ma 'jug pa dang/ nang du 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang kar sha pa Na lnga brgya 'tshel te mchi ba dang/ gang gi tshe khyim nyul ba de'i laM kA bdag gi khyim zhag bdun na byul ba dang
bdag gi khyim du mgrib rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang/ nang du 'jug pa lam brtag pa'o// ming tshan gyis/ a mra skyong ma'i 'phrin bzlas pa dang/ tshogs kyis sbas pa/ dubazhin du bya ste/
ris dang po'i khang pa zhes gang sa pa la/ ris dang po'i khang pa ni bud med rin po cha kho na la 'os so// gcig nang du zhugs pa na/ cig shos nang du ma 'jug par bya'o zhes gang sbas pa de
yang bden te/ sha khon rnams la ni/ 'di lta sta/ bud med kyi sha khon tha chad yin pas/ gal te gcig nang du zhugs pa dang/ ga shos kyang nang du zhugs na/ gdon mi tra bar
gcig la gcig gsod par 'gyur ro// nang du 'jug pa des kar sha pa Na lnga brgya zegs te/ nang du 'jug par bya'o zhes gang sas pa de yang bden te/ gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang rgyan du
dpal sAde can yin pas 'a dod ngo// des smras pa/ lha gal te don ma mchis pa la gcigs cher mdzad na gshegs mod/ dengashing rta ra zhugs nas sa skyong dang lhan

cig yangs pa can du chas te/ me gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas/ sa skyongani skyad mosatshal na sdod do// rgyal po na a mra skyong ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang/ ji tsam na dril gyi sgra byung ngo/ ya dra
ba can gyi li tsa byi rnams rod red por gyur nas/ shes ldan dag bdag cagago min dza' ba zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo zhes sgra gsal ba dang/ sgrachen po byung ba dang/ rgyal po gzugs
can snying pos/ a mra skyong ma 'dris pa/ bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/ lha sdum par nyul bar bgyid do// ca zhig gi phyir/ lha'i slad du'o// ji ltar khya/ ce'abros sam/ lha mi dgyes par ma
mdzod cig/ lha dgung bdun lon pa dang/ bdag gi sdum pa nyul bar bgyidapos ) ra zhig dgung bdun du rol pas dgyes par mdzod/ dgyes dgur mdzod la/ dgung bdun logs dang/ dus
mkhyen bar bgyi'o// de dang lhan cig rtsa bar byed/ dga'i bar khyod/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ tsim na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can/
snying bo la smras pa 3 lha bdag la sems can zhugs lags so// de la sang ras gcig dang/ sor gdub rgya byin nas smras pa/ gal te bu mo zhig yin na khyod nyid kyi yin no// 'on ta khye'u yin na seng
ras 'di bskon la/ sor gdub kyi rgya mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du skye zhig/ de byung sta nga rtar zhugs te sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang/ dril bu la 'khrol bar 'dug go/ de rnams kyis
smras pa/ shes ldan dag dgra bobyung gis/ rje bzhin btsal lo zhes li tsa byi sbyin 'khor gyi mda'i rtsibs can lnga brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyi bzhin bsnyags pa dang/ sa skyong
gis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ lha yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams mchin/ lha ci 'dedag dang lhan cig 'thab mo bgyi 'ag/ 'on te shing rta bda'/ des smras pa/ nga ni dub pas shing rta de/
kyis: khyod kho nas 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thub mo khye zhig/ des de rnams dang lhan cag 'thab mo 'gyed par brtsams pa las/ yangs ba can rnams kyis ngo shes cas/ de rnams kyis smras
pa 3 shes ldan dag mi'i srin po de nyid 'di yin gyis/ slar log go/ de rnams slar log nas/ yangs pa can du 'ongs te/ 'dus nas yang khrims bcas pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag
gi dgra 'di la yang gzugs can sAng po'i bu rnamasangasha glon du gzhug go zhes bcas so// ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang/ a mra skyong ma la khye'u gzugs bzang ngo/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug
pa zhig btsas so// bcos nas sabya ba nas/ bsrings bskyod de chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// do yangs pa can gyi latsi byi'i khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams /
kyis mi dga' ba'i tshig smras pa// bran mo'i khye'u khyed brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni rgyas na/ tha gu in/ des dus nas ma'i drung du song ba dang/ res skyas pa
bu ci'i pa'i du/ des thams cad rgyas par smras ba/ bu gal te yang dris dang/ nga'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang mad do zhes sgos shago/ gal te su yin zhes smyus dang/ rgyal po
gzugs can snying po yin no zhes smos shig da ji tsam na de de rnams dang lhan cig yang rtse bar byed ba las/ de rnams kyis/ de la de bzhin du smras pa dang/ des smrase ba/ nga'i pha lta bu
ni khyed cag gcig la ang na da do/ su yin/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no// de rnams kyis shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgro gang yin pa de ni 'di'i pha yin no zhes lhag pa'i yang
brdags so// des dus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la sbas pa dang/ des bsams pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin te/ gal te 'di bsad par 'gyur ba'i
gnas de yod do snyam mo// de de lta bu soms dang 'dug pa ded/ tshong pa rang cumang po zing thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ba de dag des mthong nas sbas pa/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'dis snod
thob la dengs shig dang 'go 'am ma gcod par 'gyur ro// khye'u 'di yang rgyal bo'i pho brang du khride la/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'di'i mgul du thogs te/ rgyal bo'i khabakyi sger tshogacig/ de rnams
kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes blangs so// khu la yang mu tig gi doshal zhig byin nas smras pa/ bu rgyal po dgos pa'i ched du 'dus dang/ mu tag gi do shal rkang pa'i stang du zheg la 'dzegs te
pang du 'dug cig/ gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go zhes smadang/ de la bu pas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam zhes smos shig// de tshong pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rim gyis rgyal
po'i khab tu phyinanas/ de rnams kyis khrus byas te/ sor gdub kyi rgya btags nas/ rgyal po'i bu bung gi sgor bzhag pa dang/ de rgyal po gang na ba der song su phyin nas/ mu tig gi do
shal rkang pa la bzhag nas 'tshogs te pang du 'dug go/ rgyal pos sas pa// shes ldan dag khye'u 'di na 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go/ das smras pa/ yab bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchis
lags sam/ de nas rgyal los 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra kun tu sbas pas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs mdatses byepar grags so// 'dul ba gzhi
bam po drug cu gcig pa// rgyal po gzugs can snying bo gzhan gyi bud mod la lhag par chags pas/ glang po chal zhon nas grong khyer gyi srung rnamA

su song nas/ mig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyam par byed do// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na tshong dpon phyug ba 3 nor mang ba/ longs song cha ba zhig yod pa des/ ragis ma nyam pa las chung ma blangs nas zhag bya ba
nas/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de dus gzhan zhig na/ chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo zang thegs nas yul gzhan du 'gro'o// des
sbas pa/ rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzodacig/ de zang thogs te yul gyi mthar song ngo// de yang kha zas zhim po dang gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur ba las/ rgyal po gzugs can

snying po glang bo che la zhon nas/ de'i khyim cung nas song ba dang/ des kyang skar khur du 'dug nas/ rgyal po la me tog gi 'phrang ba bor ro// de nas rgyal bos mthong nas smras pa/ mar shog/ des smras
pa lha g.yar tshe lags kyis 3 khyod nyid nang du gshegs shig/ de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas/ de do dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang/
ldan pas soms can chags par gyur nas/ des rgyal po la sbas pa// lha bdag ni sams can dang ldan par gyur to// de nas rgyal pos de la ya nga sor gdub kyi rgyu dang/ seng ras khra bo byin nas
sAs pa/ gal te re zhig khye'ur gyur nasong ras 'di bskyon la/ sor gdub kyi rgya yAng mgul du thogs kyi/ nga'i drung du skye zhig/ 'on te bu mo yin na ni khyod nyid kyi yin no zhes smras nas/
rgyal po song ngo// ji tsim na ded dpon de don rnams khrub ste/ rgyal po'i khab dang nye ba zhig tu phyin nas/ des chung ma la bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig/ kho bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te/ zhog
0 'di tsam khon na ban bar 'ong ngo// sing ba des thos nas/ bdag gis ni bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la/ de yang 'o na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du 'phongs par gyuranas/ des de ltar gyur
pa rnams rgyal po la reg par byas pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos slar snying nga/ bgamache bar 'dug cig/ jinus kyang myur du mi 'ong ba de ltar nges bya'o// rgyal pos de 'a po nya btang ba/ ded dpon
nga la rin po che che ge mo dang chog mo dag cig dgos kyis/ de mad par khyod 'dir ma 'ongs shig/ de rani po che de rnams kyi phyi'i lam ring bor song ngo// de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas btsas pa dang/
khye 'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// ma bslabs kyang bud mang la shes nyon yod pas/ des mar dang sbrang rtsis re 'grangs par bsnyad nas sor gdub
kyi rgyu mgul du btags te/ seng ras kyis dkris nas sgrom bu'i nang du bcug ste/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma la bsgo ba/ song la sgrom bu 'di khyer te rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor khyod kyis dkya'i
'khor byos la/ ma mar bus te phyogs gcig tu ji srade 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du sdodacig das de bzhin du byas pa dang/ rje tsam na rgyal po stong gi khang bzang kyi gzhir song nas/
rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs mod dang lhan cig 'dug pa las/ des rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo namar ma mthong ngo// de nas zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bslob/ shes ldan dag rgyal po'i pho brang gi
so na mar me 'bar ba kon ci yin zhesangashag/ de de dag gis bltas nas skyas pa/ lha sgrom bu zhig mchis so// des sas pa lo nga zhige/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs
mad kyis sbas pa/ lha sgrom bu de na mchis pa de bdag la stsal bar ci gnang/ rgyal bos de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so// ji tsam na sgrom bu blangs nas rgyal po la phul ba dang/ rgyal pos
su sa ba/ kha bu zhig/ kha phu ba la sa lu 'u zhig byung ngo// rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di ci gson nam/ 'on te8shi ba zhig/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ lha gson lags so// de nas rgyal pos
sor gdub kyi rgyu dang sang ras ngo shes nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med la byin pa dang/ des de bsnun bstod bskyod de/ rgyal pos gson nam zhes tshig tu byung pa dang/ rgyal bu gzhon/
nu 'jigs med kyis gsos pas/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos zhes bya bar grags so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos chen por gyur to// de 'jags med/
dang lhan cig dre mo gAtam zer zhing 'khod pa/ 'jigs med gzhon nu ma skyes dgu ni ma bcos pa kho na nas rgyal po nyid du lung bstan gyis/ bdag cag nibazo cung zad bslabs te/ des na
bdag cag gi phyi dus kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas ba las/ shing rtamakhan gos dkar bo gon pa/ mi gos dkar po gyon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i kho pa
[/]brang du zhugs pa dang/ de rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med des mthong nas/ des rgyal bu'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa// shing rta mkhan la ga
so// 'dis ca thob/ 'tsho ba'o// des bsams pa// bdag gis kyang lha la brtags nas/ shing rta mkhan bsub bo snyam nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag kyang shang rta
mkhan paslab bo// rgyal bos smras pa/ bu khyod chu 'dis 'tsho bar 'gyur ram 3 yab rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags so// bu gal te de lta na khyod shing rta mkhan slobs/
shig des bslab par brtsams so// 'tsho byadakyis kyang smanapa gos dkar po gonapa/ mi gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa mthong nas des
gzhan dag la dris pa ) 'di su zhig mne/ de dag gis smras pa/ sman pa lags so// 'di ci zhig byed/ dpyad bgyid do// ci theb/ gal te nad pa zhig sos na rngan pa thob bo// 'on te gum na mi
tshol ma 'dri'o// des bsams pa/ sman dpyad bslab bo sAm nas/ de'i pha'i gan du songanas sbas pa// lha gnang bar mdzod cig/ snyan dpyad bslab lags so// bu khyod rgyal po'i sras
yin no// khyodal sman dpyad kyis ci bya/ lha rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad bslab par bgyi ba lags so// bu gal te de lta na slobs shage gdo sman dpyad bslab par brtsams pa dang/ sa
sman dpyang ni lobs na/ des klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad ma shes nas/ des rdo 'jog na snyan pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba yod do// des klad pa'i thod pa 'byed/

pa'i dpyad shes so zhes thos nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song su sbas pa/ lha rdo 'jog tu mchi'o// ci zhig gi phyir/ de na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de klad pa'i thodo
ba 'byed pa'i dpyad 'tshal bar de slobacu mchi'o// bu khyod 'dis 'tsho 'am/ lha yang nan sman dpyad ma bslab/ yang na na legs par bslab par bgyi'o// khugal te de lta na song zhig/ des rgyal

po pad+ma'i snying po la spring ba/ bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyad slob tu rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ong gas/ 'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyis sbyor cig/ de rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin pa dang/ pad+ma'i
snying nges kyang sring yi ga bklags te rgyun shes kyi bu la gtad nas/ rgyal po'i bu 'di khyod kyi drung du ched du 'ongs kyis/ 'di la sman dpyad slobs shig/ rgyun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed ba

na des nyung zad bstanapa dang 3 'tshotshod khyad par dang bcas par ljob bo/ rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tsho nad pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tsho 3 bram ze'i khye'u gcig khrid de 'gro ba yin pas/
de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas/ des nad pa'i sman bstan pa 'di dang 'di dag byin cig ces smras nas byung ngo// 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni mkhan pos nyes te/
tha'/ gal te 'dis snyanu'adi zos na 'di deng nyid 'chib 'gyur te/ mkhan pos bstan pa ni legs pa ma yin gyis// thabs shig bya'o snyam nas/ de rgyun shes kyi bu dang lhan cig tu byung nas/
slar nang du zhugs te sus pa mkhan po 'di skad ces gsung ngo// kho bas sman bstan pa gang yin pa de ma byin par 'di dang 'di dag phyin cig/ ngas de bzhin du byas pas sos par gyur
te/ jitsam na nyi ma gzhan zhig la rgyun shes kyi bu yung de'i drung du song nas dris pa/ nab ji ltar sos par gyur te/ sang yang de nyid byon cig/ ci snga ma lags sam/ 'on te slad kyis bstan/
ba la gas 3 ci bdag gis sngar bsamanam// 'on kyis bstan/ de dag gis sbas pa/ 'di dag ni khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan to// 'din 'tsho byed la 'phrin du srung ba yin no// des
bsams pa/ bdag gis nyes kyis/ 'tsho byed na shes rab can yin no snyam bsams nas smyos nga/ 'tsho byed kyis bstan pa gang yin pa de byon cig/ rgyun shes kyi bu 'tsho byed la dga' ba
rgyas pas/ du gang du 'gro ba der 'tsho byed khrid do// khram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis sbas pa/ mkhan po khyod rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas 'di la ni so bar ston par mdzad kyi/ bdag cag la ni
mi mdzad do// des smras pa/ 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin pas/ des bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis rnam par 'byed nus kyi/ khyed kyis ni de lta ma yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa//
mkhan pos ji ltar mkhyen/ gal te de lta na ngas khyed cag gi mngon sum du bya'o// des bram ze'i khye'u de rnams la khyod kyis ni rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin dris shig/

khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes thams cad tshong dus su btang ngo// 'tsho byed kyang khyed kyis kyang chu ga mo zhagi gi'o zhes bsgo'o// bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin dus
[：]'tsho byedakyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin byas nas bsam pa/ gal te mkhan po rdzas gzhan gyi ran 'dri bar byed na/ bdag gis ji skad brjod par byas/ thams cad du rdzas thunas cad/
kyi ran dri'o snyam mo/ de dag thams cad mkhanapo'i drung du song nas/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin smras so// rgyun shes kyi dus ma bstan pa'i rdzas kyi ran dri bar brtsams te bram ze'i khye'urdzas
che ge mo zhig gi ran ji tsam/ des skyas pa ma 'tshal lo// gzhan dag la dris pa dang/ smras pa ma'achal lags M so// 'tsho byed la dris rang dang ) des rdzas thams cad kyi ni skyas sa// rgyun
shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis shes sam/ shes lags so// ngas 'tsho byang ni shes rab can yin te cu zad bstan na yung/ de la rang gis rnam par 'byed nus so zhes
smas pa ni don de yin no// gzhan ya nga na ngon sum du bya'o zhes des/ de rnams la snas pa/ thang shing can gyi ri la dang la sman ma yin pa dag khyar te shog cig/ de dag dong nas de dag las gang
0 zhig gis gar sman pa yin par shes pa de dug gis blangs so// 'tsho byed kyis bsams pra/ smanam yin pa ni cung zad kyang med do snyam nas/ dus 'dam bu mnga' sgyu'i rtsa ba dang 1 rdo

pa'i dum bu zhig blangs so// ji tsam na 'tsho byad kyis lam gyi phud na phyugs rdzi mo zhig zho'i bum pa dang phrum chung khyer nas rgyan shes kyi bu'i drud du song ba las/ deshin+na tu snyeg na ba des
mthong nas des dris pa/ gang du 'gro ba des sbas pa dang/ des de la gnas de nyad kyi drung na yod pa'i snyan zhig bstan pa las/ des byas pa dang/ mod la sos par gyur to// de dga' ba
sus nas sas pa/ zho'i bum pa dang phrum chud 'di khyod snyoms shig/ des phrum chud blangs te zho'i bum pa ni de nyid la dun nas/ de phum chung khyer te song ba las/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u
rnams kyis lam gyi dbus na glang po che'i rjes shig mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de la brtag par brtsams pa dang/ 'tsho byed kyang 'ongos nas des smras pa/ 'di ci yin/ glang po che'i
rjes so// 'di ni glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyis/ 'di ni ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mag g.yas pa zhar ba/ de rang kho nar glang po'i sdug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la//
de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la// de yang mig g.yos pa zharab/ sbrum pa/ de ring nyid du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhig yin no// ji tsam na rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ongs nas/ gang/
gas gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de bstan to// rgyun shes kyi sbas pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag 'di thams cad na sman yin te/ re zhig 'di ni cho ga cheg mo ga/
gis nad che ge mo zhig yun la/ de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang yin no// 'tsho byed la dris pa/ khyod kyis ci khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ mkhan po thams cad snyan la gas
te/ sman ma la gas ba ni ci yang ma mchis so/ 'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bumada' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang/ rdo'i dum bu dang/ phrum tshud cig 'tshol te mchis so// 'di dag ci dgos/ sdig
pas zin pa la 'dam du mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas bdug go/ phrumatshud kyis ni klan par bgyi'o// lho'i dum bus ni ston ka'i dusaMn zho'i bum pa 'tshag bar 'gyur ro// rgyun shes kyi bus
'dzum byung ba dang/ bram ze'i khyi'u rnams kyis bsams pa/ mkhan po na 'di la khros so snyam num/ des rnams kyis sbas pa// mkhan po ci 'de gcig pur bas sam mam/
bdag cag mchib na lam gyi dadus su glang po che'i rjes shig mthong ba na 'di'i mchid nas 'di ni ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/ dalang mig g.yas pa zhur ba la sbyam pa/ de ring kho nar glang
po'i phrug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhen pa ni bud med yin la de yang mig g.yas pa zharab/ sbrum pa/ de ring nyid du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// rgyun shes kyi lus
dris pa/ 'tsho byad padon nam/ mkhan po mad do// de glang po che'i rjes sam bu lang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes/ des smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa
la gas na/ rdza ma 'tshal/ glang po che'i rjes ni khrum mo// ba lang tsho'i rjes ni chur rang ngo// mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa lags
so3 sbrum pa ji ltar shes/ rkang pa gnyis gnonacing mchi ba las so// dung kho nar 'brang bar 'gyur ba ji ltar shes/ gcin be'u snobs dang bcas par 'byung bas so// glang po che'i phrug gu
bor 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par gnon cing mchibs so// de la bud med zhen par ji ltar shes/ babs nas rkang pa'i bar dugatsis ba las so// de yang mig
gas sa nga zhar bar ji ltar shesaM/ g.yon phyogs su ma tog thu zhing mchis nga sa so// de ung sbyam pa ra ji ltar shes/ de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchas pas so/ dung kho nar btsa'
bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shos ) gcin ljan ljani dang bcas te 'byung ba las so// de lta lags kyis kyang gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na 1 'gron ma gnas pa'i phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga'
'ge mngag tu gsol/ des bram ze'i khye'u zhib tang ba dang/ 'tsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i chu
dag khyed kyis shes sam/ 'tsho byed na de 'dra bar shes rab can yin no// 'tsho byed kyis klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad ma gtogs pa thams cad bsla bas so// jitsaman
mazhig kyang nad kyis thengs nas/ rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song g+ha smras pa/ rgyun shes kyi dus bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ kyi nang rje ge de rang dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon
gyis shag dang/ sang badrag gis khyod kyi dpyad bya'o// 'tsho byarakyis thos nas de da'i phyi bzhin song// kyi nang rje bdag gas cung zad bslabs pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni soms can la phan
pa'i ra ye na na/ bdagagis klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba ma bslabs kyis/ khyod kyis bdag dbyen pa zhig tu zhag cig dang/ khyod kyi lasu ji ltar byed bu blta'o// rus sbas pa// de bzhin du bgyi'o//
des de phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag go/ de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas ma dadong du bcugs/ thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis thod pa phu nas/ das skam pas srog tshegs de blang bar brtsams pa
dang ! 'tsho byadakyis smras pa/ mkhan po gzu lums su ma blang zhig/ rigs kyi bu 'di dang nyid du 'gum par 'gyur ro// des sbas pa/ 'tsho byed 'ongs sam/ sbas pa// mkhan po
ba dag mchis so// kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya/ mkhan bo skam pa tsha ba ra mdzod do/ rgyab tu log nas rkang lag 'khums par gyur pa dang/ de nas ber cig/ de das de
0 bzhin du byas nas sos bar gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ 'tsho byed kho bo shAn tu mgu ba'agyur gyis/ khyod khrus byas la shog cig dang/ klad ba'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad sbyin no//
de khrus byas nas 'o ngas pa dang/ des de la klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad byin nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag cag ni 'dis 'tsho ba yin gyis// yul 'dir khyod kyis ma bya zhig/ mkhan po/
de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes 'tsho byad kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phyag byas nas/ rgyal po pad+ma'i sAng po'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas/ bdag gis sman dpyad bslabs lags kyi mche'o// de'i tshe

rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa spyi bsang zhes bya ba dgacig yod de/ des smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa spyi bsang zhes bya ba dag cig yod kyis/
'di ltar khyod ni shes rab can nus pa yin bas/ ri zhig de thob la phyis song zhig dang/ de ltar na bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi tshul byas par 'gyur ro// des de la khas blangs pa dang/ de nas dus
dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te btang ba las/ de mtha' 'khob pa skya bsang de rnams phung nas/ gte'u bzung/ dpya blangs te/ slar bde bar 'ongs nas khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du

rgyal po la phul ba dang/ deshin tu dga' nas/ de nyid la rjes su yi rang sa/ des kyang rgyunangashesakyi bu la byin no// de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du phyin nas/ de nyid du dbyar gnas/
te: de nas dag 'a khyung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba'i bstan bcos bslabs nas/ grong khyer ba zang byed nus rgyas pa dang/ ma zhig bkang khur khyer nas grong khyer du 'jug//
b.rus pa dang bags pa'i lhag ma lus pa// lus kun nas 'dzag pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas/ de la smras pa// kyi nang rjong zhig gis gnas skabs 'di lta bu r gyur/ des skyes pa
bdag gis kyang mi shes na/ 'on kyang bdag gis shing khur 'di khyer nas/ bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su myur to// de shing brtag pa la byung ba yin pas smras pa/ kyi nang rje
rtsi shabakhur 'di 'tshong dam/ 'tshong ngo// rin ji tsam// kar sha pa Nalnga bcu'o// des de nyos nas/ de nas bltas nas/ 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes du ba'i nor bu mthong nas/
de'i ma bu ni 'di 'dra ste/ gang gitsha nad pa'i mdun du bzhag pa de'i tshe/ marams khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin du nad dzalta ba bzhin du snang ngo// de rim gyis yul u dum wa rar phyin pa dang/ de
na mi bres 'jalal zhig yod pa das bra bor gzhal nas/ bre mgo la bskrun pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas smras pa/ kyi nang ci'i phyir de ltarabyed/ bdag gi klad pa lhag par g.ya' 'o// chur

shog blta'o zhes des de bsnyal nas klad pa bltas te/ de nas 'tsho byad kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa'i nor bu de'i klad pa'i steng du bzhag pa dang/ ji tsam na spen gyi midacig snang ngo//
de nas des smas pa/ kyenang rje khyod kyi klad pa la srin gyi med yod do// des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs tasbas pa/ bdug pa dpyad mdzod cig/ des khas blangs so// 'tsho byed kyis
bsams la/ mkhan pos ji skad bstan pa bzhin 'di'i dbu du bya'o snyam nas/ dus de la smras pa/ kyi nang re ra zhig de ring dang nas la lci ba dag sta gon byos shig dang/ sang dpyad
bya'o des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas song ngo// 'tsho byed kyis de'i phyi de nyani 'ongs nas/ de dong du bcug ste klad pa 'khrid pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyisakad pa'i thod pa phya nas/ sam ba tsha
bas sran gyi med kyi sgrub la reg par byas te/ des rkang lag 'khums pa dang/ de nas des skam pas blangs te bor bas sos par gyur to// des de la kar sha pa Na la brgya byin pa dang/ des
kyang rgyun shes kyis bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed yul ro hiti ka zhes bya bar phyin pa dang/ ul ro hiti ka na khyim bdag cig la skyed mos tshel ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu phun sum
tshogs pa zhig yod de/ de ri la lhag par chags pa las/ sha nas de nyid du mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes so/ de'i bu ni khyim gyi dpon por gyur nas/ des skyed mos chel der srung ma'i
ma bzhag pa dang/ de min yin pa des bsad do// gnyis pa kha nag pa dang de yang bsad nas/ khyim bdag gi bu des skyad mos tshal de bor ro// ji tsam na mi dmu chus gang pa snyan ba thams
[r ]cad kyis sbyangs pa zhig/ skyed mos tshal der song nas nul mo brang ba tab ste 'dug nas/ kye ma'o bdag ni mi ma yin pas bsad kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nyid du 'tsho
byed kyang nub mo brang btab ste 'dug go/ ji tsam na mi ma yin pa des/ dmu chu cand bsdigs par brtsams pa dang/ dmu chu'i nad de byung nas smras pa/ 'di bdag gas sngar bzung na ci'i phyir
'di bsdigs/ khyod la ra sa'i dud pas 'dug pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ desani khyod du pag tshad bcu gas su 'bros par 'gyur ro// des kyang sngar sas pa/ khyod la gung la phug gis bon
mar byung ba'i dar ba dang btags te sbyin pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ des ni khyod dum bu dum bupa'atshag par 'gyur ro// thamasacad 'tsho byadakyis rjes nas/ de nang par sngar langs te khyim
bdag dra'i drung du song nas/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag skyed mos chel ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu phun sum tshogs pa ci'i phyir dor/ khyim bdag gis de la ji ltar gyur ba rnams sbas ba
dang ! dus sbas pa/ khyim bdag re su'i dud pas bdugs shig dang/ mi ma yin pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur 'o// khyim bdag gis ri su'i bdug pas bdugs pa dang/

mi ma An ba do dpag tshad bcu gnyis su bris pa ra gyur to// khyim bdag des kyang 'tsho byed la kar sha pa Na lta brgya byin pa dang/ ris de yang rgyun shes kyi khu la bskor ro// de nas 'tsho byed kyis/
dau tshu can la dris pa/ nang che khyod ci'i phyir mi ma yin pas gnas btab pa'i spyod mos tshal du 'dug des re la ji ltar gyur ba dug sbas pa dang/ 'tsho byed kyis sbas pa/ la phug
ga sa bon ma ra phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags pa 'khrungs shag dang/ sos par 'gyur ro// des 'thungs nas sos par gyur te/ mi ngas kyang 'tsho byed la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin no// des de
yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis bcom brlag tu phyin nas/ bcom brlag gi phyi rolanashing zhig gi drung du ngal bso zhing 'dug go/ ji ltar na gyad kyis khyad cig
ba rdabs nga sa de'i nang khrolo rnams 'khrugs nas de shi'i zhes phyi rol tu phyung ngo// shing de la yang bya rgod mo phrug gu dang bcas ba zhig 'dug pa las/ da la thug gu do rnams kyis sbas pa/
ma sha byin cig/ des sang/ dug ga la yod/ de rnamus kyis sa pa mgyad kyis rgyud 'di brdabs tesha nas byung ba yin no// bu 'dir snyan ba'i rgyal bo 'tsho bar 'ongs na/
des 'ad sos bar byad pa'i gnas de yod do// ma 'deca zhig gis sos par 'gyur/ gal te ri'i nang khrol rnams du mas reg par byas na'o// da thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos so//
de nas de langs te ro drung du song nas dris pa// shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig/ de rnams kyis sbas pa 3 gyad kyis gyod brdabs khas sha ba mni no// 'tsho byad kyis smras pa zhog
cig dang blta'o// de rnams kyis bzhag pa dang/ den 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu klad par bzhag nas brtags na/ ji tsam
na nang khrol rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas/ das smyug ma'i sbubs su ma blugs te khas bus pa dang/ phyi mas nang khrol rnams la rog nas sos par gyur to// des kyang 'tsho
nga la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang/ des kyang rgyun shes kyicu la bskuraro// bcom brlag na khyim bdag cig yod pa de'i chung ma gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa yin bas/ de de la
lhag par chags shing 'dug pa las/ bsha nas de nyid kyi mo mchen gyi srin bur skyes par gyur to// de gang dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod pa de shi bar byed do// de nas de dang 'ga' ya nga lhan cig/
dga' dgur spyod par m byed do// des sman ba 'tsho byed der 'ongs so zhes thos nasaM/ de de'i drung du song bas skus pa// 'tsho byed bdago pa khro nad mchis kyis dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byed kyis de
mthong zhing sba ba'i tshig thos nas chags pas smras pa// dam zhig bca' sku/ gal te bdag dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad pa ltan dpyad bya'o// des smras pa/ g.yar tshe lags so//
des smras pa/ khyod kyi dpyad gzhan ni mad do// bdag las 'phangs pa gzhan med pas des khas blangs so// de nas des sgron mor phyung// bzo bcos byas nas mo mtshan gyi sgo sha'i dum bu
zhig bzhag pa las/ de nas srin bu de de la chags ba dang/ des de blangs nas bor ta/ sos par gyur to// de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par zhinapas brda zhig byas pa dang/ des rna ba

gnyis bkag ste smras pa// khyod kho po'i sring mo dang 'dra ste/ khyod kyi dbang de yin pas kho bos de ltar byas par zad do// des kyang de la ka ra sha pa Nalnga brgya byin pa dang/ des de yang rgyun shes kyi/
khu 'bakur ro// de nas 'tsho byed kyis rim gyis chu bo ya mun nu'i 'gram du phyin pa dang/ des de na mir zhig yod pa de'i rtang pa'i phyogs na rgyus pa'i phreng yod pa nya rnams kyis drangs pa los//
pa'i mig 'byed pa dang 'a khrims pa mthong nas/ 'tsho byed kyis de thams cad brtags te/ ji ltar rgyus pa dang/ long mo lasogs pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel 'bas ni de kho na ltar 'dug go snyam nas/ de
ma gyis las pa can du phyin pa dang/ jitsam na khyod kyis gyad cigawal mos bsnyan pas tshig ga 'bras bu 'phags pa dang/ 'tsho byed de'i drung du song nas/ res rnying pa'i rgyus pa'i brang nas
drangs pa dang/ slar tshud par gyur to// des de la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang/ des 'jigs mod kyi ma la byin no// yangs pa can na ma zhig yod pa de'i rna bar srin gyi med zhugs te
ra de las phug gu bdun brgya byung bas/ de rna ba'i nad kyis nyan par gyur nas/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du song sta sbas pa/ dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byad kyis bsams pa/ sngar ni bdag
gis mkhan pos bstan pa las byas kyis/ dan rang gi blos byas so snyam nas/ des mi de la bsgo ba/ kyi nang rje song la le ma'i sul bo byas te ras sngon pos g.yog
la de'i 'og tu rje zhig zhog ste sa yang dron por gyis shig/ des ji skad bstan pa bzhin thams cad byas so// de nas 'tsho byed kyis mi des la bsnyal nasas de chus chag chag btab

nas: de nas rnga brdungs pa dang/ srin gyi med kyis dbyar gyi dus la bab bo snyam nas phyir byung ngo// de nas 'tsho byed kyis rna ba'i drung du sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa dang/ de yang spyir zhugs te
phrug gu rnams khrid de byung nas/ phrug bu rnams dang lhan cig sha'i dum bu la chags pa dang/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis de'i mod la sha'i dum bu bor ba dang/ midis sos par gyur to// der kar
sha pa Na lnga brgya byin ba dang/ des 'jigs med kyi ma labyin no// de'am gyis rgyal bo'i khab tu phyin pa dang/ rgyal po gzugs can sAng pos 'tsho byed ji ltar 'ongs pa byes nas/ des
gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la bsgo ba/ bu khyod kyi phu bo 'ongs kyis bsur song zhig/ de bsur song ba dang/ 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu ma skyes dgu ji ltar bsur 'ong ba thos nas// des bsams ba/
gal te bdag gis de bsur ba rang gir byas na ni/ rnam rgyal po 'gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de slar legs sgo gzhan zhig nas zhugs so// dus gzhan zhig
rma 'tsho byed skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te/ sams ga nga zhing song ba dang/ ji tsam na bram ze zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas 'tsho byed kyi drung du song// bdag la sman ston
cig tshig pa zos nas sus pa/ bral bas thob cig/ des drang po zhig pas/ thal bas brtag pa dang sos par gyur to// mag nad kyis thebs pa gzhan zhig yod pa de yang 'tsho byed/
kyi drung du song ba bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/ kyi nang rje gang du 'gro/ des ji ltar gyur pa d+mas pa dang/ des smras pa/ khyod la 'tsho byed ci dgos/ des kho bo la gang bstan pa de byos
shig/ de yid ches par gyur nas/ des thal ba btab pa dang long bar gyur to// dusaM gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i spyi bor la migakhyung ngo// rjes blon po rnams la bsgo ba/
bas ldan dag sman pa rnams khug cig/ blon po rnams kyis sman pa rnams bkug pa dang/ rgyal pos sas pa/ shes ldan dag nga'i sA bor phal mig byung gis dpyad byos shig/ de rnams /
kyis smras pa/ rtswa sman pa chen po 'tshobyed mchis na/ bdag cag gi bgyi ci 'tshel rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'tsho byed khug cig/ de rnams kyis tshigs bkug pa dang/ rgyal pos smras
pa 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig/ 'tsho byad kyis smras pa// lha dam zhig bca' sa/ gal te lu la bdag nyid kyis khrus bgyid du gnang na bgyi'o// de bzhin gyis shig/ de nas 'tsho ba kyis/
skya ru ras skud cing smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag kha tab nas/ smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs te/ gang gi tshe smon pa

pa'i tshon ma tshor ba spu gris rig par bya ba dang rdol lo// de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab nasaM/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu du ma pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang/ ma
de sos shing pags po 'drab dang skra yang manyam par gyur to// rgyal po khrus byas ma thag tu sbas pa/ 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig/ des smras pa// lha re zhigashos gsol cig/ rgyal pos zan
sanas/ 'tsho skyid dpyad phyes shig lha bgyis legs so// de yid ma ches nas lag pas byugs na phyogs gang na rma yod pa ma shes so// me long blangs te bltas na 'on kyang ma mthong ngo//
btsunamo la dris na/ ngos kyang phyogs gang na rma yod pa ma shes so// rgyal ba mchog tu ngo mchir skyes nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'tsho byed na ba'i rgyal por dbang
sku ri zhig/ me leng ba des smras pa/ lha ci sras la byams pas sam 'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur bar mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sman mkhas pas so/ des smras pa/ gal
te de lta lags na/ 'a dis bdag ni sos par ma bgyis lags so// 'tsho byad kyis sbas pa/ kyi nang rdzabadagags khyod mthongo yang ma mthong nasos par lta ga la byas/ ris skyas ba dani mang na/
'on kyang khyod kyis gang la bstan pa des bdag la bstan to// ci zhig bstan/ che ge mo zhig go/ 'tsho byed kyis sbas pa/ de'i khams kyang gzhan la/ khyod kyi khams kyang ga zhan yin/
sa da 'di dang 'di dag khyos shig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des byas nas sos par gyur ba dang sbas pa/ lha 'di sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar mdzad du gsol/ de glang po che lu
zhon nas dpal gyi 'byor pachonapos snyan pa'i rgyal bor dparab skur ro// rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa sman gyi nad kyis thebs nas smon pa thams cad kyis sbyangs ba dang/ des
bas mas pa/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du 'gro'o// gal te dpyad cig byasonani de ltan lags/ gal te ma byas na bdag nyid 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/ de 'tsho byed kyi drung du song nas/ 'tsho bar bdag la
dpyad mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyi sman 'di ni rnyed par dka' 'o// des bsams pa/ 'tsho byed kyis kyang bdag sngangs na/ 'di la ci byar yod/ dus la bab kyis bdag
ni'ami'o snyam nas/ da dur khrod du song ngo// de narosreg pa'i ma 'bar ba'i 'u le gdug pa zhig dang/ srog chags go rgyu tsan dan zhes bya ba 'thobs te lhung ba dang/ debakres pas nyen
pas de gnyis kar bros te/ lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thu ngas nas/ dur khrod dang ha cang yang maring ba zhigan gnag lhas yod pa der song ste/ ko dra'i chan dang mar phyung
ba'i no 'thungs pas sman rdol te ar son yur 'khrus nas/ sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na lus 'phags ma'i 'doms kyi phyogs su bol
mgabyung ngo// des rgyal po la sbas pa dang/ rgyal bos/ 'tsho byed la bsgo ba/ ma yar mo'i dbyar gyis shig/ des khas blangs so// de nas zan byas te/ ma ma la byin nas khyod kyis
'di'i stong du 'jug tu chug cig des de 'dub tu bcug pa'i zan 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas bsams pa// phyogs che ga mo zhag na'o sAm mo// de nas snyan bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab ste
sIn bar shas nas/ zanagyi nang du gtsags bu sbas ta ma ma la bsgo ba/ khyod kyis de 'di la 'dug tu chug la 3 btsun mo 'dug nas slar slongs shig des de bzhin byas pa las gcigs jus
rig mthag tu ro la mig rdol bar gyur to// de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dang bsres pa bas ba'i chus bkrus to/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams btab pas sos par gyur to// 'tsho byed rgyal/

po'i drung du song ba dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed khyodakyis ma lar mo'i dbyar byas sam/ lha bgyis so// khyod kyis sgren mor byung snyam bltas grang/ lham bltas so// ji ltar byas/ des ji ltar
gyur pa rnams smras pa dang/ rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ des blon po rnams la sAs pa/ 'tshobyed la lan gnyis su smin pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur zhig/ mi skrun can la 'tsho byed kyis sman
rnyed par dka' 'o zhes sbas pa gang yin pa des sas pa/ lha ci sras la sdug pas sam/ 'on te san mkhas pas dbang bskur bar mdzad/ rgyal pos sbas pa/ sman mkhas pas so//
gal te de lta lags na/ 'das bdag ni sos par mabagyis so// 'tsho byed kyis sas pa/ kyi nang rje ngas khyod la dpyad ni ma byas kyi/ 'on kyang ngas khyod kyi smanan red par dka' 'o zhes snyas
so/ das snyas pa/ bdag gi snyan nga lcabu dgacag yin/ 'tsho byed kyis sbas pa/ gal te zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la mi ser skya cig ga nas de dur khrod du srogapa na ne'u le 'dug
pa dang srog chags go d+hatsan dan 'thabs nas lor lhung ba dang/ de gnyise khyod kyis zos la/ dbang phyug chen po'i lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs la/ ko
dra'i chan zos shing mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs na/ de lta na khyod mod la sos pa ra 'gyur te/ bdag gis de las bsams nas snyan rnyed par dka' 'o zhes sbas pa yin no// des smos pa
shin tu legs par shes// de bzhin du bdag gis zos so// de nas dga' bar gyurenas sbas pa/ lha 'dis sman pa'i rgyal po rdo thog gis/ dbang bskur bas dbang bskur du gsol/ lan gnyis

su langasman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur ro// gang gi tshe mi dge ba'i grogs po lhas byin gyis ma skyes dgu bsus nas/ phatshes kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral ba de'i tshe/ de la skran gyi nad kyis
thebs par gyur to// dus snyan pa rnams la skyas pa/ ngal dpyad gyis shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha lha'i gcenA bo snyan pa'i rgyal bo bla na med pa'i 'tsho byad 'di na/
mchis pa zhan du ba dag cag gis dpyad bakhyed rdzogi la thog/ des blon po rnams la sbas ba/ shes ldan dag 'tsho byed khug cig/ de rnams kyis bkug pa dang/ 'tsho byad nga la skran gyi nad byung
gi 'dapyad byos shog/ lha bgyi'o// des bsams pa/ rgyu gnyis kyis skrun rdol bar gyur te/ lhag par dga' bu 'am/ lhag par khres pas yin no/ sems can sdig pa byed pa 'di lhag
par dga' bar ga la 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du khros par bya'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/ lha ram zhig bca' sgyu/ gal te gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po'i sha gsol ba lta na dpyad
bgyi'o/ rgyal pos thos nas khros te sbas pa/ legs so// ngas ni pha srog dang bral/ khyod kyis kya 'char byed bzang po srog dang phral/ nga yang rang nyare nad kyis shinas/ khyod ni rgyal por
'gyur mod/ sa sAs kha/ lha dpyad ni 'di lags te gzhan gyis sos par rtsom thogago/ bdag dang 'dra ba'i phangs pa med pas des khas blangs so// de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu
'tsher byed bzang bo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rgyal po la bul to/ lha gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po la legs par gzigs pa de ltar mdzad du gsol/ phyis gzigs par mi 'gyur ro//
de nas de bstan nas// khyim du khridi nas bzhag go/ de nas 'tsho byed sha'i don du bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba las/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod nishi ba'i ros stong pa ma yin pas/ de
nas des ro'i sha blangs te/ mo khyad kyi khyad par dag dang g.yos byas nas/ rgyal po drel bab pa'i dus su bstabs so// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras sha khu'i phor pa bla sa nas za bar gathas pa
dang 'tsho byed kyis rdzogs nas klad du bsnun te/ sdig pa byed pa khyod kyis pha chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal bo srog dang phral la/ dbu'i sha yang za bar byed dam/ de rngams nas sbas pa/
gal te de lta na ci'i phyir gsad ces mi bzod pa rgyas pas/ de'i skan rdol nas yar slon mar 'khrus te/ kha nas khrag dang bcas par byung ba de mthong nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel lo// de nas chus
gtor nas dbugs sur byung ba dang/ khrus byas te 'phrod pa'i zas byin pas/ sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas 'tsho byad kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te
khrid de rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis gtugs te slus pa/ lha gzhon nu 'char byed bzang bo 'di lags te/ bdag srog chags grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral bar bgyid mi bod na/
gzhon nu lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'on kyang thabs 'dase lha 'tsho bar 'gyur bas/ bdag gis thabs bsham par bgyis par bas so// rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ des blon po
rnamar la bsgo ba/ 'tsho bar sman pa'i rgyal bor dbang skur zhig/ blon po rnams kyis glang po che la bskyon nas// dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos lan gsum du ma nga sman
ba'i rgyal bor dbang bskur ba sa dbang bskura'o// de nas 'tsho byed dregs pa skyes taM/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i nab ni 'jig rtenan 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni lus kyi dbang byed pa
rnams kyi mchog yin la/ bcom ldan 'das ni samasakyi dpyad mdzad pa rnams kyi mchog yin no snyam mo// des dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba las/ de grags
pa'i bsnyams pas bden pa rnams ma mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed na ci'i phyir bden pa rnams ma mthong bar gyur snyam na/
grags pa'i bsnyams pa las gyur par gzigs nas/ do'i drugs pa sbyang ba bya'o snyam nas/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho
byed khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po gang tsan mthongangam/ btsun pa ma mthong lags so// dbazhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zung zhig des bzung ba dang/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis sman ba'i rgyal bo 'tsho byed khrid nas/ ri'i rgyal po gangs can ga la ba der gshegs pa dang/ de na sman rnam pa sna tshogs sgron ma bzhin 'bar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
00 sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'tsho byed snyan ji tsam 'dod pa long zhig/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs lags so/ de na ba com ldan 'das kyis ) gnod spyin
lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal ba/ lag na rdo rje song la 'tsho byed la bsrung ba byos shig/ de dang song nas 'tsho byed la snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dag blangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed snyan 'di mang ci yin/ des gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'dus cha ga mo lags te/ tshog 'dis nad tsha ge mo zhig zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni che ge mo zhi'og lags te/
nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhibar 'gyur ro// gzhan rnams kyi ming yang mi shes so// ma shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed 'din che ge mo ste/ chog
chag mos nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di yang che ge mo zhig ces bya'o// 'tsho byed kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman dpyad kyang mkhyen pa lta/ de nu bcom ldan 'das
kyisu0f10 snyan pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa// 'tsho byed sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa/ yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa ni rgyal po la 'os pa/ rgyal po la mgo ba/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su
'dul ba gzhi// bam po drug cu gnyisapa/ ga bzhi gang dgace na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad la mkhas pa yin/
nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin/ nad byung ba snang ba la mkhas pa yin/ spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ nad la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di
la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing/ nad 'di ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes/ de ltar nad la mkhas pa yin no// nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa
nad shes shing/ nad 'di ni rlung gis kun nas bslang ba 'am/ mkhris pa sa kun nas bslang ba 'am/ bad kan gyis kun nas bslang ba 'am/ bdag las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan las gyur pa
'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'o zhes/ de ltar nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin no// nad byung ba slong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shas shang/ nad 'di
ni mig sman nam/ bsku mnye 'am/ skyags snyan nam/ bkru sman nam/ snar blugs pa 'am/ du bas bdug pa 'am/ nun rtsi'i las kyis song bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar nad byung ba

sbyong ba la mkhas pa yin no// nadasungs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing/ nad 'di ni ra sdod pa'i cho ga 'di lta bu dag byas te sangasaM na
phyis mi 'byung ngo zhes/ de ltar nad sangs pa phyis ma 'byung ba la mkhas ba yin te/ de ltar na sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa/ rgyal po la 'os pa yin/ rgyal po la mkho
ba yin/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun lag bzhi dang ldan pa yang sman pa zug rngu
'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o// 'tsho byed bzhibang dgace na/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgrwa btsem pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'di ni sdug bsngal 'dzugs pa'i bden pa'o
zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden

pa'o zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'tsho phyid sman pa zug rngu 'byin pas na skyo ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i snyanu mi shes so// rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/
mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i snyan mi shes so// 'tsho byed de bzhin gshegs pas ni
skyo ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sa ga bsngal rnams sngang ba'i sman mkhyen no// rga ba dang/ nub dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/
'khrug pa'i rtsa ba canagyi sdug bsngal rnams snang ba'i sman mkhyanano// de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i nges [']sanang zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes
bya'o: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyad chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing drim dang bral ba skyes so// de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyod
kyis chos mang ba dang/ chos thob pa dang/ chos rig pa dang/ chos kyi gting spobs pa dang/ som nyi las rgal ba dang/ the tsom las rgal ba dang/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang/ gzhan gyis
ma bkri ba dang/ ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la ma 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba/
btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
la skyabs su mchin/ dge bsnyan du gzung du gsol/ deng sman chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te// skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas snyan pa'i rgyal po 'tsho
byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo// ri'i rgyal po gangs can kha bas yog sa rtag tu lhags pa che bas/
bcom ldan 'das grang nad kyi snyun gyis thebs pa dang/ sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ dpar na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba bzhin/ bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan
0: 'das la rim gro bya'o snyam mo// de nas 'tsho byed kyis me tog ut+pa la sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ bkru sman gyi rdzas dag sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams shangs
kyis bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bsnams pa las thang sum cu rtsa gnyis kho na 'khrus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ga la legs par
'khrus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed skyon gang dgagayos la ma 'khrus pa de dag kyang yod ) 'khrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod )'khrus la g.yos pa yang bon/
ma 'khrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod do// 'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na bu ram dang a ru ra gsol la/ khu ba'i rami pa yung mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de

bzhin du mdzad nas snyan gdangs par gyur to// 'tsho byed kyi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po 'am 3 blon po gang su'i dpyad byas kyang rung ste ros de la grong dam/ grong mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no// ji tsam
dus gzhan zhigan/ 'tsho byed kyis lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dpyad byas pa las/ sa de la brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug pocha zhig byin pa dang/ des de blangs pa nas bcom ldan 'dus gun
ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus brgyad kyis:
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod ba ni rgyal bo 'am ) blon po gangasu'i da pa da ba byas kyang rung ste/ des bdagal grong ngan/
gror mchog stsol kha lags pas/ bdag gi lus la phugs kyi rgyal bo la dpyad bgyis pa dang/ des bdag la brgya stong ra ba'i ris shag stsal ba 'di bcom ldan 'das la bdag sa khul zhing namus
na: bcom ldan 'dus thugs brtsapa nye bar gzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus baspyad las brgya stong re ba'i gos be'u ras yug po bzhes so// de'i tshe tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das lagayob cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
ba kun dga' bo brgya stong re ba'i gos re'u ras yug bo ma long la/ de'i ched du gris dros shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs te/ sa phyogs gsal ba yangs par song nas
gzhal bar brtsams ba las/ chos gos mang du ldang bar mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' chos gos gsum dang/ bdag nyid kyi bla gos mthang gos dang bcas ba dang/ tshe
dang ldan pa sgragacan 'dzin gyi ral cung dpung chad gcigabyas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gyi gnas der ngas lnga brgya brnyes shang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang du ma zhig redan/ dge slong
rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ma shes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rdzas su gnang ste/
dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos gris dras/ kha dog ngan par byas pa khotsang bar bya'o// rgyal po gzugs can snying bo'akun tu spyod pa na dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las
babs nas rkang pa la phyag byed pa min no// de dus gzhan zhig na glang bo che la zhenanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byed du song ba las/ ji tsam na lamagyi dbus
nas 'tsho ba ba zhig mthong nas/ de de la gus pa bskyed de/ glang po che las babs nas kar pa gnyis la gcugs so// den ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis bsams pa// lhani dge slong 'ga'
zhig la mngon par dad pa ma yin no// dad pa can gang yin ba de dgags bsams pa/gdon mi za bar lhas dge slong yin snyam ste/ de gus pas glang po cha las babs nas/ rkang pa gnyis/
la gtugs so snyam nas/ de rnams la de gnyis su gyur te/ rgyal po la sas ba/ lhas su laphyagabagyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la'o// lha ra ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thes
ma lags te/ 'tshob pa lags so// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'disnyem du saMms te/ bdag gi don la'ang kho na gsolal snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo
spyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pan dag slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthongon glang po che la babs nas/ de'i
rkang pa la phyag bgyid pa lags pa las/ de ring bdag gus ba skyas nas glang po che las babs te dge slong lags snyam nas 'tsho ba pa'i rkang pa la gtugs lags kyis/ kye ma'o bcom ldan
'dus kyis thugs brtse ba nya bar ga zung ste/ 'bags pa rnams kyi chos gos rnams la mtshan ma cung zad cig gdab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying bo lacan
mi gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'dus cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song
ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'tsho ba pa gang gis bden pa mthong ba la phyug bdag gir byas pa nyams te ma rung ngo
de'i tshe tshe dang ldan/ pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam legs na bsil lab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka2
wastsal ba/ kun dga' khyod kyis lus 'phags kyi ri bo mthod ngan/ btsun pa ma mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' tshes gos kyi mtha' nas zung zhi/ des bzung ba dang
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bo'i khab nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ de nyidi nas rdzu 'phrul gyis stang gi nam mkha' las gshegs nas lus 'phags kyi ri bo la bzhugs so//
tshe ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyi nangamanyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam pa// rnang gi khyad par snatshogs dag rnang sgal gyis 'brel zhing mdzes pa dgagazigs nas/ tshe dang ldan pakun dga' bo la bka' stsal/
ba kun dga' bo khyod kyis nang mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam la/ rnang gi khyadapar sna tshogs ngag rnang sgalakyis 'brel bar mdzes pa de dag mthongadag/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun
dga' bo de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu r chos gos rnams dras tu drub par bya'o// gnas brtan kun dga' bos/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ khyed kyis 'di lta bu r
chos gos rnams dros la drul sa shig/ dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dras te drub par brtsams na/ ma bu rnams kha phyogs gcig tu btsun pas mi mdzes na// tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bos bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' ma stsal mod kyi/ 'ang kho nas rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yodado snyam nas des snam bu rnams kha phyogs
gnyis kar bstan na/ 'on kyang mtha' skor med bas mdzes bar ma gyur nas/ mtha' bskor byas so// de nas byas shing zin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
la phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo legs so legs so// ngas gang gi phyir bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis shes te// de lta bas na dge slong
rnams kyis 'di lta bu r chos gos rnams dras la drub par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dras shing drubs pa re re bcangs nas/ lhag ma ni ma dras so// de nas bcom ldan
'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ 'brog gnas su byon nas 3 'brog gnas na 'brog gnas kyi chel na bzhugs so// 'brog gnas 'bab chu dang nya bas grang zhing rlung
ldang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thun dang po la mthang gos gsol to// thun bar ma la blagos gsol to// thun tha ma la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
bo nga la snam sbyar gyis g.yogs shage// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lag pa gnyis bkrus nas snum sbyar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du g.yogs te// bcom ldan 'das kyisan bza'
chos gos gsum gyis mtshan mo de 'das por mdzad do// de nas nam nangs nas dgongs pa/ 'jig rten na shin tu skyid pa 3 bde bar 'dod pa gang dag yin pa su yang rung/ de rnams kyi mchog
ni nga yin te/ da yang chos gos gsum gyis 'tsho bar spyod na/ pA'i nyan thos rnams lta mos kyang ci dgos snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de lta
bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis dres pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong zhig la chos
gos gsum pa med nas/ de phying ba zhig red nas/ das de dra bar brtsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs nas lcas pa// dge slong 'di ci yan/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dras ba'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ bdag la tshes gos gsum ma mchasi nas btsal ba las/ bdag gis phying ba 'di
rnyed de dras nas chos gos bgyi'o// dge slong 'di ni dra ba'i 'os ma yin no// 'on kyang lhan thabs kyis glan pa'i 'os yin pas lhan thangos kyis glan nas bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/
gshegs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka2

stsal pa// dge slong dge slong che ge mo zhes bya tho la chos gos sod nas phying pa 'dra bar byid kyis/ dge slong dag de lta bas na la dra ba ni lnga ste/ phying pa thams cad du nga/ snam bu thams cad dang/ be'u
ras thams cad dang/ song ras thams cad dang/ klam sboms cad de lhan thabs kyis khronanas bcang bar bya'o/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ ko
sa la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po'i mchog redags 'dzinaces bya ba des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de da dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do/ du
rtsa ba'abyed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ khye'u zhig btsas so zhes bya ba de bzhin du khye'u bdun btsas te/ de la drug gi ming nici dga' bar btags so/ tha chung gang yin pa de'i

ming ni sa ga zhes bya bar btags so// ji tsam nari dgas 'dzin gyi chung ma shi nas/ des bu drug gi khyim phub pa dang/ de rnams rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhan cigabyi dor lhur len cing khyim du
'tshonam mi sams par 'dug go/ khyim bdag ra dgus 'dzin 'gram pa la lag pa gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de'i grogs bshes bram ze zhag yod pa des 'ongs nas/
dus de sams khongs su chud pa mthong nas/ sa sa pa/ khyim bdag ci'i phyir sams khongs su chud/ bdag gabu 'di dag rang rang gi chung ma dang lhan cig phyi dor lhur len cing khyim gyi 'tsho nam
mi sems par 'dug pas khyim zhig par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ ci'i phyir sa ga khyim ma dbub/ gal te na de yang lhag par phung krol byed kyang sus shes/ gal te na 'di lhag par legs
par byed kyang sus shes/ gal te khyod da na bu mo zhig btsal lo// de bzhin du gyis shig/ de tshol zhing rim gyis yul tsam par phyin to// tsam pa na khyim bdag stobs kyi bshes gnyen zhes
bya ba yod de/ de'i bu mo yag ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba dar la bab pa/ tshul dang dul ba dang ldan pa/ mkhas pa/ g.yar pa zhig yod pa de/ bu mo yid 'phrog ma gang 'dod pa
rnams dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir chas pa dang/ bram ze de yang phyogs der phyin te/ des bu mo rnams mthong nas/ nges bsams la/ 'di rnams kho na la re zhig brtag par
bya'o snyam nas/ de bzhag pa lhur len cing dal bus 'jab cing de rnams kyi phyi bzhin du song ngo// bud mad na phal cher yang ba'i rang bzhin yin bas/ de rnams las kha cig ni bang rgyug kha cig
mchongs pa byed/ khacig ni'agro/ kha cig ni rgod/ kha cig ni lus sbyar bar byed/ kha cig ni glu len par byed do/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang spyod tshul ngan pa dag byed do// dul ba phun sum

tshogs pa de ni gom pa dal gyis de dag dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o// ji tsam na skyad mos tshal du phyin pa dang/ bu mo de rnams ni rdzong gi 'gram du gros rnams bzhag nas mod la zhugs te rtsa bar brtsams

so/ 2dan jitsam jitsam chur nub par de tsam datsam du gos dag lnga zhung 'jug la jitsam ji tsam ldang ba de tsam de tsam du gos dag 'bebasashang ldang// de lta bu r spyod lam zhi ba yin no// de nas khrus
kyis brtson pa byas nas gnas gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bu mo de rnams ni thog mar rang zas zos nas/ de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi skya bo la sbyin par rtsom mo// de ni 'a khor gyi skye bo/

la sngar byin nas de'i 'og tu rang za bar rtsom mo// de nas zos shing 'khrungs nas skyed mos tshal gyi bde ba nyams su myong bar byas nas dong ngo// dzitsam la makar chu rgal bar byed pa na/ bu mo de rnamA
ni mchu lcam rnams phud nas rgol lo// de ni mchil lham dang bcas pa kho nar ro// yang dong ste de dag kun dga' ra bar zhugs pa dang/ des na gdugs thogs te a mra'i tshal du byung ngo// gzhan
dag gis gdugs rnams bor ro// de nas rlung dang char pa bab nas de'i tshe bu mo rnams lha khang du zhugs nas 'dug go/ da na bla gab med pa na'o// bram ze de la nga de'i bzhin du song ba las/ des de'i

mtshan nyid dang spyod tshul de lta bu mthong nas/ de nas ngo mtshar skyes te bu mo de 'dri bar brtsams pa/ bu mo khyod su'i/ stobs kyi bshes gnyan gyi bu mo'i// bu mo khyod la cung zad cig dris ma khro
zhug des 'jum pa sngon du btang nas sbas pa/ khu gu 'dul khror ci mchis dris shig/ bu mo 'di dag thams cad ni rgyug pa dang/ mchong ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ lus sgyur bar byed pa dang glu

len par byed cing/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang spyod tshul ngan pa byed cing 'gro na/ khyod ni tshul dang dul ba phun sum tshogs pas dal bus rgyu zhing/ de rnams dpalhan cig skyed mos tshol du 'gro bar byed do//
[/ ]des snyas pa/ bu mo thams cad ni pha dang mas btsongs pa'i rdzas yin na/ gal te bdag gis mchongs sam 'gres nas/ rkang pa 'am lag pa bcag par gyur na/ bdag la su zhig slong
mtha' cig bzhag nas/ gos gcig kyang med par mod la zhugs nas rtsa ba'i rtsom la/ khyod ni ji tsam ji tsam chur nub pa da tsam de tsam du gos sngo bar byed do// khu gu bud med ni ngo tsha shes
pa dang/ khrel yod pa dang ldan par bya dgos pas/ gal te bdag gis gos phud pa 'ga' zhig gis mthong nami rigs par 'gyur ro// bu mo khyed la de nasu zhig lta/ khu gu re zhig khyod kho
nas kyang bdag mthong bar 'gyur ro// bu mo legs te de yang khong du chud do// gzhan yang 'di 'dri sta/ bu mo 'di dag ni rang sder zos nas/ de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi skya bo la zan sbyin par byed
la 3 khyod ni 'khor gyi rgya bowaM sngar zan byin nas/ de'i 'og tu rang za bar byed do// lu gu bdag cag ni bsod nams kyi 'bras dus 'tsho bas/ bdag cag la rtag tu dus ston mchis la/
'di dag ni tshogs 'byung ba'i 'bras bus 'tshob lags/ brgya lam na lan 'ga'i rgya chen po blob pa'i phyir ro// bu mo legs te de yang khong du chud do// gzhan yang 'dris/ 'jig rten
thams cad na skam la mal lham gyon la/ khyod ni chu la gyon pa de ci/ khu bu 'jig rten blun mod/ chu kho na la mchil lham bgo 'tshel te/ ci'i slad du zhe na/
tha nga la sdong dum dang/ tsher ma dang 3 rdo ba dang/ zug rdo dang/ nya phyis kyi dum bu dang/ srin kogagi dum bu rnams mngon la// chu la ni de dag ma mngon pas/ des chu kho na la mchil
lham bgo bar bgyi'i ( thang la na ma lags so// bu mo legs te de yang khong du chud do// gzhan yang 'di 'dri ste/ bu mo de dag ni nyi ma la gdugs thogs na/ khyod ni kun dga' ra ba'i
shade gi grib ma la thogs par byed na/ 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod/ khu gu 'jig rten blunamod/ kun dga'i ra ba kho nar gdugs bcang 'tshal te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun dga'i ra
ba ni rtag tu'u dang/ bya rnams kyis gang bas/ bya rnams ni gtsan rtug 'thor zhing rus pa'i dum budag 'thoraro// su'u rnams kyang bshang ba dang gci ba byed cing/ 'bras bu'i za
'bro dag 'thor bar byed la/ rang bzhin gyis rgod bag can yin pas phan tshun yal ga gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa na shing dum dgu ltung bar byed do// bla gab ma mchis pa la ni de dag ma
mchis so// brgya la mchis na yang de res 'ga' zhig 'bab par bas te/ des na kun dga' ra ba kho nar gdugs bcang bar bgyi'i bla gab ma mchis par ni ma lags so// bu mo lags/
te de yang khong du chud do// gzhan yang 'di 'dris/ bu mo 'di dag ni rlung dang char pa byung na lha khang du 'jug na/ khyod ni bla gab med par 'dug go/ khu gu bla gab ma mchis par kho nAr gnas/
par bgyi'i/ lha khang du 'jug par ni ma lags so// bu mo 'di la rigs pa ci yod/ khu gu lha khang stong pa 'di dag ni rtag tu dwa dang/ nal phrug dang/ g.yon can rnams kyis ma skyong
lags te/ gal tapadag zhugs pa'i yan lag dang/ nying lag dag la 'ga' zhig gis rig na/ de lta na bdag gi pha ma dag la mi snyan par mi 'gyur ram sa nu bla gab mad pa ra
srog dang bral ba na bla'i/ lha khang stongapar ni mi 'jug go/ de nas bram ze de de'i spyod tshul gyis myangs shing yid bde ba skyes nas/ khyim bdag stobs kyi bshes gnyen gyi khyim du zhugs
te bu mo thob par 'a dod pa'i pho ba dang bcas pas/ bde legs su gyur cig/ bde legras su gyur cig ces snyas ba dang/ khyim 'khor gyi skye bos sbas pa/ bram ze re zhig bslang ba'i
dus ni ma yin na ci zhig slong/ bu mo slong ngo// su zhig gi ched du/ chonyan yod na blon po'i mchog ro dregs 'dzin cig bya ba de'i bu sa ga zhes bya ba'i 'o/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ de
dang bdag cag narogs mnyam pa yin na/ 'on kyang yul ha cang thag rang chas so// des smras pa/ rang po kho na la bu mo sbyin par bya'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ nya na re zhig gal te bde bar gyur pa zosan/
dga' ba bskyed par zad/ nye na sdug bsngal bar gyur spyon pa dang/ mchod pa dang 3 bkur sti bya bas dub par 'gyur zhing/ nor 'god par yang 'gyur ro// de rnams
kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na sbyin no// de nas bram ze bde legs su gyur cig ces smras nas song sa ram byas mnyan yod du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa bsal te/ blon po'i mchog ri dgas
'dzin gyi drung du song nas/ da nas bu mo'i zla ba dang/ gnas pa'i spyod tshul dang/ gzugs bzang zhing dar la bab pa dang/ mdzes pa dang/ mkhas pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du bsnyad
nas sbas pa/ bdag gis nyonamo ngas ba chen pos yul dang tshong rdal sna tshogs su rgyus pas sdug bsngal kyis de rud kyis/ da ni sod la long 'gi/ de nas blon po' mtshog ri dga' dzin
gyis nyi ma dang/ tshes grangs dang/ ud tsam dad/ rgyu skar dag bstan nas/ tsem par 'o ngos te/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos sa ga'i chung ma blangs so// de mi yul du 'gro ba'i tshe
mas bslabs pa/ bu mo khyod kyis nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la rtag tu phyug=/ ma la bsnyan bkur bya/ me long drim phyi b.rakya/ gos dkar po bgo bar bya/ blang bar bya'i/ sbyin par mi bya/
tshag bsrung bar bya/ langs nas su la yang ston bstab par mi bya/ nam po bza' bar bya/ bde bar nyal bar bya/ them skas gzugs par bya'o// de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyis thos nas/
0 des bsams pa/ bu mo 'de lta ba log par 'dzin du bcug ste/ bdag gis 'di lta ba log pa dang phral la yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dzin du gzhug go snyam du bsams nas/ de blangs te chas so/
de nas de'i ma sdug pas snying dkrugs shing mag mchi mas gangabs mgul nas 'khyud nas du bzhan gyi nga ros sbas pa// bumo khyod mthong ba'i bla ma ni 'di An no// des de la shes khrar bya
ba'i phyir sbas pa/ yum ro zhig khyod 'dire 'khrungs sam/ 'on te nye du'i khyimaM du/ bu mo nyi ngu'i khyim du'o// khyod kyikhang pa de yin nam/ 'on te 'di in/ 'di mAne ne// bdag kyang 'dir
spyas la/ der bdag gnas b.rangs la 'dub mchisAn/ gdon ma za bar mthar 'bral bar 'gyur na/ bshums su ci mchis cang ma gsung zhug/ de nas ri dgas 'dzan ni thang la song//

sa ga la la ni khyim thab dang/ rang gi khyim nas thob pa'i 'khor gyi skya bo dang lhan cig tu krur dong ba las/ de na rta rgod ma re'u snyad byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhig rgyur gzhug par byas pa dang/ rta'u
thang la mi rga'o snyam nas bsgrims kyang 'jug tu ma btub pa dang/ ku co byung ba sa ga mas thos nas des snas pa/ ci'i phyir ku co 'di byung/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa rnams sbas pa dang/
sa ga mas smas pa/ rti'u sngar chug cig dang/ rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis de bzhinabyas pa dang zhugs so// de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis/ de rnams la dris pa/ ci'i
phyir khyed cag rang zhig lon nas 'ongs/ rta rgod ma grur mchong du ma btub pas so// 'on ji ltar mchodas/ tsam la mos thabs bshum pa zhig bstan te/ rta'u
sngar bcug pas so// tsam ba mo ni mkhas pa yin no// jitsam na 'a gron ba rnams lam kar nub mo bung btab ste gnas pa las/ ri dgas 'dzin gyi mal pa skyibs shig tu bcas pa sa gnas
mthong nas dris pa// 'di su'i mal/ ri dgas 'dzin kyi'o// sros shig/ ci'i phyir/ gal te gnyid kyis log pa la bya skyibs steng du jib na gdon mi za bar non pas 'chi bar 'gyur te/
bdag gang zhig blangs nas po khyim du ma phyin par lam kar sha ba 'di lta bu'i bu mo bag mar blang zhes/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma sAn pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mal de gad gros ba las
gad pa zhig pa dang/ skya bo'i tshogs chen pos khyim bdag non to zhes kun tu brgyugs pa dang/ khyim bdag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag 'di na 'dug gis ma sgrug par lam rtogs
shig[﹙]mal sros so// sus/ sa ga mas so// cim pa ma ni mkhas pa yin no// yang skyed mos maMl rAri pa zhig tu nub mo blang btab ste 'khod pa las/ ri degs 'dzin gyi ma la lha
khang stong pa zhig tu khacas pa sa gamasamathong nas dris pa/ 'di su'i mal/ dbonamo'i 'o// ltos shig ci'i phyir/ gal te lha khang ba ste/ rdos non nangashi bar 'gyur te// bdag la zhes khyab nas/
00 ma sAn ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// mal de yang sos pa las lha khang zhig pa dang/ skya bo'i tshogs chen pos brgyugs pa dang zhes bya ba dang/ cem pa ma ni mkhas
pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// ji tsam rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa bsal te/ mdza' bshes dang/ nye du dang/ gnyen gyi skye bos basmras nas/ sa ga
ma rang gi rigs dang 'tsham pa'i khyim bdag las byed do// ri dgas 'dzin gyi mna' ma drug gis re mo ri mos khyim mi'i zan sbyor ba las/ sa ga ma la yang de bzhin du bsgo sa/ khyod kyi ras

kyang zhag bdun la sbyor zhig/ de'i res la bab tu cu ba dang/ gyos po dang/ smyug mo dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyi phyi'i lhag ma gang yin pa de dag ri lur byas nas nyi ma re re zhing snyoms so// nyi ma re

ra zhing nod pa'i bya gang yin ba de las kyang dre kha phri ste bzhag la/ lhag ma mar dong bsres pas de dang ched mnyam bar gyur to// sang lta bu ras bab pa na/ chang btung la reg par bya ba dang/ khyim
zab dang rang gi ma tog gi 'phrang b.rung pa gang yin bde dag bsil bar bzhag nas/ dri tsim na nam nangs pa dang las byed pa rnams la skyu rtsi dang/ dri dang/ me tog dang/ zas dang/ chung
dag byin no// de rnams shin tu mgu nas bdag cag ring zhig lon nas khyim bdag gi chung ma rnying pas bzhin bltas so nas/ de rnams kyis de'i nyin par las nyis 'gyur du byas so// ji
tsam na ri dgas 'dzin gyis phyi dro'i dus su las kyi mtha' la bltas pa na las mang du zin pa mthong nus/ des dris pa/ ca khyed cag gis gla mi gzhan dag cig bkug
gam sus kyang ma bkug go/ gangags na las nyis 'gyur du byas pa 'di la rgyu ci zhag yod/ de rnams kyis slas pa// dbon po zas ci 'dra de 'dra ba'i las bgyid do// de ji lta bu yin/ de rnams
kyis ji ltar gyur pa rgya cher smras pa dang/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu rnams kyis/ rang rang gi chung ma la snyas pa las/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ sa ga mas ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du gal te
bdag cag gis kyang khyim nas brkus la gla mi rnams dga' bar bgyis pa dang/ bdag la yang jo bo dang/ khyed dang/ bla ma rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyis sa gam
la sa pa/ bumo khyod kyis kha zas rnams ji ltar bshams/ des rgyas par smras pa dang 3 ri dwags 'dzin mgu nas/ des de khon khyim gyi bya ba rnams byed du bcug stu 3 nang mi thams
cad la smas pa/ khyed cag las gang zhig sa ga mas byin pas mgu ba ni/ saganas par gyis la/ de dang rjes su mthun par yang gyis shig/ ji tsam na khyim khri dpon mor gyur nas sbyong tshul

a: dang rta gnas pa dang/ des pas nang mi thams cad dga' bar gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na sa ga ma'i khyim stong nas ngong pa rnams kyis byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras
ma/ zhwa lu dag khyer nas dong pa las/ rgyal po'i khab na 'dug pa'i ngang pa des de dag mthong nas skad phyung ba dang/ de rnams kyis kyang skye gnas mthun pa'i gcugs pas mnags ma thub su ka da/

phyung ba dang/ rgyal po'i khab kyi khang klog tu 'brasakyisnya ma rnams lhung bar gyur to// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la re re byin pa dang/ ri dgas 'dzin gyis rang gi skal ba sa ga ma la byin no//
dos za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste zhing pa rnams la bsgo ba dang/ de rnams kyang shin tu mgu ste/ de rnams kyi zhing chung ngu zhig legs par bstan nas dus shes par byas ta btab pa dang/ lhas
dus bzhin du char phab pas sa bon dang mthun par phun sum tshogs par byas so// phyi de lo la ni rab tu mang por gyur to// yang phyid lel ni de bas kyang mang por gyur te/ de bzhin du ji tsam na bad
ba thams cad ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i 'bras sA lus gang bar gyur to// ji tsam na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nad kyis thebs nas/ des sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa dang/ de
rnams kyis sbas pa/ lha gal te ngang pas 'tshal te mchis pa'i sA lu brnyes na de la 'jams bsgral nus gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur lags so// rgyal pos blon po rnams bkug nas
smras pa/ zheseldan dag khyod la ngas dang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i sA lu'i sa ma byin pa de dag khyed kyis ci byas/ da na kha cig gis smras po/ lha bdag cag gis ni lha khang du bul lo//
gzhan dag gis sbas pa/ bdag cag gas ma'i nang du rtsal to// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis sgo khang du btags so// ri dgas ba dzan gyis
smras pa// lha bdag gis sa gam la stsalanAre zhag des cir bgyis rma bar 'tshal lo// des sa gam la dris pa dang/ des snas pa/ rdzob cingang pas 'tshal te mchis pa'i sA lu'atshal ba zhig
mchod sam/ rgyal bo sUn gyis thebs pa la sman pa rnams kyis ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i sA lu bstan to// dunas sa ge mas gsar snod kyi nang du dung bas khyer te 'ongs pa'i 'brasakyis bkag
nas rgyal po la bskur b.las/ rgyal pos zos nas sos par gyur to// dus gzhan zhig nar+yal po la ljongs kyi ma rnams kyis rta rgodam ma smad gnyis shig phul ba las/ de la ma ni gang
yin: te'u ni gang yin pa 'gags kyang ma shes nas/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bso ba/ shes ldan dag legs par rtogs la bal gsol cig/ blon po rnams kyis nyin thog thag tu/
dpyad na dub ste gtan la ma phabs so// ri dgas 'dzin phyi dro khyim du song ba dang/ sa ga mas rkang ba gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ ngo bo ji snya de ring ring zhig lon nas gshegs/
des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyas par smras pa dang/ sa ga mas sbas pa/ jo bo 'di la dpyad du ci zhig mchis/ de gnyis chas menyam par stsal tang/ bu gang lags pa de ni myur du 'tshol
01 nas ma'i skal pa la 'tshal lo// ma gang lags pa de ni mi 'tshal bar mgo stag ge mchis te/ rtags ni de lags so// ri dgas 'dzin gyis/ blon po rnams la sa nas/ de rnams
kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin brtags nas/ de nas nam langs pa dang/ rgyal po la smras pa// lha 'di ni ma lags so// 'din du lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed cag gas
