ji ltar shes/ lha 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu las so// khar rtsa nga ci ste ma shes/ lha bdag cag gis 'tshal bar rdzog la thogo/ sa ga mas de skad bstan lags mod/ rgyal pos sbas pa// tsam
ba ma ni mkhas pa yin no// ma zhig chu 'gram du klum bzhag nas khrus byed pa dang/ mi gzhan zhig 'ongs nas/ des klam des mgo la dkris nas de nyid du khrus bya bar brtsams so// ming
khrus byas nas langasan 3 klam de ma mthong ngo// mi dis sbas pa/ kyi nang rje ci tshol/ klum mo// khyod kyi klum ga la yod/ gal te khyod la kum yod par gyur na ji ltar ngas mgo la dkris
nas zhugs pa de bzhin du/ khyod kyis kyang krum gyis mgo la dkris nas zhugs par 'gyur ro// des smras pa// 'o na nyidri kha ba'i ma yin no/ de gnyis khyed kyi nga'i zhes rtsod bar gyur nas/
dganyis rgyal po'i drung du song ngo// rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgol/ shes ldan dag legs par rtogos la gang gi yin pa de la byon cig/ de rnams kyis brtags par brtsams nas
gcig la dris pa dang/ des smras pa/ bdag gi lags so// cig shos la yang dris pa dang/ smras pa// bdag gis lags so zhes khyodakyi dang nga'i zhes pa
la nyim 'das te/ blon po rnams dub nas dgongs ka gtan la ma phabs bzhin du khyim du dong ngo// sa gu mas ri dgas 'dzin gyi zhes bya ba nas/ dris te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du/
sa des ji ltar gyur pa rnams sbas pa dang/ sa ga mas sas pa/ jo bo 'di la dpyad du ci zhig mchis/ de gnyis gcig kyang bod khyer cig/ cig shos kyang phyid khyer cigaces
gsungasashag dang/ gang ga lags pa de'i mchid nas ni ci'i phyir bdag gi klam dral zhes 'chi'o// gang gi ma lags pa de'i glo ba la ni ri zhig bdag gas phyed thob na yang der zad/ 'di'i bdag la
ci zhig god snyam ste/ de ltar brtag par bgyi'o// ri dgas 'dzin song nas/ blon po rnams la smras nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal pos smras pa// tsam pa ma ni mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i
bar gong ma bzhin du'o// rgyal po latshong pa gru bas tsan dan gyi sdong dum zhig skyes su phul ba dang/ de'i mgo gang yin mjug gang yin pa ma shes nas/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bzlo ba/
ji lta bu yin rtogs shig/ de rnams kyis nyin thog thag dpyad na ma shesanas dgongs ka khyim du dong ngo// sa ga mas zhes bya ba nas/ ri dgas 'a dzan gyis dris pa zhes bya ba'i bar
09 gong ma bzhin du'o// des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgya cher snyas ba dang/ sa ga mas sbas pa/ jo bo 'di la dpyad duci mches/ chab tu bor cig dang rtsa ba gang lags pa ni 'byin bar 'gyur ro//
thor to gang lags pa de na nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la brtag ba ni de lags so// ri dgas 'dzin gyis/ blon po rnams la smras nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal pos smras pa/ tsam
pa ma ni mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i ba ra gong mi bzhin du'o// ri 'or na khyim bdag cig yod pa des/ de dang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa las/ de la bu tsayang med/ bu mo
yang mad de/ de bu mngon par 'dod pas chung ma zhig blangs pa dang/ de la chung ma shes rang bzhan gyis phrag dog can zhig bas/ kim ngal ma rung bar bya ba'i sbyor ba zhig byas pa las/
'i mang la shin tu rnam par dag pas/ somos can dang ldan par gyur nas/ ji tsam zla ba dgu 'das pa dang/ khye'u zhig btsas so// des bsams pa/ sha khon rnams la ni 'di lta ste/
chen chun 'di tha chad yin pa sa gdon mi za bar ma Ar mos thabs gang yang rung ba zhig gis gsod par 'a gyur na/ bdag gi khyim thab bram/ bdag gi ci byar yod/ bdag gis nam du na srung
la da kho na la ni sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/ de dang khyim thab lhanAcig gros byas te rung nas chen ma shes la sbas ba/ chazhe bdag gi bu 'di khyod la byin skyes gsosashig/ des bsams pa//
khyim ni gang la khu yod pa de kho na'i yin par zad pas khyim gyi bdag mor 'gyur bas gso'o snyam nas/ des de gsos pa las de'i pha yang shi bar gyur to// de gnyis khyim
gyi phyir rtsod par gyur nas gcig gis smras pa/ 'di kho mo'i bu yin no// cig shos kyis smras pa/ 'di kho mo'i bu yin no// rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes
ldan dag deng la gang yin pa rtogs shig/ de rnamasakyis dpyad pa las nyi ma 'das kyang gtan la ma phabs nas dgongasaka khyim du dong ba dang/ sa ga mas ri degs 'dzin la dris te zhes bya bas/
'di la dpyad du ci mchis zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de gnyis la kho bo cag gis ni gang gi bu yin pa mi shes kyis/ khyed gnyis las gang stobs che ba de khyer la song zhig ces gsungs
shig dang/ lag pa gnyis nas bzung nas 'dren par bgyid du/ de sdug bsngal gyis du bar gyur dang/ de'i ma gang lags pa de ni brtsa bu mchis pas 'di gson na/ nam zhig mthong bar
'gyur grang sAm nas gtong bar bgyid do// cig shos de ni brtse ba mchasi pas gang gi tsho mi gtong ba de'i tshe/ de la lcag gis gzhus shag dang/ jiltar gyur pa spa bar 'gyur te/ 'di la
brtag pa ni 'di lags so// ri dgas 'dzin gyi blon po rnams la sbas pa dang zhesapya ba nas/ rgyal pos sbas pa/ tsam pa ma namakhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// dus/
gzhan zhig na/ ri degs 'dzin nad kyis thebs nas/ de la snyan pas nyi ma gcig sman byin pa las theg gi bar gyur to// phyi de nyin par sman ma yin pa phyin pas na bar gyur to// sa ga mas bsams/
pa: jo bo tsa'i srid du nyin gcig ni thig gi bar gyur la/ nyin gcig ni nad par gyur snyam nas/ des sman gang dag gis theg gi bar gyur pa'i rtags de dag bzung nas/ de nas des sman pa rnams
sgo nas slar log nas rang nyid dpyad byas pa las sos par gyur to// ridagatso 'dzin gyis bsams pa gang gis na bdag nyin gcig na thig gis/ nyin gcig ni na bas/ gang gi tsho sman pa ma

tshong ba de'i rtag tu thog gi kha 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod snyam ste/ ris sa ga ma la dris pa zhes bya pa nas/ tsam pa man ma khas pa yin no zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ kos la'i rgyal po gsal
rgyal gyi glang po che'i bu dpal skyad ces bya ba de la dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gshi bar gyur to zhes sa ga mas thos nas/ das ra degs 'dzin la smras pa/ jo bo blon po zams cad la mthar gyis bka'
'bab par 'gyur gyis/ dpal skyid la lha bzod pa mdzad du stsal ba'i rags so// des smras pa/ bu mo bzod pa byed du gzhug go/ de nas desargyal po la smras pa/ lha dpal skyod ni lha la glo ba nye
ba lags na/ de la bzod pa mdzod du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bad par bya'o// lhagal te bzod par mdzad nas/ de'adibang thang de dag stsal tu gsol/ de bzhin du sbyin no// dpal skyid
kyis ji ltar sa ga mas bdag la rgyal bo bzod pa byed du bcug pa shes nas/ de de la lan blan pa'i bsam pas gnas so// dus gzhan zhig na/ ri dgas 'dzin pho mtshan
la nad khyung// de'i rim gro sag ma byed pa la sa de 'dzom par gyur to// des smras pa/ jo bo 'di la 'dzem du ci na chis/ ci ba'i romi khro bu mo mi bgyid dam/ 'on kyang de 'tsham par gyur to//
des bsams pa/ 'di bdag gis rim gro byar ma btub pas/ de'i chung ma zhig blang ngo snyam nas/ de dpal spyod kyi khyim du song ba dang/ des 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig sbas nas/ snyan
btabs te 'dug go/ dpal skyod la bu mo zhig yod pa des de la smras pa// bu mo sa gams rkang pa gnyis la zung zhug/ sa ga mas sAs pa/ bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa la bzung bar 'gyurab 'i gan
gang lags pa de na mchis so zhes smras nas yang skyes pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ bkra shis par gyur tsag/ dpal skyod kyis sbas pa/ ci zhig slong/ bu mo slong do// su zhig gi chad du
des smras pa/ rgyas po'i ched du'o// dri cang mi sla bar 'dug go/ dpal skyid kyi chung mas smras pa/ dgog gcig na de la ci ste snyane/ su ga mas sbas pa/ mi rnams kyi lang tsho ni nor yin pas
dpyad du ci yod byon cig/ dpal skyod kyis smras pa/ bzang mo bdagacig la/ sa ga mas phan btags kyis khyon cig/ gal te de ldan sbyin par bgyi'o// de nas ri degs 'dzin gyis dpal gyi
'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs nas/ de de'i rim gro byed par gyur te/ sa ga ma ni de ltar mi byed do// ra rigs 'dzin gyis sbas pa// bumo bdag la tshig byin cig/ des smras pa// rdzob cung
zad nyams par ma gyur tam/ bu mo khyod la mas bslabs pa gang yin pa de cung zad blangs te mi gnas sam/ jo bo thams cade blangs lags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la phyag byos shig ces
mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ mna' ma'i nyi ma dang zla ba lta bu n sa smyug lags pas/ re zhig bdag gis bgyis lags so// ma la bkur sti bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ bud med kyi

khyim thaban me lta bu lags te/ khyim thab lanyacang bsnyan par ma bgyi/ ha cang ring bar yang mi bgyi ste/ bdag gi khyim thab la mi lta bar bsnyan bkur bgyid do// me long phyi bar bya'o zhes mtshab lang/
lags pa ni/ sdug pa ni ma long lta bu lags pas rtag tu zhal zhal bgyi zhing phyag bdar bgyi ba lags te/ snum pa drel bdag gdugs gcig bzhin du byi dor bgyid lags so// gos dkar
po bgo bar bya'o zhes mchib gang lags pa ni/ khyim gyi las bgyid pa na gos gzhan dag kho nas so// lha mchod pa dang khyim thab kyi drung du mche ba nani/ gos dkar lo rnams bgo bar bgyi ba ste/ ya da

bdag bgyid lags so// blang bar bya'i sbyin par mi bya'i zhes 'chi ba gang lags pa la ci zhig blang bar bgyi zhin/ 'a jagi rten las tshig ngan pa smras pa'o// tshig ngan pa ni su la 'ang smra bar mi bgyi
ba ste/ de la yang bdag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas lags so// tshig bsrung bar bya'o zhes mche ba gang lags pa ni// gsang ba'i tshigame 'thal bar 'gying//
bdag la ngag bsdam pa mchis lags so// langs nas su la yang snyan bsab ma bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ de 'di skad ces khyod rigs kyi mna' ma yin pas/ khyod gnas dban
ba na 'dug par bya'o zhes mchi ba lags te/ bdag dben pa kho na na mchis lags so// zhim po bza' bar bya'o zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ shan tu bkres nas bza' bar bgyi bsta/
bdag ni rta ga tu khyimegyi skya bo zas 'tshal lo// bde bar nyal bar bya'o zhes mche ba gang lags pa ni/ mtshan mo khyimakyi dgos ba thams cad bgyis nas snod brtul te/ ci nas kyang yang
ldang mi dgos par khyod nyal bar bya'o zhes bgyi ba lags te/ 'di ni legs par bzhag pa'o// 'di na nyis par bzhag pa'o zhes bdag de kho na bzhin du bgyid do// them skas bca'
bar bya'o zhes mche ba gang lags pa ni 'di skad ces// khyod sngon dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa des lha'i 'gro ba thob nas/ 'dir mi'i 'jig rten du skyes pa 'di ni las kyis yin
pas: 'dir yang khyod kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bya lta/ sdig pa mi bya'o// 'di ni dbyig gi ya gad mthorasi kyi them skas lta bu yin no zhes bgyi ba lags te/ de yang
bdag rdzo tsa wig gis bgyid do// sa ga ma legs so legs so// khyod kyi ma mkhas pa la na na/ gang gi phyir mas ldem por sbas ba rtogs lasan/ khyod ni lhag par mkhas pa yin no/
'dul ba gzhi// bam po'i gsum pa// de nas dedags 'dzin 'di snyam dusams te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/
sag ma la bdag gis ma zhes bod de snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der se ngas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to// btsun pa mna' ma la ma zhes bod du rung lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te chos lnga dang ldan na sto/ lnga gang zhan/ nad g.yog byon pa dang//
thab ri'i bab pa'i chung ma len pa dang/ srogagi skyabs byed pa dang 3 nor srung ba dang/ shes rab kyi bgo bsha'abyed pa'o// khar sdom la/ nad ga mog dang na chung ma dang/
srog dang nor na sbyin pa dang/ shes rab sgrub par byed pa dang lnga po 'di dag mar bshad do// de nas ri dgas 'a dzin kos la'i rgyal po gsalargyal gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ rgyal kho
gas ba smyol la 'di skad ces smras so// lha bdag nas ga ma la ma zhes 'bod par 'tshal lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ sa ga mas nga la ya nga ram ga byas pas/ phyi mo la dris la/
ngas kyang de la sring mo zhes bod do// des phyi mo la dris pa dang/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis bos kyang rung/ ma bos kyang rung/ de ni khyod kyi sring mo kho na yin no// de
du 'a phur tshangs spyinamangag gzhug ma'i khu mo dang 'dus pa las/ de las bu pho zhig btsas te/ de'i mang stobasakyibashes gnyen du btags pa las/ de rgyal po mos kyis nyes pa 'ba' zhig gi
phyir skyugs pa las/ tsam par song nas gnas pa de'i bu mo ni 'di yin te/ des na khyod kyi sring mor 'ong ngo// de nas rgyal po glang bo ma la zhon nas dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ sa ga ma 'di'i
dgas 'dzin gyi ni ma/ rgyal po gsal spyi ni sring mo yin no// des sngon gyi kun dga' ra bar gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang/
de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodanu'i dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzangs na bzhugs
so zhes gdags pa byas so// dus gzhan zhig nas gam las sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo zhes ra dgas 'dzin gyis thos na/ lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas/ sems khong du
chud cing 'dug ste/ yul gyi bzang mo la lung ba ci 'dra ba dgabyung bar gyur snyamanas/ ra dgas 'dzinagyis dor bar brtsams pa dang/ sa ga mas smas ba/ jo bo ma dor bar
ba com ldan 'das la zhus sha ge/ des bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma dor bar gzeb bu sum cu rtsa gnyis byos la/ gang bal
gyis khong :/ gzeb bu rnams kyi nang du sgo nga re re zhig la/ sa ga mas dus gsum du lag pas lugs shig ces sgo zhig dang/ de nas nyi ma bdun pa la gas nas/ gzhon nu sum cu
rtsa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhane du byas pa las nyam bdun pa la gas pa dang/ gzhon nu sumacu rtsa gnyis byung nas/ bsrings bskyod de nar son pa dang/ rtsal po che thub
brlag pa sha stag tu gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na de rnams shang rtar zhugs te khyim khyung nas/ slar 'jug pa dang/ mdun na 'don gyi bu shang rtar zhugs nas phyir 'byungal jitsam na phan
tshun shade rta'i mda' gnyis thug pa dang/ mdun na 'don gyi bus smras pa/ zur cig/ de rnams kyis kyang smas ma/ khyod nyid zur cig/ mdun na 'don gyi bus mjal lo zhesabyas
nasu0f10 tshig rtsub bo sna bar brtsams pa dang/ de nas sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis shing rta'i mnga' nas bzung sgyu 'phangs pas/ phyagadar gyi phung po'i steng du rdab snyan no// de de nas gos
kyis mgo bskyur te/ pha'i drung du song nas mig mchi mas gang bas sgras ba/ yab sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis bdag la 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su bgyis so// buci'i phyir/ des rgyas
khar smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ bu gal te de lta na thabs shig bsham ba byas la/ de rnams mthar gyis kha gdag gis mya ngan ma byed cig/ de de rnams la
klan katshol pa lhur len gnas so// dus gzhan zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal la ri 'or ba kho ga par gyur nas/ rgyal pos de la dmag kha chenacig bkye ba las/ rdugs rab tu rdug
nas slar log go/ de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du dam ga ba chen bkye ba las rdugs rab tu rtsugs te 3 sar log nas rgyal po rang nyid dbu ngag tshogs yan la gabazhi da nga byung ba dang/ sa ga ma'i
'gaM bu nang du 'jug pa de rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa/ lha gang du gshegs/ ra'o pa rnams 'debs su'o// lha bzhugs shig/ bdag cag mchi'o// de bzhin dugyis shig des de
rnams la dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba btang nas/ de rnams dong stari 'ong ba rnams phab nas gta'u bzung da bya blangs te slar 'ongs pa dang/ mdun na 'don gyis smras l/ lha 'di
dag ni 'phags pa rtsal bo mdag cig ste/ re zhag lha'i dka' bas bsgrub pa gang lags pa de na 'di dag gagi 'bring gis bsgrubasakyis/ lhas 'di la dgongs shig/ rgyal bo rnams
ts+tsha: ni khu 'phrig can yin pas/ snying la bzhag ste slar mdun na 'don la bris pa de de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des smras pa/ lha de lo ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ gal te de dag 'tshal bar gyur
na 3 lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po ji mi dga' nas bsams pa/ de ltar 'gyur srid kyis/ ji ltar gsad bar bya zhen/ thabs bsham ba
soms shing gsang 'apal du dogs pas su la yang mi 'dri bar do bdag nyid kyis dpyad pa las blo skyes pa/ 'dikho nar mgron du bos la brdungs te gtang ngo snyam nas/ des sa ga ma la sbed
ba zhe'i bu rnams sang 'dir zan ze zhig/ des bsams pa/ sang ni bu rnams zhang bo'o der za bar 'khyung byas/ bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
gdugs tshod gsol lo snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song sa phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gam la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
mdzad nas/ cangam gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i ba ra gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas ra dgas 'dzin gyin sa ga ma stan las langs to/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bla bas gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol
bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas 'degs 'dzin gyi mas ga ma la gnang ngo zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs
so zhes bya ba'i bgong ma bzhin du'o// rgyal po'i pho nya de rnams kyi drung du 'ongs khye bushogacig ces bos so// de nas rgyal pos dug ha la ha la dang zas su sbyar bas rmongs par byas nas/
mgo rnams bcad de/ de nas gzab bkang nas steng du phu bo shes kyi mgo bzhag ste/ rgya skyags la rgyas btab nas sa ga ma labaskur ba dang/ sa ga mas bsams pa/ gdon mi za/
bar lhas sring mo'i bu rnams la ba go ba zhig bskur ba yin gyis/ bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa drag slong gi dge 'dun la bgo bar dbul lo snyam nas/ de nas sangs rgyas
la sogs pa dge slong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed rgyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gzeb kha dbye bar brtsams pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
gal te sa ga mas bden pa ma mthong bar bu bsod pa mthongon bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do snyam du dgongs nas/ sa go ma la bka' stsal pa/ re/
zhig 'dug la chos nyon la/ sacad ga' ba gyis shig/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir nas 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas ! bden pa mtheng bar mdzad de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bden
pa mthong nas gzeb kha phye ba dang/ bu'i mgo rnams mthong nas da nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'du byed thams cad na de 'di ltar mi rtag pa lags so// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/
dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sa gA ma'i bu rnams brdungs pa ni nyes so// gal te ma brdungs par gyur na/ 'di rnams kho nas
grogs byas pas de'i lag mthil dus mtha' dang ga 'jog par 'gyur ba zhig/ de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lus rdul gyis yog cing/ bcom ldan 'a das gang na ba der song/
phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogasaM gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kos
la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod lus rdul gyis sog cing gang nas 'dir 'ongs/ btsun pa rgyal po rgyal ragis spyi bo nas dbang bskur
ba yul gyi dbang phyug dang/ mthu dang/ brtson 'grus thob pa sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po legs par phab te/ gnas pa rnams kyis rgyal po'i baspyi ba dang :
rgyal po'i bsgrub pa bya rang pa gang dag lagaso ba de dag bdag gso bgyis te/ yas su rdzogs nas lus rdul gyis yogatsang du mchis pa lags so// rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid
la dri bar byas/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod ba de lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po dpar na/ khyod la 'drar shar phyogs nas ma yid ches pa// yid brtan du rung ba/ brtan pa 'jig
rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas de 'di skad ces/ lha bdag da gzod 'di nes shar phyogs su mchimachin/ de nas bdag gis ra brag chen po ma chag pa/ sor ga ma mchis pa/
phrag ma mchis pa/ shin tumakhrags pa/ gcig tu sdug pa zhig sa'i bar dang/ nam mkha'i bar gyi sams can thams cad dang/ srog chags thams cad dwang/
'byung po thams cad dang/ rtswa dang/ shing dang/ [u0f00]la ga dang/ lo ma dang 3 'dab ma ji snyad pa thams cad phyi mar rlog cing mche ba mthong gis lha khyod kyi bgyi
ba 'am/ bsgrub pa gang lags pa de mdzod cig ces zer la 2 de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs nas ma zhig 'ongs te bya ba nas bgyi ba 'am/
bsgrub pa de mdzod cig ces zer te/ rgyal bo chen po 'jigs pa chen po ma bzod par byed pa mi bzad pa de lta bu nye bar gnas na/ mi nyid thob pa ni rnyed par dka' na khyod kyis ci zhig bya/ btsun
pa 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po mi bas par bgyid pa mi bzad pa de lta bu nye bar gnas na/ mi nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba lags pas/ don spyad pa dang/ chos spud pa dang/ bsod
nams spyad pa dang/ dge ba spyad pa dang/ bzang po sdud pa dang/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bgyi ba ma lags par gzhan ci zhig bgyir mchis/ rgyal po chen/
bo khyodaci'i phyir 'di skad ces/ btsun pa 'jigs pachen po' sa nga chen po de lta bu'i zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bgyi zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin
du'o btsun ba rgyal po rgyal rigs sbe bo nas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po legs par phab ste/ gnas pa de rnams kyis glang po che
rnams dang/ glang po cher 'byed pa dang/ rta pa rnams dang/ rtapar 'byed pa dang/ shing rta pa rnams dang/ shing rta par 'byed pa dang/ dadung bu chung rnams dang/ dpung bu
chung du 'a byed pa dang/ gas nga tshig mkhan rnams dang/ gsang tshig mkhan du 'gyed pa dang/ nor rnams kyis nor bu brgya pa tha dad pa gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad de'i
tshe 'byed pa'i mthu ma mchis pa dang/ stolas ma mchis par ng/ pha rol gnon pa mchis pa lags pas de'i slad du bdag 'di skad ces/ btsun pa 'jigs
ba chen po' yang chen po de ltakhu nye bar gnas na zhes bya ba nas/ sa sa rgyus rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bgyi ba ma lags bar zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// rgyal po chen po
de bzhin du srog chags 'di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par rga ba dang 'chi bas 'joms pa yin no// rgyal bo chen po de ltar rgya ba dang 'chi bas 'joms pa na ) skyes bu gang zag gsadon
spyad pa dang zhes bya banas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtsonapar bya ba ma yin par gzhan ci zhig byar yod ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
tsho tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar tshe zhing rgya che ba// ri bo nam mkha' las 'ong ba// kun nas yang dga'odra ba yis// sa na phyi mar rlog pa na/ de la glang po ches mi
brdzi// dpung bu chung dang shing rta dang// rgyus min gsang tshig mkhan dang ni// nor gyis 'gyed bas skul ma thob// de bzhin rgya dang 'chi ba yis// mi rnams 'joms par byed ba ni/
rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang// dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yur bo dang// tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims ldan// khyim pa de bzhin brtul zhugs can// lang tsho nyid dang rgan/
0 po dang// de bzhin bar ma'i mi rnams la// cung zad kyang ni 'dzem med par// thams cad mngon du 'a dzoms par byed// de lta bas na mkhas pa'i mi// bdag gi don la lta ba yis//
sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni// bla med dag la dad bya zhing// lus dang ngag dang bad dag gis// dam pa'i chos ni sbyang byas na// 'di na sad par ma 'gyur zhing// mtho ris song
nas dpa/ 'a khrar 'gyur// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yid rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stan las langs nas song ngo// dag slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la zhus pa/ 3 btsun pa ri dgas 'dzin kyi ma sa ga mas las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung la/ de rnams las kyang bu pho sum
cu rtsa gnyis byung// rtsal po che blub rlag pa sha stag tu gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// smon lam gyi dbang gis so// gang du smon lam btab lags/
dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA rA NA si'i grong khyer du/ khyim bdag cig gi bu sha nas de'i chung ma de rtag tu bu mngon par 'dod par gyur to// gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
'od srungs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/ shang zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma medra pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su
yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tsho/ wArA NA sir rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba byung ste/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rten rin po sna bzhi las brtsigs so//
de nas bud med bu nad pa mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang rgyas par gyur nas mchod rten de la byi dor byas nas 'dug go/ des 'dun pa'i slong mo byas nas mchod rten la mchod pa byas te/
smon lam btab pa// bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rten la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de bdag bu mang por gyur cig ces byas te song
nas grong khyer du zhugs so// de na bud med cig bu nad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas du ba dang/ des gzhan zhig la dris pa/ ci'i phyir 'di du bar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur
pa rnams smras pa dang/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag kyang bu 'byung bar gyur na/ bdag kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro snyam pa lasaM/ ji tsam na sum cu rtsa
gnyis kyi dga' 'dun gyis mchod rten de la mchod pa byed pa na/ bud mod de yang de dang ha cang yang mi ra dri ba zhig na 'dug go/ de rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas smonalam btab pa//
dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces byas so// des de rnams la dris pa/ bu dag khyed kyis smon lam ci zhig btab/ de rnams
kyis skyas pa/ yum 'di dang 'di dag go/ des skyas pa// bu dag gal te de ldan khyed cag gi mar bdag khon gyur cig/ sum de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas de rnams dong ngo//
des bsems pa/ re zhig bud med de lanacig btsa' na yang sdug bsngal gyi tshorabs nyen nas de sbyar du na/ bdag la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis btsa' na ji ltare bya zhes de de ltar rnam pa
rtog pa na/ mchod rten dang nye ba na bya gag mo zhig yod pa sgo nga 'byung bar de de thangacigatsamachis sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung la/ so sngags kyang mi 'donano// des bsams pa/ 'byung
ba'i thabs 'di ni rung ba yin no snyam du rig nas/ mchod rten de la dod pa drag 'os son lam gdab par brtsams pa/ ji ltar bya gag mo 'di thangacig tsam gyis sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung
ba de bzhin du/ bdag gi sum cu rtsa gnyisakyapa'i sgo ngar 'byung par gyur cig[…]sa byas so// dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bu med rgan mo gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma 'di/
nyidi yin no// sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dga' 'dun gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma'i bu 'di rnams kho na yin te/ 'dis de na smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam pa ra smin pas sgo nga sum cu rtsa
gnyis byung ngo// btsun pa sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las da'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa ma bgyisangashang/ skyon ma mchis par rgyal po
gsal rgyal gyis bkug nas/ de rnams kyi mgos gzeb bkang ste/ sa ga ma la bskur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag kho nas las rnams byas/
shing bsags pa dag ni zhes byab nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba ra bar zhig na chang 'tshong zhig gnas so// chom

rkun pa rab tu mang po tshang 'tshol zhing de'i drung du 'ongs nas dras pa/ chad yod dam/ chang 'tshong gi chung mas smras pa/ yod de zhes de rnams la chang blud na/ 'dzar ba mad nas/ des glang zhig bstan
te/ 'di sodacig/ de rnamasakyis sbas pa/ mtshon cha mad do// des gta' blangs nas mtshon cha 'byin pa dang/ de rnams kyis de gsad par brtsams pa dang/ de gsod pa na sems la
bdag gsod pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ni chang 'tshong gi chung ma 'di yin gyis/ bdag gang du 'di rnams kyi mgo bcad nas gzob bkang ste/ 'di la bskur ba 'gyur ba der skye bar
gyur cig ces bsams so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ 'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gang yin pa de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin no// chom rkun po gang yin pa de rnams
nas ga ma'i bu 'di dag nyid de rnams yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chang 'tshong gi chung ma gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma 'di nyid yin no zhes rgyas par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshul bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i bsti gnas shig yod do// de de na 'chag pa las bste
gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'anges ljab can gyi phyogs shag tu gcin khu chudang bcas ba zhig gcig so// glo bur du ri dgas mo skom pas nyen pa zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/ de skom pas nyen
pas de 'thungs nas me'i dbang po la bsnams so// sams can rnams kyi lasakyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bas/ sams can dang ldan par gyur to// ji tsam na dus gzhan
zhig na phyogs de nyidadu 'ongs nas khye'u zhig khyungab dang/ des de bsnams na sprul pa mi mthun pa'i sams can yon nas bor te song ngo// ji tsaman drang srong de bsti gnas de na 'chag pa las/
khye'u de mdong nas/ 'di su'i bu yin zhes de bsam pa zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na bdag gi yin par mthong nas/ ngos de bas gnas su bzhag ste/ bstun/ bsod/ brgyad
nas de'i mgori dgas kyi 'dra bas/ ri rigs mgo ri dgas mgo zhes bya bar grags so// dus gzhan zhig na drang srong sha nas/ ri dgas mgosakud pa'i ched pa rdob pa'i rig pa bslab
te de bod pa brdabs nas thams cad lung ston par byed de/ gal te re zhig sgra drag por gyur na/ khyon du 'gro ba lhar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do// 'on
te 'bring du gyur nabyen du 'gro ba mar skyo bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/ de ni bde 'gro'i rtags so// ngan 'gro'i rtags ni gal te re zhig sgra ma gsal bar gyur na 'og tu 'gro ba sems can

dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do// 'on te sgra 'bring du gyur na 'gro ba dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do// 'on te sgra chung bar gyur na 'og tu 'gro ba yi dgas su skya bar lung
ston par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sengal rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir
'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa'i mgo bzhi khyer cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhini'atshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas/ mgo bzhi khyer
drang srong de'i drung du songanas khyod kyis lung ston cig/ des rgyun du zhugs pa'i byed pa la brdabs nas smras pa/ 'di ni lha rnams su skyes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no// phyir mi
'ong ba yang dobazhin no// dgra bcom pa'i bod pa la yang brdabs na/ ma shes rnam par ma shes nas ngo tsha bas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa 3 bdag cibastan pa
tha ba de las nyams gyur tam// 'on te slob dpon rags las ma skyas sam// 'on te rtags rnams de 'dra ma yin nam/ tshe dang ldan ba kun dga' bos smras pa// gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes/
pa// khyod kyi rig pa kun legs goms ma byas// re zhig rig pa mtha' dag rtogs byos la// khyodakyis phyi nas 'jig rten lung ston cig/ ri dgas mgos smras pa/ khyod kyis dag pa thams cad
la byang ba 'ga' mthong ba yod dam/ des smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// de nas ri dgas
mgo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba lha mi skyo bo'i 'gro 'tshalan// rigepa'iskyon gyis
sams can sbyod pa drug pa ma 'tshal gyis// gtso bo sud pa gsum gyi mtsho chen pha rol byon pa po// pha rol stsa kun las rgyal drug pa ma 'tshald ca gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba/ rnamarab sngags pa yi lcags kyi ma// lcags kyi tho bas brdungs byas nas// rims kyi nyi bar zhi ba yi// 'gro ba ji ltar mi mngon pa// de bzhin 'dod pa'i 'dam tshogs las// rgyal te
yang dag rnam grolab// mi g.yo go 'phang thob rnamasakyi// 'grobo gdags su yod ma yin// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ ri dgas mgos 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung pa dang/ bsAn par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spun

sngaratshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dras kyis rab tu phyung bsnyan par rdzogs par mdzad de/ de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyanapar rdzogs par mdzad nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu ji tsam
bzhad kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod kyi ra degs 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon
gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bla gab med pa na 'chag cing smyuskar rnams gyur pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas mgo la
bka' stsal nga/ ri dgas mgo ji srid cig na lhas char 'bebs bar 'gyur soms shig/ des bsams pa/ btsun pa 'jig rten 'di ma rung/ 'di rab tu ma rung lags te/ rtsaskar rnam/
ltar gnas pa dang sbyar na le bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab lakas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu skar rnams mthun par byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/ yang shes par gyis shig des
gsol ba lo drug tu lags so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis yang smras pa dang/ gsolo pa/ lo lngar lags so// de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du'o// denabcom ldan 'das kyis/
! dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gnas mal rnams skyabs yod par smros shig/ de ring khonar lhas bya ba'i tshogs lta bu'i char 'bebs par 'gyur te/ de la khrus byed pa gang/
yin pa de rnams la 'bras dang phol mig 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ri dgas mgo de ltar na rgyu skar rnams ni 'gyur ba// g.yo ba/ mi brtan pa yin te srogakyang g.yo ba ma brtan pa yin no//
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ ri dgas mgomangon par dad par gyur to/ 2de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pas// dgru bcom pa na ngon sum du byas so// de nas rnam par
grol pa'i dga' ba rab tu myong nas// tshigs su bcad pas snyas pa/ ri dgas rnams ni nags khrod rten// 'dab chags rnams ni mkha' la rten// rnam par sgom pa chos la rtan// dgra bcom
mya ngan 'das la rten// ri dgas 'dzin gyisag gams bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ mnyan yodan byon nas/ mnyan yod na bdag kho na'akun dga' ra ba kho na na bzhugs so/
zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der songs phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'jug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug

pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtamagyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas 3 yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar
gongan bzhin du'o// de nas ra dag sa 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma stan las langs taM 2 bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad/
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na ( gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis sa ga ma la
cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo zhes bya ba nas/ nor bu'i chu snod bzhag sta/ bcom ldan 'das la bu mo mngag gzhug ma dus tshod gsol ba dus tshod gsol du bcug go/ jitsam na bu mo mngag gzhug ma
'khaM de sngon gyi kun dga' ra bar song nas sgo gsab nas bltas na/ dge slong rnams skrunu mor khrus byed pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la/ 'tsho
ba pa nal phrug 'di dag gis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab bo snyam nas/ da rings parings par 'ongs te smras pa/ jo mo mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'phags pa rnams na bzhud la/ 'tsho ba ba
nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang 'di'i btab lags so// sa bdams bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ gdugs tshod ma gsol bar bzhud par 'gyur ba la/nga yin pa de ni
gnas med cing skabs mdado// gdon mi za bar 'das dge slong sgren mo rnams mthong ngo snyam nas/ des dus tshod gsol gzhan zhig btang// des btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shing
mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag bcibs te lcang pa zed khyu khor rage nas nas
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du snya/ rgan pa'i mthar 'duganas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadaces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni sbyin pa chen po brgyad bca' bar 'tshal te glo bur ba la sprul pa dang/
mchi bar chas pa la stsal ba dang/ blo 'tshel ba la stsal ba dang/ bro g.yog la stsal ba dang/ gsang nas kyi 'jams nAr ma dang/ sman nur ma dang/ dge slong rnams la dbyar kyi gos ras
chen dang/ dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sag ma khyod kyis yon tan ci zhig mthong na/ glo bur du 'ongs pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa blo
bur du mchis pa'i dge slong na spyod yul mi mkhas pa dang/ lam srung mi mkhas pa lags pas/ des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na/ spyod yul la mkhas pa dang/ lam srang la
mkhas par gyur lags so// sa ga ma de thugs su chud de legs so legs so// don gyi dbang cha zhig mthong na/ 'gro bar chas ba la sbyin pasbyin/ btsun pa dge slong mchi bar chas pas
bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ 'gron pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur zhing 3 tshogs dang bral na 'phongs par 'gyur pas/ de bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs sud na/ tshogs dang 'bral/
bar mi 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthongan/ nad pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa dge slong
bro 'tshal ba bsod snyoms tshol du mchisan/ nyon mongs pa 'am/ 'gum par yang 'gyur bas/ des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na/ blond las ldang ba dang/ bde ba la
rog par gnas par 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yAng thugs su chud de legs so ligs so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthongan/ nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa dge slong blo
g.yog bgyid pa rang gi ched du bsod snyoms tshol dumachas ni bro 'tshal ba'i bgyi ba nyams par 'gyur bas/ des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyod na 'khrub par 'gyur lags so//
sa ga ma de mang thugs su chud do legs so legs so// don ci dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge 'dun la nas thug nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la drod chung ba yang
mchis/ drod che ba yang mchis te/ de la re zhig drod chung ba gang lags pa de rnams ni nas thug 'tshal na drod skya bar 'gyur la/ drod che ba gang lags pa de rnams ni nyam skye bar 'gyur
lags so// sag mde yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so// donagyi dbang ci zhig mkhong no/ dge 'dun la sman nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la dro
nad mang ba dang/ bro nad nyung ba mchis te/ de la bro nad mang po gang lags pa de rnams la nu ri zhig 'tshal chog/ bro nad nyung ba gang lags pa de rnams kyis longs spyad na/ lcag
bar yang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yang phugs su chud de legs so legs so// don gyi dbung ci zhig mthong na/ dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras/
chen shAn/ btsun pa de rang kho na bdag gis bu mo mngag gzhug brgyad pa dus tshod gsol bar btang ba las/ des dge slong rnams sgron mor khrus bgyod pa mthong nas de slar mchis )
bdag la 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la/ 'tshob pa nal phrug rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du btab bo zhes mchibs/ de rnams dbyar skyigs ras tshon gyis bkab par 'gyur lags so// sag
ma de gung thugs su chud de legs so legs so// don spyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras sbyin/ btsun ba dus 'dicig na khyim pa mo rab tu mang bo dag/ dge slong
ma rab tu mang po rnams chu bo gnas ldan la sgron mo ri khrus bgyid pa las/ khyim pa mo de rnamasakyisakhagad cid bgad nus mdzub ker gyis dge slong ma rnams kyi mdoms nye bar ston te//
de dag gis nye bar bstan pa rnams / bag 'khums par gyur pas/ de rnams bdag gi khrus sa kyis bkab nas khrus bgyid par 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma legs so legs so// khyod kyi
bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po brgyad smras pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun rnams la yang dag par snang zhing/ 'di dag ni
rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po gang dag la bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/ bsod namasakyi 'bras bu rnam bar smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes ched ba zur
bar mi nus kyi/ 'on kyang bsod nams mang ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba rnams kyi nang du 'dus so// btsun pa bdag gis 'di skad ces/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma gamo de snga nas dge slong 'di yang kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnam par ni lung pa'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub chu nges par gzhol ba re ltar thogs/
na srid pa lan bdun par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du nyid mchems sbyor zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thos te/ de mnyan yod du
res 'ga' mchi zhing/ slar yang mchi bar 'gyur la/ de bdag gi glo bur du mchi ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang/ dge slong mas khrus ras lengs spyod par gyur
lags so zhes bya ba'i bar te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba rgyuchen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tsha gamo
de: dge slong 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug bsrabs ba'i phyir lanAcig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir lan cig 'ongs nas sdug/
bsnga la gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchizhing slar mchil/ des bdag gi globur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang/ de'i
slong mas khrus nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das

kyis dge slong che ge mo de/ dge slong 'di ni klu ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang nges
'ga' mnyan yod du ma zhing slar mchil/ des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang/ dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du 3 thos
nas kyang dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dag ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dag slong che ge mo de/ dge slong 'di ni nyon mongs pa
thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan laMs 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du
mchi zhing sar langamam la// des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang/ dge slong mas khrus 'os zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du
su thos nas kyang dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dgu ba ngas bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis ri dkas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la/
chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ mang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nus gadran las bzhengs te
gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ yangs pa can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ mi gyis rgyu zhing gshegs
pa na yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spru'u rdzong gi 'gram gyi khangapa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ chosaM gos dang lhung
bzed bsnams nas/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal ma gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang/ sgams pa
dang/ 'dings par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos ba rnams 'khru ba dang/ skams pa dang/ 'dangs par byed
pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dgo pags pa dang/ sha dang/ khrag zad zad du sbyin par btang zhing bsod nams
byas pa gang yin pa de la 3 dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs nas/ yangs ba can du bsod snyoms spud de zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/ zas phyi
ma'i bsod snyoms stangs shing/ lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos mkhos su phab nas zhabs pasal te/ nang du yang dag 'jog la gtsug lag khang du zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
'das dgong kanang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan pa shams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dgo
slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di'i nga snga drosham thabs dgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ ngas
dge slong rab tu mang po dag kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnamasaM 'khru ba dang/ skams pa dang/ 'dinges par byed pa mthong ngo// mthonganas kyang 'di snyam du
dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag pags pa dang/ sha dang/ khrag zad zad du sbyin pa ra btang zhang bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la/ dge slong rnams khag
mad cing ma brtags par sbyod par byed do// dge slong dag dad pas byin pa la bag yod par spyod pa dang/ dus su spyad pa dang/ skabs skabs su spyod pa dang/
brtags te spyod pa dang/ cung zad spyod pa ni legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas byin nga la bag yod pas sad par bya ba'i bsngags pa gsungs nas 3 dge slob/
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la gding ba med par longs spyad par mi bya'o// gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos na de'i mod kho na la bkru bar bya rgyu/
gzhan du na 'gal tshabasacan du 'gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i
dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgyab nag por gyur pa zhig rgyang ni po kho na nas gzugs so// gzigs
nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi rgyab nag po pha gi mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags s kun dga' bo ma lagi ni/ yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de nas 'dis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la/ ming tsam gyi gding ba dang/ dri ma can gyi gding ba dang/ shur bu dang/ rgyu tsang dang/
smyug gu'i gding ba bting nas longs spyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar rgyab nag por gyur to// da dung yang 'di rgyab nag por gyur to zhes rig par mdzad nas/ yangs pa can/
du bsod snyoms mdzad do zhes bya ba nas/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba'i braragong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//
bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dgeslong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ring snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod
snyoms la zhugs pa las/ de na ngas mi rgyabanag por 'dug pa zhig mthong sta/ de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la dge slong du gyur pa las/ de na des

dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang zhes du ba nas/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rgyab nag por gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gangan bzhin du'o// dge slong dag do lta bas na dge slong rnamA
kyis deng sAn chadamang tsam gyis gding ba dang/ dri ma can gyi ba ring bas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la longs spyad par mi bya'o// longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang
gdang ba gnyis kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ stag na na rimegacig gis so// sang ba zhog na rim gnyis kyis so// dge slong rnams gdang ba bkra zhing bkra ba kha tshar ma bcad pa dag 'chang bar byed
pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon po//
'am 'dam ka 'am/ kha bsgyur ba'i gding ba gyis dras pa bcang bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dag song zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis nyen pas/ de'i chos gos rnams
rnag dang khrag gis reganas/ dri ma zhim pa sbyang ma rnams 'du zhing/ de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyasabyed/ kha
zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang sta/ g.yan pa dgab pa bcang bar
bya sta zhag lnga 'am drug lon nas bkru bar bya'o/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong mdze'i nad kyis nyen pa dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang khyams dang/
rdzong dang/ slo khang dang/ bang rim dang/ 'chag sa rnams dang/ shing drung gi gnas rnams na dri ma zhim pa dang/ sbrang ma rnams 'khor bas gnas shing longs spyod par byed pa de dag bram ze dang
khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas snodapar byed/ gzhog 'bus byed/ kha ze bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang de bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka'
0) stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong mdzo nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong ma dzi nad kyis thebs pas// dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang/
gnas khang la longs spyad par mi bya/ khyams rnams dang ji skad du bsgrags pa'i khyams la sogs par gnas par mi bya/ dge 'dun gyi chab khungs dang/ snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya zhing/
dge 'dun gyis de la gnas dben pa byin nas i krobya'o// dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas/ kun tu spyod ba'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs
can du 'gyur ro// 'dul ba gzhi/// /rem po re bzhi pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor
gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos/ chos gos lhag par bcang du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo// btsun pa mon dar gyi chos gos gsum du
byin gyis brlabs nas/ chos gos lhag par byin gyis brlabs te bcang du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ci dgar zad de/ de bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du bal dang sha na'i ras la yang rung ngo//
ka sdom la/ gso ma sku yi chos gos dang// gcer bu sku 'bal lo ma'i gos/ mthang gos bcas dang g.yang gzhi dang// gso ris seng ras pa char rtogs/
gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong zhig khacom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gso ma'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyas bu gti mug 'di lta sta/ gso ma'i chos gos 'di ni mu snyags pa'i rtags yin no/ de lta bas na dge slong gso ma'i chos gos bcang bar mi bya'o// bcangs na 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sku'i tshes gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di na mu snyags pa'i rtags so zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gcer bu bgyid bar 'tshel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gcer bu 'di ni mu stags
pa'i rtags yin no// gzhan yang ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyed gcer bu byed ) de lta bas na dge slong gis gcer bu mi bya'o// byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro
de nas dge slong de gcer bu ma gnang ba dang/ bslab pa rnams sbyangs te nyams par gyur to// dge slong rnams the tshom skyas nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'dras la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong 'di gcer bu ma gnang ba dang/ bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams par gyur pa la gzigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ltar

'ba' zhig tu ma zad de 1 ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di nyid ngo che med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ngang pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba byung ste/
de'i bu mo rang khyim thab tshol lozhus// ul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'dus par gyur te/ so so nas bsams pa/ de'i khyim thab tu bdag 'gyur ro snyam mo//
des rma bya zhig mthong nas/ des smras pa/ 'di na bdag gi khyim thab tu 'gyur ro// de la gzhan dag gis 'dis khyod khyim thab tu gdams so zhes smras pa dang/ des mjug ma basbrang nas
gar byed par brtsams pa de/ yul 'khor gis mthong nas snyas pa/ 'di ci zhig gi phyir gar byedu/ gzhan dag gis sbas pa/ khyod kyi bu mo'i khyim thab tu gyur pas so// des smas pa domaM
dang khrol dang mi ldan pa sa/ 'di la bdag gis bu mo ma sbyin no zhes pa rma bya des thos nas yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song ste/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ dbyangs snyan 'di 'od kha dog mdzes
pa dang// 'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni// nor bu ba ltarlu dang 'dra gyur na// ci slad khyod kyi sras mo bdag mi skyal// yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/ dbus
snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang/ 'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa na// nor bu bo DUrlu dang 'dra gyur kyang// 'dzom med skyon gyis khyod la mi sbyin no// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems

de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di ngo tshatshad pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob nas sdug bsngal zhing mad ma bde nas/ phya'i tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo//
da ltar yang 'dis gtsar bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo// yang dag slong zhig bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gisol to//
btsun pa bdag skra 'bal bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa// sa 'drog bar rjes su gnangan/ ci'i phyir khyod sku 'bal/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ sku 'bal
ba 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no// de lta bas na dge slod gis sku 'bal bar mi bya'o// 'bal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag lo ma'i bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di na mu stags pa'i brtul zhugs yin no zhes bya ba nas
'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa padag bla gos mthang gos dang bcas
bas 'tshob 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug ngas chos gos gsumarjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar byed/
de lta bas na ngage slong gis bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gus kyis 'tsho bar mi bya'o// 'tsho bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gi/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdagagayang gzhi 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ gti mug 'di ni ma snyogs pa'i rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas/
'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gso ma'isang ras kyi chos
gos 'tshang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni chu stags pa'argyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag la char 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu
gti mug 'di lta ste/ pa char 'di na khyim ra 'chos yin te zhes bya ba nas/ 'galatshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag chos gos thams cad sngon por 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalAng/ 'di ni khyim pa 'chang bar byed do//
de lta bas na dge slong gis/ chos gos thams cad sngon por bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de bzhin du thams cad sar
ba 'am thams cad dmar ba 'am/ dkar ba ni rung ba ma yin pa nyid do// sdom la/ kha tshar ring dang gdongs ka dang// ral ka gtsug tor byed dang ni// rab l gos dang rnga
bal klam// mchin nad kun dga' mthang gos bcas// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kha tshar dang po'i chos gos
'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// gang
dgeslong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso la to// btsun ba bdag kha cher gdengs ka lta bu'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa//
ba'i/ skyes bu gti mug 'de ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i ba ra gongam bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gse/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ralaka 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'din khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal
chabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gtsug tor bgyid par 'tshal lo//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// skyes bu gti tshug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dag slong zhig
gas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag thod 'ching bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no/
zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhigagis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ra bal gyi gos
bcang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bugati mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma/
bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag rnga bal gyi klam 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'a dus
kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di na khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// tshodang ldan r kun dga' mchin
nad can dge slong mad pa'i gnas sgo 'phar mad pa zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ snam sbyar med par de phyi rol tu byung ba dang/ de'i snam sbyar rkun pos khyer ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/
de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong mad pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam ma bca' zhing/ snam sbyar mad par gang du yang 'gro bar mi
'o/ song na 'gal tshabs can tu 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan ma kun dga' mchin nad can na ba'i de'i nad g.yog tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed pa las char bab pa dang/ de snam sbyar byon te
'gro ba'i skyo ba med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthang gos dang bla gos su bcasaras 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang snyam sbyar gzhag tu rung ba na lnga s+sa/ dge slong dang
bcas pa'i gnas sgo 'phar dang nga cas pa dang/ char bab pa 'am/ char 'bab tu dogs pa dang/ 'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang/ sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas dang/ dge 'dun
gyi gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o/// bar sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa// dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi/ byung ba gnyis po dag dang ni// rnyed pachung dang 'gyod pa dang// dge 'dun
red dang de de yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyi chos gos kyi red pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na/ dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i mod khon la ljongs
rgyur dong ba dang/ de rnams kyi rgyud pa sus kyang ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de'i rid pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir/ dge slong la bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o// ma bcol
ba'i dag slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang/ dge slong rnams phan tshun rtsod bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa blang bar mi bya'o
blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dgags ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de rnams kyis thams cad mnod par bya'o//
dge tshul rnams dong nas sus kyang red pa ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyi mkhan po dang/ slob dpon dag gis blangabar bya'o// dag slong dag myud
pa chung du dag 'khyer bar byed pa ni/ rid pa chung ngu saMne nosnyam nas dong ba rnams kyi ma byon pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la bcol ba de rnamasakyis blang bar bya'o//
gzhan dag gis ma bcol bar rong ba dang/ de rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod pas kha blangs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// rnyed pa chung du gzhan dag bgor ma chog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzhan dag dang bsras la gcug
lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya sa/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcol bas rnyed pa chung du ma blangs na/ ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan chadani nges par brdabar bya'o// ri bor zhagi/
'a na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag bang zhig brtsigs nas/ don gal te dge slong brgyaganas na ras yug brgya 'bul lo// de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug
brgya kho na 'bul lo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// jatsam dus gzhan zhig na/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis shag dbyar gnas pa las/ khyim bdag des ras yugabargya bskur
ba/ de gnyis kyis blangs nas phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis smras pa// rnyed pa 'di na dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro// cig shos kyis rgyas pa ! b.rag cag kho na par 'gyur ro// gal te
de lta na long zhig/ des smras pa/ phan tshun rtsod par ma 'gyur grang/ ji tsam na gcig gis kyang mo blangs nas/ re gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa// de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya:
ya gcig gis sbas pa/ dge slong rnams bos 'a de rnams dang lhan cig bgo'o// cig shos kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du byas na su 'gro/ gang gzhon pa'o// gos rnams sus
srung gang gzhon pas so// de ltar ma nus kyis/ gang gzhon pa ni 'gro'o// gang rgan pa des ni gis rnams srung ngo// de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon bshos dge slong rnams 'bod
pa'i phyi'i mnyan yod du song ngo// drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal sgro ra mos re mos mi stongs par byed ra in pas/ nyi dga' rgyal
bu rgyal byed kyi tshul gyi sgo nas 'dug pa des rgyang ring bo kho na nas mgo spra ba'i ma rtogaltar skya la/ sman ma 'phung ba zhig mthong nas bsams pa/ dge slong gnas pa rtan 'di 'ga' zhig
'ong gas/ de bsur 'gro'o snyam nas/ gnas brtan byon pa legs so// khyon pa legs so/ slob dpon phyag 'tshel lo// des bsams pa// 'di ni slob dpon yang
mi shes/ mkhan po la nga mi shes te/ 'di ni rgan zhugs shig yin no snyam du ragi nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod gang nas 'ongs/ ri bor che ge mo zhig nas so/ ca de nugatsug
lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod do// ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/ 'on te 'phongs pa yin/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang/ khyod don ci zhig la 'ongs/
dge slong rnams dang bgo ba'i phyir ro// gal te de lta na nga kho nas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o// slob dpon legs so// nye dgas bsams pa//
gal te 'di bdag gi thad nas gzhan du song na skye bo'i tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyis/ legs par bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas des de ngal sor bcug ste/ dus ma yin pa'i
brtung ba dag blud nas/ ci nas kyang dre mo gtam gyis rnam sros kyi bar du brengs nas mal bzang po bshams to 3 rkang pa bkru ba dang/ rkang pa bsku ba byin nas/ ji tsam gnyid
log par gyur pa de srid du bsdad do// de nas nyi dga' gsang 'phal bar ma 'gyur grang snyam pa'i 'tsher bas mtshan mo de 'dus par byas so/ de nas de nang par sngar langs te rgan zhugs
de khrid nas ranges par so nga// rim gyis ri bor du phyin pa dang/ de nas gtsug lag khang du gnas pa'i rgan zhugs cig shos des 'ongs pa legs so zhes kun dga' bar 'gyur
ba'i tshig sbas nas de gnyis ngal sos pa dang/ khong gsum car yang gnas gcig tu 'tshogs nas/ nye dgas smras pa/ red pa bgos shag/ gnas brtan ba go'o/
nye dgas rgano zhugs shig la sbas pa rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shaka 3gnas brtan bdag mi bgod de/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo// cig shos la yang
0 smas pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/ des kyang de bzhin du sbas pa dang/ nye rags smas pa/ khyed ni nyis pa byung bas 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' na spyi'u chugs su sems can
ni dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ nye dgas bsams pa/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis sdong gis dbyen bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun du rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po
mthong nas// gcig gi drung du song sta dris pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis gtsug lag khang dag tu rtag tu chag chag btab/ phyag bdar dang
ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so/// rgan zhugs gal te chag chag dang phyag bdar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob na lta/ nye dga' gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang phyag bdar bya'o//
'on kyang 'dir red pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ rgan zhugs cig shos de'i mthu yin te/ de gtsug lag khang du dus dus su chos 'don pa'i sbyin pa byed pas/ chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spo ba
dang ldan par gyur te/ des na rnyed pa red bar gyur gyis 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang bar mi bya'o// des do gnad la phab pas skyongs nas cang mi stsa bar 'dug go/ de nas cig shos
kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dge byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis 'di'i dus dus su chos bsgrags pa'i sbyin pa byas so// rgan zhugs gal te chos bsgrags pas rnyed
pa thob na lta/ nyi dgas 'greng ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'jug pa dang/ nyam pa dus thams cad du chos bshad do// rnyed pa gang cung zad grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs
cig shos de'i mthus yin te/ des gtsug lag khang 'di'i chag chag dang/ phyag bdar dang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag bdar byed pa la yon tan lnga
yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi sams dang bar 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan gyi sams dang bar 'gyur ba dang/ lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ mdzes par gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
sogs par 'gyur ba dang lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de lta bas na gtsug lag khang phyag bdar byas pas yon bdag
mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga' bar gyur te/ des na der red pa byung bar gyur to// de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas/ da ci byin pa re slong bar bya ste/ 'khang bar mi bya'o//
de yang gnad la phab pas sbyangs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de gnyis spobs pa med pa byas nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i las ma 'khrugs pa gsung
pa'i thabs gzhan yon paso gsol kha byas la bgo'o// de gnyis kyis sngarasaphab pas sbas pa/ gnas brtan ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas nye dgas cha gsum du byas te/
cha gnyis kyi bar na rang nyid 'jug go/ de gnyis kyi bar du ni cha gcig bzhag nas gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa/ rgan zhugs khyed gnyis nyon cig/ khyed gnyis dang 'di gcig/ 'di gnyis
dang kho bo gcig ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum mo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// de nas chaganyis ni bdag nyid kyis blangs so// cha gcig ni de gnyis la phyin pa dang/ de gnyis kyis smras pa//
gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis rtsod par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgegs shig/ des bgo bar brtsams nas/ de na ras khug cig kha 'khyer du 'dug pa de
yang blangs nas ras rnams bam por bcings te song ngo// da nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang/ de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas sbas pa/ btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis su zhig
sha ba mthong/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/ mi mdza' bo rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas so//
skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang tsa byung ba// dge slong rnams gzhan rnyed pa la
thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gzhan gyi rAd pa la thob la mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
tsom skyas nas/ thetsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tsho dang ldan pa nye dgas rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus/
pa la gzags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de 3 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'das rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyon cig/ dgo
slong dag sngon byung pa 'bab chu'i ngogs shig na/ sram gnyis shig gnas pa las/ de gnyis gang gi chu'i nang du zhugs pananya gam la them par 'gyur zhing/ gang gi tshe skam la dong ba de'i
che chu'i nang du dong nas cung zad kyang ma red do// de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/ bdag cag las gcig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o// cig shes kyis ni skam la ste/ rnyed pa gang yin
pa de ni spyir bya'o// de na gcig ni chur song ngo// cig shos ni skam la sa/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams bsgrogs te skam la bton nas/ de rnams skam luganas
pas bsad do// chu la gnas pa ni chu la gnas pa nyidakyis so// ji tsam na nya' phung po chen por gyur pa dung/ gcig gas sas pa/ khyod kyis khagos shage/ cig shos kyis sas
pa/ bdag mi 'khyod do// ca'i phyir bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo// des kyang smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis sems khongs su churaM
wacing 'dug pa las/ jitsam na wa bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba/ de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas/ des smras pa/ tshe bo dag cis sams khongs su chud cing 'dug/ zhang po dag bdag
cag ni ha red pas so// ci sa mi 'byed/ zhang po nyes pas 'jigs so// khyed ni nyis pas 'jigs la/ bzhin rgyus ni rkang pa spyi'i tshugs susems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur
bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyus kyis bsams pa ! 'di gnyis sdong gis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu gsog byed pa rus sbal zhig mthong nas/ gcig gi drung
du song ste bris pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dur ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag chur zhugs te/ bdag chur zhugs nas nya rnams bsgrigs te skam la thon pa dang 'dis bsad do// tshabo gal te chu
zhugs las cung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu chu nang du 'gro'o// skam la 'gro ba ni sdong dum ci 'jiges pa dang/ tsher ma'i 'dzags pa dang/ gcan gzan gyi 'jigs ba dang/
mi'i 'jigs pa dang/ ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te des ma bsad na/ khyod kyis bsgrogs kyang ca phan/ mdor na 'dire nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni
rta'amathu yin pas/ 'dis ci byon pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang bar mi bya'o// de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas cig shos kyi drung du song nas smras
pa: tsha bo khyod kyis 'di'i ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag gis skam la song sku/ bdag gis skam la thon pa'i sku rnams bsad do// che ba gal te skam la song nas
cung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyus rtag tu skam la 'gro'o// chur 'gro ba'i de dba' klong gi 'jigs pa dang/ rus sbal gyi 'jigs pa dang/ tshusrin byis pa gsod kyi 'jigs pa dang/ chu
phyin kum ba ra'i 'jigs pa dang/ chu'i 'dzags pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te des ma bslogs na khyod kyis ji ltar gsad/ mdor na 'dir nyared bgang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu
in pas/ des ni byon pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang bar mi bya'o// des de gnad la phub pas skyangs nas cang mis bar 'dug go/ bzhazhi rgyas kyi snas nga/ tsha bo dag 'di la tshigs
su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ ma g.yo bar bgoba'i thabs yod do// desngar stsaphab pas smras pa/ zhang po ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum du bgos
te: nya'i mjug ma rnams gcig tu byas/ mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/ khar gyi cha rnams gcig tu byas nas/ tshigs su bcad de snus pa/ thang la rgyu bas mjug ma sta//
gting du rgyugs mgo bo'o// bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa// de ni chos la gnas pas bkur// bzhin rgyus kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis bsus pas bdago red pa dang ldan no
gAm nas/ des na chen po zhig ge yod pa khyer te/ ma'i drung du song ba dang/ de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/ bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang nas 'ongs//
mgo yang med cing mjug med pa'i// nya bo che zhig thogs nasan/ shin tu don grub gu las 'ongs/ des smras pa/ gang phyir blun po rtsod gyur cing/ chos dang chos min mi shes
bas/ rgyal po 'i mdzod ni 'a phal pa ltar// des ni chog shes 'tsho bar 'gyur// des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa// rgyas pa blta na sdug pa khyod// pha rol gnan pa
gne tu legs// de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la// khyod kyang rAd pa phun sum tshogs// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nyi dga'
'di nyid yin no// sum gnyis po gang yin pa de na rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang de gnyis 'dis bslus la/ da ltar yang de gnyis bsus so//
gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ der dag slong brgya dbyar gnas par dem bcas so// khyim
bdag de'i blo skyes pa// ras yug brgya bsgrubs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re ra la mngaras yug re re bskon no snyam mo// ji tsam na
nye dgas khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/ ri ra la yang ras yug re re bskon no zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams
pa gal te de las ras yug gcig ma gru ba na/ bdag nye dga' ma yin no snyam nas/ de mgron du ma bos bzhin du song ngo// khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugasatshod
'tsha gsol nas/ ras rnams 'grim pa dang/ nyi nags rus gcig blangs nas myur ba myur bar song ngo// ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chad do// khyim bdag gis sbas pa/ 'phag
pa dag bdagu gsaras bcu legs par bgrangs te 'tshal tamachis na/ 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis bsnams par ma gyur chung/ dge slong rnams kyis smyos pa/
khyim bdag de ltar su zhig khyed/ 'on kyang btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis spyan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis spyan ma drangs so// des ris de khyer nas song ngo// de nas khyim
bdag de smod par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni/ dge
slong dag mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi red pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rud pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na
'o ga la che bas can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ ! btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ste
dga' yar ma drangs par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal brgyud pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag da lta 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus
na yang nye dgas mgron du ma shes pas gzhan gyi nad pa la thob rgyal byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na khram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod da/ des bram ze'i khyon
brgya zla ba gsum du mgron du bos te zan byin nas de'i blo skyes ba/ bram ze'i khye'ur re la yang ras yug re re bgon no snyam mo// de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ bram ze rgan po zhig gan
ba des gles nas/ de rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ thog mar zos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo// khrun rjes ras rnams 'dris par byed pa na/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gcig gi ras
chad nas des dris pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na ! bras ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis blangs par ma gyur grang/ da rnams
kyis yas pa/ de ltar su zhig bgyid/ 'on kyang khyod kyis bram ze rgan po mgron du bosasam/ bdag gis mgron du ma bos so// des sa lugade thog mar blangs nas song ngo// bram ze
des smad bar brtsams so// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze rgan po gang yin pa de ni dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang de mgron dum
bos so// da lta na yang ngo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri 'or zhigan khyim bdag cig yodapa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ der dge slong zhig dbyar
gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de ldang ba phun sumatshogs pa zhig pas/ des nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag bdar byed do/ gtsug lag khang de ni saphyogs
dban zhang bzang ba'i phyogs subartsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ dar ba dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ natso dang/ ri skegs dang/ khu byug rnams skad
'byin pa/ ma tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no// ji tsamanaded dpon 'byor ba rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang der dgongs btab pa las/ des gtsug
lag khang de mdzes pa dang/ nye ba'i tshal mdzes pa dag mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i ched du rnyed pa rnal mo che zhage bskur nas/ de nang par

sngar langs te song ngo// dge slong da 'tshem bgacan zhig pas rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no zhes 'gyod pas ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams
kyis: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gis ba'i lci ba'i khang par dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang/ der gal
bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa nyung du 'am/ phal mo cher phul na/ de na gnas pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho
na'i sku/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sdom la/ bya ba rnams la skal ba ni// sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las// dge 'dun dang ni chos gos kyi// rnyed pa brgyud du bya ba 'o/
gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod nA'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa// btsun pa dbyar kyi nang logs su dag 'dun bye bar gyur na/
rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ rtsistsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nye bar 'khor kha cig la na sbyin no// kha cig la ni ma sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ chos
dang mthun pa'i phyogs la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gis bslab pa phul te nyams par gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig
la ni sbyin no// kho cagol nas sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gum par gyur na red pa stsal bar bgyi 'am//
rnyed pa stsalabar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mo sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa 'a 'o// ra 'or zhig na khyim
bdag cig yod pa des yod byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las gtsug lag khang der phyin pa dang/ khyim bdag
dus zas byin nas/ ras yug lnga brgya byin pa dang/ des ras yug lnga brgya po de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas songo so// ji tsam nA re'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len dang/
drang srong byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las ri bor de nyid du phyin nas/ khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin nas/ ras yug lnga brgya byin no// dge slong rnams kyis sa pa/
tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi mkhan pos khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na la bgos kyis/ de rang gi red pa 'di rnams bdag khe nas thob pa'i 'gyur ro//
dganyis kyis sbas pa/ mkhan po ni bsod nams che ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/ ros lan 'ga' khyed cag la khyin par zad do// de rnams kyis slar lan glan par brtsams
pa'i skabs de dag slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rnyed pa brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang
zhe na 3 mtshams kyis thob pa'i rud pa dang/ khrims kyis thob pa'i rad pa dang/ rtan gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang/ dge 'dun gyur btags pa dang/ dge slong gar btags pa dang/
dbyar gyi dang/ mngon sum dang/ so sor bstan pa'o// mtshams kyis thob pa'i rid pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ gnas nyare la/ gso sbyong gcig la sa/ gtsug lag
khang de gnyis kyirnyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin no// de la gnyug mar nas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brgya
la gso sbyong tha dad par dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/ de la red pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin to/ gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyug mar gnas
pa'i dge slong rnams kyis longs sdud par bya ste/ 'di ni mchems kyis thob pa' rid pa zhes bya'o// khrims kyis thob pa'i red pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis
'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba khyed kyi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go/ kho bo cag gi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go/ lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo na spyi'i
yin no zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang/ dam
ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la red pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar
'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu
drangs la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la red pa phul na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// 'dul ba gzhi//
pa bam po re lnga pa// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la red pa phul la/ dam
bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rId pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dag
slong rnams zan byin nas// rgan pa'i mthar red pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ red pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhen/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa/
rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan khyim nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la red pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang
dbang bar gyur zhen/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas ba rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma pa cas pa/
rnams red pa phul/ dAm ma bcas pa rnams la chu dungs na/ red pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na: dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas
pa dang/ dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rAd pa phul lo/ dam ma bcas pa'i rnams la chu drangs na/ rUd pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhin/
ram bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ nam ma bcas pa rnams la rAd pa
