khul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu dwangs na/ rnyed nga gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma
bcas pa'i dge slong rnams phan byan nas/ rgan pa'i mthar da pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// ji ltar
dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu yin pa de bzhin du/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi
gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o// gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis lam po che dang/ tshod dus
dang ! bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas ba'i dag slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la red pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams
kho na la chu drangs na/ red pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma
bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la red pa la la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rAd pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o//
lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams bran byani nas/ dam ma bcos pa rnams la rnyed pa
phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o/ lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su
dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byinanas/ dam mabacas pa rnams la red pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhon/
gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi med dang/ sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar red pa//
phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhi na/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su dam
bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan bun nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la redab tshul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang par 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis/
ka'o/ lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan khyin nas/ rgan pa'i mtha' logs su
rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gar dbang bar 'gyur zhen/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su
dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma pa cas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcasaM pa rnams la rin pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhu na/
gnyisaka'o// lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rtsod pa
phul la/ rgan pa'i mtha' nyid du chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhen/ gnyis ka'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa dgu yin pa de bzhin du/
dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni khrims kyis thob pa'i red pa zhes bya'o/ rten gyis red pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ ma ning ga pa la
brtan to/ dbyar gnas par dram btsas pa des red pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni/ ri kho na'i yin te/ 'di ni rtan gyis thub ba'irAd pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun khyer btags pa'i rid pa gang zhe na/
rnyed pa gang zhig nges la/ dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 'di ni reg 'dun gyir btags pa'i rid pa zhes bya'o// dge slong gir btags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rud pa gang zhig ngos la//
dmagasakyis phyi nas gnas khang pa'i 'o// yang thog pa'i 'o// khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'o zhes btags pa ni/ don dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa de kho na'i ste/ 'di ni dge slong gir btaglu
ba'i rid pa zhes bya'o// dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhen/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis bcas pa ste// 'di ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// mngon
sum gyi rid pa gang zhen/ rnyed pa gang zhig ma nges la/ dmagos kyis ma bya ba'i sa// 'di ni mngon sum gyind pa zhes bya'o// so sor bstan pa'i rin pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig ba ma
pa dang/ byang chub pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la phul ba de gal te mchod rten chen po bzhir khyer mi nus na/ mchod rten gcig kho na la
dbul gyi/ gzhan la ni ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni so sor bstan pa'i red pa zhes bya'o// sdom la/ gnas nas phyung ba shi ba dang// bge ba dang ni bsu ba dang// gnas nas
phyung dang dge tshul dang// dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba 'o/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod ma'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun
pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba ba tu mang po dang/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu ma'apo mchis pa la// de rnams las gnas nas phyung ba zhig khum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang
pa ra'agyur lags/ nye bar 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni gnyis mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa na rab tu mang po lags na/ gnas nas
byung ba zhig gum na/ de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// gnas nas phyung ba na rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni
nyung ba las ka gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas
phyung ba rab tu mang po dang/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar
'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis mchis pa las/ rang bzhin duganas pa zhig kum
lags na/ gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur la gas/ rong bzhin du gnas par cig shos so// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mapal/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni bcig mchis pal
'khaM gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ gnas nas phyung ba rnams las thog mar sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge
tshul 'ongs nas shin/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dwas ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dag tshul shi las/ de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long zhig ces rta nya gtang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams
'god par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'byed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsresanas 'god par byed na/ ma bgos
nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sgo bar khyed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcos pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di
skad ces tsho dang ldan pa dag bdag drang dugasol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes sa ba las de yang ma byung bar shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi
de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long zhig ces tho nya gtang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyis bar bges pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'khyen
par byed na/ bgos pa legos par pags pa yin no// bsres te 'gyod par byed na/ ma bgos ba nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sgo bar byed na
legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shin/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs
pa mtshungs par sbyod pa shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no//
dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos ba de gas par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'gyed par byed na/ mkhagos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge
slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnamasakyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'angs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag
bdug drang du gsol// dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba nyid du shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs
par spyod pa sha yis ) de'i stang du zed dang chos gos long zhig ces bo nya gtang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams 'gyod par byedan/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bsna
pa rnamos 'gyed par budan/ [“]pagos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsras nas 'gyod par byed na/ ma bgos pa sa par bragos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
la so bar byed na/ lugs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shin/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams
la khyad kyi dgi tshul shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhag ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// dmam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par phyed na/ ma bgos pa nyes pa bgos pa yin no//
dum bcu sa pa rnams 'gyod par byed na/ bags pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'byon par byang n ) ma bgos pa nyas bab bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la
sngo bar byedan/ legs par bsngos pa yinan// dam ma bcas ba rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dgotshul 'ongasanas 'disnyad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par
bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba shin/ dam ma bcas ba rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul sha yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhag ces tho nya gtang bar bya'o//
dum ma 'dus pa rnams 'byed pa'i dad na/ ma bgos pa nyes bar bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres
te 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dag slong gi dge 'dun 'a sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dmam bcas pa
rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'od s te shin/ dmam bcas ba rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyad kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa she yis )da'i lhung bzed dang chos
gos long zhig ces pho nyagatang bar bya'o// dAm ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas po rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa leg
pan bgos pa yin no// bsus te 'gyod par de da na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos ba yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dag slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byedan/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam
ma bcas ba rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slod 'ongs la 'di skad ces tsho dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes smras las de yang ma byad ban shani/ dam ma
bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs bar spyod pa sha sa// de'i lhung bzed dang chos gog med zhag ces pho nyagatang bar bya'o// dum
ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ 'gres ba legs par bshes ba yin no// bsres te 'gyed par byed
na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dag 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin na// stomani nye dga' dang ne pan gyis/
brlabs// bag ma sbyin dang bsung bya dang// bdag shi sbyin ba med pa dang// sbyang pa dang ni mi gsumamo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'i// nya dga' spyi ba'i phol mig cig
byung nas/ de sman pa'i gan du song nas bzhin bzangs kho po la sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'bagapa mar khu gsol cig dang sos bar 'gyur re/ nye dgas bsams pa// gal te
rang khon 'thungasan/ de ring nyid du sos par gyur na/ sang mar dang gos bsrung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/ re zhig bslangs la phunas btung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du gsan/ bsod
nams chen po dang ldapas lhan cig gnas pa dang nya gnas rnams kun tu mgapa dang/ de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang/ rma g.yog pa gos phal bo che blangs so// phyi de nyan pa'i sman
pas dris pa// 'phags pa khyod snyan gdungs gam/ khyod kyis mar gsalalam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungs so// 'phags ba ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyis
dung nyis 'gyur du gsol cig/ dus lhan cig gnas nga dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa/ sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/ mkhan po thos lags so// kho bo'i nad 'di na chen
skyes par gyur mar dang rmagayog pa'i gos mang dudagos kyis slongs shig/ de rnams kyis mar dang gesaM phal mo che bsrungs so// de sang githabs la chags par gyur pas/ nyi ma
de la yang ma 'thungs pas/ de'i nad rab skyes par gyur to// ji tsaman mngan pa 'ongs nas drasang// 'phags pamar gsal lam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungs so//
'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// des smras pa/ bzhan bzangs de rang ni sus gyur du btung ngo// sman pas smras pa// 'phags pa gal mar gyi sgrom gyi nang na nubu par zhugs
kyang du na khyod la srog ma mchis so// des smras pe/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi mgul ba rdog pas mnan ma'i 'thus dang sos par 'gyur te/ sman pa des mjal te zhes phyag
nas khros te song ngo/ de nas nye dgas mar khus lhung bzed bkang ste 'thungs nga las ma 'u nas shi'o// de nas gsar mang du yod de/ cha gcig na chos gos las so cha gnyis pa/
na nad kyi rkyen sman las so// cha gsum ban rdungs su byas ba dang mkhas pa las te/ gsar srang sum khri phyung ngo zhes blon bo rnams kyis thos nas rgyal po la smras pa
lha 'phags pa nye dga' gum pa las/ de la gsar mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri mchisakyis/ de la bka' stsal pa'i rogs so// rgyal pos smras pa// gal te de lta na
dang la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob cig/ dge slong rnams de khyer tasrog tu song ngo// de rnams kyang lhags nas gnas khang rgyas btab bo/ ) dge slong rnams kyis da dun khrod du bsags
nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na/ gnas khang rgyal bo'i rgyas pa tang pa mthong nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la da'i tshig gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la nadad par gyur cig ces byos la/ 'ad skad ces
rgyal po chen po gang ga mo khyod rgyal po'i bya ba byed ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyi dam slong nye dga' la bltas sam/ 'on te gang gi tsho khyod bag ma gtong ba 'am/ bag ma len pa de'i tshanye
dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho ba'i chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal dang/ na ba'i rkyen rtsa dang/ yo byad rnams kyis bstab sa sam/ 'on tan pa
na 'am gro bas sam zhes gyes shig/ gal te ma bgyis so zhes sman/ de largyal po chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi du ba dang/ rab tu byang ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sams las chung dus
gnas bar gyis shige/ rnyed pa 'di ni mongs ba mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang nga bar 'gyur bas gtogs 'dod brong zhig ces smos shig// btsun ba bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi lar mnyamanas dra le ga la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/
datsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'aji skad stsal ba bzhin du bgyi sta/ bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal pos lan
gsol ba bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyed kyis dag h+phe to dga' shi ba' yo byad
bges shig/ rag song rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su phyag so bsgyur nas bges so// gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye dga' shi nas/ de 'a gsar mang du byang ste gsang
sbang sum khri dge slong rnams kyis rna gos so zhes thos nas/ de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun pa nye dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs par
spyod pa yin pas/ bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te dag dang lhan cige yang bgos so/
yangs pa can dang/ wArA dzAs padang/ rgyal bo'i kham pa dang tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nusakhagos te/ de ltar grong khyer na bodrugan gnas/
pa' dag slong rnams 'dus so// dge slong rnams sdud tsang 'gyed pa na/ lung nod pa dang/ klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ yid la byed pa bod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis//
@# bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu lta ste/ lnga gang zhan/ gaN+Du dang/ rgyud chags gsum dang/ mchod rten
rgyu dang tshul shing dang lnga pa na gsol ba'o// shi ba'i gaN+Dade rdung pa na 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin [} ]rgyunachags gsum 'don pa dang/ mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang/
tshul shing 'grim pa dang/ gsol ba byed pan sang de bzhin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na she ba'i yo byad thams cad gsal bo byas te bgos na mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar yang byas
gnas mal bshams la zhes bya banas/ dag 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin no// shi ba'i mi byed rgan pa'amathar bzhag ste[” ]/dge slong
gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la gsal ba bya'o// dag 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'di'i dge slong nyi dga' gum ste/ gum pa de'i yo byad gda'ad/
dang mgada' ba mchis pa 'di lags te/ gal te dag 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bldad na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga'
gum pa'i yo byad rdzas gda' ba dang/ mi gda' ba la gum ba'i yo byad du byin gyis brlung pa'o// 'di no gsol ba'o// dge slong dag 'di ni sha ba'i yo byad bges zin ba ste 3'di lta ste/
giso' nga 'o// gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa mi sbyin no// tshadang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa
btsun pa gang na dge 'dunam mthun bus gsol bar bgyid pa ma mchis pa der bum ba'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi 'am bgo bar mi bgyi lags )nye bar 'khon thog ma dang tha mar byas nas
bgo par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis thog ma pa dang tha ma ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yo byad cige sbyar ta de las cung zhig dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang/ dge 'dun

gyi gzhon ba la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gsol ba 'am thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyisnyad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar
dge slong rnams thatshom skyes nas/ tha tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa/
nye dga' ma 'os pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os
bar chags pas shi ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byang brjen pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnad du bsnan pa dang/ de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda'i phyi rjes/
bzhin du song nas/ ngon pa de srog dang bral la/ ji tsam na ma stas// chom rkun pa lnga brgya ri 'or zhig bcom nas phyogs der phyin pa dang/ da rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo// mu ge dang
bcas ba'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smas ba/ shes ldan dag sha 'di rnyed kyis/ nyib brgya lnga bcu'i ni glang bo re'osha bcad btsa'o// nyis brgya lnga bcus ni chu rlung ngo// de na glang po che'i
tsaN+NaM sha bcad cing 'tshid pa gang yin pa de rnams 'di snyamadu semasate/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas/ rkun jus rab tu mang po 'di grub kyis/ de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin/
sha las yog pa zos la/ lhag ma dag gis gdab bo// de dag gis dugacan khros dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro zhes da rnams kyis ci yog bshig zos nas/ lhag ma dug gis
[zo. ]btab bo// gang dag chu la dong ba de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin dudapyad nas chu ru yog nga 'thungs nas/ lhag ma dug blugs te 'ongs nas/ gang dag gas ni sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang
chu'athungs nas/ gang dag gis chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cud shi bar gyur to// ji tsam na 'a zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas/ phyogs der 'ongs nas/
des ro de dag thams cad mthong ngo// de nas chags pas bskyod pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa/ bdag la rnyed ba phal mo che yod kyis rim bzhin du bya'o snyam nas/ des gzhu mchog khar bcug
ste/ gzhu rgyud kyi rjod pa rgyus pa bca' brtsams te/ de nas rgyus pa chod pa dang mchog mas dkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to// lhas tshigs su bcad ba snas pa/ bsags par yang ni bya ba ste/
lhag par bsaMgs par mi bya'o/ sogs la chags pa'i wa long ba// gzhu yis bsad par gyur la ltos// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi zhwa gang yin pa de ni nyi
dga' 'di nyid yin te// don yang lhag par chags pas shi'o// da ltar yang lhag pa la chags pas sha bar gyur to/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ de'atsho dge slong nad kyis theg pa
sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de/ dge slong gis rame gro byas// 'on kyang sha bar gyur nas/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang/ de nas chos gos cig
bshang gcig dag gas 'bags shing sbrang ma rnams 'du bar gyur to// de nas gos 'gyed pas/ rame gro byed pa de la smras pa// tshadang ldan pa khyod kyis rgyud ldan byas
te chos gos ma bkrus kyis khrus shig/ des smras pa// yod byad ni khyod 'gyodran/ kho bos bkru'am/ khyod kyise dus shig/ skabs dedag slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsaye pa/ nad g.yog la yo byad drug byin la/ lhag ma dgo slong gis bgo bar bya'o// gal te nad ga mogamang bar gyur pa thams cad kyi sbyor yo byad
drug bgo bar bya'o// dge slongashes nyen dang pasod nams chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi nas/ de rnams kyi yo byad dang/ dge tshul gyi yo byad dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i
mthar spudas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nad g.yog gis yo byad drug bkur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/ zhes dus 'dams shing 'dams shing bzang po rnams blangs so// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang po rnams las sbyin par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las sbyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalaM pa/ ngan pa rnams las sbyin
par mi bya ste// 'on kyang bar ma dag las sbyare bar bya'o/ nad pa mar bar dgo 'dun gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nad g.yog
[ra ]gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/ myur ba myur bar brtag par bya'o// de'i bya ba nyams par mi bya ste/ lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas gang zag ga gnas mal la bsnyal ba khya'o//
glud bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slongand pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas/ dge slong zhig la smras pa/ re zhig kho bo jitsam 'tsho'i bar du rin
gro gyis shig/ kho po'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni kho bo shi nas khyod ci bder gyis sha'i// des de'i mi gre bya bar brtsams pa las ji tsamin dge slong de shi'o// de nas gos 'gyed pas
de la snus pa// dge slong de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgod dgos kyis phul cig des smras pa/ des kho bo kho na la ci bder byed du bcug go zhes pa'i skabs de dag slong rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol nga deng/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de gson po'i che nyid nam byanan/ shi nas sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdag shi nas 'du'i

yin no zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni mad pa yin bas blangs te bgos la dge slong de'i rang ga skal pa sbyin par bya'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa/ sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs cheb zhig yod pa deshes
bachung bas de'i sman med nas/ de'i lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags te rim gro byed pa la sbas pa/ bdag la ci yang med kyis/ bdag ga med du mched pa gyis shig/ des khas blangs pa las/
shi nas ngan song rnams su skyes so// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong sha ba gang yin pa des rim gro byed pa la ji
skad smras/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang/ dge slong dag dge slong de 'og bar lhung ngo// gal te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de 'ched du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas
bar gyur dang/ dad pa skyes pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig/ de lta bas na dge slong gas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod ba na/ nam yang yal bar mige zhag ste/ nad g.yog
sbyin par bya'o// des de la dras te/ gal te de la sman med na yon bdag la bslang bar bya'o// gal tagrub nad lta na legs/ ji ste ma grub na 'dun gyi las sbyin no// ji ste yang mgrub na
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ dri gtsang khang gi gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshananam/ rgyun gang yin pa de dag 'dun gyis phog la sbyin par bya zhing/ rim gro byed ngas bskyar
nas rim gro dang ston pa mchod par bya'o// sos par gyur nas la 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yin te/ khyod kyi e khyad du spyad de zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te de la 'byor pa yod na des 'bad de bsob
bar bya'o// gal te med na de'i spyad pa legs par spyadapa yin te/ tha' la bu bzhin du ldog sa pa yin pas de la 'gyod par mkhya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong nad kyis
bka thebs pa sdug bsngal ba// nad tshabs che bu/ tshon bas nyan pa zhig yod pa de lhung bzed bzang bo zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chab/sanas rim gro byed pa las ba/ kho bo'i lcang
bzed 'on cig/ des ma byin pa dang/ de de langanasams skyes share lhung bzed la lhag par chags pas shi nas/ de lhung bzed de da du sprul zhig tu skyes so// dge slong rnams kyis de
brag tukhyen nas/ ba sags te gtsug lag khang du lhags nasaM ) dge slong gi reg 'dun 'dus so/ )gos 'gyed pas shi ba'i yo byad rgan po'i mthar spungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo song la dpe slong rnams la dag slong sus kyang da'i lhad bzed bzhag nga 'i snod ma dbye zhig/ de bzhin gshegrwa
ba nyid kyis 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes sgo zhig/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phye ba dang/ sbrul zhige mgo'i gdengs ka chen byas
nas 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gol gyi sgras drungs nas bka' stsal nga/ me gti mug canalhung bzed 'di stongs la song zhig/ dge slong rnams kyis 'gyed par 'gyur ro//
de 'khrugs nas rtsa dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/ nags stug po zhag tu zhugs nas/ des de khros pa'i mi sbyor bas nags de rab tu 'bar te/ de nyid du tshig nas dge slong rnams la ngan
@#// sams skyas pas dmyal ba rnams su skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag srid pa thams cad las sku ga/
bar gyis shig/ srid pa'i yo byad gang gi phyir sems can gcig galus de gnas gsum po nags stug por khros pa'i mo dang/ dmyal bar soms can dmul ba'i dung/ dur khrod du
me phal pas srog par 'gyur ba thams cad las yid byung bar bya'o// de lta bas na dge slong gis e byed la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya zhing/ gang la skye ba de yongs su spang bar bya'o//
ma spangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur de// gzhan yang gal te nad pa rang ga yo byad slongan/ rim gro byed pas myur ba myur bar sbyin par bya'o// ma byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/
'agleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas/ ma ma yin pa rnams kyi steng du skyes so/ dgos 'gyod pas lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo'i
zhes dge sbyong do'i gnas khang du 'jug bar brtsams pa las/ de kun nas dkris pa drag pos dbyug pa blangs te langs nas/ des smras pa/ re zhig kho bo dur khrod du yang ma phyung bar lhung
bzed dang chos gos 'gyed par byed dam/ de stas nas bros pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyisaM/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol po/
ra zhag thog mar dge slong gire byung nas/ phyi nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o/ gleng gzhin mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong zhig shunas/ dge slong rnams
kyis de phyung ste/ dur khrod du de bzhin du bor nas gtsug lag khang du lhags te 3 gis 'gyed pas chos gos dang lhung bzed ngago'i zhes de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang/ de mi ma yin
pa rnams su skyes pas// dbyug pa blangs te langs nas/ des smras pa/ re zhig kho bo'i ro la mchod pa yang ma byas par chos gos dang lhung bzed 'gyed par byed dam zhes pa 'i skabs
de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis sngar nge'i ro la mchod pa byas la/ de'i 'og tu lhung
bzed dang chos gos bgos dang/ nyes dmigs 'a'i mi 'gyur no/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa lhagi gnas khang du shi nas/ de dag slong rnams kyis
du khrod du khur te/ ro la mchod pa byas pasagasanas/ de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang/ gos 'gyod pas de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa las/ de'i dbyug ra blangs te langs nas/
re zhig bdag gached du chos bsgrags pa ma byas par chos gos rnams 'gyed par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i ched du chos bsgrags pa dang/ de'i ched du yon bsngo ba byas nas/ chos gos rnams bgo bar bu'o/
nad pa dang na tshong dpon dang// dngos po'i sbyin pa lag gis gu/ mtshams bzhi dag tu bya bdang// phonya brgyad du bya ba'o// gleng gzhin mnyan yodana'o// detsi khyim bdag cig gis
sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa las/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni lhags so// bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs/
nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu las rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes te 1 lnga po gang ga/se ge
na 3 nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang/ lha rnams la chos 'chad bar bzhed pa dang/ gnas mal lo gzigs por bzhed pa dang/ nad pa la gziges par bzhad pa dang/ nyan
thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/ skabs 'dir ni nad pa la gzigs pa dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas 'de bo ma lon par mkhyen nas/ lde mig bsnams te kun
dga' rab nas kun dga' ra ba dang/ gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang/ spyale po naras stsol po dang/ 'chag sa nas 'chag sa rnams su 'chagatsang gshegs pa na/ gtsug lag
khang chen po gang na ba der phyon pa dang d+ha de na dge slong nad tshabs che ba/ shes pa chung ba/ rang ba gcin dang ngan skyugs kyi nang du chub pa zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ bcom ldan
'dus bdag la mgon ma mchis so// bde bdu gshegs ba bdag la mgon ma mchis so zhes skad ngan bton pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong nga khams gsum gyi
mgonapo'i rjes su khyod rab tu byung na/ ci'i phyir de skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgonam mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so zhes du skad 'don/ btsunang
bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par srid pa 'ga' yang 'chi gro bgyid nga 'am/ lta ba ma mchis so// dge slong khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' la rame gro dang blta ba byas pa yod dam/
btsun pa mamachis lags so/ de bas dang khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bu r gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kye'i lca rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te 'ong zhing/

ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa khyer te 'ong par gyur cig ces 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyod pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshabcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyad nga mdzad pa de'i tshe/ brgya
byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po la
dris pa nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gsar gyi ril bkang ste/ ri spos kyi ngad ldab las sa blangs nas myur ba myur bar/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te 'dug nas 'de skad ces
gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shag dang de'i rame gro bdag gis bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsal pa/ ko'ushi ka khyod kyi phare rab tu byung ba ma yinagyi/ 'on kyang nga'i phyir
yin no// gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di sngon ma mthong la/ lha rnams ni gtsang sprul dga' kha yinabs 'dug cige/ ngas 'di'i rim gro khya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na bab+ba'achos gos bas
nas phyag 'khor leng// bkra shis dang/ g.yung drung 'khyil ba can bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas dge slong du bzung
ste/ gan dang ngan skyags nas phyung nas mthu' gcig tu bzhag sta/ smyug gi tshal bas bzhar nas sa dkar pos dril phyi byas te bkrus so// de nas skyil mo krung 'char bcug nas/ de'i chos gos
rnams bkrus te/ phyogs de yang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa mdzad do// de nas phyag dang zhabs bsil nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la nad pa la mi gro bya ba sngon du 'gro
pa'i chos bshad pas mang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin dubacug nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skam gyi bsod snyoms khyer
te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo// chos nyid kyis sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na/ bsod snyoms mnos nas khyer te 'ong ba'i dug slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa'i
'das so so gang dag par dga' bar mdzad du/ dge slong cig dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam/ zhes yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin
pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo cig dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam/
btsun pa de bzhin du zhal zas bsod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun legs par tshim par bgyis lags so// donas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi phud bzhes te/ tshadang ldan pa kun
dag 'a bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo songal gtsug lag khang che ge mo na dge slong nad tshabs chab zhig yod pa de la bsod snyoms phyed po 'ad khyer la khros nas 'di skad ces/ tshe dang
ldan pa khyod kyi rim gro ston pa nyid kyis mdzad de/ bsod snyoms phyed kyi bgo bsha' yang mdzad do zhes gyis shage/ btsun nga bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
ldan zhadas kyi ltar mnyananas/ bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyon te/ de la bsod snyoms byin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa yang snyas so//
bam po ri drug pa// de nas dge slong de 'di snyam du soms te/ bdag ni khams gsum gyi bla ma nyid kyis rim gro mdzad ste/ bsod snyoms kyi thad
kyang gnang gi/ bdag dpas byin pas longs spyad nas le las dus 'das par byed pa'i/ bdug la rages ba ma yin pas/ ma la bdag nam gyi cha stod dang/ nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal
bar sbyor da la brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ des nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson bar gnas pan/ 'khor ba'i 'a bor lem lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di
nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang ltung ba dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
te dgra bcom par gyur to// dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gsar du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems/
tsan dan dang lta bu r mnyamaMpa/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing/ rage ba dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob ba/ srid pa dang/ 'dod pa'i rnyid

pa dang/ bkur sde la rgyab kyis phyogs pa// dbang po dang lta ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa/ra bya ba dang/ brjod par bya ba dang/ mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
sa dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dgund pa 'ad deg la ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa khyed cag kho na ma gtogs par ma mad/ pha mad/ rtsa lag la zhan med do// de lta bas na/ tshangs
ngamatshud pa na spyod pa rnam kyis phan tshun du rim gro bya ste/ mkhan pos ni lhan cig gnas pa'i 'o// lhan cig nas pas ni mkhan po'i 'o// slob dpon gyis ni gnas kyi'o// nye gnas kyis ni slob
dpon gyi'o// mkhan po gcig nga sa ni mkhan po gag pa'i 'o// slob dpon gcig bas na slob dpon gcig pa 'a 'o// gtam 'dres pas ni gotam 'dresapa'i 'o// phabs par sman pas na phebs
par sla ba'i 'o// smos 'drin gyis ni smos 'dren gyi'o// 'khor dang bral ba shes pa chung ba gang yin pa dge 'dun gyisand kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas mi gro pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/
mang po sbyin te/ mthar na dge 'dun kun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o// dag slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi 'oge gro mdzad nas/ des dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da lta
'ba' zhig tum zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i rim gro byas nas/ des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung
ba bsti gnas me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu phun sum tshogs pa// shang sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig na drang srong mngon bar shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so// des slob

ma rami grwa byas nas sos pa dang/ de nas das mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag ngo snyam du sems 3 de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyidi yin no// drang
srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas de'i rim gro byas so// da ltar yang byas so// gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'adas la zhus pa/ btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das lhag par nad pa rnams la byams par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar bdos pa'i dus na nang

nga lhag par nad pa rnams la byams par byed pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba yu la shi bo'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang na/ rgyal po shi ba zhes bya ba 'byon pa dang/ rgyus pa dang/ bde

nga dang/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang ma mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ de slong ba pa rnams la ma gtong bcung zad kyang med de/ nod pa rnams la ni khyad par du byed do// ji tsaman
khyim bdag nad pa sman ba thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig rgyal po'i drung dusong nas/ lha bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag dpyad byos shig/ de rnams
kyis smras pa// lha 'di'i sman ni dkon lags so// rgyal bos smras ba/ dkon pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ lhagapa zhig btsas tshun chad sngon lan 'ga' yang su la yang khro ma myong ba de'i
khrag las nas thug bgyis te/ zla ba drug tu stsam na de ltan de'i sos par 'grub lags kyi/ gzhan gyis ni ma lags so/ rgyal pos snyas laM/ de'i sman dkon pa ni bden no// de
nus bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par brtsams na/ bdag nyid kyi spyod pa brtag par dka' bar gyur nas/ des na ma la dris par brtsams pa/ ma ma nga dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon 'ga' la khro

pa yod dam/ gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bag gi srad du byonapa de nas/bdag kyang sngon su la yang lan 'ga' khro ma myongan/ khyod lta smosakyang ci 'tshal/ de nas ma'i drung du song nas smras pa// yum
bdag dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon sul yang 'ga' la yang khros pa mchis sam/ gzhon nu khyod gang gi tsho bdag gi rum du zhugs ga de nas bdag kyang sngon su la yang khro ma myong na ) khyod lta smos
kyang ci dgos/ des bsams pa// sman rnyed do snyad do snyam du rage nas sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dmag ngas rang la brtags na/ nga sngon su la yang khro ma myong bas nga'i yan lag
[j]lnga'i rtsa gtor cige/ lha bdag cag na mo phal pa zhig gi don du lha'i sku la mtshon mi 'debs so// byang chub sams dpa' rnamasan bzo'i gnas dang/ las kyi gnas de

dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas/ rgyal po rang nyid kyis rtsa gtar tu/ khrag des zla ba drug tu nyim re re zhing de la nas thug blun bas sos par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i

dus kyi rgyal bo gang yin pa de ning nyid yin te/ den yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ da lta lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ gzhan yang shi ba'i rgyal po'i bu gzhogs khyad bskams bar gyur nas
rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu'i dpyad gyisashagi/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha bcud thams cad mar dang sgrol cig/ lo bcu gnyis su bcud thams cad sogasan/
'di'i yang shang shang te'u'i sha ma red do// sman pa rnams kyis bya ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag me long dag dang bya gag khyer te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du deng la/ der rma tshugs te bu gag gi

mdun du me long zhig dang/ bya gag rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong nas 'di bya gag yin no snyam ste skad phyung ba dang/ shang shang te'us skas bros nas ngo mtshar che bas bya gag gi drung du 'ong bar 'gyur te/
de gzung pa'i thabs ni 'di yin no// de rnams kyis de bzhin dubyas pa las/ ji tsam na las kyi zhogs pa'i zin pa'i srog chags shang shang te'u thogs nas// de rnams kyis de khyer te dong ngo//
'di ni chos nyid yin te/ 'jig rten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma len pa'i tsha dud 'gro rnams kyang sbas shes bas/ srog chags shang shang te'us smras pa// bdag gar bkri/ de rnams ji ltar gyur pa
smras pa dang/ des snas nga thang zhig/ sha'i mthu yod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sman dang/ 'ani po che rnams sna'o// de rnams kyis sbas pa/ re zhig khyod kyi snyan de dag ci 'dra bar bltas ston cig/
des smras pa// bdag gis khrus byas pa'i mun sha'amathu yod pa yinagyis/ da khyer la dengs shig/ rin po che ni 'di dag yin no// de dag rgyal pos 'jigs pasan po che rnams bor te shang

shang te'u de nyid khyer te deng ba las rim gyis yul sha bo'i debangs kyirgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas/ de rnams kyis srog chags shang shang te'u rgyal po la phul te/ des bstan pa'i sman gang yin pa/
de yang smras so// de nas rgyal pos shang shang te'u la tIs ba dang/ smras pa/ lha bdag bkrus pa'i chab sha stobs can du bgyid pa lags so// rgyal pos chu snod bdun chu bzang pos bkang
bar gzhag go/ ji tsam na de dag tu ji srid legs par ngal sos par de sridi khrus byas nas/ de nas lus kyi stobs shes pa dang/ mod la 'phur te khang pa'i stong du 'dug nas/ 'gas pa//
dang bag tsha ba dang bral te tshags su bcad nga 'i slas pa/ re zhage thog ma bdag blun te/ phyi nas bya ba 'di dag go/ de nas rgyal po sman pa ste/ blun po'i dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs//
zhes smras nas song ngo// de nas rgyal bos sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa// shes ldan dag shang shang te'us khrus byas pa'i mud sha'i mthu yod par byed pa//
bden nam/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha mad lags kyis mar dang sgrol cig/ de rnams kyis bcud thams cad mar dang btsos te/ rgyal po'i bu la blud par zhugs so// ji tsam na gangs
ri'i sul zhig na rang sangs rgyas lha brgya gnas pa las/ de na gcig gzhogs phyed bskams par gyur to// de la rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ljongs su song la
sman pa la smyos te sman stan tig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag skya bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang pom 'dod pa/ skya bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skya bo mang po'i

yid du mi 'ong ba/ sa mas can thams cad kyi thun mong du chos 'ad lta sta/ 'be zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'ong ste/ bdagand dang bcas te khyer bar gyur na/ ci'i phyi'i grong gi mthar 'go/ de rnams kyis/

smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang ji tsam du skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa yun ring du 'tsho ba de tsam du bsod nams mang po sogs so// dza sum du nga sod nams mang po
bsags pa de tsam du mtho ris rnams su mun pa de du dga' bar 'gyur go zhes ) de de rnams kyis skul ma btab nas ljongs gubabs te/ rim gyis yul sha po'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin
to// de nas lam gyi dub pa ngal sos nas sman pa'i drung du song// bzhin bzangs kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags ba khyod kyi spun nad 'di cu/
'dra ba kho na rgyal po'i sras kyi yang de kho na 'dra nas le bcuganyis kyis bcud thams cad mar dang bcos pa mchis kyis/ bzhud lamyos shag dang/ gal te skal ba'i khyad par gyis bcur
thob na/ des na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de rgyal po ba bo brang du song nas/ sgo gar bsdad do// rgyal bo dang kun tu spyod pa na slong ba po'i skye bo sngon du bzhug pa'i phyir/ sgor rgyun du dril
'dogs te/ gang gi chu slong ba po smon 'dug pa de'i tsha de dkrol bar byed do// ji tsaman rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nasal de dkrol lo// de nas rgyal po'i bus ) pha dang ma la smras pa// mtho mus slong
ba zhig mchis kyis/ ci zhig slong smos shage/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis su rdzas rnams bsags te// btsos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di re zhig 'thung zhig dang/
phyi nas slong ba po nang du bkug la ci slong ba rna'o// de ngo mtshar dang/ bkra shes dang/ bde legs su gyur pa dag byas nas mar 'thung bar 'dod na/ slong ba po'i skye bo'i 'o pas lus
kyi gnad du phog nas/ mar de ma 'thungs par smras pa/ yab yum re zhig slong ba po nang dum bkug ga bar du ma 'tshol lo// rgyal pos sgo ba la bsgo ba/ slong ba po nang du thong zhig/ de nang
@#// du zhugs pa dang/ rgyal po'i bus lus mdzes pa dang/ sems dang ba dang/ spyod lam zhi bas zhugs pa mthong nas/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci zhig bzhed/
des rgyas par smras pa dang/ des smras pa// 'phags pa bcud ni khyod kho na la 'os kyi/ bdag la ma lags kyis dbul gyis bzhes shig/ des lhung bzed bzod pa dang/ rgyul ngo 'i bu bsam pa

tshe drag pos lhung bzed der bcud blugs so// bdag nyid chen po dus kyang rgyal po'i bu la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam ni 'grub
par 'gyur la/ de yang tshul khrims rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyis ka yang sos par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal bu gzhon nu gang yin pa de ni nga
nyid yin te/ don yang ngand pa rnams la byams par byed na/ dalta lta smos kyang ci dgos// btsun pa rgyal bu dang rang sangs rgyas des las cizhag bgyis na/ des na gnyis ka
mnyam du bros thabs la/ mnyam du sos par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag 'di gnyis kho nas ston bya rabs gzhan rnams su las tshogs rnyed pa
rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhan du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba' las dag byas shing bsags bas/ 'dages nyid kyis las byas shang bsags pa gzhan su zhag
[0 ]/gas so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi'il gyi sa khams la rnam par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/
rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags po dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las
rnams bskal ba brgyar yang na/ chud mi zla ba'i tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA rA NA si'i grong khyor du/ rgyal
po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/de la bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de rgyal srid la dga' bar gyur to// mdun na 'don la yang bu gnyis yod pa las nubo shes gang yin pa de mdun
na 'don 'dod par gyur te/ sams can rnams ni khams kyi sgo nas shid 'phrod pa yin pas/ de gnyis phan tshun du yid gcugs par gyur nas rgyal bus smras pa/ thabs ci zhig byas na
des na nga rgyal por 'gyur/ das smras pa/ khyod kyis gal te bdag mdun na 'don du gzhug na ni thebasamachis kyis/ snyan du gsol bar bgyi'o// des snas pa/ de ltar bya ste/
gzhug gis smos shig des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi gcen zha bor bgyis dang khyod rgyal por 'gyur ro// des rjes su yi rang ngo// de nas rgyal bu phu boshis de sman ma yin pa byin nas 'bor
brgya
'gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po shi nas blon po rnams kyis de ni sha bor gyur to snyam nas/ nu bo shos rgyal por dbang bskur ro// des kyang mdun na 'don gyi nu bo shes/
gang yin pa de mdunan 'don du bcug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dang mdun na 'don lhan cig tu bre mo gtam smra zhing 'dug pa las rgyal pos phu bo na ba de mthong ngo// des de mthong
nas 'gyod bar gyur te/ bdag gis rgyal srid kyi phyir phu bo zhi bar byas pa gang yin pa de na ma legs pa zhig byas so// lha bdag kyang 'gyod par 'gyur sa/ gal te lta dgyes na 'di phyi'i sngon gyi
ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o// des smras pa/ gnang gas byos shag/ des de la sman byin nas sos par gyur to// de nas de gnyis kyis rang sangs rgyas shig la bya ba byas nas/ smon lam gdab
pa brtsams pa/ gang yang bdag cag gas yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la byang byas pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing/ zha bor byas pa'i
sdigo pa'i las 'dri'i rnam par smin pa yang nyams su ma myong bar gyur cage ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ da'i tshade'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// mdun
wa par gyur pas de gnyis kyis gros byas te/ slar sman byin pa gang yin pa desan mnyam du sos par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gzhag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gzhag
pa yin la/ gcig tudakar po rnams kyi gcig dkar ba dang/ 'dren ma rnams kyi 'dren ma ste/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang/ 'dren ma rnams na sngangasal
las gcig tu dka' ba rnams la ba rtsa la par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'atshimanyan yod na khyim bdag tshong
dbon zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa// rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhage gnasas/
des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa
la gsol ba 'debasashing/ lha'i bye brag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang/ tshal gyi lha dag dang/ bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang/ sum mdo'i lce dag dang ) gtor ma
lenapa'i lha dag dang/ lhan cag skyes pa dang/ chos mthun pa'i lhadag dang/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs pa'i
rgyu las/ bu pho dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod do// de ni de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar gyur du zinan/ re la yang 'di lta ste/ dpal na/
'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum po de dag gang zhe na/ pha dang
ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang/ ma dus la bab cinge zlumtshan dang ldan pa dang/ dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/ gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag
skya par 'gyur ro// des gang gi tshe lha rnams la gsol ba byas kyang bu pho dang bumo med pa de'atsho/ lha thams cad spangs to/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to// ji tsam na dge
slong zhig gi drung du song ste/ 'phags pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba 'tshal lo// bzhin bkrungs de bzhin du gyis shag ces des de rim gyis skra brags/
nas: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams sbyin pa'i brtsams pa las rims chen pos thebs nas/ rab tu byung ba'i bar chad du gyur ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'dus la/ drug slong rnams kyis
! gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re zhig sos kyi bar du bslab pa'i go zha rnams mi sbyin zhing de'i rim gro bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rim gro bya'o zhes
bka' stsalan/ dge slong rnams kyis sus bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang ) dge slong rnams dang sman pas so// sman pa rnams kyis nyin dar sman byas na//
mtshan mo nad la bar bar gyur to// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags 'di'i depyad bdag cag gas gdugs la bgyis// mtshanam bre la bab par gyur gyis/ gal te 'di khyim du bskya lan/
bdag cag gas nyin mtshan du'ada'i debad bgyi'o zhes pa'i skabasade dge slong mas kyis/ ngacom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyim du skyol la der
mang de'i rim gro byed pa sbyin par bya'o// de'i nad de yun ring por gyur nas/ sku rang po 'dipor skyes pas/ khyam bdag de khyam bdag mgo reg ces bya bar gragasaso/ de gang gi rtsa ba dang/
sdong bu dang/ 'ad ba ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas pa las/ slar lan bar gyur pa de'i tsho/ das bdagan 'chi zhes bya bar rang gis cha chod nas/ de na des
'chi ka'i tsha rang ga nor thams cad glags bu la bros te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul du bskur ro// deni shi'o// blon po rnams kyani/ kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la snas pa/ lha khyam bdag
mgo reg bu mams par gum ste/ de la dbyig dang/ gser dang/ glang po che dang/ rta dang/ ba lang dang/ ma hadang/ go cha la sogs te phal mo che zhig mchis pa de thams cad glagrwa
bu la bris nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul// rgyal pos smras pa// 'phags pa nye dga'i dpang ba glegs bu lam dra se ba yang ma thob/
glegs bu la bris pa lta smos kyang ca dgos/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhung pa gang yin pa de leng zhig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de la ca dag yod// par sdom la gzhidang gnas mal dgos dang na// lcags nag lcags dang lham khyim dang/ rdza mkhan
'dreg mkhan shangemakhan sogs/ tshon rtsa mdud sheng bar bur dang// rkang gnyis rnams dang rkang bzhi dang// zas dang nga tung ba sman dngan// phran dang gdung ba dpang rgyadag/ ci'i gis par n wego
bar bya/dbyig rnams dung na gser rnams dang/ (gzhan yang rdungs byas rdungs ma byas// dag 'dun 'dus nas bga'i zhes// drang srong chen pos bka' stsal to// dge slong rnams kyi
gsol pa dang/ bcomaldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci 'gas par bgo bar bya ste/ de la zhing gi gzhi dang/ khyim gyi gzhi dang/ tshong khang gi gzhi dang/ gnas mal dang/ lcags nag
! gi mgar ba'i lig spyad dang/ lcags mgar gyi log spyod dang/ rdza mkhan gyi lag spyad dang/ shing mkhan gyi lag spyad dang/ smyug ma mkhan gyi lag spyad dang
byed pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba dang/ kha zas dang/ btung ba dang/ 'bru rnams kyi ma bgo ba'i phyogs bzhi'i dge slong ga dge 'dun gyi phyir sbyin gzhag par bya'o// nas yug dang/ ras yug
chen dang/ ka sgro dang/ mchal lham dang/ 'bru mar gyi snod dang/ bul ba dang/ bya ma bum rnams na dge 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o// mdung shing ring po gang yan ba de dag ni 'dzam/

bu lta bu'i sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi shang bya'o// thung du gang gnapa de dgan 'khar gsal gyi yu bar byas la dge slong rnams la sbyin par bya'o// khye'u dang bu mo na dge 'dun gyis ma bsgyur
te/'gus pa zhige blas nas ci bde bar gtang bar bya'o// rkang bzhi pa rnams las chung chedang/ rtadang ]rngamo dang/ bong bu dang/ dro'unams na rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o// bya nga
dang Da ma ha dang/ ra dang/ lug rnams ni phyogs bzhi'o reg slong ga deg 'dun gyi phyi'i skya gzhag stam bgo'/ 'thabastan dang/ gos dang/ gzhan yang rgyal po la 'os pa gang yin pa
de thams cad ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o// mtshon cha rnams ni gzhug ma/ de rnams gri gu dang/ khab dang/ 'bar gsal du brdungs te/ dge 'dun la bro me par bya'o/ tshonatsanemu
las tshon rtsi chen po gang gus ba dang/ mtshal dang/ thangeshing la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni sku'i zugs brnyan gyi dri gtsang khang dugazhag par bya'o// thod le kor dang )btsag dang rams ni dge
'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o// chang na sos blugs las dong du gzhug par bya ste/ mar gyur na longs spyod par bya'o// tsha ma nung na dor bar bya'o// dge slong dag nga ston pa
yin par khas len pa rnams kyis tshang ma sbyin zhing/ tha na rtswa mchog gis kyang mi btung ngo// sman rnams ni nad khang rung bar gzhag par bya zhing/ de nas dge slong rnams kyis longs spyod
par bya'o// rin po che rnams mu tig ma gtogs par nor bu dang/ bozurla dang/ dung g.yas su 'khyil pa la sogs pa na cha gnyis su byas te/ gcig ni chos la'o// cig shos ni dge 'dun la'o/ !
tshes kyi gang yin pa des na sangs rgyasakyi gsung bri bar bya'o// sang ga' khri brgyan par bya'o// dge 'dun gyi gang yin bad ni dag slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// rgyags bam rnams las sang
rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi glegs bam rnams ni ma bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i deg slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyi'i mdzod du gzhug par bya'o/ phyi'il pa'i bstan bcos kyi klogs bam rnams ni btsongs
la bgo bar bya'o// chags rgya namyur du 'grub bar nus pa gang yin pa den rdzas 'gyod pa'i tshe/ dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// ma nus pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dag
'dun gyi ched du sbyor mdzod du gzhag par bya'o// gsor dang/ dbyig dang/ gzhan yang rdungs su byas ba dang rdus sum byas pa gang yin pa de na cha gsum du bya ste/ gcig na sangs rgyas
la'o// gnyis pa'i chos la'o// gsum pa na deg 'dun la'o// sangs rgyas kyi gang yin bdes na dri gtsang khang dang/ dbu skra dang/ san mo'i mchod rten rnams kyi rol ba dang 'drums pa slar
bcos par bya'o// chos kyi gang yin dus sangs rgyas kyi gsung bya der bya'o// sang ge 'a khri brgyan par bya'o/ dag 'dun gyi gang yin pa de na dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o//
gling bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// gang gi tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis chu bzangs kyi dus ston btsugs pa de'i tsho/ don dag slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyan rang
drag bsnyen ma rnams mang du tshogs par gyur to// deb tsho dag slong khrums stod dag slong mas bkur ba yin pas/ tshubazangs kyi dus ston btsugs pa'i dag yod ma rab tu mang pos
tshadang ldan pa khrums stod la 'ad skad ces smras so/ 'phags pa chu bzangs kyi dus ston la spyan 'dren gyis gshegs so// des smras pa/ bdag gis chos gos dang lhung bzed
phyi' su la bcol/ dge slong ma bcuganyes sde rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa thugs las chung dur mdzod cig dang/ bdag cag gas gzhag par bgyi'o// des de rnams la bzhag
pa dang/ de rnams kyis kyang skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos kyang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la'o// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang gtsug lag khang
zhag tu bzhag go/ denas tshodang ldan pa khrums stod chu bzangs kyi dus ston la 'ongs ba dang/ den de dge slong ma rnams kyis mgron du bos pa yin pas/ gcig gis sku
ba/ 'phags pa deng bdag gis nAl tshul bgyi// gzhan drung gzhan dag gis kyang g.yar tshus pa bos so// gzhan zhig gse smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol nug/
dbazhin du gzhan dang gzhan bdag gis kyang smras so// gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag ga des ma lags pa'i brtung ba gsol cage/ de bzhin dugazhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras
nas des de rnams kyi sems srung ba'i phyir g.yar tshus rnams las cung zad cung zad blangs/ de bzhin du dro yang zos/ dus ma yin pa'i btung ba blud pa yang 'thus pa dang ) de dag brtse ga
brtse ga pa yor langs nas de yang lam gyis dung pa des mang por zos nas ma zhu bar gyur te/ gsud de sha'i/ de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du bsregs nas chos bsgrags pa byas nas rim gyis
gtsug lag khang du lhags so/ gos 'gyed pas/ nad g.yog la snas pa/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'on cig/ des smras pa/ des bcu gnyis sde rnams kyi lag tung zhag go/
de rnams la dris pa dang/ smras pa/ bdag cag gis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i lag tu bzhag go/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos snas pa/ bdag gas 'phags pa kun dga' bo
la gtad do// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ bdag gse gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig tu bzhag go zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ba'i yo byad kyi skyon par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab par bya'o// byin gyis brlab pa yang 'di ltar bste/ gaN+Di brdungs la/ dge 'dun thams cad
tshogs shang mthun par gyur pa dang/ dag slong gA cage gas gsol ba bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas la/ gaN+Di brdungs// so pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang
dgu par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cud tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang/ dag slong gcig gi gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ sa/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol gnas
'di'i dge slong khrums stod gum na/ de'i lhung bzed dang/ chos gos gos dang/ gos kyaren dang bcas pa// kun dga' bo'i sug pa na mchis kyis/ gal te dag 'dun gyi dus la bab cing
bzodan/ dag 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyisadage slong khrums stod kyi bum pa'i yo byad lhung bzed dang/ chos gos gos dang ) gos kyi don du bcas pa'i dengos
po'i skyon par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan banye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa
[p]/ @#// dge slong yang gzhan du gum/ lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang gzhan nam mchis/ dngos po'i sbyin ba yang gazhan namachis na/ de'achos gos dang lhung bzed gang dbang bar gyur
lags/ nye bar 'khor dngos po'i sbyin pa'i dge slong ngam/ khyim pa gang na yod pa'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong lag gi blo zhige shi'o// dge slong rnams de'i
lhung bzed dang chos gos la 'gyod pa'i ma bgos pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dag srong rnamasakyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun thams cad

bsogs la bu 'dres sam ma 'dres pa gyur pa de brtag pa'akhya'o//gal te 'ad+d+he te dge 'dun gyi ni mchod rten gyis byas la/ mchod rten gyi ni dege 'dun gyis gyur na/ de lta bu chos dang ma mthun pa yin pas/
da' lhung bzed dang/ chos gos dang/ gos kyi ni dung chas pas cha gsum du bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun no// dge 'dun gyi na dge slong rnams kyis bag par bya'o//
sangs rgyas kyi ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang/ dra gotsang khang dung/ mchod rten gyi lag gi blo'i sar spyad par bya'o// dam pa'i chos kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bra de ra bya )sang ga'i
khri brgyan par bya'o/ gal te 'dres par ma gyur na thams cad dge slong rnams khonas bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod bar mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe

[cz ]dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgya zhing dong ba las rim gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer dang nyeb yag tu phyin pa dang/ de rnams kyi nang nas dge slong zhig shi'o// de rnams kyis bsams pa// sa/ tsug
lag khang na 'dug pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang skal ba 'dod par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bgo bar bya'o snyam pa las/ mnyan yod de na gnas pa'i
ba lang rdzi dang/ phyugs rdzi dang/ rtsa thun dang/ shang thun dang shu lam gyis 'tsho ba dang/ lam gol bas 'tshob 'a mi rnams kyis kun nas gang zhing/ de rnams gang dang du 'dug
nas 'gyed par byed pa de dang der skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor bar gyur nas/ da rnams kyis bsams pa/ gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bge'o snyam nas/ de rnams kyi
gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo bar brtsams pa dang/ dge skos kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshadang ldan pa dag ci zhig byed/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang/ des smras pa//
bdag kyang mtshams su 'ongs pa yin na zhes des 'khang kyang de rnams kyis ma byin pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dag songa rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// mtshams kyi nang la mtshams phyi nang du 'du shes te sha pa'i yo byad 'gyed par byed// ma bgos ba nyes par bgos ba yin te/ sun yang mtshanas na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan/
cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur// de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang la yid gnyis kyis 'gyed bar byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos
pa yin no// slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cige bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal 'tshabs can du 'gyur ro// mtshams kyi phyi rol lamatshams kyind gyi 'du shes kyis
'gyed par byedan/ ma bgos ba nyis bar bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan ci yi bgo bar bya'o// gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// mtshams
kyi phyi rol la yid gnyis kyis 'gyed par byedan/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams 'dug ba rnams dang lhan cag bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gling bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'atshadag slong gis dge slong la dge slong ga lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na/ dge slong de gang gis bskyal ba de la yod
gcugs pas spyad pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal paM/ dge slong dug dag slong des yodi gcugs par
bya ba ma yin pa la yid gcugs par bskyod de/ 'di ltar des gang gis bskul bde la yid gcugs par spyad do// 'on kyang dge slong gsadage slong la dge slong gi lag nas chos gos dag/
ba0 bskur ba na/ gang la bskur ba de la ade gcug pas spyad na leg par gyur pa ino//gang gis bskur ba de la yare gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no/ de dag spyod gso rig sbyong la chos
gros dag skur bar byed naM/ gang la bskur bde gshil/ gang gis bskul la de la yid gcugs pas spyadan nyes par spyad pa yin no// gang la bskur ba desha ba'i yo byad du rung bar
byin gyis rlob par byedan/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed pa// gang gse bskur ba de ga la/ gang gis bskul ba
da' shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob bar byedan/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis da ge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des
des slar bzlog/ gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na legs par spyad pa yin no// gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yuni no// deg slong gis dug
slong la chos gos dag bskur ba no/ gang la bskur ba de ni shi la/ gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byadan/ legs par byan gyis brlabs pa yano//
gang gis bskur bde'ashi ba'i yo byad du byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yan no// dge slong gis dge 'dun la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur/
ba des slar bzlog la/ gang gis bskur ba de yang shin/ gang la bsgyur ba de la da gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no// gang la bskur bde 'ashi ba'i yo
byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byedan/ legs par byin gyis brlobs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slongal chos gos dag skur bar byed pa// gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog nas de sha la/ gang

gsi skur ba byed pa de'ang shin/ de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byedan/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa mnano// gang gis bskur ba de'aleshi bo'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/
legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// gos kyi gzhi rdzogs so// sras brkyang ga gzhi'i sdom// gnas bcas pa dang kha cig dang// rdol ba dang ni blangs pa dang/
dus dang gang zag ma mo'i gzhi// nyi shu dag tu byas pa dang// bgos pa dag na bcuganyis te// gnas bcas dbyar gnas dam bcas pa// ston pa blta bar 'dod panang// 'dam rdzab kyis
ni ngal gyur pa// de la der ni chos gos gnang// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyitshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis
bzhes so// de'i tshodage slong rab tu mang po dag gnas bcas su dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'dasanas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan

nas : lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtswa skyug po dang rdza ba chen por tshabs ngal bar gyur cing/ rdul gyis lus log bzhin mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu de song ste/ rim gyis rgya zhange song ba
dung/ mnyan yod du phyin to// de nas dug slong rab tu mang ba dug gis chos gos dang lhung bzed mkhos su phabanas rkang ba bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gangan bdir dong nas lhags pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamasan glo bur du lhags pa'i dgeslong rnams la so
so yang dag pa la dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong dag khyad du gcod nus 'ongs/ gnas gang du dbyar gnas gnas/ btsun pa padagacag na gnas
bcas nas dag gzod mchis lags te/ bdag cag gnas bcos na dbyar mchis mchis lags so// dag slong dag khyed cag gnas bcas su ji ga bde ba la reg bar dbyar gnas sam/ bsod
snyoms kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/ btsun pa mad par gsol te/ bdag cag gnas bcas su bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas shing/ bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel ba ma mchis lags
so// 'on kyang bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing/ rdul gyis lus yog pas ljongs rgyu zhing mchas te/ ram gyis rgyu/
[r ]/zhing mchas ba na/ tshogs chen pos 'di'i mchis lags so///'dul ba gzhi/ bam po de bdun pa/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa// kye ma nga'i nyan thos rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtswa stag bo dang rdzab chen por tshabs ngal bar gyur cing/ lus rdul gyis yog pas rjes
zhing 'gro ban nyon mongs kyis/ la ngas dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba' phyi'i dang/ sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ dge slong rnams la sa
brkyang gnang bar bya'o// 'di ltar su brkyang btingen phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu las thalan ma yin pa dang/ zla ba las thal nam yin pa dang/ nub mo bral na ma yan pa dang/ bla gos thang
gos dang bcas ba'i chos gros kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro ba dang/ chos gos rung ba ma yin pa ji tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba nam yin pa'o// gzhan yang phan yon lnga yod de/ tshogs shing zan ma yin pa
dang/ yang yang bran ma yin pa dang/ khyim rnams su mgron du ma bas bar 'gro nam yin pa dang/ ji tsam 'dod pa'i chos gos btsal ba dang/ ston zla 'bring po nas/ dpyid zla ra ba'i bar gyi

nang deb sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyid pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams reg par gnas par bya/
[ns ]ba'i phyir dang// sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyod par bya ba'i phyi'i/ dbyar gnas pa'i dege slong rnams kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o// 'di
zhag pacu thal nas ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas su brkyang btang ba rnamasakyi rnyid pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis sa brkyang gdang bar bya'o zhes nga ka' stsal
na: dag song rnams kyis sra brkyang ji ltar gdung ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyis rnyed pa yod pa gang yin pa de las gding
par bya'o// gdang ba ni 'di ltar bya ste// re zhig thog mar mthun pa'igo ba bya ste/ chos gos 'di na dbyar gnas pa'i dga' dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ gal te dge 'dun bzhed na
chos ga 'dis dag 'dun gyi sa brkyang gding bar bgyi'o// de nas phyi de nyin gnas mal bshams nas ga brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gas dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgol/ dag
'dun thaman tshogasashang mthun par gyur pa dang/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsanadu gsol// chos gos 'di na dbyar
gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed ba byung ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos 'dis sa brgyang bgyis nas/ sa brkyang gdang bar bzhadan/ des na su brkyang bting
dbya ba'i gnas nas chas dpa' chos gos rnying pa rnams dang babral ba yang ma 'byung na/ sar ba rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la
bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cige dang ) 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di su brkyang du mdzad de/ chos gos bad u0f7ada ge 'dun gyi sa brkyang 'di nges so/ dus
na su brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chosang la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang bral ba yangs 'byungan/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang 'tshal/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// las na 'di ltar bya ste/
dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa 'a dge 'dun gyi rnyid pa byung ba lags l/ dge 'dun yang sa brkyang bgyi bar bzhed de/ dge 'dun gyis chos
gos 'di des bskyad du mdzad pas/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyis brkyang 'dunges sa// de sa brkyang btang ba'i gnas nas rgyas pa la chos gos rnying ba rnams dang 'bral ba yang ma 'byung na/
sar pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ tshodang ldan pa rnams las gang dgachos gos 'dis brgyang du bgyi zheng/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sa brkyang btang sta ) des nu su tserkyang bting
ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chosagasazhing pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang ma 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smosakyang 'tshol bar bzos pa de dag na cang ma gsung zhag dgong dag ma bzod pa de dag ni
gsungs shage/ dag 'dun gyis chos gos 'dis brkyang du mdzad nas/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyis brkyang du mdzad nas/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sa brkyang 'dangs te/ des nas brkyang pa ting

ba'i gnas nas chas de las chos gos cha de pa rnams dang bral ba yang ma 'byungan/ sa pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin/
du 'dzin to// de'i 'og tu sa brkyang 'dinges pa'i dge slong bar byas:chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dag song na su brkyang 'dings pa ram bskos dan bsko bar ma bya zhing/ bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/
lnga gang zhan/ dbyar gyis yin pa dang/ dbyar bal ba dang/ dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang/ dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang/ bsleb pa byon pa'o/ (gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan
na bsko bar mi bya ste/ spo ba pa dang/ gzhi nas so ba pa dang/ mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang/ gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang/ gnas nas phyung ba'o// gzhan yachos lnga dang ldan na bsko
bar mi bya ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang gis 'go bdang/ gti mug gis 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang/ sA brkyang bting b.rangam btung ba mi shes pa'o// yang tshes lnga dang ldan
pa'i dag slongan sa brkyang 'dings par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya zhing/ bskos pan dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun bsam 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang gis ma 'gro ba dang/ gti mug gis
dgu/ mi 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang/ sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba shes pa'o// bsgo ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshanas te zhes bya ba nas/ dge/

'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du sku/ re zhig thog mar spo bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dag 'dun gyi sa brkyang 'dinges par spro 'am/ gal
te sngon des sngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sa brkyang 'dings pa'i dge/
slong mang 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dag 'dun gyi sa brkyang 'dings par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ 'di ltar dag 'dun gyis dge slong
ming zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'danges par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyis brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dag 'dun
btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sa brkyang 'dinges par spron/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos
te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi su brkyang 'dings par 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dongs par bsko bar ba zod pa de
dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang
'dinges par bskos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas gsol bas su brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong la sra brkyang sbyin par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnam
gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sa brkyang du mdzad lags la/ dag slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di yang sra brkyang 'danges par bskos lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus
la babacid bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la chos gos 'des brkyang gi slad du stsal to// 'di'i gsol ba'o//

ngas dag stong su brkyang 'dangs pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong su brkyang 'dinges pas/ sra brkyang la thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya snya bkru'o// brkyang ngo// dra'o//
drub bo// kha sbyar ro// chung ngun khab kyig srubs gnyis sam gsum btsem par bya'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du sams baspyad par bya'o// de nas ston zla 'bring po zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco

lnga la go bar bya/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sang kho bo su brkyang 'dangs kyis/ khyed cag so so'i chos gos sngags phyung zhig/ de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang dri dang me tog gis gtor
zhing [u0f10 ]dri zhim po'i bdug pas bdugs nas/ gnas mal bshams te/ gaN+Di brdungs nas/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la ) dag
'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang/ rgan pa'i mthar gzhug par bya'o// de nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas sra brkyang blangs te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dag/
'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni su brkyang du mdzod la/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dengs par bskos te/ su brkyang 'dinges pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gos 'dis dge
'khaM 'dun gyi sa brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro// gding ngo// bting ngo// de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas bting nas dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ 'di skad
ces gnas brtan dgongs su gsol/ chos gos 'di na dge 'dun gyis su bskyad du mdzod la/ bdag mang 'di zhes bgyi ba ya nga sa brkyang 'dings par bskos pa lags te/ bdag gis chos gos/
'dis dge 'dun gyi su brkyang bting lags so zhes brjod par bya'o// des legs par bting ngo// shin tu bting sta/ 'di la rud pa dang phan yon yod pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya zhing/
N+NaM de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du thams cad kyis legs par bting ngo// shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon yod ba gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin
no zhes brjod par bya'o// sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang thogs te/ chab khung sang ma yin/ snam phyi sar na yin te/ tshangs pang du 'jug par mi bya'o// mtshams kyi phyi rol tu
'gro bar mi bya'o// gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o// sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa'i bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par ma byed na 'gal

tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dag slong gis dpyid zla ra ba zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la ang go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sang kho bo sra brkyang 'byin gyis khyed
cag so so'i chos gos rnams ban gyis rlobs shig/ de la red pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar
'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa du zhig gis sra brkyang ma ba ting lags/ nya bar 'khor lnga'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang/ dbyar ral ba dang/ dbyar phyi sar gnas par dam bcas pa dang 2 dbyar
tha dad par gnas pa ra dam bcas pa dang/ sra brkyang de 'dinges pa na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i 'o// gzhan yang 'di lta'i ma bting ba yin te/ so ba pa dang/ slob spyong zin pa dang/ mgu bar
bya ba spyod pa dang/ mgu par bya ba spyad zin pa dang/ bslab pa byin pa'i 'o// btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed pa mchis la/ phan yon ma mchis lags 3 nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma yin
dpa dang/ dbyar ral pa dang/ dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang/ dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang/ sra brkyang da 'dings pa namangon sum du
ma gyur pa'i 'o// gzhan yang lnga pa 'di dag gi ste/ spo ba pa dang/ spo ba sAd zin pa dang/ mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang/ mgu bar bya ba sprad zin pa dang/ bslab pa phyin pa'i 'o// btsun pa tu
zhig gi rnyed pa yang ma mchis la/ phan yon yang ma mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor lnga'i sta/ ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang/ phyir mi byed pas gnas nas phyung ba dang/ sdig pa'i
lta bar song ba ma borabs gnas nas phyung ba dang dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang/ dge 'dunabya na chos ma yin pa'i phyogs pa'i 'o// dge slong rab tu mang po ljongs rgyu zhing dong ban/ chom rkun
pa rnams kyis bcom nas/ de dag rims kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so// 'ongs pa legs so/ jig bde bar spyad dam/

tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar spyad pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig/ bdag cag ni chom rkun pa rnamasakyis bcom mo// tshe dang ldan ng dag bdag cag lared pa mang du byung// gal te sra brkyang phyung na khyed la chos
gos kyi bgo bsha' bya ba zhig ces pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang/ chomakun
ba dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir/ sra brgyad dbyung bar bya'o// dbyung ba ni 'di ltar bya ste// gnas mal bshams la/ gaN+Di brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshag gis dge slong rnams la yang/
dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs share mthun por gyur pa dang/ dge slong gcig gis gsol babya ste las bya'o/ 'a/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du su brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po tshes rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzed na/ dag
'dun gyis gnang bar ma dzod cig dang/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du/ sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/
dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dor dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rang khyimang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags te// dag
'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa drag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du/ su brkyang 'byin par mdzadan/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag dag slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi phyir/ sra
brkyang 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhage/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom
pa rnams kyi smad du/ sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad de/ gang gi slad du cang mi gsung bas de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa ni bar bya// dgyes nas
gang 'dod pa des rang gi skal ba las chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la bgo bsha' bya'o// sdom la/ rdzol ba dang ni srin zos dang// mtha' skor lhan No lhan ranges/
dang 3 gso ma'i seng ras sbregs pa dang// b.rIngs dang sangs dang dengs pa 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa chos
gos rdol bas su brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo// btsun pa chos gos srog chags kyis 'tshal ba dang/ chos gos cha ga btab pa dang/ chos gos lhan pa ro bos bab/
pa dang/ chos gos lhan rings can dang/ gso ma'i ging ras kyi chos gos dang/ chos gos zegs pa dang/ chos gos b.rIsapa dang/ chos gos spangs pa dang/ chos gos dengs pas sa bskyang
gdangadu rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo// sdom la/ rlungs dang dus ma 5na pa dang// gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum// ma rung ba dang ma dras dang// khru lngar ma chog mi
bya dang// blo mthun min dang mi gding dang// mtshams kyi phyi rol mi skye'o/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa blangs pa 'i
chos gos kyis sra brkyang gdang du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo// btsun pa dus ma lags pa 'i chos gos dang/ gang zag gi snam sbyar dang/ bla gos dang/ mthang gos dang/ mi
