pa de dag gis de bslab pa spong bar ma mthong zhing/ rtags de dag gis ma yin mchinam de dag gis ma yin la/ rjes ma mthong ba dang/ ma zlos pa dang/ mi rigs pas gso sbyogazhagapa nis

ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni bslab pa slong ba ma yin pa'o// bslab pa song ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dag so rab tu mang po tshogs shing 'dus
la gtam skya ba de yang de las byung ba ma yin/ de gleng ba'i skabs la bab pa ma yin zhing/ dge slong de rnams kyang stan las langasanas so sor dong ba dang/ des ma mthong ba dang ma thos pa dang/ mi
dogs par gso sbyongagazhag pa ni chos ma yin pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ma yin te/ de lta bu ni bslab pa song ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi ma yin pa'o// dge 'dun stong ba ma yin pa dzil bu zhen dge slong
gis rnam pa gang dag dang/ rtags gang dag dang/ mtshanam gang dag gis dge 'dun song bar byed pa'i rnam pa de dag gis dge 'dunasong bar byed bar ma mthong zhing/ rtags de dgags ma yin/ mchen
ma de dag gis ma yin la/ sa ma mthong ba dang/ ma thos pa dang/ mi dogs par gso sbyong gzhag pa ni chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni dge 'dun stong ba ma yin pa'o// dge

! 'dun song ba'i gtamagyi gleng gzhi ma yin pa ji lta bu zhin/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rab tumang po tshogs shing 'dus lu gtam sma ba de yang de las byung ba ma yin/ de gleng ba'i skabs la bab pa ma yin
zhing 3 dge slong de rnams kyang stan las langs nas so sor dong pa dang/ des ma mthong ba dang/ ma thes pa dang/ mi dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/

da ltabu ni dge 'dun spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi ma yin pa'o// tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na/ sa tham pa bzhi rnams las gang yang rung ba'i ltung ba ma byung bar dge slong de la ma
mthong ba dang/ ma zlos pa dang/ mi rigs par gso sbyong gzhag pa ni chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin pa'o// lta ba nyams pa ma yin pa
jilta bu zhen/ lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis la/ gang yang rung ba'i lte bar mngon par ma zhanapar dag slong de la ma mthong ba dang/ ma thos pa dang/ mi dogs par gso sbyong gzhagapan sa mA
kyi/ @#// yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni lta ba nyams pa ma yin pa'o// spyod pa nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhin/ bslab pa'i rjes su mthun zhing 'tsham pa'i tshig

gas lam dag gas skyes na yang dag par sgrub pa de la dge slong gis ma mthong ba dang/ ma thos pa dang/ mi dogs par gso sbyong gzhag pa ni chos ma yin pa'i gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni spyod
pa nyams pa ma yin pa'o// 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin pa ji lta bu zhen 'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin/ dal dag sopagos ma mthong ba dang/ ma thos pa dang/ mi dogs par gso sbyong gzhag pa ni chos
ma yin pa'i gas sbyong gzhag pa lan te/ de lta bu ni 'tsho ba nyams ba ma yin pa'o// dkar po'i phyogs la phas pham pa yin pa dang/ phas pham pa'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa nga bslab pa

ts+tshasong ba yin pa dang/ bslab pa spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa dang/ dge 'dun stong ba yin pa dang/ dge 'dun slong ba'i gtamakyi glengagazhi yin pa dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa yin pa dang/
lta ba nyams pa yin pa dang/ rtsod pa nyams pa yin pa dang/ 'tsho ba nyams pa yin pa yin no// phas pham pa yin pa ji lta bu zhin/ dge slong gis rnam pa gang dag dang/ rtags gang dag dang/ mtshan

ma gang dag ngag gis phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung ba'i rnam pa de dag dang/ rtags de dag dang/ mtshanam de dag gis de phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung bar mthong la/ des mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs

bas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni chos kyi gso sbyongagazhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni phas pham pa yin no// phas pham pa'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa ji lta bu zhin/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rab tumang po tshogs shing 'dus
lagatam smra ba de yang de las byung ba yin/ de gleng ba'i skabs la bab pa yan zhing/ dge slong de rnams kyang de bzhin du 'dug bzhinal/ des mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag
pa ni chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni pas pham pa'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yinan// bslab pa slong ba yin pa ji lta bu zhen dge slong gis rnams pa gang dag dang/ rtags gang dag dang//
mnam gang dag gis bslab pa slong ba'i rnam pa de dag dang/ rtags de dag dang/ mtshanam dedag gis de bslab pa sbyong bar byed par mthong la/ des mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs pas gso sbyong

gzhag pa ni chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu'i bslab pa sbyong ba yin no// bslab pa sbyong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rab tu mang po tshogs shing 'dus
la gtam snyab de yang de las byung ba yin/ de gleng ba'i skabs yin zhing/ dge slong de rnams kyang de bzhin du 'dug bzhinal/ des mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni ris

kyi gso sbyongagazhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni bslab pa sbyong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yano// dge 'dunasong ba yin pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge slong gis rnam pa gang dag dang/ rtagos gang dag dang/ mtshanam gang
dgis dge 'dun spong bar byed pa'i rnam pa de dag dang/ rtags de dag dang/ mtshan ma de dag gses dge 'dun spong bar byed par mthong la/ des mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs pas

gso sbyong gzhag pa'i tshes kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni dge 'dun song ba yin no// dge 'dun spong ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi yin pa ji lta bu zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rab tu mang po tshogs shing

'dus la gtam sna ba de yang de las byung ba yin/ da gleng ba'i skabs la bab pa yin zhing/ dge slong de rnams kyang de bzhing du 'dug bzhani la/ des mthong pa dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs pas gso sbyongagazhag

ba ni chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni dege 'dun song ba'i gtam gyi glengagazhi yin no// tshul khrims nyams pa yin pa silta bu zhen/ phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i ltung ba byung bar/

gyural/ de la dge slong gis mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni tshul khrims nyams pa yin no// lta ba nyams pa yin pa ji lta bu /

zhen/ lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis la gang yang rung ba'i lta bar mngon par zhen par gyur la/ de la dge slong gis mthong ba dang/ zos pa dang/ dogs pas gso sbyong gzhag pa ni chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa

ny+tsA yin te/ de lta bu ni lta ba nyams ba yin no// spyod pa nyams pa yin pa ji lta bu zhan/ bslab pa'i rjes su mthun zhing 'tsham pa'i tshig ga lam dag gis smras na yang dag par mi sgrub pa de la/ dge slong gis

00mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs pas gso sbyongagazhag pa ni chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni spyod pa nyams pa yin no// 'tshob nyams pa yin pa ji lta bu zhen/ de'i 'tsho ba ma dag par gyur

la3 de la dge slong gis mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs pas gso sbyongagazhug pa ni chos kyi gso sbyong gzhag pa yin te/ de lta bu ni 'tsho ba nyams pa yin te/ 'dangag ni chosam yin pa bcu dang/ chos kyi

bcu'i gsosbyopagazhag ba yin no// gso sbyogazhag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ dgag dbye gzhagapa yang de bzhin no// ngag slong dag dge 'dunanalnga po 'di dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ ngo tsha mang pa'i dge 'dun dang/
lug ltar lkugs pa'i dge bdun dang 3 tshogs kyi dge 'dun dang/ kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun dang/ don dam pa'i ngag 'dun no: ngo tsha mang pa'i dge 'dun gang zhin/ gangan dge slong thams cad rgyal khrims
'tshal zhing sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa'o// lug ltar lkugs pa'i dge 'dun gang zhe na/ gangan mdo sde 'dzin pa ma yine/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma yin/ ma mo 'dzin pa ma yin pa'o// tshogs kyi ngag 'dun
gang 'dun gapazhin/ gang na tshogs dang 'brel bas/ las rnams 'byed pa'o// kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun gang zhe na/ so so'i skya bo dge ba dang ldan pa thams cad do// don dam pa'i dge 'dun gang zhe na//

slob pa dang mi slob pa'i skyes bu gang zag brgyud do// de la dge 'dun gong ma gsum bo ngo tshayad pa'i dge 'dun dang/ lug ltar lkugs pa'i dge 'dun dang/ tshogs kyi dge 'dun gang dag yin pa 'di dag gis
@#/ nichos ma yin pa'i las byed pa thobe// kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun gangayin pa 'dis ni chos kyi 'du shes kyis chos ma yin pa'i las byed pa thob bo// don dam pa'i dge 'dun gang yin
'disanam yazhi pa'i las byed pam thob bo// gso sbyongagazhag pa'i gzhi rdzogs so/// 'dulakhagazhi pa/ bam bo don bzhi pa/ ca/
gnas mal gyi sdom ni/ shAkyayin ba'i lnga sde dang// mgonamad dge 'dunagang zag gi/ dngos po bcom pa'i phyir dang ni// gshibs pa yi ni sa dang na// dgon pa chos gos snyam pa dang// dgon pa
gnas brtan rnyed ba dang// khargyad po dag ni phyi ma yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol mgon med zas byin gyi kun ngaga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu

spyi mang po dag bstan bkur gyi gnas su tshogs ring 'dus nas 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng bar byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis su zhig la bsnyen bkur bya/ blamar bya/ brjod par bya/ mchod
par bya/ bdag cag gis su zhig la mtshon du su ba dang/ phyag dang/ ldang ba dang 3 thal mo sbyar ba dang/ gdud pa bya/ bdag cag gi nang su zhig stan gyi thog ma dang/ btung nga' thig ma dang/ bsod
snyoms kyi thog ma longs spyod par 'os/ don kha cig gis 'di skad ces smras so// shAkya las rab tu byung gang yin pa'o// kha cig gis 'di skadaces smras so// bram tho las rab tu byung ba gang yin/
ba'o// gzhan dag na re rgyal rigs las rab tubyung ba gang yin pa'o// gzhan dag re rje'u rigs las rab tubyung ba gang yin pa'o// gzhan dag na re dmangs rigs las rab tubyung ba gang yin pa'o//
gzhan dag na re rigs ngan pa ma yin pa mkhron po las rab tu byung ba dang/ bkren pa ma yin pa phyug po'i rigs las rab tu byung ba gang yin pa'o// gzhan ngagan re gzugs bzang bo blta na sdug pamadzes
ba dang/ tshig bzang ba tshig la mkhas ba dang ldan pa dang/ shes nyenacan bsod nams che ba dang/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ mamo 'dzin pa thos pa mang ba chos smra ba gnas brtan rgyal
por 'os pa dang/ dgen pa pa chos gos gsum pa dang/ phying pa canadang/ phyag dar khrod pa dang/ bsod snyoms pa dang/ bsod snyoms mi 'dam pa dang/ stan gcig pa dang/ bras
phyis mi len pa dang/ shing drung pa dang/ dur khrod pa dang/ bla gab med pa dang/ cog bu pa dang/ gzhi ji bzhin pa gang yin pa dang/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes thob pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba nas/

rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gzhan dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa dag bdag cag thams ngani 'di lta ste/ so
sor brtags nas mi mthun pa yin gyis tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na der dong la phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis jiskang lung bstan pa de
03/ thu da ba zhin du 'di bdag cag gis gzung bar bya'o/ de nas dge slong rab tu mang bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
'tshal// phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu'aduganas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong rab tu mang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bsnyen bkur gyi gnas 'di'i bdag cag dge

slong rab tumang po tshogs shange 'dug nas 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gle ngas ste zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad lung bstan pa de bzhin ngu 'ang bdag cag gis gzung bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i
bar ge ngam bzhin du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la 'dag cag don 'di zhus lags te// bdag cag gis gang la bsnyen bkur bgyi/ bla mar bgyi brjod par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi zhes bya
ba nas/ thog mar bsod snyoms los spyod par bgyi zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis chesargan pa la bsnyen bkur bya/ bla mar bya/
brjod par bya/ mchod par bya/ mngon du smra ba dang/ phyag dang/ ldang ba dang/ thal mo sbyar ba dang/ gdur pa'i las bya'o// den khyed cagag stanagyi thog ma dang/ btung ba'i thog ma dang/
bsod snyoms kyi thog ma longs spyad par 'os pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag khyed kyis ches rgan pa la bsnyen bkur bya zhes bya ba nas/ bsod snyoms kyi thog ma longs sbyang par

bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhan du gsungs pa dang/ dag slong rnams kyis khyim pa rgan pa dag la bsnyanamakur byed/ bla mar byed/ brjod par byed/ mchod par byed pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa
can rnams stod pa byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag ni 'dod pa la spyod pa 'gas/ 'dod pa'i 'dam du byang ba lags na/ 'i slad du khyed bdag cag 'ad/
ban ngakur 'gyi zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgas rab tubyung ba rnams la gos rtags du
ba yin gyi/ khyim pa rnams la ni ma yin no// ngag song rnams kyis gzhan mu stags can rgan pa rgan pa dag mthong nas bsnyen bkur byed/ bla mar byed/ brjodapar byed/ mchod par byed nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sa chos 'di pa rnams la dgongs te gsungs pa yin gyi/ phyi rol pa rnams la ma yin no// de rnams kyis rab tubyung ba'i dge tshul rgan po dag mashong nas bsAn
bkur byed bla mas byed/ brjed par byed/ mchod par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyisakhaka' stsal pa/ dgeslong dag ngas bsnyen par rdzogs pa rnams la sa dgongs nas gsus pa yin/
gyi dge tshul rnams la ni ma yin no// de rnams kyis rgan po gsar du bstan par rdzogs pa dag la bstan bkur byed/ blam khyed/ brjod par byed/ mchod par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
0/ @#// bka' stsal pa/ phan tshun lo'i dang po dras nas phyag bya'o// de rnams kyis dris pa las/ na tshod kyi li sbas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsnyen par

rdzogs pa'i li'i deng po dri bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar dri ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re zhig dang por dus tshigs dri bar bya'o// dag slong rnams kyis dus tshigs du yin
pam shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dus tshigs na lde po 'di deg yin te/ dgun dang ! sos ka dang dbyar dang/ dbyar thung ngu dang/ dbyar dang po'o// de la bla

ba bzhi ni de kun yin no// zla ba bzhi ni sos ka yin no// zla ba gcige na debyang yan no// nyin zhag gcig ni de byar nyung du yin no// zla ba gsum du zhag gcig gis ma tshong ba ni dbyar dang po yin te/ de ltar dus/

tshigs debarjod nas sngar bsAn par rdzogs bgang yin pa de la phyag bya'o// dag slong dgagazhan yang phyag bya ba na bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ rizhig 'ag na lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs

pa dang bcas pa dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i skyodagu dang/ lha dang mir bcas pas phyag bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ khyim pa thams cad kyis/

phyagakhyab rab tu byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa thams cad kyis phyag bya ban sngarab stan par rdzogs pa yin no// dge slong mam gtogs te/ de nibasnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya len kyang/ da ring bsan

[o/ ]par rdzogs pa'i dge slong la phyag bya ba yani'o// bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa thams cad kyis phyag bya ba bstan par rdzogs pa'o// phyag ma bya ba ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen/ so ba pa dang/ bzhi nas so ba dang//

so ba spyad pa dang/ mgu bar spyod pa dang/ mgu bar bya ba spyad ba dang/ ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang/ phyir mi byed pas gnas nas phyung ba dang/ sdig pa'i lta bar song bar mi 'dor ba gnas nas phyung
ba dang/ khyim pa thams cad dang/ bstan par rdzogs pa ma yin pa thams cad do// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'dasakyis ji ltang rgan pa'i bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tshe/ dge slong rnams gcig la gcig bsan bkur/
byed [… ]bla mar byed/ brjod par byed/ mchod par byed do// de rnams gcig la gcig bsnyan bkur byed/ bla mar byed/ brjod par byed/ mchod par byed pa na/ chu'i nang ga utul ji lta ba/
bzhin du dge ba'i chos kyis 'phel bar gyur to/// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyasabcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsunapa gang gi tshe ji ltar
rgan pa'i bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tsho/ dge slong rnams gcig la gcig bsnyen bkur bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ brjod par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid do// de rnams gcig la gcig bstan bkur bgyid/
bla mar bgyid/ brjod par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid pa na/ chab kyi nang ga ut+pal ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos kyis 'phal bar gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
dgad ltarang 'dod chags dang bral/ zhesdang dang bral/ gti mug dang bral/ skye ba dang/ rgyab dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sba sngags 'don pa dang/
sdug bsngalab dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las grol te// thams cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes bya thams cad la ma' bsIs pas ji ltar rgan

lnga pa'i bca' ba mdzad de/ lta rgan pa de la brten nas/ dge slong rnams gcig la gcig bsAn bkur byed/ bla mar byed rtses byab nas/ chu'i nang ga ut+pal ji lta ba bzhin nguzhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa 'di
la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/ gang gi tshong 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bas/ gti mug dang bas/ skya ba dang/ rgab dang/ na ba dang 'drib dang/ mya ngan dang/ skye sngags
'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang ) 'khrug pa las ma grol zhing rnam par ltung ba'i lus kyis ji ltar rgan pa'i bca' ba mdzad de/ ji ltar rgan pa de la brten nas 'dzam bu gling
na gnas pa'i skyakho'i tshogs phalar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i sa gya nom par skyes pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul ka shi'i nags stug bo zhagen srog chags bzhi gnas pa
( gong ma sreg dang/ ri bong dang/ spre'u dang/ glang po che'o// de dag kyang phan tshun yid gcugs pas lhan cig gnas shing mthun pa dang/ yang dag par dga' ba dang/ rtsod pamad
pa dang/ dogs pa med cing dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis gnas pas dus 'da' bar byed do// ji tsem dus gzhan zhig na de rnams kyi blo skyes pa/ sa ldan dag bdag cag la phan tshun yid gcugs
pas lhan cig gnas mi mthun pa dang/ yang dag par dga' ba dang/ rtsod pa med pa ni yod na/ 'on kyang bdag cag gis gang la bsnyen bkur bya ba mar bya/ brjod par bya/ mchod
par bya ba mi shes kyis/ ma la bdag cag gis rgan pa ji lta ba'i bca' ba bya'o// de rnams phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa bdag cag gi nang na su rgan/ de nas gong ma sragagisaNi
n+ya gro d+hazhigabastan nas/ shes ldan dag susashing n+ya gro d+ha'adi'i tshod ji tsam pa mthong/ glang po chos sbas pa/ khobo khyu dang lhan cig lam 'di nas 'gro ba na/ 'di'i srid kho bo'i
lus dang mnyam pa kho na mthong ngo// spre'us smras pa/ kho bo khyu dang lhan cig lam 'di nas 'go ban/ 'di'i srid kho bo dang mnyam pa khon mthong ngo// de dag gis smras pa/ de bas khyod
rganano// ri bong gis smras pa/ kho bos 'di'i lo ma gnyis skyes pa na/ 'tsho ba'i sgrolakha' thigs pa lus bldags so// de dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag pas kyang khyod rkan no//
gong ma sregs kyis snus pa/ khyed cag gis shing n+ya gro d+ha'i tshod chen po rnam pa 'di mthong ngam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di mthong ngo// kho bos sa bon rnams zos nas phyogs ]
'dire rtug pa bor ba de las skyes pa ni 'di yin no// de rnams kyis lcas pa/ gal te de lta na bdag cag thams cad kyi nang na khyod rganano// de nas glang po ches thams
cad la bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so// sgra'us ri bong dang gong ma srags la'o// ri bong gse ni gong ma srags kho na la sdu/ de rnams de ltar rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsnyen bkur byed cing nagA

sa: stug po do na phan tshun du rgyu zhing/ gang gi[@]yang b dngagazang po'i phyogs su 'gro dgos pa de'itshe/ glang bo che la sbe'u/ sbra'u lari bong/ ri bong la gong ma srogs zhonano// sdugapa'aphal zhing sa dang bcasapa

donoms la yang 'di lta bu'i blo skyes taM shugs ldan dag bdag cag la sdug pa 'phel zhing zhe sa dang bcas pa ni yod kyis/ razhig dge ba gzhan yang cung zad cig blas to'ajug par bya'o// cidag kya/ gong
ma srags kyis smras pa/ srog gcod pa las slar log par bya'o// bdag cag gi srog gcod pa ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ gong ma srogs kyis smras pa/ lo ma dang/ ma ga pang/ 'bras bu srog chags dang bcas pa yang
yod srog chags mad pa yang yod pas/ dbasan bdag cagagis deng phyin chad srog chags dang bcas pa ni sang la/ srogs chags med pa ni longs spyad par bya'ozhes/de rnams kyis srog chags dang bcas pa
ni spangasashing/ srog chags med pa la longs spyad par brtsams so// de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag la srog gcod pa las slar ldog pan yod na/ mkhyin par len pa las ma yin pas/

[n ]ma la bdag cag gsam byin pa len pa las slar log par bya'o// bdag cag ga ma byan par len pa ru 'dra ba zhig yin/ gongam sregs kyis smras pa// yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i rtswa dang/ lam dang ma

tog dang/ 'bras bu yang yod/ 'dzin pa med pa yang yod pas/ de bas na bdag cagags deng phyin chad yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pan spangs la/ 'dzin pa med pa ni longs spyad par bya'o zhes/ de rnamasakyis yongs
su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa ni ngas te/ 'dzin pa med pa nilongs spyad par brtsams so// de rnams 'disAms dusams te/ bdag cag la ma byin par len pa las slar logapa ni yod na/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa
las ma yin pas/ ma la bdag cag gis 'dod pas logaparagayom pa las slar ldog par bya'o// bdag cag gi 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ gong ma srogakyis smras pa/ bdag cag

bgrod par bya bar yang 'grobagrod par bya ba ma yin par yang 'gro bas/ de bas na bdagacug gis dang phyin chad bgrod par bya ba kho na bkod par bya'i/ bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa ni ma yin nozhas/ de rnams bgrod par bya ba
bgrod kyi/ bgrodapar bya ba ma yin parim yin no// de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdagacag la 'dod pas log par spyod pa las slar log pa ni yo ngan/ brdzun du slab las ma yinagyis/ ma la bdag cag gis

brdzun du smra ba las slar ldog par bya'o// bdag cag gerdzu nadu sma ba ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ gong ma srags kyis snas pa/ bdag cag ci la rung smra bas/ ribs na bdag cag gis deng phyin chad ci yang ngab skya
bar mi bya zhing/ brtags shing brtags pa'i tshig dus su smabar bya'o zhes/ de rnams kyis ci yang rung ba ma smra zhing/ ci yang brtags shangabartags pa'i tshogs su smra'o// de rnams /
'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag la brdzun du slab las slar log paniyodan/ 'bru'i chang dang/ sbyar ba'i chung myos par 'gyurab/ bag med bganas las ma yin pas/ ma la bdag gis 'bru'i chang dang/
sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba/ bag med pa'i gnas las slar log par bya'o// bdag cag gi 'bru'i chang dang/ sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyurang/ bag med pa'i 'dra pa zhig yin/ gong ma sregs kyis/

smras pa/ myos par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa dag kyang yod/ myos par ma 'gyurab gang yin pa dag yod/ nge bsan bdag cag gis deng phyin chud myos par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu gang dag yin pa ni spangs la
myos par mi 'gyurakha'i 'bras bu gang dag yin pas longs spyad par bya'o zhes/ de rnams kyis myos par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu gang dag yin pa ni sus te/ myos par mi 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu gang dag yice pa
longs spyad par brtsams so// gang gi tsho de rnams brtul zhugs kyis gzhi lnga pa la rab tu gnas pa de'i/ gong ma sregs kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag la brtul zhugs kyigazhi lnga
labacuganas pa ni yod kyis/ ma la bdag cag gis gzhan dag kyang brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga la rab tu dgod par bya'o// de rnams kyis sa pa/ de bzhin dubya'o// bdag cag gi nang nas sus
su dag rab tu dgod bar bya/ spre'us smras pa/ kho bos ni spro thams cad rab tu dgod par bya'o// de nas ri bong gis smras pa/ kho bos ni ri bong dang spyatsanathams cad rab tu dgod par bya'o// glang
bo ches smras pa// gal te de lta na kho bos ni grung po che dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ gung thams cad rab tu dgod par bya'o// gong ma sregs kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na mdor na khyed kyis
'dul bam yin pa/ rkang pa mod pa dang/ rkang gnyis dang/ rkang bzhi pa dang/ 'dab chags gang yin pa thams cad kho bos brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga la rab tu dgod par bya'o// de nas de rnams kyis
yulakang+ka na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags ji snyed pa de dag thams cad brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga la rab bkod do// de rnams gcig la gcig gnod pa mi byed cing/ nags stug po de na
shos bzhin gyis gnas pas/ cidaga' bar gnas pa de rnams kyi mthus/ lhas dus su char phabs pas/ sa rtagatum tog dang/ 'bras bu'i shing dang/ lo tog dang ldan par gyur to// mi rnamA
kyis de dag gcig la gcigaganod pa mi byed bar gnas pas/ sa rtag tum tog dang/ 'bras bu'i shing dang/ lo tog dang ldan par mthong ba dang/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas chos bzhin gyis
rgyal srid byas te/ 'dini nga'i mthu yin no// btsunamo dang/ gzhonananams dang/ blon po rnams dang/ khrom gyi rtsa ba rnams dang/ grong mi dang/ yulami rnamasakyis smras pa/ 'din bdag cag
gi mthu yan no// rgyal pos bsams pa/ 'di dag thams cad 'di ni bdag gi mthu yin no// 'di ni bdag gi ma yin no zhes smras na/ 'di su'i mthu yin pa ma ngeshes so snyam nas/

dngo mtshar skyes te/ sa ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa dang/ de rnams kyis kyang ma shes so// dzi man wA rANA si dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i skyed mos tshal zhig yodapa don drang srong mngon par shes pa

lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas te/ wArA NA si na gnas ba'i skye bo'i tshogs mtha' dag gas mchod cing brjod cing mngon du smra bar bye ba zhig yodado// de rnams rgyal po drang srong de'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la
gcugs smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag gi yul na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srogachags ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig la gcig gnod pa ma byed cing shes bzhin gyis gnas pas ci dga'
bar gnas pas lhas dus su char phab pas/ sa rtag tul tog dang/ 'bras bu'i shing dang/ lo tog dang ldan par gyur pa dang/ bdag ni 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid
byas pas/ 'din bdag gi mthu yin no snyam du sams so// btsunamo dang/ gzhon nu rnams dang/ blon po rnams dang/ khrom gyi re ba dang/ mul ma dang/ grong mi rnams kyis kyang/ 'di'i
bdagacagagamathu yin no snyam dusems te/ bdag kyang ngomatshar chen po skyes na/ de'i phyir 'di su'i mthu lags pa the tshom gcad pa'i rigs so// des snas pa/ rgyal po chen bo 'di ni khyod kyi mthu
pa ma lags te// btsun mo'i mo lags gzhon nu rnams kyi ma 'gas/ blon po rnams kyi ma lags khrom gyi du ba'i me lags/ grong mi'i ma lags yulama'i ma lags te/ 'on kyang khyed kyi
yulan srog chags bzhi gnasato/ 'di ni de dag ga ma mneno// rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de ltar na re zhig bltas mchi'o// drang srong gis smras pa/ rgyal bo chen po khyod kyis de rnams blta ci 'tshal/

'on kyang de rnams kyis yang dag par blangs te spyadapa gang lags pa de yang dag par blangs te spyad mdzod cig/ da rnams kyis ci zhig yang dag par blangs te spyod/ brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga'o// drang srong chen po

brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga 'dra ba zhig lags/ rgyal po chen po de rnams ni srog chags rnams kyi srogami gcod/ gzhan gyi bdog bam 'phrog/ bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa bgrod par mi byed/ brdzun gyitshig mi

myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba ma 'thung ngo// rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na/ bdag gisakyang brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga po 'di yang dag par blangs te spyad par bya'o// de nas rgyal po des

brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs tepyad bar brtsams so// rgyal pos brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par byas te spyad pa dang/ btsun mo rnams kyis kyang bartul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par

blas te spyad par brtsams so// gzhon nu rnams dang/ blon po rnams dang/ khrom gyi ra ba dang/ grong mi dang/ yul mi rnams kyi sos kyang brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te spyad par brtsams
so=[L]khams kyi rgyal phrana rnams kyis rgyal patshangs sbyin btsun mo dang/ gzhon nu rnams dang/ blon po rnams dang/ khrom gyi ru ba rnams dang/ grong mi dang/ yul ming bas/
bar brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par byas te spyod do zhes thos so// thos nas de rnams kyang btsun mo rnams dang/ gzhon nu rnams dang/ blon po rnams dang/ khrom gyi brnamasaM dang/ grong
mi rnams dang/ tshulam rnams dang lhan cig tu brtul zhugs kyi gzhal yang dag par blangs te spyod pa brtsams so// 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo'i tshogs thamasacad las phal cher brtul zhugs kyi
gzhilnga yang dag par blangs te spyad par brtsams so// de'i tshe'adzam bu'i glingapa 'chiba'i dus byed pa/ dalus zhig nas sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha bya rdomapa rnams su skya'o// de nas lha rnams kyi
dbang po brgya byinagyis lha'i 'khor rgyas par mthong nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gus bcas zhe sar bcas pa dag/ dka' thub tshal na gnas pa yi// gong ma srags gyi tshos spyod pa//
'jig rtenaso sor rab tu bstan// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sulal// dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe'i dus kyi gong ma sregs bang yin pa de na nga nyid yin no/ ri bong ni dag

slong rAhA'i bu yin no// spre'unamo'u 'gal gyi bu yin no/ glang po che ni kun dga' bo yin no// de'i tshoyang ngas rgan pa ji lta ba'i ba' ba mdzad de/ rganapa ji lta ba de la brten nas/'dzam bu'i gling na/

gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs phal cher sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris rnams su skyes so// dalta yang pas rgan pa ji lta ba'i bca' thamadzad de/rgan pa ji lta ba de la brtenanas dge slong rnams gcig la gcig bsAn

bkur byed/ bla mar byed/ brjod par byed/ mchod par byed pas/ chu'i nang gi uts+tsha la ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos kyis 'phel bar gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i gnas
brtan dang/ bar ma dang gsar bu rnams la bkur sti dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas 'jigs pa'i dbang du 'gro ba dang bcas pas gnas par bya'o// dge slong dag/ de ci'i phyire zhen/ re zhig dge slong de
gnas brtan dang/ bar ma dang/ gsang ba rnams la bkur sti med/ zhes med cing/ 'jigs pa'i dbang du ma 'gro bas/ gnasan kun tu spyod pa'i chos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di
mad do/ kun taspyod pa'i chos yongs sum rgyas par slob pa'i chos rnams yongs su rgyasapar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di mad do// slob pa'i chos rnams yongs su ma rgyus par/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang/

ting nge 'dzin gyi lubo dang/ shes rab kyi phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang/ rnamapar grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do/ rnam par grol ba'i
ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su ma rgyas par/ len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di mad do// dge slong dag re zhig dge slong de tshangs pamatshungs par spyod pa'i
gnas brtan dang/ bar ma dang/ gsang bu rnams la bkur sti dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas/ 'jigs pa'i dbang du 'gro ba dang bcas pas/ gnas na kun tu spyod pa'i chos
yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yodado// kun tu spyod pa'i chos yongs su rgyasan/ slob pa'i chos rnams mos su rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do// slob pa'i chos rnams yongs su

rgyasan/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang di nge 'dzin gyi phung bo dang/ shes rab kyi phung po dang/ rnam par grol pa'i phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su rgyas par gyur ba'i gnas
'di yod do/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su rgyan// len pa mad par yos su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do// dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab
par bya ste/ gnas brtan dang/ bar ma dang/ gsang bu rnams la bkur sti dang bcas/ zhes dang bas/ 'jigs pa'i debang du 'gro ba dang bcas par gnas par bya sa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la
bslab par bya'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde btul ba de rnams dgon pan gnas te/ da rnams dgon pa naganas pa nasang ga dang/ stag dang/ gung dang/ chom rkun pa rnams kyis bgrod
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gong du sngon gyi yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyen thos rnams kyi gnas rung bar gyur snyaman/ gtsug lag khang yin/

[/]par gzigs so// lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhade du/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de'i tshe wa rA NAsin khyim bdag dge bzang zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems kyi rgyud bskul nas 'di
snyam du sams te/ kye ma'o bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs gosAm sa/ de nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dag 'phrang la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzas bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' ba mdzad de/ rnamakhrungs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab turaga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo// de nas khyim bdag dag bzang stan las langs
dabla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thalamo sbyar ba btud do/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gal rtaganangan/ 'di
ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ khyim bdag de lta bsan rjes su gnang gas rtsigs shig/ zhes
'dra ba brtsigs pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal taganas khang gsum brtsig na/ dbus su dri gtsang khang bajig par bya zhing/ g.yas phyog
su gnas khang gnyis te/ de ltar na ngos gsum pa la ni gnas khang dgu'o// ngos bzhi pa la ni drigatsang khangag thad kar dbus su sgo khang gdod par bya zhing/ g.yas phyogs su gnas khang gnyis so//
du rtsegs tu bya bam shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong rnams kyi gtsug lag khang na lnga rtse ga tabya'o// dragatsang khang na bdun rtseg tu bya'o// sgo khang stong gi bsal
khang yang 'dunajug tu bya'o// dge slong ma rnams kyi gtsug lag khang ni sum tshug tu bya'o// dri gtsang khangan lnga rtsig tu bya'o// khang stong ga bsil khang yang lnga rtsag tubya'o// de'i

tshamanyan yod na khyim bdag sbyin pa zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nong mang ba/ losaspyod che ba/ yos su gathungab/ yang sashing+ge rgya chab/ rnamazosakyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis
'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ da rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed ! dga'
dgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na ) chungam sems can dpaldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsos pa'i btsas ston 2ma bdun gsuman+ti
shu rtsa gcig tu char byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u mnger gdags/ nye du dag gis smras pa// khye'u 'di khyim bdag spyin pa'i bu yin pas/ ba phyir khye'u'i ming ni bzang spyin du gdags
so las/ de'i ming bzang sbyin zhes bya bar btags te/ khye' bzang spyin ma ma brgyad po// pang na thogs pa'i ma ma gnyis dang/ nu ma snyan pa'i ma ma gnyis dang/ dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang/

rtsa grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ maradang/ zhun mar dang/ mar gyi snying po dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi bya brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis srid

par byed skyed par byed cing/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyo bar byed do// de dus gzhan zhagen rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ ma ma'i pang du 'dug ste phyir byung ba dang/ slong bas rgyan bsus
ba gzhon nu bdag la rgyan dgos kyis/ bdag largyan byin cig/ des dga' ba dang mgu bas de la rgya de byin no// de khyim du zhugs pa dang/ de'i phos ma ma la dris pa/ gzhon nu'i rgyan ga ra/
des smras pa/ gzhon nus slong ba la stsal to// de rgyun gzhan dag gis rgyun na/ de yang byin no// yA brgyan na/ de yang des byin nas/ khyim bdag des/chung ma la smras pa/ ! bgrang mo
bdag ceg ga bu ni bzang po zhig btsas te/ rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' 'o// des smras pa/ rje'i sras gal te de lta na/ slan chad rgyan de lta bu ni ma bgyi'o// sa smras pa/ bzangamo
bdag cag la gser dang rin po che tshadachad pa yod mod kyi/ rgyan rdung ba med pas/ 'damador na phyi rol tugatang bar mi bya'ozhas de napa kho nar rtsang 'jug go/ jitsam dus gzhan zhig
na khyim bdag sbyin ba glu ma'i spyi bos longs su bskor sa/ 'bab chu adzir ba til khrus byed du chas pa dang/ khye' bzang spyin gyis smras pa/ yab bdag kyang mchi'o// des de la brid pa brtsams
tabu'adi nyidin chu bzang po yodado// 'bab chun srin 'dzin khris gang ba yin pas khyod 'dir ma mas khrus byos shig/ des sa so// de'i mas smras pa/ rje'i sras khye'u 'di ci'i slad du
nga das ji ltar gyur pa rnams sbas pa dang/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras khyod kyis lhag par bsrus par gyuran/ lhan cig bzhud pa la nos pa ci mchis/ des de khrid de 'bab chu'i ngos su song
myunas khrus byas ta mu'agram du gzhag go/ des sas pa/ yab 'i slad du bdag srung bar mdzad/ bu khyod la nyes pa yodado// yab bdag la mos pa ci 'dra ba zhig mchis/ rgyan byin dang byin pa dag
slong ba rnams la spyanipasaso// yab kyi nor don du gnyer lags sam/ bu su zhig don du mi gnyer ]yab gal ni lta na bdag chag tu 'jug tu stsolatshig/ des par bcug pa dang/ de
nas des de'i lag pa gnyis chu'i nang du bcug nas/ lcags kyi bam pa gsar gyis gang ba bzhi phyung nas smras ba/ yab 'dims khyod jisaMm bzhad pa'i ni kyis nor gyi byakhamadzod la/
lhag ma 'di nyid du chug cig/ bu khyod kyisan tshun yod pa'i gtor mthong ngan/ yakhra chunams pa 'ba' zhig tum bas kyi/ thangalams pa dang/ bdag pomachis pa dang/ bdag po mchis pa
nga gang dag ring po na mchis pa dang/ gang dganyeban mchis pa yang mthong ngo/ khyim bdag sbyin pa ngomanaMr skyes pa'i mig bgrod de bsams pa/ nor gyi bdag po 'ji lta bu s ni sbyin pa
btang bar nus so snyam du rig nas smras pa/ bu gal te de lta na ci dka'aphang sbyin pa byin cig/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ jitsos pha gsonapa de'i bar du bu'i grags pa mi 'byung ba yin no// dricom
dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag sbyin pa shanas/ bzang sbyin khyim gyi boratshur nas/ des rtag tumagon med pa rnams la gras sbyin pas/ kun tu khyim bdag sbyin pa'i bu bzang spyin khyim gyi rdzapo
gyur te/ dmagonamed pa rnams la thus sbyin no zhes sgra grags pas/ pa'ami khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya bar grags so// de nas des rdzogs mnyam
ba las chung ma blangs te/ de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod pa byed de/ ri rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed// dga' dkar spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas so
zhes bya banas/ khye'u bdun bcos so zhes bya ba'i bar du sku/ nges drugan khyim phub bo// bdun pa legs skyes zhes bya ba de'i chung marigs mnyam pa las btsalanam snying nas/ nga bgras
[） ]@#/// ba la lag pa gtad de/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de'i ni'u bla bram ze'i khye'u sgrung rtsi'i phung bo zhes bya ba des/ de de ltar sems khongs su chud pa mthong nas
sa smras la/ khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa lagatad de/ sams khongs su chud cing 'dug/ des smras pa/ bdag gis bu phrug ni khyim phuban/ bdun pa legs skyes kyi tshul
rigasamanyam pa gang las 'di khyim dbub pa gang yin pa de soms mod/ des smras pa/ sems las chung ngur 'dug cig dang/ 'di'i chung ma kho bos rigs mnyam pa las bcol lo//
'a7 yul gdu/ des smras pa/ re zhig yul ma ga d+har 'gro'o// de bzhin du byos shig/ de rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang/ rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod
chab 4 khyim bdag mgon mad zas sbyin dang mtshungs pa gzhan zhig gnas pa de'i khyim du du zhugs nas sgo khang du 'dug sta smas pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ khyim po'i skya bos smras pa/ ma
tho ru zhig slong/ bu mo slong ngo// su'i phyir/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu legs skyes zhes bya ba de'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag rigs ni mnyam na/
'on kyang kho bo cag la gnod mang du dgos so// mad kyang jisnyad gangs can gyi pi'iglang bo chab rgya/ rta brgya/ gser gyi rgyan brgya/ dre'u'i shing rta brgya tho gar yul gyi bumo brgya'o// bram
the'i khye 'u sbrang rtsi phung pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la don de'i phying yi ge sbas pa dang/ des kyang bklags nas thams cad sbyar gyis/ long zhig ces yi ge lan sbrang ngo// nges nyin zhag
dang tshes grangs dang/ yud tsam dag bstan nas blangs pa dang/ de nas des gtsang zhing bsod pa'i kha zas mang pos tshim par byas nas/ bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi khyim du sos gnas btab pa dang 'khru

sa thebs nas/ bram ze rnams dang ngo shes pa ma yin pas/ de rnams kyi mgatsang bas skrag pas phyir phyung ste bor ba dang/ stos te tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis phyogs der
phyin pa de gnyis kyis de mthong ngo// de nas de gnyis kyis smyug ma'i chol pas bzhar nas sa dkar pos bsus bkrus nas/ del chos bshad nas dong ngo// de 'khru ba 'chad du ma btub nas/ des

de gnyis la soms dang ba bskyed nasangasha ba dang/ rgyal tshon bzhi yis kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas de rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i drung du song sta gnas bslangs pa dang/ des smras pa/
khyod song la de nyid du lho sgo gnas thob cig/ dngos song ste gnyug mar gnas par gyur to// lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gangs can gyi mi'i glang po che brgya skyes su
bskur ba dang/ des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/ kho bo la lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos gangs can gyi lo'i glang po che brgya skyes su bskur rgyas ) gal tadagos par gyur na len ba zong
@#// zhig ces smreng ngo// de nas khyim bdag mgon mang bas sbyin/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der songs phyin pa dang/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad/
ces sas so// lha bdag rgyal po'i khabacu bgyi ba cung zad cig la der mchis su mchi'o// rgyal po'i smas pa/ legs kyis song la de nas pa'i glang po che brgya zhig blang dgos pa de dag kyang dad
da shog cig/ des sas pa/ lha gal te der bdag 'tshal ba mchis na/ blangs la 'dir mchis nas lha'i thugs mnyes par bgyi'o// rgyal pos smas pa ! legs kyis de bzhin du byos shig/
de nas khyim bdag mgon med byas sbyin gtod mang du khyer nas rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to// de khyim bdag gang gi khyim du gnas babapa'i khyim bdag de/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo langs de nang ma rnams la
bsgob/ nang rje cag longs shig/ bzhin babrangs dag pos shig/ shing rnams gshogs shig/ ma dag dus ngashig/ 'bras chan tshos shika/ tshod ma tshos shig/ bca' ba dag bsrung du
gyis shig/ bkad sa'i zhal ta dag gyis shig/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ ci khyim bdag 'di bag ma lenanam/ bag ma gtong ngan/ tshul mi rnams
'dis bras la mgron du bos sam/ tshong pa las/ tshogs sam/ 'khor rab/ 'dis ma gang+ga'i rgyal po btso sbyangs gathugs can snying po zas la spyan drangs sam snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag ro
la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag cakhyod bag ma len nam/ bag ma gtong ma/ yul mi rnams khyod kyis zas la mgron du bos sam/ tshong pa 'am/ tshogs sam/ 'khor ram/ khyod kyis
ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo bzo sbyangs gakhrugs can snying bo zas la spyan drangs sam/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag kho bos bag ma len pa 'am/ bag ma gtong ba yang med/ kho bos yul ma yang gras lam bos/
tshong ba ma yin/ tshogs ma yin/ 'khor ma yin/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can sAng po yang zas la spyan drangs pa ma yin te/ 'ong kyang sas rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i zla sngon ma thos pa thos pa dang/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas/ de spu zing

zhes phyed pas/ khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so// khyimabadag sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di su yin/ khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu brags te gos
ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tubyung nas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ khyim
bdag de ni sangs rgyus zhes bya'o// khyim bdag dag 'dun zhes bya ba 'di su yin/ khyim bdagargyal rdzogs las kyang rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag/
dpa kho nas khyim mad par/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rdzimasu bab tu byung ba dag yod/ bram ze'i rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs las kyang

[H ]rigs kyi bu sku dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur sag bgos nas/ dang pa yang dag pa khos khyim nas khyimamadapar/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tubyung ba dag yod de/ khyim bdag
'di ni reg dun zhes bya ba yin te/ sang kho bo'i khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slojago dge 'dun de gdugasatshod la spyan drangs so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang
zhugs rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid kyi dur khrod kyibasal ba'i rol nabazhugs so// khyim bdagabcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis bltar rungungs/ nges 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag khyong re
zhig sdod cig dang/ gal te bad nyidir gshegs nas sa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin de'i nub mo sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas gnyid log ste 3 de

naganang pa nam nadra pa 'i 'du shes kyis lha sgo gang na ba der song ba dang/ de'i chapho na glo bur du 'ong ba dang 'grob rnams ma thogs par bya pa'i phure mchin mo'i thun dang po dang h+pha ma gnyis la lha sgo phye ste 'jog go/
malho sgo phye ba dang/ snang bas gsal bar gyur pa mthong nas/ 'disnyam dusams te/ 'di ltar lhosgo phye ste 'dug pas gangon mi tha b.ranam nangs so snyam du rig nas/ snang ba de nyid du grong
khyer nas byung ba dang/ de byung ma thag tu snang ba gang yin pa de med nas/ sur namasros par gyur to// de yang 'jigs par gyur/ bag tsha bar gyur cing/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ bdag
ma 'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ g.yon can 'ga' zhig gis gtsos tu gcod mang po yang m son par phrogs par mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams te/ slar log par 'dod pas lha'i bu sbrang rtsi'i
phung po'i 'dug gnas la skor ba byed cing phyag 'tshal lo// de nas lha'i bu sbrang rtsi phung po 'di snyam du sems te/ dang nyid du khyim bdag mgon med khras sbyin gyis bden pa mthong bar gyur na/

deng nyide 'di sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das spangs te/ lha gzhan la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba snyam du bsams nas/ gang yang lho sgo nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod kyi bar snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar
byas nas/ khyim bdag mgonamed zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig/ slar m ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi/ slar log na ni ma yin

no[C ]da ci'i phyir zhe na/ rta brgya dang gsang rgyan brgya/ dre'u'i shing rta brgya dang ni// sna tshogs nor gyis sbyar ba yi// rta rgod ma yi shing rta brgya// gom pa gcig gcig bor ba yi// bcu drug char yang
mi bod do// khyim bdag smanasngar sopazhig/ sam ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar songan legs par 'gyur gyi 1 slar logananam yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gas can ri yi glang chen brgyu// gsar
dang nor bus brgyan byas la// lus mgashol mda'am bar ldan// ma dang gar skyes stod po che// gom pa gcig cig zer ba ya// bcu drug char yang ma yod do//
khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig/ slar m ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par ' gyur gyi/sur 'gan na ma yin no// daci'i phyir zhe na/ thogar yul gyi bu mo ngargya// nor bu'i rna cha gdub
kor thogs// gser gyi dpung rgyan thogs pa yi/mgrin pa rkyen gyis legs brgyan pa// gom pa gcig cig bor ba yin// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig/ sla ma
ldog cig/ khyod spyan snga song na legs par 'gyur gyi// slar log na ni ma yin no// de nas khyim bdag mgon mang gras sbyin gyis// lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// bzhin bzangs khyod su

zhig khyim bdag kho bo ni khyod nyid kyi grogs po rid pa phram ze'i khye'u sbrang rtsi'i phung bo yin te/ kho bos dge slongashA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis la sems dang pa bskyed nas sha ba dang//
rgyalan bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes te/ lho sgo 'di 'den gnyug mar gnas so/ de'i phyir kho bo khyod la 'di skad ces/ khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig/ sar ma ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song
na legs par 'gyur gyi// slar log nan mo yin no zhes smra'o////'dul ba gzhi////bam po don lnga pa// de nas byomi bdag/

byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de la blta bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ bsal ba'ol gyi dur khrod gang na ba der song ba dang/ de'i tshe btsem ldan 'das la tshug lag khang gi phyi rol ba gang
med pa na 'chug cing/ lhag par yang khyim bdag mgon med bris snyane 'ong ba la gnyis pa khyim bdag mgonamang bas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho nas ma shong ngo//
mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der songs phyin pa dang ) bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gis yang dag dar dgyes par 'gyur bas/ yang dag pa dgyes par bar nge/ bcos ldan
'das ji ga bde bar mnal lam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pa'i rmi tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig 'dod bsam gos la//zagamad rab tunam grol ba/mya ngan yongs 'dasabam then/ mas cad
! du ni bde bar mnal// 'dir ni ri bong kun bcad nas// thugs kyi rims nad rnam bsal zhing// zhi ba klob pa'i thugs kyis ni// nye bar zhi ba bde bas mnal// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin khrod nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ gangan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas snyan gyis/ bcom
shub/ ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol/ phyogs gcig tu'ajug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med
zas sbyin la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga'
[ ]bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su/ chos kyi gtam mdzod pa gang yin pa 'di lta sta/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang/ tshul khrims kyi gtam dang/ mtho ris kyi gtam dang/
tsa 'dod pa rnamasakyi mnog dang/ nyes dmigs dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ nges par 'byung ba dang/ rab tu dben pa'i phan yon gyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi gtam
rgyas par yang dag par bstan to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dga' ba'i sams dang/ dge ba'i sems dang/ mgu ba'i salas dang/ sgrib pa dang bral ba'i soms dang/ skal bdang ldan/
zhing yang dag phul gyis bshad pa kun shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa// 'phags pa'i ban ba bzhi bo gang
yin pa 'di lta ste ! sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam rgyus par rab tu bstan to/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis snyan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/'phag/
sa lam mar par gas[/ ]dpang na gos gtsang mnag nogamad pa tshon du gzhug par 'os pa/ tshon gyi nang du bcug
na legs par tshon rtsi 'jana'acub pa dbazhin du khyim bdag mgon mad rdzas sbyin gyen+d+ra na da nyid la 'dug bzhin du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bo 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/
'gog pa dang/ lam mngon par rtogs so// de nas khyim bdag mgonamong 'bad+d+her gyis 3 chos mthong ba dang 3 ches thob pa dang/ chos rigs pa dang/ chos kyi gting spobs pa dang/ som nyi las la ba
dang : bla ma las rgal ba dang/ ston nga 'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'dzag pa dang/ gtan gyis bkri la dang : chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas// stan las langs tu bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
gatra nas (bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su shul mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldun 'as 'a 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/ mngon par 'phags so/ bcos
ldan 'das dang/ chos nga dge slong gi dge bdun la bdag skyabs su mchu lags kyi 3 dge bswAn du gabang ngu gsol/ dengo sAn chad ji srid mtsho'i bar du srog dang ya nga bsdos te skyabs su
mche bar mngon par dang lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// khyab bdal/ mgon med graskyed 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod kyi ming cu btsun pa bdag gi
ming pazang sbyin lags mod kyi/ mgonam mchis pa rnams la 'chal ma stsal bas/ des na bdag la sku be rnams kyis mgon med zas sbyin zhes bgyi bar 'chil lo// khyim
bdag khyod kyi gnas gang yin/ btsun pa yul khrin zhes bgyib na ko sa la rnams kyi grong rdal mnyan yod ces bgyi ba de na bdag mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshigs shig dang/
bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la// bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims chu dang/ snyan dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byang rnams kyis
bsan bkur bgyi lags so// khyim bdag mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang yod ma/ btsun pa ma mchis lags so// khyim bdag gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der dge slong rnams 'od ba dang/
'gro ba dang/ gnas bar soms so// bcom ldan 'das gshig shig dang/ bdag gis ci nas kyang mnyan yod du dge slong rnams mchi ba dang/ gzhan du mchi ba dang/ mchas par semasar
'gyur ba de ltar gtsug lag khang brtsigs lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rung mi gsung bas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la gnang ngo// de nas khyim bdag mgen rmad byas
spyan gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan sna nas song ngo// de nas des
rgyal po'i khab tu bsgrub pa dang bya ba gang ya dpa da thangs tshud pas gnas tsAr parim na 'jabagapa da nga ror songs pa yang/ phatedza na rags na byaya3 la chag bos phyag 'tshal
te: bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag med thogs goslopazhig stsal du gsol 3 pa/ )dang+gA lhan cig mnyan yod du'ang 'das kyi snang du gtsug lag
khang brtsig lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ) dge slong su zhig gis khyim bdag mgon mar gras spyir 'khor dang bcas nga dang/ mnyan yod na gnas pa'i lungo'i tshogs 'dul
bar 'gyur snyam na/ dag songasha'i dus 'gyul mar gaN+Dig nas/ de nas bdum ldan 2 paN kyi tshong 'dapa shA ri'i pu9 bka' sa' nga ) ga shA ri'ilu
khyim bdag mgon med gros sprin 'khyer dang bcas pa dang/ mnyan yodan gnas pa'i sku bo'i tshob sa 21 so ra gtsa shag/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bton[']lda[']rtag pA dI bas/ 'don
ldan 'das kyi bkal mnyan to// de nas tshes bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa nA ri 'a bas cang ma smra bas khas bas par rig nas ! bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyi'i 'a/
mgo bos phyag 'chil/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo// de nas tshur len pa ka'i bu de nyid kyi nub sa 'das nas/ snga ro sham 12sa ba des ngos gos dang lhung 'brang bregs
na// rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ rgyal po 'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zlas kyi bya ba byas nas zas phyi ma'i bsod sogs spangs te ( gnas
mal ji ltar los sbyang pa mkhos su phab nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ngo// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lam brgyags mang po khyer nas/
nub mo chub mo zhing mnyan yod du song ste phyin nas/ ngo mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga' r ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang/ nags tshal nas nags tshal dang/ skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal
du 'chob sa nas 'chags dbod cing 'di skad ces sas so// mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la/ ha cang yang mi nub dang/ nyin par lang lo nyung zhing sku myong ba dang/ mtshan mo gcom
zla chur ba dang/ sgra chung ba dang/ sAr bu dang/ sha sbrang dang/ rlung dang/ nyi ma dang/ sdig sbrul gyi rig pa chung ba'i sa phyogs de gang na yod pa der/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug
log khang btsug go zhes pa las/ khyim bdag mgon med bas sbyin gyis/ gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba ni mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba cang ma nyi la nyin par lang long cung mi
ku rtsorkur ba dang/ mtshan mo gces chung ba dang/ sgra chung ba dang sbrang bu dang/ shaljang nga/ rlung dang/ nyi ma dang/ sdig sbrul gyi rig pa nyung bar mthong ngo/ khrong nas kyang 'di
snyam du sems te/ 'di bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ deng gi khyim du ma song ba nyid du gzhon nu rgyal byed kang na ba der song sA phyin pa dang/ gzhon nu
rgyal khyed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu bdag la kun dga' ra ba sol yeg/ der bsdug kher gtsos ldanu'adas kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig legs so// sa lcas pa/ khyim bdag de ni
pa'i kun dga' ra bam yin// skyed mos tshal yin mod kyi/ de ba'i yin no/ lanag rigs lam bsal du yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ gzhon nu rgyal bde la 'di skad ces snyas so//
gzhon nu bdag la skyed mos tshal snya2rig/ bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig 'a gas so/ khyim bdag kun dga' ra ba de gsar bye ba gzhigs kyang mi gtongo// pad
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ gzhon nurgyal bung la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nus kunudaka'ar 'a na bcad zin gyis/ gsar dang dbyibag la zhig/ ka chu dga' r ba ni bdag gi lagA
so ( sus na bcad/ khyod kyis ri bcad mod/ de gnyis na bcad dom bcad de zhis rtse da tshagyur yAs/ zhal che gcod pa'i snachen po 'du gtogs pa'i mi gang bas deng song ba dang/ ri'i bar/
du'ajig rten skyongang bzhi 'disAm du sems/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtson gyis de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas/ de nas zhal cha
gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas dgos pa'i phyir 'dus so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang/ gzhon nu rgyal byed gnyis
zhal gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i mi'i drung du songanas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ zhal che gcod pa'i rtsa chen po la gtogs pa rnams la don de rgyas bar smras pa dang/ de rnamA
kyis smras pa/ gzhon sa kun dga' ra ba na rin bcad zin gyis/ gsar dang dbyig long zhig kun dga' ra ba ni khyim bdag gi yin no// de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
gyis shing rta dang/ khur dang/ skya dang/ gzeb dang/ rngamo dang/ glang dang/ bong bu rnams la gseramang bo bkal tu 'ongs nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi la thams cad bye ba'i gshibs bas
gshib par brtsams pa dang/ sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma g.yogs pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin don de soms shing yud tsam zhig kyang mi sna bar 'dug ste/
gang gses ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas/ slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin// hacang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin sam pa dang/ gzhonan rgyal byed kyis
bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar khyim dag mgon med zas sbyin ni ci'i phyir/ kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di sAd kyi nor gyi phung po yos su gtang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so snyam du bsams nas/
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag khyod gal ta'agyod pa skyes nas/ gsar dang dbyig khyer cig/ kun dga' ra ba ning nyid kyi yin no// gzhon nu bdag ni 'gyod/
ba ma skyes/ 'on kyang don 'di sems dang/ ud tsam zhig byang mi sla bar 'dug pa ni/ gang gis ma 43 pa'i phyogs 'dir bkram nas sur yang spa bar bya mi dgos pa'i gtar ba cung nyung ba lang
ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam mo// de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'disAm dusan['：u0f7a] ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid mchog na[']na pa ma yin la// chosakhastan pa
mang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la pa ltar khyis bdag 'di kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di sud kyi nor gyis phung bo chen po yongasasu gtong ngo snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag mgonamad thag da la 'di
skad ces smras so// khyim bag ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la byed cig/ der kho bos btsemaldan 'das phying sgo khang brtsig par bya'o// khyim bdag mgon med thos sbyin gyis gzhonan rgyal
byad la ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs byade nas/ der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khar brtsig tung ga go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ! bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir
gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtsams pa dang/ mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas grongs par yid can rnams 'dus nas/ khyim bdag mgon mang bas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang//
smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma tshugs shag/ ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos te// dge sbyong go'u tama'i
ni rgyal po'i khab yano// kho bo cag ga ni mnyan yod yin no// des smras pa/ khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos kyi) bdag gi ring ma bgos su/ bdag gang la mngon par dga' ba/
pa'i chos kyi phung bo brtsig ge/ de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba dang/ de la yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyan gyis pham par byas pa dang/ mu stegs spyi brtol khyad pa cor ba rnams kyis smras
pa khyim bdag khyod 'dod dgur byed du mi gzhug sto/ dag sbyong go'u tama'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'as nas/ gal te de'i gshags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang rtsigs
shig/ des smras pa/ rung gis re zhig 'phags pa nA ri'i bu kho na la brtag go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin// tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/
tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ tshe dang ldan
bshA ri'i bu 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu mu stags can rnams 'di skad ces/ khyim bdag khyod 'dong ngagur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi
0 mchog 'os nas/ gal ted pa'i gshags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig ces mchin/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam
pa ci 'dri rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 'on te mnga' yasams pa 'gas yod par mthong ngo/ su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na/ bangag khon 'tsha ga las
par mthong ngo// yang bsams pa// tshe 'disnyad ts+tshakeg kho na bdag la ga las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar 'gyur ma/ 'on gzhan yang tshig gis 'dul ba yong snyam pa las yong par mthong ngo// dus
ji sring cheg rnatshogs par 'gyu snyaman/ zhag bdun len nas so/ khas pas rtas sas pa/ khyices khag de bzhin du bya sta/ 'on kyang zhag bdunapa'i nyin par bya'o// nga nas khyimabadab
mgon med zas sbyin dga' ba dang mgu bslag/ mu stegs rgyud rnams gang na ba dedza song rtas phyin pa dang/ sku zla [:3]ra nusaMs 1'ang/ gtus so// [-]shes ldan dag shA ri'i bu na
b.rung gses de bzhin bya'o// 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o zhes gleN so// de rnams kyis ngasams/ 3 'de la ni rgyu gnyis yod par gyur 3 yang na ni de 'bros 'dong ngo // yang na ni
de phyogs la 'dod do// de ma yin na dus deng gdapa ci dgos/ bdag ca kyang thosadas pa la lo naNe rnams phyekas bcol bar btsas/ / dzAn+tams kyis phogs btsal ba dang/
kun tu rgyu mgo dmar mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de la sbas ba/ khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs pa mtshungs par dpa yin gyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog
bdagacag gas brtsad pa'i phying bkugan/ de phyogs tshol gyis khyed kyang bdag cag ga grogs gyis shig/ dus ngesaMm zhag na/ 'di nas zhag bdun pa'it+tan pa ro// rung gis de bzhin du byas/
gang gakhyed cag 'dus par gyur ba de'atshokho bo la spron cig/ mu stags can rnams bgatsho ba dang/ sams khral skyes nas nyin ra zhing phyogs tshol ba dang 3 nyam bgrang bar byed do// ji tsaman zhag
bdun len pa dang/ khyim bdag mgon mad zas sbyin gyis bla gabamed pa'i sa phyogs yangs par stan shom du bcug go/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bab ched du yungasang ba'i khri bshams so// yul sna
tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stags can rnams kyang 'dus so// mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang/ de'i 'khor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang khacig ni ngo mtshar skya/
kha cig ni sngon gyi dag ba'i rtsa bas bskyal nas 'dus par gyur to// de nasatshe dang ldan ba shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon mang byas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pas bdun du bud nas rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du
zhugs te/ 'dul ba'i skya bo rnams la bltasanas dran po sngon du btang ste/ spyod lamazhi bas sangage'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug pa dang/ 'khor thams cad soms mi g.yang bar tshongang ldan pa shAri'i
bu la rtog cing 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa'ari'i khus/ mu stags can rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag pazhig khyed la/ 'on te 'jig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gas byas/ khyod kyis

shaki cage/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis byas na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang 'jig ma nus na/ kun tuny+tsa mig dmar gyis lta smos kyang ca degos snyam du bsams na
kun tu mig dmar la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyis byos shes pas gzhig go/ de ig 'phrul la byang ba yin pas/ nges shing sa haka ra shAni tum rtog gis rgyas pa zhige sprul ba dang/ tshongang ldan

pa shAri'i bus rlung dang char drag po phab ste/des ri rtsa nas nas phan tshun rnam par gtor te/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul du yang ma gyur to// de nas des pad+ma'i rdzong zhig sprul ba dang/ tshadape ldan pa shA ri'i bus gling/

po che bklang po zhig sprul nas/ des de kun tu brnal nas ming gi lhag ma zhig bzhag go/ des sbrul mgo 'dun pa zhig sprul ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus nam mkha' lding nag sbrul te/ des de blangs so//
des ro langs shig sprul ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pas btab pa las nyes par sbyar ba'i rolas ni bdag nyade lagasod par byed pas des de nyid bsags pa dang/ de nas de 'jigs
skrag yongs shing ba spu zing zhes byed nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/ 'phags pa skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa
@#// shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dar las de zhi bar gyur te// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus de la chos bshad de/ de dang ba skyes nas skyas ba/ 'phags pa sha yi'i bu legs

par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bstan par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa stan/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshos par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de tshe dang ldan
pa ba'i bus rab tu phyung/ snyan par rdzogs par byas nas/ gdams ngag byin pa dang/ des brtson pa dang/ 'bad pa dang/ brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa
'khaM mngon du byas nas dgra bcom pagyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gsar du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lagamathil du mtshos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang/
sto'u mnyam pa/ rig pa'i ma rig pa'i sgo pa'i skyabs bral cing/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang/ rnyed pa la chags pa dang/ bkur sti la

rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang/ da bar bya ba dang/ mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad

nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bus na smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po char bcad do snyam du rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to/
danas tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsams pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin shes nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa

byas so// de thos nas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gis na nyen thos kyi byang chub sems bskyad do// kha cig gas ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o// kha cig gis ni bla na
mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o// kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams byas so// kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis/

ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gsen phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni reb tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// 'khor de phal cher yang
sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// mu stags can rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di bdag cag gas gshags kyisaaMr gcad par mi nus kyis/ thabs shig
bsham par bya ste/ gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du gla ma'i las byas la/ donas glags rnyed nus 'di bgags te gsad par bya'o snyam nas/ thams cad 'dus takhyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du song

nas son pa dang smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis bdagacag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/ de bas na sIng brtse bar gyi shig dang/ khyod kyi gtsug lag khang dugla mi'i las bya'o// kho bo cag 'di na
pheng zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bo nam rung ngo// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis skyas pa/ re zhig 'phags pa ngashA pa'i bu la brtags par bya'o zhes// de tshe dang lda

pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ tshe dang ldan ba shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa mu stags can rnams kyi mchid nas bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'agazhathems cad bcad de/ de bas na

sang brtse bar gyis shig dang/ khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du glami'i las bya'o// khebo nug 'danering zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor nam rung po zhes ma'i// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyi 'di rnams /
la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 'on dmad ces bsam pa la zhugs na yod pa mthong ngo// su zhig la rag lasasnyaman/ bdag kho na la'o snyam nas/ ngas bsams te smras pa/ khyim bdag de la 'ga'
ba ci yod kyis de bzhind kyis shig/ de rnams gtsug lag khang der rgya mi'i las bya bar brtsams pa na/ tshadang ldan b shA'i bu lcag thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas/ des de rnams las byed du gzhug

par brtsams so// tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na 'chag ci 'dug pa las/ de rnams kyis de mthong nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ dben pa
na'ag pas 'di gsad pa'i dus ni'adi yin nosAms/ de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong nas bskor ta'adug go/ tshodang ldan pang+gashAri'i bus bsams pa/ 'di rnams semasaci'adra ba zhig gis bdag gi
drung du lhags snyam na/ saMmanagasad pa'i sems kyis yin par mthongan/ des lcag thogs de sbyang nas/ des de rnams las thos deng zhes thag bcug pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa
shA ri'i bu bskyab tu gsol// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa re zhig song la ngal sor chug cig/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'ani 'di lta bu r bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni 'di gsad par bsam
na: 'di ni bdag cag la byams ba'i sems so snyam du mig nas dad par gyur to// denas tshe dang ldan pa shA 'i bus/ de rnams kyi bsams pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin

gshisanas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas te/ de thosaMnas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bal
nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ste smras pa/ btsun pashAri'i bu bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsAn

bar rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po klob pa ltan/ bdag cag btsunapa kA ri'i bu'i san snga chos par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tubyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/
gdams ngag byin pa de de rnams kyis brtson pa dang/ 'bad pa dang/ brtsal ba byas nas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang/ mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyirnam pa thams cad nyams pa
dang ltung pa dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnanatu nyon mos pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dag
bcom par gyur khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang phral ba/ bong ba dang gsar dumanyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang snya'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas
ma rig pa'i sgo pa'i sbubs dral cing/ rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ sridapa dang/ rnyed pa la chags pang [. ]bkur sde la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang

po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par byab dang/ rjed par bya ba dang/ mngon du smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ) gtsug lag khang gi thig skudakyimatha' gcig nas
bzung/ mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum par brtsams so// khyim bdag mgon mad zas sbyin gyis smras pa// 'phags
pa shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams nirgyu mang rkyen mang par 'dzad pa mumadzad na/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu tsi'i rgyu pa'i rgyan gyis 'adzramapa mdzad/
khyimabadag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu mang rgyan med par 'dzin pa mi mdzad de/ khyod kyis 'ding thig skud bzung

ban 4 dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su mngagasar gyi khang pa grub par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrod de sbasapa ) 'phags pa shA ri'i bu gal te de ltan pa'i slad

du yang thug skud brkyang ba ngang lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang thig skud de bzung ba dang/ khyim bdagamagon med bras sbyin gyis lhag par dang pa drag po'i shug

kyis sems mngon par dad pa byas te dad pa po'i mjug thogs kho nar gsar gyi khang pa de rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas/ tshodang ldan pa shAli'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so// de nas khyim bdag

mgon med thos sbyin gong nas gong du bsod namasarab tu 'phal ba'i rgyud kyis/ gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang khang phran drug cubartsig tu bcug ste/ des gtsug lag khang chen po bcudrug dang khang phran drug

cu brtsigs nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/ tshodong ldan pa shAli'i khug na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa shAsi'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// baphags pa shA ri'i bu brgyus ldan
'das gshegasan shulatshod ji tsam du byon par 'gyur/ khyim bdag dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tsom mo// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchiba'i tshod jitsam/ khyimabadag 'khor les sgyur ba'i
rgyal po ni nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i lam du 'gro'o// de nas khyimabadag mgonomad zas sbyin gyis/ gang yang mnyan yodaM nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshags dgongs brtsigs nasaM/ zhes
dag byed du bcug/ sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag brtsig tu bcug/ dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dgabakod/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ bdan dag gis brgyan/ tsanadanagyi sa
chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag nye b.rab kod/ rta babs dag byed du bcug/ dus kyi dang thunatshod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go/ de ltar tshogs bsags nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/

kyi nang rje tshu khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba derasong la phyin pa dang/ kho bo'i tshig gas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ma/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa/
yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang nga de ba la reg bar gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodadu gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
ts+tsa gcig la/ bdag rjesrid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ snyan dpyad kyi skyon sman dang 1 yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti bgyid ngozhes kyang gsol cig/ jobo bka' bzhin 'a la
zhes mi des khyimabadag mgon med thas sbyin gyi ltamanyan nas/ rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te/ rims kyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang/ denas lam gyis dus ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der songs phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gas la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
ba bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mage khos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas/ phag par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kye mi khyodadang khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin bde ba gyuracag/ btsunapa khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin gyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
thabs gcig la zhes bya ba nas/ bkur ste bgyid do zhes bya ba der gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang ma gsubs gnang ngo// de nas ma nges bcom ldan 'adas kyis cang mgasung
bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba ! 'khor dul ba zhi ba/ 'khor
zhib/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin ba/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcomapa/ 'khor dgrabcom pa// 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang

bral ba/ dang ba/ 'khor dang ba/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogasakyis bskorab ltabu dang/ glang po cho glang po riphrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskorab lta bu dang/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta

bung/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ namamakha'aldingabya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ bram zeslob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ sman pa mkhas pa nang
[j]khyad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang ) lamamakhana'agron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ ded dpon tshong
ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ tshong dpon skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ khams kyi rgyal phranablonapo 'i tshogs kyis bskorab lta bu dang ) 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor

ba lta bu dang/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang nyi ma 'od gathor stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang/ ul 'kho skyong driwa'i tshogs kyis bskorab lta bu dang/ 'phags skyes po grul bum
gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskob lta bu dang/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ thag bzlas cis lha ma yin gyi tshogs

kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ rmongs pa tshangs sa kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang/ rgya mtshogayo ba med pa lta bu dang/ sprin chu
dang bcas pa lta bu dang/ glang po che dam pa dregs ba dang phral ba ltar/ dbang bo rnams shani tudul bas rtsod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ ska skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun
nas brgyan cing dpe byad brgyad cu'i rnam par mdzes par byas laM/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku nyi ma'i 'od gzer stongabs lhag pa'i 'od can rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta kun nasamadzes ]
pa stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ngeng/ ma 'dres ba'i dran ba nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang/ thugs rjechen bo dang ldan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin/
'khor dang bcas pa dang/ mnyanayodan gnas pa'i skya bo'i tshogs dang/ lha brgya stongaphrag dums zham 'bri byas nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegasaso// gang gi tshe 'am ldan 'angosakyis
mnyan yodakyi grong khyer du gshegasasamangon par 'du mdzadabs grong khyer gyi sgo'i thim pa la/ zhabs g.yas pas mnan bde'itshos rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sachen bo 'di ris rtagasos/ kun tu
btugayos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mgon nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogru
thonalho phyogs dma'/ mthu'amatho narab sama' 3 dbus mthon mtha' dma' bar koranas/ 'jigarten 'dithamasacad 'ajig rten gyi bar dang bcas te snang sa skyonganapos khyam par gyur to/
bar snang la yang lha'i nga rdung zhing/ nam mkha'i dkyil gnas ba'i lha'i ni snying nas lha'i me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+madakarapo dang/ akaru'i phum dang/ rgya spos
kyi bya ba dang/ tsan dan gyi phyi ma dang/ gur kum gyi phyi ma dang/ tamaM la'i lom dang/ lha'i me togiman da ra ba rnams 'thor zhing/ lha'i gos rnams kyang shor ro// bcom ldan 'adas
grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang ya mtshanA'adi lta bu dag byung bar gyurato// gzhanayung dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to// dma'acho rnams ni mthon

por gyur to// mkhronapo rnams ni mnyam par gyur to// gangapo che yang yang 'byin/ rtayang skad 'byin khyumatshog rnams kyang skad 'byin no// khang ba nayod pa'i rolamo'icha sbyar snyatshogs pa rnams kyang

rang sgra 'byin no// lob rnams kyis ni mig rdzob bo// 'onapa rnams kyis ni rna bas thos so// skukab rnamasakyisanasmra nus par gyurato// dbang po ma tshang b rnams ni darang po rnams tshang bar thob bo// chang

gisamyos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to// dug 'thus parnamasan drug zhi bar gyur to// phan tshun khon byung ba rnams ni byams pa thob par gyur to// sbrum pa rnams ni bde bar btsos par gyur to//

btson du bcings pa rnams na bcings pa las thar ro// nor mod pa rnams rnanor rod de/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gtogs pa na ngo minaMm bcastong dag byung bar gyur to/[”]/nga nas bcos
ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bu s mnyanayod du gshegs so// gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med blas sbyin mdza'
bshes dang/ nye du dang/ gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas/ gsar gyi bya ma bum blas te chusbyong bar brtsams pa las/ de 'dzag ma btub nas/ khyim bdag mgon gdab spyani yid mi bde ste
[54) ]bsams la/ bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang sAm pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad kyang
byas pa mdade/ 'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas/ sngon kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di phul ba yin gyas/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbyangs shig/ nges

phyogs gzhan zhig tu'adug ta sbras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi rtsol bskyod par mdzad de/ rgyal byed kyi tshul brjod pa mdzad pa na/ gzhon/
nargyal byed kyis bsams pa/ kyi ma bcom ldan 'das kyis dor bdag gi ming thog mar sbyos kyang rim rung snyam pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi bsam pa thugasas chung nas/

dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol mgon mdawas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no zhes de ming thogam smos pa mdzad do// gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis deng bdag goming thog
mar spos pa mdzad pa thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir na po chesna bzhi'i sgo kha byed du bcug go// de
bzhind sdudab byed pa rnamasakyis kyang ) mdosdo'inang dusas rgyas bcom ldan 'dasargyulabu rgyal byed kyi chol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so///
[cj ]/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sngon gyi yang
[】 ]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las phyogs 'dzi sdun nas phul lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sas rgyas bcom
