yaM ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri nyis stong dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe mnyan yod 'dir khyim bdag rgyal zhes bya ba byung sta/ des sa phyo
as/ 'di skyong grags drug gsar dang dbyig ka4shings pas rgyal bu gzhon nu las sanas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phul// de nyid kyi spyan sngar rab tubyunganas/ nyon mongs
pa thams cad spangs dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bo zhig des bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams par gzigs la shin tudad pa skyasanas/ des yang dag pa

sh+tsa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa mgazigs kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsig tu bcug ste/ des bsams pa/ gang gis na bdag cag gis 'di nyin mtshan du sgrib pa mid par mthong bar 'gyur ba'i las
[d)]deci yod snyam pa dang/ de la rten pargya mtsho'i 'gram na 'dug pa zhig gis ne khu rin po che 'bar ba zhig skyes su bskur nas/ des de mchod rten la btags pa dang//
mthus de dbu sku dang sen mo'i mchod rten de nyin maraMn du sgrib pa med par mthong ngo// de nas dad pa skyes te smon lam btab pa/ jiltaras phyogs 'di bdag gi zhang pos rgyal bu gzhon nu las gsar
dang dbyig gshengs pas nyos nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyadag 'dun dang bcas pa la phul ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang sa phyogs 'di
gsar dang dbyags gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhonanu las nyos nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sasargyas bdun la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing/ de rnams kyi spyi ma shos gang yin pa de'i
spyan sngar bdag bab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sngas te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas par gyur cig ces bab bo// dge slong dag jisnyam du sems/ de'i tshode'i dus kyi khyim bdag la
gyi che ba gang yinub ngo// khyim bdagamagon med zas sbyin 'dinyid yin no// de khyon chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa la ston pa gtsug tor can zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig

nadu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gongam bzhin du snya/ de'akhor dag so drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gshegasaso// de'i tsho khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes byab byung sta/ das phyogs 'di dpag tshad phyed dang
gsum nor bu gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhonanu las nyos nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug topany+tsan nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo//

dge slong dag de'i tshade'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhanazhig yin snyaman/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshonga'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di/
nyid yin no// de'i 'og tu bskal ba sum cu rtsa gcig pa 'di nyid la ston pa thams cad skyob ces bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jigarten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du/
sta de'akhor dge slong drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba byung sta/ sa phyogs 'di rgyang grags gnyis su mu tig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas/
gang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo// dge slong dag de'i tshonga'i dus kyi khyim bdag mtshuzhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyed
kyis de lta mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyin bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyidi yin no// de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang bo 'di la ston pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba nas 1 sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dubyung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong mkhazhin du ste/ de 'khor dag slong bzhi khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'its+tsha khyim bdag srid smyon zhes bya ba byung ste/ sa
0/ phyogs 'di ba lang gis bkang bas gzhon nu las nyos te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas 'khor ba 'jiganyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo// dge slong dag de'i ri de'i dus kyi tshes
phadagasrid sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyaman/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid sInano// de'i 'og tubaskal pa

bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tsholo sum khri thub pan ston pa gser thub ces bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gom bzhin du ste/ de'akhor dag slong
sum khri dang phyogs 'di'i gshagasaso// de'i tshe khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya ba byung sta/ des phyogs 'di gos bting bas gzhon nu las nyos nas/ yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar sgrub

nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dusakyi khyimabangag phur bu zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyaman/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta sta/ 'on kyang de'i de'i dus
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skyo dgu'i ri la nyi khrikhrub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srus zhes bya ba nas/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin nguste/ de 'khor go slong nyi khri dang/ phyogs 'di gshegs so// de'i khyim bdag chu stod ces bya bzhig byung ste/ nges
sa phyogs 'chang grags phyogasar gyis bkram pas gzhon nu las nyos te/ mdag bar rdzogs pa'i sa sargyas 'od grus nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul le//
dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag stod ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyaman/ khyed kyis de ltar mi bltaste/ 'onakyang de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde nyid yin no/
dge slong dag de ltar gyi dbazhin gshegs pa dgu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde b.ragashegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bu named pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston pa nga 'jig rten du byung nas/ nga 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcudang phyogs 'dir gshegs pan/ dalta
yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rmon pa dor bcu drug gis rmos pa'i khyon bye ba gshanges pas gshibs nas gzhon nu rgyalakhyedalas nyos te/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/

dge slong dag ma 'os pa'i dus na skyo dgunams kyi tshile brgyad khri thub pan/ ston pa byams pa zhes bya ba'akhor dgra bcom pa khrag khrig phrag dgu dang/ thera'abum chen po phrag drug phyogs 'di gshegs par
'gyur ro// de'i tshokhyim bdag nor babs zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur// des phyogs 'di dpag tshad gsum gsar dang dbyigs gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas/ byams pa nyan thos kyi dga' n

[o]dang bcas pa la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing/ de nyidakyis bstan pa la rab tu byupas nyonamos pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum dubyang par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de'i tshodi'is kyi khyim bdag
nor bzas zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de gzhan zhig yanesAman/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang khyim bdag mgonamad zas sbyin 'di nyid khyim bdaganor bzangs zhes bya ba yin par 'gyur ro//
khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gter bdag po dang bas pa dang/ bdagakho med pa dang ! thang la yod pa dang/ chun yod pa dang/ gang dag rgyang ring po na yodapa dang/ gang dag thag nye ban yod pa
ya mthong bas kun tu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang/ bdag po med pa dang/ nyapal yod pa dang/ chun yod pa dang/ gang dag rgyang ring bon gor pa dang/
gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo zhes grags so// de'i mu stags canagyi dag sbyongadang/ bram ze dang/ spyod pa pa dang/ kun tumyu sna tshogs rtogs khang du 'dus te 'khod pa
rnams 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng bar byed do/ shes ldan ngag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mchin gang dag ldan na/ gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang/ bdag pomadapa dang/ thang

la yod pa dang/ chunayod pa dang/ gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang/ gang dag thaganyebanayodapa mthongabar gyur/ de'i bram ze'i khye'u phyugasastanazhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du tshogs shing 'dug
pa gyur nas/ des smras pa shes ldan dag khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod ga dang/ kho bos khyim bdag mgon med zas spyinamachin ganganang ldan n/ gtor
bdag po dang bcas pa dang bdag po mdab dang/ thang la yod pa dang/ rgyun yod pa dang/ gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang/ gang dag zag lu banayod pa mthong bar 'gyur ba brtags la
khyed la smra bar bya'o zhes/ de khyim bdagamagonamed zas sbyin 'gro ba dang 'dug pa la brtag pa lhur len cing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brang ngo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhigan khyim bdag mgon med/
zas spyin chu bo a rir ba tir khrus byas nas byung ba la/ sa do'i rgyabatubral mos brgyab pa dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong bzhin du nga mi skya b.ra'adug go/ des smras pa/ khyim
bdag khyod ni mkhas pa yin zhing bzod pa dang des pa dang ldan pa yin pas/ des na gter bdag po dang bcasab dang/ bdag po mad pa dang/ thang la yod pa deng/ chun yod pa dang/ gang dag rgyung

b+haM ring pon yodapa dang/ gang dag thag nye ba na yodapa mthong ngo/ des mu stegs can rnams la go bar byas pa dang/ mu stegra can kha tshacan rnams kyis kyang kun tus pas/ khyim bdag mgon mad zas sbyin
nibazod pa dang des pa dang ldan pas/ des na gtarab dag po dang bcas pa dang/ bdag po med pa dang/ thangal yod pa dang/ rgyun yod pa dang/ gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang/ gang dag thog nye ba
na yod pa mthong ngo zhes kun sgra grags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mu stegs can brgya stong phrag byebs

kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dang ldan n/ gteramathong bar 'gyur ba shes par bya ba ma yin no// 'od kyapa'ame bdagamagon med zas sbyin gyimig gi 'bras bu rin po choltar bkra ba dang

dbyig gi skad yod de/ des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang/ bdag po med pa dang/ thangal yod pa dang/ chun yodapa dang/ gang dag rgyal nge bon yod pa dang/ gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo//
'dul bgazhi/// /bam po don drug pa////dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ thetshom thams cad gcodapa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das 'a zhus pa/ btsun pa khyimab gamagon med thas sbyin gyis las ci zhig bgyisan/ las pa'i rnam par smin pas mig gi 'bras bu ren po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan pa ra 'gyur/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyidakyis lasatshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongasasu bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nyabar gas pa/ gdon mi
za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dgabyas shing bsags pas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhanasu zhig gis so so myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong
dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams lanam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams lami 'gyur/ me'i khamasalam 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi
'gyur gyi/ 'di ltaralas dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsagasapa dgan yin pa'i phung podang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams khon la rnam par smin par gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/
chud mi zaba'ang tshogs dang dus/ dan lus can rnamasal// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur bdi/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri'ir zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mngalalongs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzungab/

yangs shing rgya chab/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'granapa zhigaganas te/ des sos ka'i dus la bab pa'i mi ma tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing/ ngang ba dang/ khrung

khrung dang/ rma byadang/ natso dang/ ri skogs dang/ khu byug dang/ shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pazhigasatshal stug po'i skyed mos tshal gyi gzhi nang mi dang lhan cig dong ngo// sangs rgyasarnam
byung ba med pan yang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba 'jig rten rnams kyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyurabs/ ji tshom

na rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song na ri'or der phyinanas/ daskyed mos tshal de'i phyogasashig na 'dugago/ skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mi/ khyim bdag de la smras pa/ dbon po phyogs 'di na rab

[4/]tubyung ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid can zhig bzhugs so// des thos nas de yid dga' bar gyur cing dad pa skyes te/ gang gi skyed mos tshalan 'di'adra ba'i dbatubyung ba gnas panibadag skal ba can yin nosAmamo/
bdag nyid chen po de yang phung po'i lhagam mad pa'imya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas khyim bdag des mdza' bshes dang/ nya dung/ nyen dang
nang mi rnams dang lhan cig tubakur sti chen po byas nas bsrogs/ mde 'o mas bsad nas sa pa de rnams shel las byas ba'i bum pa'i nang du rin po chadang bsres te byugs pa dang/ sa pa de rnams 'od

dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin par gyur to// de nas des drang du gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar rus pa 'di rnams rin po che dang bsres nas shan pu'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin pa de bzhin du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
bdag gi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag jisAm du sems/ de'i de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa da ni/ khyim bdag mgon
mad zas sbyin 'di nyid yinato/ 'dis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa dang/ khyim bdag rgyal gyi bor gyur pa na/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs

kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la nor bu 'barab btags pa gang yin pa de'i las kyirnam par smin pas/ mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing/ dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur to// dge slong dag de
lta bsan las gcig tuganag pa rnams kyi rnam pardzin pa ni bdag tuganag pa yin la/ gcig tudakAb rnams kyi ni gcig tudakar pa dang/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma

yin te/ de lta bas na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ las gnag pa la 'dze na pa dang yin pa rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig khyudakar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis da lta
bu la bslab par bya'o/// ba sdom/ rgyal tsam du gyur/ srid sbyin dang ni phur bu dang/ chu stod da na bza sbyin dang/ phyim pa ni nor bzangs yin/ dbyig rnams dang nags
dngani/gsum po nor bu mu tig yin/ ba dang gos dang nas dngani/ bya ba dbyig gis bsdus pa yin/ gang gi tsho khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bya ba'i gshibs pas gshibs nas gzhon nu
rgyal byed las nyos te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe/ yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dad pa can mchod rten la phyag 'al ba dag mnyan yod du lhags nas/ de rnam
las kha cig mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa 'phags pa bdag cag gis kyang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi slad du/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi rtsol dugazhicung zad brtseg go/ ngag slong rnams kyis
smras pa/ rinagyis sa ltos la rtsigs shig/ 'phags pa rin ci ji tsam sa la lags/ dbyig 'di snyad do// 'phags pa re zhig 'di sud kyi 'byor pa bdag cag la lta ga la mchis/ de lta mod kyi gal
te phyogs 'di thoban brtsig go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag la rtogs la gal de bzhin rtsa ge
shig dge slong rnams kyis khyim bdag mgonamang bas sbyin la brtags pa dang/ des smras pa/ gal te bdag la brten te bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams / dge 'dun gyi phyi bsod nams
bgyi ba'i dngos po brgya u0f7ana stsal to// gang zag gi phyir bgyidi nam stsal to zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa 4 de lta bsan rjes su gnang sta/ dge 'dun gyi phyir na brtsig par bya'o// gang zag gi phyir ni yon bdag brtags te/ gal te byin na brtsig par bya'o// ma byin na btsog par mi bu'o/
glo bur ba'i dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'chil ba dag mnyan yod du lhags pa na/ de rnams smos 'dzin jilta ba bzhin dge slong rnams kyi drung du dong ba dang/ gzhan dag la smos 'dren med pa de dag
pongs par gyur nas/ byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glo bur ba rnams kyi phyir ma bgos pa'i gnas gzhag par bya'o// ri 'or zhigan gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der ngas
slong rnams dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ ji tsaman pa'or der dbyar gyi nang logs su 'khrigs pa byung nas/ de na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams skrag nas dgag dbyas byas
par mnyan yod du lhags pa dang/ de rnams dge slong rnams kyis lam gyi dub pa ngal sor bcug ste/ lam gyi dub pa la sos nas de rnams kyis sbas pa/ dang ldan pa
dag gnas mal skos shige/ de rnams kyis dbyarakyi nang logs yin no snyamanas ma bskos pa dang/ glo bur ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phras byed/ kha zer bar byed de/
tshodang ldan pa dag khyodang ltar ston pa nyid bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam ci/ gal te khyed la 'gyod pa yong na cham rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal byin cig/ de rnams kyis 'on
tsha kyang ma bsgos pa'i skabs do dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka'astsal pa// de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ 'jigs pas thal ba'i
dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gas par dam bca' bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyisam shes na// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zla ba gsum pa'i dgag dbye bya zhing/
dbyar zla tha chung la dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pas phul ba'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o zhes gsu
pa dang/ jitsamana'ajigs pas ral ba'i dgeslong gzhan dag kyang mnyan yod du lhags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnamasakyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas 'jigs pas phal ba'i dge slong rnams la brten nas/ dbyar gas par dam bca' ba bcasakyi/ gsum panam yin no// 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong
rnams kyang smos 'drin ji lta ba bzhin du nga la sor gzhug par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis de rnams las su sko bar byedanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams las su bskobar
mi bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis de rnams la red pa byin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams la rnyed pa ma sbyin no/ (dgeslong rnams kyis kha zas kyi da pa yang m byin pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyisebaka' stsalapa/ de rnams la kha zas kyi med pa ni spyin gyi/ gos kyin pa ni ma yin no// dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang mang du brtsigs pa 'as mnyan yod na
dge slong nyung ngu zhig dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ de rnams stong par 'dug pas sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod las byung ba'i bsod namasamed ceng/ nal phrug rnamasakyis gnas su gyur nas//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thams cad bago bar bya ste/ re sa kyangs sor gnyis sam/ gsum sam/ bzhi ci ran par thams cad la longs spyad par bya ste/ la lar ni snga dro 'dug par
bya'o la lar ni nyi ma'i gung la'o// la laran phyi dro'i/ la larani nub mo gnas par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis lag ga las ma byas pas de rnams 'dums par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal pa/ yonabadag la spro ba bskyed par bya'o// gal te grub na de lta na legs/ gal ma grub par gyur na dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos par bya'o// gal te
minus par gyur nAtutsomanus ba de tsam bcos par bya ste/ gzhan ni btang snyoms su gzhag par bya'o// gang gi tshabcom ldan 'das kyibastan ba rgyas pa gyurapa'i tsho/ dge slong mngapo mnyan yodadu lhag
pa dang/ de rnams gnas khang gis thos par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gsum gyi bsgo bar bya ste/ chu snod bzhag pa dang/ bdag chal dang/ sman dang/ so shing

gzhag pa dang/ phan tshun gyi them skasamagatogs par/ chung nga na 'dug pa'i tshad tsam yang thams cad kyis 'dra bar bgo bar bya// lta spyod na spyi'i yinabanyid pasabago bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong dgamagon pa dang/ shing drung pa dang/ khangastongang/ jisul dang/ brag phug dang/ rtswa'istan dang/ bla gab med pa dang/ dur khrod dang/ nags mtha' dang/ bas mtha'i gnas mal
'di rnams su bsam gtan gyis shig/ phyis yid la gcags par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig ces dgon pa'i bsngags pa mang dugasus pa de tsho/ dag slong bcig dgon pa par dam
ba/ bcasanas dgon pan gnas pa las/ de rnams dang chom rkun pa rnams kyis gtogs par gyur to// gtogasanas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su chos gos tshol ba'i phyir rtson bar gyur
[o ]/bas lumad pa dang/ klog pa dang/ padon pa dang/ rnal 'byor dang/ yid la bya ba nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de dag su nams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ byung ba 'di la
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbeg myong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyi gnas gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyi gnas gzhag par bya'o zhes
gsus ba dang/ dge slong rnams kyis migasal ba zhig tu bzhag pa dang/ dge slong dgon pa pa zhig gis lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas/ sgo bcad de sde mibo blangs nas song ba dang
dge slong dgon pa pa gzhan dag phongs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gsal ba dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi gnas gzhag par bya'o// 'dags khyim
bdagacig gtsug lag khang brtsig tu bcuganas/ nga nang na mi gnas par dge slong glo bur kha gang zhig 'ongs pa de la gnas byin nas red pa ni dag khyed kyis khyer ro/ ci na dag slong chos gos
gsum pa zhig 'ongs pa dang/ des gtsuga'ag khang de stong par mashong nas/ des dris pa 'di sa'i gtsug lag khang yin/ dag so rnams kyis slas ba/ dge slong skudaga'i mni no/de
de'i drung du song nas b.ras pa dang/ des smras pa/ gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug la red pa gang yin pa don khe bo'i yin no// de der gnas te des gtsug lag khang de lan 'ga' yang phyag
bdar ma byas/ ba'i lci ba sar pa'i byug pas ma phyugs so// de ci tsam zhig na gtsug lag khang de nas song ngo// dge slong gzhan zhig khos/ des kyang zhu dga' las banas

nas gtsug lag khang der gnas pa dang/ gtsug lag khang 'di phyag ngar gyi phung bos gang bar mthong sa/ des de phyagab nas phyag dar bor te/ phyags ma 'dzin bzhin du phyag dang gyi phung po'i drung du na
'grengab dang/ jitsom na dge slong gzhan zhig gis de mthong nas des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa khyod phyags ma lag pa na thogs bzhin du de nyid na'agrengangam ci/phyags ma de mi gzhug gam/
ngas smras pa/ 'di na lag pa srung ba 'ga' zhig gnas gnasapa lta ste/ des phyags ma'i rjes kyang med do// des snas pa 'dzin ngag slob chos gos gsum pa cha ge mo zhig gnas
gnas so// ji tsam na des de bsod snyoms la rgyu bamathong nas ma nongs so// des smras pa/ nga pa ni nyo dgas khyer la de'i gtsug lag khang kho bos phyag bdar bya 'am zhes pa'i skabs de dag
slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rnyed ba su khyer ba rjes gtsug lag khang phyag bdar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin/
dag shi ba rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis shi ba rnams kyi phyi tshogs su bcad pa 'don pa na/ khyim bdag cig gtsul lag khang du
[2:; ]'ongs na des de yon sde ba thos nas/ de de'i drung du song ste smras pa 'phags ba gal te bdag gis kyang gtsug lag khang brtsig na/ bdag gi ming gis kyang yonabashad pa mdzad dam/ des
sa pa/ rtsigs shig dang 'a gas par bsngo'o// mitsaman khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsig tu bcug nas/ des der ci yang ma bzhag go/ de stong pa nyid du 'dug pa titsam na khyim bdag
des mthong nas degatsug lag khang du 'ongs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang stong par mchis na 3 de nas yang de mi bzhugs sam/ dag 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras/
ba bzhin bawas snyam pas so// khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa tshe rno can mgon byung rig pa la gal snyam par 'gyur/ khyim bdag de bsams nas ngo bo 2 sla ba ma yin
'on kyang na rnyed pa mad do// des smras pa// 'phags pa nga ni bdag gi gtsug lag khang dusubasu sa ba sa ya gi chenabaskon no// nyengags rud pa thob bo snyam nas gral rims kyis
bab pa na rang gi skal bar byas nas de ni gzhan nying na gnas te/ de ni stong par 'dug go/ jitsumanaTisod snyoms pa mchod rten la phyaga'arma' ba zhigamanyan yod du 'os pa des/ gtsugalag
khang stong pa de mthong nas/ desage slong dag la dris pa: ! kahU~Mb kang ka su' u0f7a na 3 tshe ga kis [' ]ke 'gun gyi gtsug lag khang yin mod kyi/ dge slong ha dga'i skal bar
dbang ngo// de nye dga'i drung du song nas/ khyod kyi skal ba'i gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug go/ des smras pa/ de bzhin byas shage/ de de na gnas pa na bsod snyoms pa de
mkhas pa snyom las mdapa zhig yin pas/ des de nyi ma rer phyag bdar byas so// phyag bdar byed pa la ni phan yon lnga yod de 'di lta ste// bdag nyid sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan
sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang/ lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang mdzes bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bgog pa dang/ lus zhage nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'ojig rten lha rnams
pa su skye bar 'gyur ro// gang dag gis gtsug lag khang de byug pa dang phyag bdar byas pa mthong ba de dag gi khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ des thos nas mchog tudaga' ba
skyesaso// ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang nyid der song na gtsug lag khang de de bzhin du gyur pa dang phyag bdar byas pa mthong nas/ dadad pa skyes// des bsod snyoms pa la ngas yug
chen bskon pa nye dgas thos nas/ de rings par song ste smras ba bsod snyoms pa gtsug lag khapa'ang kho bo'i skal ba yin gyis/ sa yug chen kho bo la byon cig/ pasongaso/
pas bsams pa chags pa'i bdag nyid can 'di la gal bdag gis ma byin yang/ 'onakyang 'dis mthus khyer nas bdag kyang gtsug lag khang nas bskrad par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ ngos
[74 ]la byin pa'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ byung ba 'di la kyi/ na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dad pa skyes nas dad pa'i lhag par/
bya ba byas pa don de kho na'i yin no// dbyar gyi red pa ni nyi dga'i yin no 'jig rten pa yon tan ga la ba la dngaganyid dang/ bu dang chung ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang/ yon tan
dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin bar byed de/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dag song dgon pa witi/ ta na gron du 'bod par byed do// dge slong dgon pa rnams bras la khyim rnamA
su dong ba dang/ ma byin par len pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang nas brkus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan pa[']kyis bka' sul pa/ sgo bcad la lde mig blangs la 'dong bar bya'o//
ma byin par len pa rnams kyis lde mig byas te brkus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdumatshig smong bzhag la 'dong bar bya ste/ de la bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med par
bya'o:mdun bar 'an pa rnams kyis rag song gzhan khrid de 'ongs nas/ sa sgo phye zhes smras nas/ brtson ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rims dang bcas samarims medas
khardabya'o// 'on te rims med ces smra nadabye bar bya'o// gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa pas lom lta mnyam pa gzhag bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa bsalo
zhi/ @#// ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa/ dge slong rnams kyis lo ma ltaramanyen pa ci 'dra ba ma shes nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
ngag lo ma ltar mnyan par khyi yin te/ de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o// dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyis khyi bcangs pa las/ mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang gtsug lag khang sngar mos byung/
nga [u0f10 ]bshang ba dang gcibs ma rung bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgeslong dag ngas dge slong bri srol ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong khri

srol bas nang par sngar las la/ mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang gtsug lag khang khyu' bar bya ste/ sngaramos byung pa gang yin pa de bsam par bya'o// bshangab dang gcib yang phyag par bya'o// dge slopakhri

sral bas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par ma byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lta dga' gtsug lag khang zhig gi dge 'dun gyi
gnas brtan du gyur pa dang/ patsiman der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gzhan zhig 'ongs nas/ nyi dgas bsams pa/ bdag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed byed pa las
gnas brtanaganyisapar bya 'am ) bdag gtsug lag khangagazhan du 'gro'o snyam ste/ gtsug lag khang de nas byung sta/ de gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig tu song ba dang/ de'i gnas brtanaganyis

pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa de de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi yin nas/ des bsams pa/ bdagagidang pa 'di na yang dar khrod lamadapa/ gi rid pa de na yang der brad naspogs mad par dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan

gyis ci zhig bya zhes/ de slar rings pa rigs par gtsug 26ga khang pa keng du so ba dang karman ma lu phung ngaskos ngom nagatsug lag khang du phyin nas des smras pa/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug
lag khang skosashig/ dag song rnams kyis zin to zhes ma bskos pa dang/ nyi dga' sus pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed pa// srin rims ji lta ba bzhin du
gtsug lag khang sos[–]shage ces pa'i skabs de dge slob rnams kyi sa tse ldan lo 3 sa so/9 pa dang 'tshe ko ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig dge 'dun gyi'amamachod
stan gyi bya ba lasong ba zhig yin na/ de'i gnas ma la rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsko bar bya'o// ngazhan gyi rig pa bzhin du'o// nye dga' lhag par chags pasagatsug lag khang gnyis kyi rad
pa thob par 'gyu nga tsho ba ma ras/ ga sa pa sa pa sa a ba la ma ka ma pa mnos pa dang/ gcig nas kyang mthol/ cig shes nas kyang ma thob
nas/ gnasamal 'gyod pa'i dge slong rnams la kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des
dbyar gnas par khas blangs pas de la red pa byin cig/ dge slong rnams kyis gtsugalag khang nyis ka nas kyang byin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
[】 ]pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis nas sbyin par mi bya'o// gcig nas byin pa dang/ dge slong gzhan rnams rtsod par byed/ gzhoga'aphyos byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ gtsug lag khang gnyis kar dbur
lca1 gnas na/ ci'i phyir gcig nas sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas phyad phyad sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gnyis su gnas par
kaM ma mi bca' 'o// dam bca' bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// khyim bdag cig gis gtsug lag khang gnyis brtsig tubacug ste/ gcig ni dgon pa pa rnams kyi mno// cig
shosan grong mtha'i pa rnams kyi yin no// khyim bdag de'i kun tu spyod pa ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dge slongar ri la ras yug chenare re bskon pa yin pas/ de bas yug chen
rnams khyer tu dgon pa pa rnamasakyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang/ 'ga' dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du rnyed pa 'bul 'bo zhes khros nas/ des dga' bo la spring ba/ gal rta 'dird
ba 'bul na skal ba nos shig ces smras nas/ des par dgon pa ba rnamasakyi gtsug lag khang du song ba/ khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsams pa/ 'on gom stangs dang sbyar na dgon pa'i
gtsug lag khang der song gis/ da ji ltar byas n rungasam pa las re zhig grongamathar ba'i gtsug lag khang du phul la/ sa 'di 'bul le sAmanas/ de phyir log nas sa yug po chagram par brtag
pan dga' bos lag pa 'thad pa dang/ khyim bdag gis sa yug po chagacig byin no// mang bzedapa dang/ khyim bdag gis smras pa 'phags pa khyod la sa yug po chaphul lags na/ ci
yang bzhed dam/ sa smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du nye dgas dbyar gnas pas de'i skalab nod do// khyim bdag gas smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/
rang gi laganas sbyin pa la sngags pa mdzad pas/ rang gi lag khen nas 'bul lo// de skyengs nasacapayi smra bar 'dug go/ 'i dgas bsams pa/ khyim bdag de mingazhig thogs na grong
gi mthar ma song gang sAm dubasams nas/ grong mtha' pa'i gtsug lag khang du song nas dga' bo la drisapa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi ras yug bo'i mnos sam/ des ji ltar gyur ba snas
so[c]khyim bdag gis lam gzhan nas dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du song ste ras yug po mgrims nas song ngo// zhe ngaga' yang sar gonaya pa'igatsug lag khang du brgyugasan/ jicom
na ras yug bochanams khrims zim pa dang/ de gtsug lag khang gnyisakyi rang po la lhags par chags pa las/ red pa las nyams nasamyang n byed cing yi muganas smi sngogs 'don/
de/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ gratshom thams cad gcod ba sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 'daga' lhag par chags pas sa/
yugabo che las nyams pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ dge slong dag da ltang 'ba' zhigeg tum zad kyi/ jiltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang lhag par chags pas zas myur
par byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i ngogs gnyis na gtsug lag khang gnyis shig yod do// gcig na ni dge 'dun gyi ring pa'o// cig shosan na bsod snyoms pa rnams

kyi'i []citsem na khyi gaN+Di'i sgrashes pa zhig yod do de gaN+Di'i sgra thosanas/ dge 'dun gyi dad pa yod pa'i gtsug lag khang du song na/ de la dge slopa khacig gis lhung bzad kyi lhagam byin pa dang/ de de zos
nas bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song sta/ dayang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zos nas dga' dgur 'gro'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms pa rnams la glo bur gyi rid pa zhig byung nas/

de rnams kyis snga gaN+Dibardungs pa dang/ khyu des gad+d+hi'i sgra thosanas chu rgal bar brtsams te/ de dbus su byin pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi chud pa can gyi gtsug lag khang gi gaN+Diyang brdungs nas de spro ba mang

nas slar log par brtsams pa las/ de chu rgyun gyis ring du khyer nas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to// dge slong dag rdzasnyam du soms/ de'i tshode'i dus kyi khyi gaN+Di'i sgra shes ba gang yin pa de ni
dga' 'di nyid yinati/ den yang 'di lhags par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to// da lta yapalhag par chags pas gnyis ka lasanyams par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na dge
slong gis lhagaparatsha gas par mi bya'o// byedan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/// sdom la/ 'thab dang nad pa rdzogs pa dang// nub mo'i dus dang ka shig
dang/ shing dang gsing ma 'dug gnas dang/ cha rnams dang ni bsgo ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan bzhi ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ 'di ltar dag slong rnams kyis/
dge slong 'thab krol bgyud pa 2 mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi khospyod pa rnams mamizhing/ de dag ngo tsham mchis pas mtho btsam pa'i slad bdag/
cag la gleng bar bgyid/ dran par bgyid do zhes thos na de rnams kyis de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab krol byed pa
rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos na/ gnas ma la bsko ba gsum dang gnas mal gzung badrug bya'o// gnas mal bsko ba gsum gangazhin/ dgunagyidang/ dpyid kyi deng dbyar gyi'o// gnas mal
gzung ba drug gapa zhen gtsug lag khang thams cad dang/ gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang/ khang phranathams cad dang khang phran gyi rtsa 'khor thams cad dang/ kun dga'i ra ba thams
[f]@#// cad dang/ kun dgar ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang skos shig ces zer/ ) 'dibaskos ban no zhes brjod par bya zhing ) gtsug lag
zla khang gi sku 'khor skos shig can 'di yang bskosazin no// khang phran skosashig can 'di yang bskos zin no// khang phran kya ni 'khor skos shig can 'di yang bskos zin no// kun dga' rab skos
shigacan 'di yang bskos zinano// kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor sos shig chen 'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya'o// de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na/ gang la nyes pa skyed par 'gyur/
'khaM de nas bdo ba rnamasamod/ phyir rgol ba rnamasamod/ mi mdza' ba rnams mad nas/ de'i 'og turgan mas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin
du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang ji tsam na dge slong nad pa gcig cig yod pa debs rjes rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gnas khang bskos te/
de ni thams cad pas gzhon pas de'i gnas khang gzhanan ma thob bo// dge slong des de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas khang 'di kheba'i yin par bskos kyis byung zhig/ des smras pa/ bdag
bro 'chol bsanam sos pa na'o// dgamyongad gtum po zhig pas/ sa phyung nas dag ra zhig go/ ji comanabram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang lta bar 'dod pa lhags pa da rnams kyis dge slong
demathong nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci dog slong 'di gum lags sam/ bzhin bzangs dag 'di'i banam yin no// 'o na ci'i phyi 'dire bzhag/ 'dibs chesarban ba'i dag
slong zhig 'osanas/ 'di'i gnas khang de de'i min par bskos pa dang/ das 'di byung nas 'dare bzhag go/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag khyim ba legs kyang nad pa rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir khyim nas
mi 'byinan/ khyod cag rab tubyung la ston pa yang thugs rje can yinan/ da ji ltar nad paphyir 'byon par byed ces de rnamasaspyod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dag
slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ phyung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag de lta bsanadage slong nad pa la gzhi spyang ba sbyin par bya'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nadapa la gzhisab sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ chodang ldan pa na dga'i mdzal le zhes byas nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ ji tsiman zhag drug gam bzhu
na gnasamal 'gyed par 'gyur pa na/ rkangapa rma byung ba ltar byas te gos kyis dkris nas 'dug pa rang gnas khang 'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams kyis nad pa yin no sAms nas de'i gnas mal
bskos so// de gnas mal bskos zin nas/ rma'agayogs ma bor ta'adug ko/ nad pa lta ba'i rigaslong rnams kyis de la dris pa/ ciganas brtan zhabs sun sos sam/ des smras pa//
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed thams cad nimo rtag pa'o zhes bka' ma stsal lam/ cikhabe'i nad rtag par 'gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtanamyur du sos/
par gyur pa nabar skyanam btab krang/ des smras pa/ kho bo gnas khang sgo drung du gzhug par 'dod dam ci/ dge slong don nyung ba rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/
daltar dge slong dag min bzhin du gnas khang spang b.rang gir byed pa ci thatshig/ ces pa'iskabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na skya'adebs pa'i nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par mi bya zhing/ des rang gir yang mi bya'o// rang gar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro/

lngatshan rnams kyi bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ mdun du bodar dngarang khrims dang// mchags pa dang de bzhin du// snang ba skyadad byung ba dang// bar du gcod dung de bzhin du// phyi mar byas pa ltung ba ste//bsdus pa'i
sdom du bsdus pa yin/// bar sdomanaM/ mdunang bya dang gzhan dang ang/ 2 nang dang gzhan rnams dag dang ni/ sems canamang po phan bya ba// lnga tshan dguni dang po yin/
bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi rnams la mdo sde dang mamo bzhagago/ klu rnams la namado sde'o// 'dul ba'i zabapa zab par snang ba/ mthongabar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ dgos

[4/ ]pa mngab/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang mthun pa yinan/ dge slong rnams kyis 'dul ba bzab pa nyide dang/ dgongs pa mang ba nyid dang/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang mthun pa nyid yin pas 'don par mi spro'o//
'di nitshos nyid yinato/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bstanapa'i yan lag gapazhig yongs su nyams ba de'i bsngagasapa lhag par brjod par mdzad pa yin pas/ danabcom ldan 'das kyis/
dge slong rnams la bka' sul pa/ dge slong dag pa'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gapazhin/ 'khor bzhis mdun du bdar ba yin/ gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pagan/
la rag ma las pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyinang gamadzodasrung ba yin/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan rnams kyi slob la
'dug pa yin/ dam pa'i chos gnas par byaba'i phyir dang bslab pa'i tshod kyi phyir skyes ba mang bo la phan pa dang/ skya bemang po la bde bar zhugs pa yin no// bar sdom// bdag nyid
khrims ldan mangonaparab su// 'gyod pa dang ni bag chamad// chos dang mthun pasad pa ste/ lnga raMnaganyis pa yin par bshad// gzhanayang 'alab 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yodade/
lngagang zhen/ 'di'i rang gi tshul khrims kyi phung pos legs par bsus shing legs par spras pa yin/ 'khor bsamangonasum du bsu bar bya ba yin/ gang zag 'gyod pa skyes pa rnams kyi ston par gyur
pa yin/ dge 'dun gyi rong 'bag tsha ba med pas gnasapa ste/ chos dang mthun pas phyir rgol batshar gcod pa yin no/// b.rasdom na/ ma 'dres don dang nges pa dang/

bslab pa yi ni gzhi dag dang// snang ba dag ni gnyisapo nyidi// lnga [︽]na dag ni gsum pa yin// gzhanayang gang zag 'dulab 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lcagang zhin/ donam 'dres par srol ba yin//

don rnam par gtan la dbas par bya ba la shin tu nges pa yin/ de'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams legs par gzung ba yani/ sems kyi snangab skyes pas mang du gnas pa yin/ skye bo phyi ma rnamasakyisnang ba byed pa yin//
sdom ni/ snang ba gsal ba 'od dang ni// sems las chung dang ma stong pa'o// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yodadi/ lngagang zhan/ phyogs gangan gang zag 'dul
ba'adzin pa gnas pa'i phyogs dngas snang ba skyes pa dang/ gsal ba skyes pa dang/ 'od skyes par mthong/ phyogs der nga thugs khral chung ngur gnas/ phyogs de ngas stong pa ma yin par mthong ngo//
kasdom ni/ byung dang de nas bcas pa dang// rjes su bas dang de bzhin du// bkag dang rjes su gnang ba ni// lngatshan lnga par byas pa'o// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod
de: lnga gangazhin/ byung ba shas/ bcas pa shes/ rjes su bcas pa shes/bkag pa shes/ rjes su gnang ba shes pa yin no/// sdomani/ bar chad bar chad ma yan dang//
gdams ngag dang ni rjes bstanadang// slob ma'amathuni yod pa ste// lnga tshan drug pa dag tu bshad// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzinapa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhen/ bar dugacon pa/
rnams shes/ bar du gcod pa ma yin pa rnams shes/ 'doms pa byed rjes su ston par byed/ lhan cig gnas pa dang rtaganas rnams kyi gnas 'char 'jug nus so/// sdomani/ lhub/

ba dang ni ltung ba min// lce dang mang dpe bzhin du// so sor thar pa rgyas par yang// gdonapa dgan lnga tshan yin// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhen/ ltung ba
byung ba shes/ ltung pam byung ba shes/ lci bshas/ yang ba shes shing/ so sor thar pa'i mdo gdonapa la rgyas par zhugs pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'ibasngags pa gsungs pa/

dang : dag slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams spro ba dang bas bas 'dul ba gdon par brtsams so// de'i tshe tshodang ldan pa na baba'akhor 'dul ba'i gling gzhi dang byung ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu
chung nas/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par byed par 'gyur rosAm ste/ gus pas bstan par brtsams pas/ de lus skya bo bsengabasang por gyur cing/ ridapa dang/ nyam chung
ba dang/ rna bas nyamasadams par gyur to/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mkhyen bzhin du rmad pa mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmad kyi de mimakhyen par mi rmid/ dus su rmod kyi/
dus las g.yol bar mi rmid/ don dang ldan pa rmed kyi/ don dang ma ldan pa mi rmad bste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamasanadon dang ldan pa ma yin pa rje dpa la chu lon gyis bzlog par

mdzad pa yin no// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan par smad pa la dus mkhyen pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smas pa/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge
slong nye bar 'khor lus skya bo bsong bsang por gyur cing/ yid ba dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ rna bas nyam dmas par gyur/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa/ dge slong

tsha gnas brnyan gnasakhananams kyis de shes nas/ spro ba dang bcas pas 'dul ba gangon par brtsams pa dang/ [u0f00]dang ldan pa lta bar 'kher gyis/ ngagasong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub
par bgyid pa 'gyur ro zhes gus pas bstanapa brtsams te/ des na de lus skya bobaseng bsangapor gyur cing/ srid pa dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ bro 'tshal bas nyams dmas par gyur lags so/
byung ba 'dil bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge seng dag pas lung 'bog pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ 'ang 'bogs pa'i dge slong gi spyod 'am rnam bzhi
lung dbog par bya sta/ 'chag pa dang/ 'greng bo dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba na'o// lung nod pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam pa gsum gyis lung nod par bya ste/ gal te lung 'bogs pa'i dgeslong
'chag par lung nod pa'i dge slong 'os la/ gsar bu zhig yinananges phyagabyas la/ khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/ lus btud desams drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsu zhing lung
mnod par bya'o// stachas rgan pa zhig yin na des khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/ lus bcud de sems drang pos gus pa dngabacas pas gom pa bsu zhing lung mnod par bya'o// sta 'greng ban
'os la gas bu zhig yin pa des phyis byas la khams snyoms sam sa dris nas/ stanaches dma' ba la tsog tsog pur 'dugal ) soms drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o// ji ste
rganapa zhig yinanas des khams snyoms sam zhes dris la// lus btud nas sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o// 'grang bal ji lta ba de zhin du 'dug pa dang nyal ba la yang sgyur
bar bya'o// lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gsashanetugoms pa dang/ legs par byang ba dang/ the tshom med par byas nas lungadangog par bya'o// lunod pas kyang shinatubyang ba dang/ shin tu zin pa dang/
'tshom med par byas nas lung mnod par bya'o// lung 'bogs pa'i dgeslong dang lung nod pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs ta'ajugapa mi byed na 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro// drug sde'i dge slong rnams ljongs rgyu zhing rong ban gtsug lag khang zhag tunub mo phyin nas/ de rnams 'grogs bshes ji lta babazhin du dug snyoms kyisal sor bcug pa
dang de rnams kyis smras pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa dag 'dug ste ci byed/ gnas mal bskol babos shig/ de dag gis smras pa ci dgos/ gnasamal skoragazhug mod/de rnams
kyis smras pa/gnas mal yod kyis bde bar nyal zhig dang/ rnams nas bgo'o// de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pas smras pa/ ci khyed cagastonapa bzhugs bzhin du bstanapa nub par byed pas//
gal te khyed la 'gyod pa yod na rgan rimasaji lta ba bzhin du gnasamal skos shig/ de rnams kha stobs can yin pas gnas malasko ba bred nasags mal bskos pa dang/ drug sde de rnams kyis rgan
rims bzhin du gnas mal mnos tu 3la lo// ji tsam gzhon rims kyi bar du so ba de'i bar du nam nas so// drug sde rnams myur ba myur bar langs rtasmras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnasamal sdus/
shige 'dong ngo// dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshodapaldan pa dag khyed kyis nub gcig gi phyir/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' dag nub mo mtho btsam mam/ kye ma'o khyed caga'adi nying du 'dug cig/
de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' ba'i dga' manyan yod du 'dong ngo// 'didegani rlung nad can yin no zhes byas nas dong ba'i skabs dadag slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ byung ba 'di
la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na nub mo gnas mal bsgo bar mi bya'o// gal tanubamo lhagasan 'grogs bshes ji lta ba bzhin so sor bal song gzhug par bya'o/
ul zhig nas dge somachod rten la phyag byed pa zhig mnyan yod du'os na/ de de'i spyod yul la mi mkhas pas nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das

dang dge slong gnas brtanaganas brtan rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs/ de bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro bab tu'u nas de nyid du ra ba zhigagi drung du 'dug nas

zas kyi bya ba bya bar brtsams so// khyim bdag mgon med zas spyin yang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal zhing lam ded nas song ba las/ des de mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa kun nasamadzes pa'abastan pa las rab

chubyung ba yin na ma rigs pa mdzad dam ci/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dro la babacu nyab mamathong ngam 'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod/des smras pa/ khyod ci'i slad du bdag gis khyim du ma byon/ khyod kyi ming/
mgon mdawas sbyin no// khobs mdo sde du dang de rnams las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes thos pa zhig yod kyi/ khyod kyang me shis la khyim yang mi shes so// khyim bdag mgon med lngas sbyin gyis

bsams pa// dgoslong 'di nalam ring po nas 'ongs largyusam shes pa zhig yin te/ gdonami za bar bdag kyang ma shes la bdag gi khyim yang m u0f7a shes kyis/ 'di lta bu la ji ltar byas na ngu ba bcom ldan
'das la zhus la/ gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bya'o mnas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'angs
kyi zhabasaganyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogasagacig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'duganas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad

ces gsol to// dge slong glo bur ba spyod yul ma 'tshal ba zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro yol du nye nas ra ba zhig gi drung du g.yar zas kyi bgyi ba bgyid de/ ma dang pa rnams yan lag 'dis 'phags pa rnams

la smod par 'gyur ro// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis gang yang mnyan yod nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol gyi bar gyi bar bar dubaste gnas brtsig par bgyi ste/ gang zhig gang du dro bab pa
dade bsod snyoms longs spyad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis rtsibs shig/ ngas gang yang mnyan yod nas/ rgyal byed kyi tshal

e gyi bar gyi bar bdu khasti gnas dag brtsigs nas dge slong gang zhig gang du dro bab pa de der bras kyi bya ba byed do// dgo slong gzhanadag chus phongs par gyur nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dar khron pa
brkos nas/ aMbagasum dang 'bras bu gsumakyis shing rta bkang ste btab pas/ chud ro phun sum tshogasapa gyur to zhes 'jig rten thamasacad daklags pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas lhags pa/ dge slong
rnams kyis 'gags pa dang/ mnyan yodan gnas pa rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phagasapa khyed cag la bdag cag gis yo byad tham cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ chab 'ajig rten thams cad kyi thun mong khyer 'gog/
par mdzad dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bgag par mi bya'o// bud mad dge slong rnamasal ban dbye/
slong rnams kyis ma byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsalapa/ sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kun nas zhags pa ste/ bdud kyi 'ching ba yin no zhes gsungs pas/ dge slong

nams bud med la nusbyin par byed pa na chags par gyur to// ci tsoman bdamed byadabazhin dang lang tshos rgyags pazhag/ dge slong gzhon nu zhage la shin tu chags pas de la rlubaslangs pa dang/ de yang de la
chags pas bcis pa'i sems kyisasar bzlog kyang rgyun ma bcad par blugs te/ de yang de la rtog bzhin 'khrungs pa las chu de gler song nas shi'o// don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhog
'phyas byed// kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa/ bum dag pa zhig chag blakhanges ba'i soms
kyis dge slong lamuslong ba de la rang gis sbyin pami bya'o// bud med la churgyunamachad par sbyin par mi bya zhing sum pa khong la 'thung zhig ces bsgo la/ skabs skabs su gcad cing blugs par
bya'o/ (gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/// 'dul ba gzhi//bam po don bdun pa/// de'i tshig dag bsod snyoms
[© ]/kyi thog ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol dudabul ba de rnams kyis de nyid du dbul bar brtsams pa drug sde rnams kyis thos nas de rnams bsti gnas su dong sa 'dug nas/ bsod snyoms

kyi thog mar khyer 'ong ba gang yin pa de la rmas te gal te 'o thugayin nani lhung bzed bzod par byed do// ci ste mu thug yin na ni 'phrul chen po'i dge 'dun dang/ mthu chenapo'i reg 'dun la phul cig ces
sma'o: de bzhin du shugs kyibaca' ba la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya ste/ don nyung ba'i dge slonganams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gzhan gyurd pa la kha brngam mi bya'o// kha brngam byedan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan

'angs kyis dge slong gis gzhan gyi red la kha brngamami bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dge slong kha cig dgos pa zhig lagatsug lag khang gzhan du dong sta/ de rnams der phyin pan dro la bab kyang 'gyod pas 'chos
ma spyad pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das lagasol pa dang/ byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmad du bsams te 'grobar mi bya'o// ma bsams pa losab las

gal te drol bab par gyur na longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mkhye'o// khong ba dang bcas pa'i dus byung ban dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ba las don dgeslong de rnams las spyod
bamathong nas gang bza' bar 'dod pa las 'gyod pas los mi spyod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsalapa/ ga
lag khang snga mar de blas la/ de yang gal tatshad med pa zhig tu 'dim na blang bar bya'o/ ji ste dge slong tshad yod par byas pa zhig yanen blang bsamabya'o// len na 'gal rmobs can du 'gyur ro//
de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi'i ljos rgyu zhing gshegs panari nag po la gshegs so// de'i tshe ri nag po la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis gnas te/ de gnyis kyis ya
ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dunadang thabs cig tu yul ka shis ljongs rgya zhing gshegs shing 'dir gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes thosaso// khros nas kyang bsams ba/ ston pa'i spyan sngar dge slong paNaM/
mdapa dang ) 'dzem pa med pa rnams kyis bdag cag la gleb byed/ dran pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi gtsug lag khang chenapogacig ma gtogs pa dge slong
rnams las brtsams te/ gsamal bsko ba gsum dang/ gnas mal gzung ba yang phyag bya'o/ gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhen/ dgun gyidang/ phyid kyi dang/ dbyar gyi'o// gnas mal/
gzung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang thams cad dang/ gtsug lag khang ga 'a'akhor thams cad dang/ khang phran thams cad dang/ khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang/ kun dga' ra ba thams
cad dang kun dga' ra ba'i nyi'akhor thams cad bskobar bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang skong shig ces smras pa dang 'debaskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing/ khang phran
skos gcen/ dayong bskos zinano// gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shige con/ 'di yang bskos zinano// khangaphran gyi rtsa 'khor skos shig ba na/ 'di yang bskos zaneno// kun dga' ra bskosashage
na 'di yang bskos zinano// kun dga' ra ba'i 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya ste/ da rnams gnas mod de mi gnasan ngo tsha mad pa 'dzem pa med pas bdag cag la
gleng bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang/ gnas mal gzung ba drugabyas so// cingamanabcom ldan 'das ri nag po lagashegs na/ de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'as

kyi gtsug lag khang ni snga nas bsdogs phyin no// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa// tshodang ldanupa dag gnas mal dang gtsug lag khang skos shika/ dganyis kyis smras pa (gtsug lag khang sngarab skos zin

no khang phranaskos 'ge/ de yang skos zin no// gtsug lag khang gi 'khor skos shige/ de la bskos zin no// kha phran gyi nyil kho skos shige/ de yang bskos zin no// kun dga' rab skos shig de yang bskosazin no// kun dga' r ba'i 'khor skos shin

bsos zinano// gangagi phyi rigasakyi gnub+bamA cad maskos pa dang/ de nas kun dga' kha med dusgramathon po dang slachapo byungo// sas sa yomaldan 'aawam+panamekhyen bzhi'i chedapa mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par mismid 1 dusasu chod kyi
dus las yol ba mi rmad/ don dang ldan pa rnyed kyi/ don dang mi ldan pa mi rnyed pas/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa ma yin parmad pa la chu lon gyis bzlog pa mdzod
payigeno// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adasa rnams don dang ldan pa rnyed pa de la dus mkhyen pa yin pas/ sas rgyasabcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' kho la rmas ba/ kun dga'
kun dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogasachen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen por grags pa 'di zhig yin/ des gso'akha pa/ dge slong 'gro 'gyogs dang nab so gnyis kyis gnas mal btso nga gsum
dang: gnasamal gzung ba drug bgyi na/ge slong rnams kyis gnas mal ma thob par gyur to/ des na kun dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chenapo 'di grag lags so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas 'thab krol byed pa'i dge slong rnams la dgongs nas// gnas mal khaso ba gsum dang/ gnas mal gzung ba drug mdzod kyi/ rang bzhi/
du gnas pa la nim yin pas/ de lta bas nadage slong rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las brtsams te/ gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang/ ga mal gzungab dru ta bya'o/
byed na 'gal tshabs du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyasabcomaldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dunudang thabs cig tu yul kosala'ilces rgyu zhing gshegs pa nA/ gropemadapa'i dgon
[© ]/pa zhig tu nub mo dgos btab bo// drug sde rnams kyis bcom ldan 'dasakyiphyir shing bzang po zhig bzhag nas/shingabazang po gzhan ni nga nga gis bzung ngo// ge slong
gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis ni nang khong stong dag zlob bo// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyalakyis thob nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang chas tabasus/ sa bcom ldan 'das
[ ]kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas// dge slong gnas brtan gnas u0f8brnyan rnams la brtags na/ ji tsaman drag sde rnams ni shing bzang po dag gi drung na gnas la/ gnas u0f8brtan gnas brtan rnams
kyi ni shang khong stong rnams mthong nas/ nges 'jal lo zhes byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol te/ phyogs gcig
ju 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu'adug nas/ ko la'irgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gtso bo
lags te/ tshul mtha' dag nas 'byung ba'i rin po che rnams las/ thams cad kyimag gi dngos po gang lags pa de ni bdag gi lags la/ lhag ma rnams las ji ltara'atshalab bzhin dums
brang dang/ gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ khrom gyi ru ba rnams kyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyang bla nam mas pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags/ 'phags pako'u di rgya dang/ shA ri'i bu dang/
mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang/ 'od srungadang/ kun dga' bo dang/ nam gru la sogs pa nyanathos chen po rnamasazhugs shing khong stong rnams kyi drungan mchis la/ drug sde rnamasakyi nizhugs shing/
bzang chos lags kyis/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba chu ba bzungs zhugs shing 'a rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin gyi bca' ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldanu'adas kyis kos
la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// denas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsalargyal spyi 3 bcom ldan 'das cang ma gsungabs gnang bar riganas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stanalas lasanas song ngo// byung ba 'dil bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag delta bas na shing rnams dang/ sang budang/
gsangam rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin bsko bar bya'o// bcomaldan 'das kyisashing dang/ sang ngu dang/ gsang ma rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/
dge slong rnams rang nyid sko bar byedanas/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa ]gnas khang sgo ba'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyi phal pa las bskos nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsalapa/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i gi slong gtsug lag khang 'byed par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o// bsos pa ni byung bar bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro bdang/
zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang/ gti mug gas 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas 'gro bdang/ gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang/ ma bskos pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan/

panigatsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa'i bsko bar bya'o// bskos pani dbyung bar/

mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas ma 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang gis mi 'grob dang/ gtimug gis mi 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas ma 'gro ba dang/ gtsug lag khanga'askobs padang mabaskos pa shes pasta chos 'diwo
dang ldan ban gtsug lag khang bskopar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pani dbyung bar mabya'o// bskoban 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te/ gaN+Dibasdus la/ se pa'atshog gis dge

slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang/ re zhig thogam spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sgo bar spro 'am/ de
gal te spro bar gyur na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsunapa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsug lag khang
skob dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dag 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sgo bar spron/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzodan/ dge 'dun gyisaganang bar mdzod cig dang/ 'di ltar dge 'dun
[n ]gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang skyo bar bsko ba mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las bya ban dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsugalag khang sko ba dge slong ming 'di zhes

bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sgo bar spronas/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di gtsug lag khang skabar bskosan/ tshe dang ldan pa gangadag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi
ba 'di gtsug lag khang skyo bar bsko bar bzod pa de dgan cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag ma bzod pa de dag ni gsusashig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di
zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang skyo bar bskos te/ 'di ltar cang ma gsubs de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gtsug lag khang 'gyed pa ji lta nga bzhind byus la skyob dang/ thug pa 'dris
pa dang/ bag chos 'jim pa dang/ phranatshogs 'grim pa dang/ snod spyad 'jub pa dang/ gos sprad pa dang/ gos 'gyed pa dang/ dbyar gyi sachen skyed pa dang/ dbyar gyi ras chen 'gyed ba dang mngag
gzhug ba dang/ mdzes chos pa yang de bzhin// chos lnga dang ldan wa'i dag slong ma bskos pa nibasko bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// ldag zhen/ 'dunapas 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang
gis 'gro ba dang/ gtumug gis 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang/ mdzes pa dang mamadzes pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes chos par ma bskos pa nib/
bar mi bya'o// bskos pan dbyung bar bya'o// yang sa lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes chos par ma bskos pa nibasko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung par ma bya'o// lnga gapazhan/
'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang gso ma 'gro ba dang/ gtimug gis mi 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang/ mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa shes pa ste/ sa 'dilnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mas chos par
ma bskos pa nibasko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni byung bar mi bya'o// gtsug lag khang dang bras 'gyed dang
thug pa 'dri ma dang bag chos dang// phran tshogs snod spyad sbyad pa dang// chos gos gnyis dang de bzhin du/
dbyar gyi lasachen sngad pa dang// 'gyed pa dag dang mngag gzhug dang// de bzhin du ni mdzes chos te// gang zag bcu gnyis yin par bshad// gnas mal gyi gzhirdzogs so//

rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i gzhi'i sdom la// 'thapa dang 'gyod pa'i rtsod pa dang// rtsa ba gang dang dge ba dang// 'byed pa yin la rtsod min dang// 'byed pa dusan zhi ba dang// 'gyed pa mngon sum zhi ba dang// tshul
shing dag ni byung ba yis// gdams ngag mdabamangonasum dang// dran dngam myos 'dul 'os dang// de yi ngo bo tshol gzhug dang// lcu bkram lta bu r 'ong ba yis/ dga' dun dganamathunapa yis// de bzhi/

bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rnams bden pa la bkod pa de'i tshe/ danams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du 'dong bar byedango// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de rnams la yang dang yang du chos 'chadapar
mdzad do// rgyal pos gtsang gi kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya'i tshogasakyis bsko nas// bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du 'gro bar byedado// jitsam dus gzhan zhig nabcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya

phrag duma'i gung 'bazhugs nas/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu'i chos bshad pan/'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan pa stan pa'ichos nyan par byed do// rgyal

bo zasagatsang yang chosamanyanapa'i phyir/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang/ rgyal po'i mthu chen pos shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ des chos mnyan nas song ngo// de nas/

shAkya ming chen gyis/ bcom ldan 'dusakyi spyan snga nas chos mnyan to dang paskyes nas rang gi khyim du song ste smras pa/ kyama'osangs rgyas/ kye ma'o chos/ kyama'o dge 'dun/ sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras

bu dang bcas pa yin no// mang chen gyi chung ma dam pas smras pa/ rdzo'i sras de ci lags/ des smras pa/ dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du 'do'adra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/
da thos las srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po rtogs so// des smras pa/ rje'isras sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras bu dang bcas pa yan no zhes gsusapagangalags pa demadad/ sang
rgyas byakhan khyed cag kho na la 'bras bu dang bcas lags kyi/ bdag cag la na mo lags so// ci'i phyir 'deltar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenang nyungab ni/ skyes pa rnams kyi phyir/

lags kyi/ bud med rnams kyi phyi rim lags so// des smras pa/ bzang mo de skad ma smra zhig/ bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang thugs brtse ba yinagyis song zhig dang/ khyod kyis kyang
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos thos par 'gyur// des smras pa/ lhashAkya'i tshogs kyis bskoranas/ bcom ldand la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum dubazhud la/ lha'i mdun dumangonasum du bdag
gis chos mnyanapa g.yar tsha lags so// 'di ltar gal talha snga drolan cig bzhud na/ bdag gis kyang srid bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyanapa bgyi'o// shAkya mang chenagyis bsams pa/ lha la gsol
gyis 'gro'o snyam pa las/ yang bsamasapa/ rang gi chung ma'i ched la lha la gsol ba byed mi phod kyis/ lha ni gu'i bdag mo chen mo la bkur ste mang du byed do/ de'i tshig nyan par 'gyur bas/ dol don
'di rig par bya'o snyams/ de skye dgu'i bdag mo chenamo ge'i ta ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u tami la don dems pa dang/ des smras pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ lhal

ts+tshA gsol ba bgyi'o// de nas shAkya ming chen khyim du song nas/ shAkya rnams kyi chung ma rnams lasmras pa dang/ de nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma dang/ gzhan dag gi chung ma rnams skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gan

ba der song ste phyinanas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta ma la 'di skad ces smras so// go'u ta mi mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag cag gis bcomaldan 'adas 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun dusunapa snyanapa'i
mos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngasam lta bu bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbangapo rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das lasasan pa stan pa'i chos nyan no zhes thos nas/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das
las chos de thos par 'tshal gyis/ bdag cag gi phyiralha la ci nas kyang lha ni snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhud la/ bdag cag kyang snyad dros che bar gsol ba mdzod cig/ desaas pa/phu nu

mo dag khyed kyisasems bskyed pa legs te/ rgyal po zas gtsapal brtag gis skad cig sdodacig/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u dmargyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gcong la

'di skad ces skyasaso// lha mkhyenapar mdzod ciyo// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag dumatshigangal bzhugs nas/ snyanab snyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya

phrag du ma dbang po rnamasam g.yo pas/ bcom ldan 'das lasasnyanabastanapa'i chos nyan no zhes thos/ shAkya'imachis brang rnams kyis kyang de skad thos nas/ de rnams chos nyan par 'tshalan/ lhani snga dro

bcom ldan 'adas kyi spyan sngar gshegs pa'i rigs so// bdag gis kyang shAkya'imachis khring rnams ded de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngaraslad dro mchibar bgyi'o// deci'isnang du zhen/ snga dro ni di rnam
sdum pa'i bgyi ba dag baspyod pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchiba'i skabs mams so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i kun tuspyod pa ni/ gang gi tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo
go'u ta mis tshig smras pa de'i tsho lus kyi spu zing zhes byed nas langs te/re zhig skye dgu'i bdag monamo tshig gi lan ma byin pa de'i bar dum 'jug ba yin pas des mgo bos btud nas smras pa/ go'u tu

mibaka' bzhin 'tshol/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chenamo go'u ta mang+gashAkya'i chung ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyanasnga chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo// dza

rtsoman shAkya mang chen gyi chung ma yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas de na lhan cig song ste/ gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas/ 'dod chags dang ma bral ba dag chags pa skye

bar zhugs pa de/ tshe dang ldan b kun dga' bos mthong nas smras pa/ sring mo re zhig khyod kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs nyid kyang bzang mo blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yinan/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan palta
smos kyang cu ges/ khyod rgyan gyis brgyan te 'dir 'ong pa gang yin pa nim legs ba zhigabyas taM/ bdag nyid chenapo 'di dag ni thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba lon yang ma yin no zhes/ ngol
ngoskad ces smras pa dang/ ngo tshabasang la phog pas spyi bo smad nas mtha' gcig tu songs ! rgyananams bkrol nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las/ de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo bskyod ma zhes

bya ba dang de lhan cig chos mnyan pa'i phyire'ongs pas// dus de la bos te sbas pa/ bskyang ma song la rgyan 'di dag khyim du zhog 'angashog cig/ de ranges par song nas des khyim du bzhag ste slar 'ongs so// de
nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta ma 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabasaganyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshalanas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos bshad pa

mdzad do// chos bshad pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ rdzitsam na shAkya'i bu ma zhig mgul panamu tig ga do shal brtags pa lamar ba myur bar lta zhing lag pasanom par byed do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rtag

pa dpaldan pa'i chosabashad par brtsams so// 'on kyang de chos la mi gtod kyi/ mu go gi do shal khon la rtog par byed do// ming chen gyi chung ma dam pas/ shAkya'i bu momagul pa na mu tig gi do shal btab/
ba lamyur myur bar rtogapar byed pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'ang sAm du soms taM/ nyon mongs 'di 'du byed rnams 'diltar ma rtag par bshad na/ mu tigage do shal 'di la lhag par chags te myur ba

myur bar brtag tu ci yod/ gal te bdag gi mu tig gi 'phrang ba mthong na 'di'i rgyags pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo bskyod ma la smras pa/ bskyang masong la
kho mo'im dag gi do shal myur du khyer tashog cig/ de chos nyan pa la sems bsdus pas/ de 'dasAms dusems ) kyi hud 'di 'dra ba'i chos 'chad na/ 'dag rdzo mos mgas pas chos kyi bar chad/
03 bzla// byung bar gyur taM/ mdor nabran gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni sdug snyam du bsams nas/ sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde bsagadungs pas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang yang

sdig pas de ring rgyal zhal blta ba dang// bde gshegs zhal nas dri mad chos mnyanami thob pa// bran dngos zhal dbang sdug bsngal mang po 'chad de// bdag gi 'tsho ba ston byas las kyashes thob pa na// de nas bcom

ldan 'das 'di snyam du gongs te bu mo bskyod ma 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin mod kyis/ tshecubazhag yod pas 'di 'khor ba'i btson ra nas dbyung bar bya'o snyam du dgong
nas rdzu 'phrul gyis ni 'gro nga la// dag ma skye ba byung ba ni// 'jig pa yin par bsams nas su// ngas gsus pa yi dge ba la// brtson 'grus bskyed nas mnyan par bya// zhes bris nas byon no// de nas/
bu mo'askyod ma dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rangs pa dang/ yidi bde ba skyes nas/ tshigs su bcad pas smras bzhin sangs rgyas la dmigasapa'i sems kho nas song ba dang/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang

ni49chud mi za b.lang tshogs dang dus// de na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// ces bya ba yin pas/ tshecung zhig yod pa'i las tshogs pa red de/badras ma zhig gis bsad do// desad+ma

rgyasal sems mngon par dad par byas ten bas/ sing ga la'i gling dusing ga la'i rgyal po'i btsunamo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur to/ gong gi rim la nying mtshams sbyar ba de kho na'i nyin par mu tig
gi char pa bab bo// rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug sta smras pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa dang/ lha 'disams can zhig btsumo'i lhums su zhugs pa de'i mthu 'a gsaso// mi tshom namang

gyismin par bya ba'i phyir te/ sgra mad du mi 'ong bcung zad kyang mi grag cing/ grang ba na grong pa'i yo byad dang/ dro ban dro ba'i yo bud dang/ smanapas bstan pa'i kha zas ha cang khal ma yin pa dang/ ha cang skul

ba ma bzhi pa dang/ ha cangalan tshacan ma yin pa dang/ ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa dang/ ha cang rtsub pa ma yin pa dang/ ha cang bskabs yin pa dang/ kha ba dang/ skya ba dang/ lanamo dang/ mngar ba dang/ rtsub bam

bska ba rnams spas pa'i kha brasakyis bsnyen bkur byed cing/ ngoshal dang somo des lus brgyan nas/ lha'i bu mo dga' tshal na grub bzhin du khri nyes khri po/ khru'u nas khribang 'gro zhing/ 'og gi sa la
'bab par ma byedado// de zla ba brgyad dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba )mas pa/ blta nasdug pa zhig btsas te/ gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyin par yang mu tig gi char bab nas/ rgyal
bos bsam pa/ 'di ji ltar bu mo'i mthusuyu tig gi char bab pa ni nyid kyi mu tu'i du'agyur bzhis des de nyid labyin no// de nas nyid ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/
mo'i ming rigadags sa ming 'dogs par byed do// blonapo rnams kyis sbas pa/ gang gi phyir 'di'i mthusamu tig char bab pas/ de bsan bu mo'i ming mu tig can zhes gdags so zhes
de'i ming mu tig can zhes bya bar brtags te/ bumolu gzhan ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ pang na 'tsho ba'amam gnyis dang/ num snyanapa'i mam gnyis dang/ ma 'phyi ba'i lam

[】 ]gse dang/ rtse 'grogs kyi mamaganyis te/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ zhunamar dang/ mar gyi snying po dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gsasring bar byed

skyed par byed cing )rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+mabazhin myur du skyod par byad do// de gang gi tshan mo gyur ba'i tshe rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa dang gnas pas/ rgyal po nang ma dang bcas pas lhag par bkurasti byed/

do/ datsam dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams kyisos nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgyu mtsho'i gru 'o chobasgrubs te/ rgya mtsho chenapor zhugs pa dang/ de rnams gru bo chaphanaphunamed par rlung gi shugs kyis sing ga la'i

gling du phyin to// de nas snod rnams mkhos su phab ste/ rgyal po'ilobrang dang ha cang yang mi lo bzhig tu bra btab bo// de rnams kyis mtshan mo'i thunatham la ched du brjod pa dang/ pha rol 'gro byedadang/ bden pa mthong

ba dang/ gnas brtanagyi tshigs su bcad pa dang/ gnas brtan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa dang/ ri gnas kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang/ thub pa'i tshigs su'acad pa dang/ don gyi tshoms kyi mdo rnams rgyas par 'don pa/

la zhugs pa/ mu tig can khyim gyi nang na 'dug pas skar khung nas thos nas/ de nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha yul dbusakyi tshong pa dag mchis nas mnyid snyan par len no// rgyal pos blon po dag la bsgol/ shes
ldan dag glu ma khon rnams khug cig/ de rnamasabakug pa dang/ mu ga can gyis sbas pa/ sa ldan dag yul dbus kyi rolamo che'adrab khomos mnyan gyis long zhig/ de rnams kyis smras l/ lhamo'ag/
cag ni rol mo mkhanam lags te/ bdag cag ni mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rlug shugs kyis 'di mchis pa lags te/ bdagacag gis mtshan mo'i mthun tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi gsung btonano// mu tig can

gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas snying dga' khesab spu thams cad zing zhes byed de/ de ngo mtshar skyes nas drisapa sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ do rnams kyis sangs rgyas

kyi ri ba'i bdag nyid rgyas par smra bar brtsams te/ lha mo shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gas ri'i ngos dang ba/ chu bo skal ldan shange 'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring bzhig tubyung
sto : de bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyuran/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhi rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal bo chos dang

ldan pa/ nipo tshi sna 'dun dang ldan pa gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di ltabudag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ 'khoralo rin po che dang/ glang po rin po che dang/ rta rin po chadang/ nor bu rin po che dang/
bud mang po chedang/ khyim bdag rin po che dang/ bdun pa blon po ni po che'o// de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gagazugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi ste rab tu 'joms pa stong
yang tshang bar 'gyur zhing/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sdo ba mad cing/ 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad ba mad cing mtshon gyis 'da' ba med la/ chos dang mthun

pa zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyimanas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyuran/ de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasazhes bya bar 'jig rtenang skya rnam par grags par 'gyuraro zhes lung bstan te/ de lta bu de ni sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba lags so// mu tig can gyi
smras pa/ gang gi tsho khyed cag yul du 'dong ba de'i tshe khe mo lasngon cig/ dems kyis smras pa/ lha mo bka' bzhin 'tshol/ sbran par bgyi'o// jitsam na de rnams yul du 'dong ba'i dus la bab nas/ de
rnams kyis mu tig canasbran pa dang/ des bcom ldan 'das la mi ge gsol pa/ lha nga lhamanam yas phyag bgyis pa// skyid skrun dang bsangs las sa byupazhing/ gtso bo krags pa rgya cher rab
grags pa// drang srong 'dung rtse 'i cha las thugs rjes gnong// zhes gsol to// de nas yi ger tshong pa de rnams kyis khyer nas/ rims gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang 3 lam gyis nga la b.lasos nas:
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der songs phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mnyan yod kyitshong pa'am/
kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// btsunang sing ga la'i gling na ( si+og 2'i rgyal po'i bu mo des mchid ya gi gsol pa 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mu tig can 'dul/
ba'i dus mkhyenanas/ nyid kyis blangs te bklags so// bklags nas bka' stsal pa/ gang gatsho khyed cag slar 'drong bar gyur ba de'i tsho/ 'a snyan du gsol cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
tshong pa rnams kyis/ brjom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lam khos phyag byas dong ngo// de nas zong bsgyur te bsgyur ba'i phong zogasanas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi spyan sngar song gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag mchin/ bdag cag gsemu tig can la ji skad bgyi/ bka' stsal bar gsolag btsom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu legs par byi dor byas pa'i sa dang sa mo
ma ban dag khug cig/ de rnamasakyis gras dang rimo mkhan ga bkug nas phul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan bris shig/
ri mo mkhan rnams kyis las rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs t+tAnan bri bar brtsams pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa yin pas/ rimo mkhan rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs banan bribadzam nusanas kacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa ston cig dang 'od gatang ngo// de rnams kyis ras bstan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adus kyi 'od
btang ba la ri mo mkhan rnams kyisatshon rtswa sna tshogs kyis rgyas par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi 'og lcagasum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang//
bslab pa'i gzhi snga rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan laga'acu gnyis po lugs dang mthun pa dang/ 'dugs dang mi mthun pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bris so// gong du ni
tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po// brtsams par bu zhing 'byung bar bya// sas rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya// gang zhig rab tu
bag yod pas// chos 'dul 'de la spyod 'gyur ba// skyo ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur// zhes bris nas/ sing ga la'i rgyal po la bka' yig spring ba/

sa la rimo bris pa/ ngas mu tig can la skyes su bskur ba yin gyi/ khyod kyis de la sa phyogs yangs shing rgyatshabar sing/ 'a'i gling na gnas pa'i skya bo'i tshogs bsdus la bkur sti chen pos ngas 'ad khrom/
shig/ tshong pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gal tamu gcan 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs bkan yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te 'og ma 'di ci yin zhes
'drin/ 'di dag ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang/ lugs dang mthun pa dang/ 'gros dang mi mthun pa'i rtan cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog
ba pa'o: 'di ni dud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gong ma 'di ci yin zhesalAphrin spro bar bya ba yin te/ gang zhig skyabs su 'gro ba dang//
bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te lugs dang maskrun pa dang/ lugs dang ma mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'dil rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de/ bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thob nas
sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mnyananas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan ldan
dong ngo// de nas dge mtshan dang/ bkrashase dang/ bde legs su gyur ba dag byas te/ zong khyer nas sing ga la'i gling du song// ma gyis sing ga la'i gling du phyin nas/ lam gyis dub pa la bsos/
te/ rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te yi ga byin no// rgyal pos yi ga blangs tabaklags nas grong khyer de rdob dang/ gsog ma dang/ gyo mo bsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag

btab/ rgyalamtshan dang ba dan bsgreng/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ shinatuprazhim pa'i pog po zhi bar bzhag/ me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ sing ga la'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsogs nas/

de nas bkur sti chen po byas te/ grong khyer gyi dbus su rin po chesna bzhi las byas pa'i sang ge'i khri bshams te ras phye ba dang 3 skya bo'i tshogs chen pos/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la/
phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsang bstod de smras so// de nas rgyal po'i bu momu tig can dad pa drag pos gtad pa'i snying gsal spu bring zhes byed cing mig mchi mas gang bas zhabs gnyis
la gtugs te/ tshong pa rnams la dras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di phyi yin/ denams kyis smra bar brtsams pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gabrugs b.ranalags so// 'og ma 'di dag ci yin 'din+ti
gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang/ lugs dang mthun pa dang/ lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o// 'dini bdud rtsi rtogs
par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags so// gong ma 'di ci yin/spro bar bgyi ba lags te/ gang zhig skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te/ lugs dang mthun pa
dang lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i lam thob nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur pa
lags so/ de nas chu gcan gyis rten cing 'brel por 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang lugasadang ma mthun pa bsam par brtsams te/ rdzisade lan gsum ma bzlas pa de'i
