bar du dus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mthob yo shes kyi rordzis bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngonasum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa//
ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// shes rab mig ni rnam spyas pas// gangal 'di 'phra'i gsol ma' ba// sman mkhas de la phyaga'al lo// ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/
lta ba'i ri bo drungs phyungasta// lta ba'i zug rngu sal mdzadapa// sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras nas// tshong pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// ngashes ldan dag

khyed cag rnam 'dong ba de'i tsho kho mo la sgron cige/ de nas tshong pa rnams kyis zong rnams bsgyur te/bsgyur ba'i thong rnams khyer nas mu tig can gyi drung dusong ste/ lha mo bdag caganamaNin/ bdag
gis ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal pa gsol/ des smras pa/ khomo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyizhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag tshol la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam ngab nyung ngam/ 'tsho'am/
spyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang/ bde ba dang/ sku nyams dang ldan nam// bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhusal 'daskadatses/ btsun pa dge ba'ibashes gnyen gyis bgyi ba gang lags ba de/
bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad de/bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas rnams las ni rkang ba phyung/ lha dang mi
rnams su ni bzhag/ 'khor ba las ni rgyang bsringes/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgyu mtsho ni bskams/ sa pa'i ri bo las ni bsgal/ ngan song gi sgo ni bkum/ mthoras dang thar ba'i sgo ni phya thogam ma
na@#// mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba shes kyi rdza rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa/
bdagan 'phagasaso// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchims/ dge bstan du gzung du gsol// dengs chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar
du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchibar dang na/ mngonapar dad lags so zhes gsol la/ mu tig khregasum po 'di khyer la cha gcig ni sangs rgyas la/ cha gcigan chos la/ cha gcig ni dag 'dul
thul cig/ de nas tshong pa do rnamasakyis zong dang skyes bsku ba yang khyer tu dong nas/ rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang/ lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song/
zhabs gnyis la gtugasan// ji skad spring ba bzhin bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// btsun pa skyes su phul ba'i mu tig phregasum 'di lags te/ mu tig
cha gcig ni sangs rgyas la/ cha gtsigachos la/ cha gcaganadage 'dun la phul lags so// tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa skyes 'di gang nasamachis/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis shAkyaming chen gyi mngag gzhugamabaskyadamazhes bya ba/ nga las chos mnyananas song ba las/ lam kar ba drus mas bsad pa
mthongam/ btsun pa mthong lagar so// des nga lasems dang ba bskyed pa'i bas/ sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can zhes bya bar gyur// bden pamathong nas des skyes bskur ba 'di yin no//
'di las sangs rgyas kyi skal ba gang yin pa des dri gtsang khang gi zhal zhal byos shig/ chos kyi gang yin pa de ni chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la'o// dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis
mnyam par bgos shig dgeslong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsunab mu gcan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/
desan bran mor gyuralags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na rgyal po phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag zhu
tig can 'di nyid kyis lasatshogs dpa/ rkyen yongs su bskyarab/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdonami za bar byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ mu tig can 'di nyid kyis
lasabyas shing bsags pa dgagazhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dgan phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams
la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di lta las dge ba dang mi dge ba dgabyas shing bsags pa jagani zin pa'i phungapo dang/ khams dang/ mched
rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur tu/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dus dang // med na lus can rnams la// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//

dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skyo dgu'i lo nyi khri thub pa na/ 'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i

kha lo sgyur ba/ blanamadapa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungasazhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i ma bzhin du

wArA NA sir phung po lhag mchod pa'i mya ngan lasa'adas pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ rgyal pokri kris de'i sku dri zhim po'i shing thams cad kyis sbyangs te/ spus nas bkurasti chen pos bsregru
ti/ mde 'o mas bsad nas sku gdung de rnams gsar gyi bum bar byugs to/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpagatshad gcog yod la/ 'phang du dpag

rmad phyad pa zhig brtsigs nas dus mchod chen po btsugs so// wA rA NA si na tshong dpon phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba/ yangs shing rgya chab/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam
thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blas te/ de de dang lhan cig rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/
dga' dgur spyod par byed kyang de la bu pho yang med bu mo yang mad nas/ de lag pa 'gram pa lagatad nas bdag gi khyim du nor phal po chab sags kyang/ bdag la bu pho yang mdabu mo yang yod pas//
bdag shAnas bdog pa thams cad bu med do zhes byas te/ rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khos su chud cing 'dug pa de la/ ge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ grogs po dang/ mdza'abashes
dang: zhi dudang ! ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ lhamanyes par byosashig dang/ khyod la bu yod par 'gyur ro// de bu mad debu mngon par 'dod pas/ zhi ba dang/ chu lha dang/ lus na dang/ brgya byin
dang/ tshangs pa la sogs pa/ gzhan yang lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa'adi ltaste/ kun dga' r ba'i lha dang/ nags tshal gyi lha dang/ bzhi mdo'i lha nga sum mdo'i lha dang/ gtor

ma lenapa'i lha dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang/ chos mthun pa pa dang/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha la yang gsol ba'adebs so// 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyus bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur

rinas 'jig rten na skad du grags pa yod de/ de yang de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar gyur na ngar la yang dpar na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gnas gsum

mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skya bar 'gyur te/ gnas gsum gang zhe na/ pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyung ngo lhan cig 'dus pa dang/ mamangal rung bar gyur cing zla mtshan dang ldan po dang//
driwan bar gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ gnas de gsum mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba yin na/ des bu yod pa'i las ma byas pas/ des na de la bu bo dang
bu mo med do// ji tsam na de na kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ lom dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu'ismanarnamos kyis bsan bkur byas kyang de'i nang zhi bar ma gyur to// de nas de'i rlung
mas bsams pa/ bdag gi khyiman nor phal mo che bsags pa ni bdag la du kho yang mad bu mo yang med la/ bdag gi khyim thab 'di ni 'bara'agyur gyis/ da ni gal te 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyagasam
blangs nas/ nor zas 'di thams cad bdag la bu med do zhes byas nas rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i mu ga gi do shal brgya stong ri ba mgulan thogs pa des/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sas rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rten de la dri dang byug pas byugs nas mchod pa byas te btags nas/ dad pa drag pos drung du gtugs te smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa'i chos yongs su btang ba dang sems
bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag phyug po'i rigs sa skya zhing yon tan 'ad lta bu yang thob cing/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed kyi/ mi mnyes par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji

snyam du sems ) de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong dpon gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni mu tig can 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi mchod rten la bya ba byas nas/ smon lam/

btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing/ gtsas panamu tig gi char bab po// pa'i bstan pa la yang dad pa skyes pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo lte shu

mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// gzhan yang tshong dpon nor mang du bsags pa de'i chung mar gyur pa na/ da nu 'dis dbang phyug gi grags pas rgyags

nas spyod yul na gnas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la tshig tu bran mo'i bu zhes kun tu smras pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pasatsho rabs mang por bran mor gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag
pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin 'ang/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kun gcig tu dkar la 'drenam rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no// de bas na dge slong dag gcig stuganag pa'i 'dus rnamA

dang 'dren ma rnamasan spyas la/ gcig tu dkar ba'i las kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi cha gang yin pa de ni/ chos smra ba'i
gang zag rnams la yan no zhes gsus pa dang/ de na mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cagani bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde mtha' dag 'dzinapas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin ba yin pas red pa 'di ni
kho bo cag dbang ngo// 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bor gzhi bcom ldan 'das kyi nang gi mdzod srung zhing kho bo cag 'dul bamatha' dag 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas/
red pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo// ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag namado sde dang/ 'dul ba'i nga gi mtshan nyid dang/ spyi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin bas/ kho bo ga/

chos 'dzin pa yin pas red pa 'di ni kho bo cag dang nga ngozhes/ de na mdo sde 'dzin pa dang/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang/ ma mo 'dzin pa rnams 'ablab pa dang mtshang 'dra ba dang/ 'brakhamo dang/ 'gyed pa byung bar
gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dgeslong dgam 'thab cig/ mtshang ma 'dra zhig/ 'thab mo ma byed cig/ ma 'gyed cig/ dge slong dag bzhi bo 'di dag ni rtsod pa/

yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang/ gdams ngag mang ba'i rtsod pa dang/ ltung ba'i rtsod pa dang/ bya ba'i tshong pa'o// 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa gang zhin/ dag 'dun sna tshogs su skyab/ 'gal bar smra ba

rigasami 'phrod par smra ba/ mi mthun pa kun tum dga' ba/ rgyud gcig tum gyur pa gang yin ba de las brten te 'thab pa dang/ mchong 'dra ba dang/ 'thab mo dang 3 'gyod pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'gyed pa'i rtsod
pa zhes bya'o// gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa gang zhan/ dge 'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang/ gdams ngag mi spyin pa dang// gdams ngag bzhag pa gang yin pa de las brten nasa'athab pa dang/ mtshopa

'du ba dang/ 'thab mo dang ) 'gyod pa gang yin pa 'di ni gdams ngagamed pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// ltung ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ ltung ba lnga ni ltung ba'i phung po lnga zhes bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ phas pham pa'i

dang dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed dang/ so sor bshags par bya ba dang nyes byas gang yin pa de lasabartan nas 'thab pa dang 2 mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang zu 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ltangaba'i rtso
pa zhes bya'o// bya ba'i rtsod pa gang zhen/ dge 'dun gyi bya ba gsol pa dang/ gsol ba dang gnyis dang/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las brten nas 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba
dang/ 'thab mo dang 'gyod pa gang yin pa de na bya ba'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pan ci zhig gi rtsi bcan yin zhing/ 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhen//

'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug dang/ 'byed par byed pa'i bzhi bcu bzhi ste/ 'gyod pa'i rtsa ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di na la la khro ba yin zhing khon du 'dzin pa yin te/ khro zhing khon du 'dzin pa gang
yin pa de ni/ ston pa la bkur sti mi byed/ bla mar mi byi/ ri mor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed do// ston pa la bkur sti ma byas/ bla mar ma byas/ ri mo ma byas/ mchod

pang ma byas pas chos mi mthong ngo// chos ma mthong bas dge sbyong gi tshul lam lta'o// dge sbyong gi tshul lam lta na/ dge 'dun la 'di lta bu'i 'thab pa dang 2 mtshang 'dru ba dang 'thab mo nga/ 'akudapa

'byin par byed do// 'thab pa dang/ mchong 'dra ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa ma yin pa dang/ skye bomang po la gnodapa dang/ skyakhomang po 'a sdug bsngal ba dang/ lha
dngama rnams la mi phan pa dang/ gnodapa dang sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no// dge sbyong dag gal te khyed kyis 'khyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi 'am phyi rol gyi yang rung ma spangs par
yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang/ 'gyod pamed pas 'dun pa drag po dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ 'badapa dang/ spro ba dang/ sgrim ba dang/ mazlogs pa'i dran

pa dang/ shes bzhin gyisajitsam 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid spyas kyi bar du brtson par bya'o// de lta na khyed kyis 'gyod pa'i rdo ba de yang spongasapar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed

pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi yang rung phyi'i yang rung/ legs par spangs pa yang dag par mthongan/ de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang/ 'gyod pa med pas 'dunapa drag po dang/ brtson/

'grus dang/ 'bad pa dang/ spro ba dang/ sgrim pa dang/ mi zlogs pa'i dran pa dang/ shes bzhin gyis ci tsam rtsod pa'i rtsa ba spas pa de nyid phyis kyang mi 'byubor brtson par bya sta/ de ltar na khyed kyis
'gyod pa'i rtsa ba de yang dag par legs par bsal bas/ phyis skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dul ba gzhi/
bam po don brgyad pa/ khro zhing khon du 'dzin

'dan la la rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yin zhape'atshal pa'i 'dzin pa dang/ smras pa la dngan then byed pa yin te/ rangag lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa'achal pa 'dzin pa/ smras pa la dang then byed pa gang
yin pa de ni/ ston pa la bkur sti mi byed/ bla mar mi byed/ rimor ma byed/ mchod par mi byed do// de ston pa la bkur sti ma byas/ bla mar ma byas/ ri mor ma byas ) mchod par ma
byas pas chos mimathong ngo// chos ma mthong bas dge sbyong gi tshul la ma lta'o// dge sbyong gi tshul la ma ltan/ dge 'dun la de lta ba'i 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ thub
mo dang/ 'gyed pa 'byin par khyad do// 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'drub dang/ thab mo dang/ 'gyed pa gang yin pa ni/ skye bo mang po la phan pa ma yin pa dang/ skya
bo mang po la gnod pa dang/ skya bo mang bo la sdug bsngal ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams lam phan pa dang/ gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no// dge slong dag gal te khyod kyis 'gyed pa'i
rtsa bde lta bu mang gi yang rung phyi'i 'ang nga/ ma spangs par yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun tudaga' ba dang/ 'gyod pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang/ brtson
'grus dang/ 'bad pa dang/ spro ba dang/ sgrim pa dang/ mi zlogs pa'i dran pa dang/ shes bzhin gyis ji lta ba 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid songs pa'i bar du brtson par bya ste/ deltar
na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de spobs par 'gyur ro// dge slongadag gal te khyed kyis 'byed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi yang rung phyi'i yang rung/ legs par spangs pa yang
spru ga par mthongan/ dal khyed cag lhan cig mthun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang/ 'gyod pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ 'bad pa dang/ spro ba dang/ sgrim pa dang/ mi

zlogs pa'i dran pa dang/ shes bzhin gyis ci nas kyang 'gyod pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyis kyang mi 'byung bar brtson par bya ste/ daltaran khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang dag par legs par bsal
'a bas phyis skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni 'gyed pa'i rtsa badrug ces bya'o// 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi gzhan/ 'di lta ste/ chos so zha 'am/ chos ma yin no zhi 'am/
'dul ba'o zhe 'am/ 'dul ba ma yin no zhe 'am/ ltung ba'o zhi bam/ ltung ba ma yin pa'o zhi 'am/ lci ba 'am/ yang ba 'am/ lhag ma dang bcas pa 'am/ lhag ma med pa 'am/
bshags par bya 'am/ bsdam par bya ba 'am/ nyes pa bshad par gtogs pa 'am/ legs par bshad par gtogs pa ste/ 'di dag ni 'byed par byed pa'i bzhi bcu ban zhes bya'o// ngag

! slong dag 'byed pa'i rtsod pa ni do'i rtsa ba can yin zhing/ 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin no// dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing/ gdams ngag mang
pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa bani ci yin zhen/ dag 'dun gdams ngag ma len pa dang/ gdams ngag ma sbyin pa dang/ gdams ngag bzhag pa gang yin pa de la brten nas 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/
'thab mo dang/ 'gyed pa gang yin pa ste/ dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing/ gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba de yin no// dge slong dag ltungaba'i rtsod pa ni

zheg gi rtsa ba can yin zhing/ ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa bani ci yin zhe na/ ltung ba'i rigs lnga ni ltung ba'i rigs dang ltung ba'i phung po zhes bya ste/ lta gang zhe na/ phas pam pa dang/ dge 'dun lhag
mdang/ ltung byed dang 3 so sor bshags par bya ba dang/ nyes byas so// gzhan yang lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin sogs kyi ma yin pa yang yod/ ngag gi nagyi/ lus kyi ma
yanasems kyi ma yin pa'ang yod/ lus kyi dang sems kyi yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin pa yang yod/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ sams kyi lan pa yang yod do/ lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/
ngag gi ma yin sems kyi ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong khyim pa 'am/ bstan pa rdzogs pa'i phyir ma byung bar khyim pa 'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i phyir byung ngo sam
nas nyal bar byed pa na/ de gnyid log pa dang bud med nyal ba 'am/ gnyid log nas khri stan chen po'i steng du bzhag pa ste// 'di ni lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/[“ ]ngag gam/
yin sems kyi ma yin no// khag gi ltung ba yan gyi lus kyi ma yin/ sems kyi ma yin pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong dag bud med la chos tshig lnga 'chad pa las
ched du ma bsams bar tshig drug tu thal ba 'am/ tshig drug 'tshad pa na tshig bdun du thal ba ste/ 'di na ngeg ga ltung ba yin gyi/ lus kyi ma yin sems kyi ma yin no// lus dang sems kyi
ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin pa gang zhen 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis ched du bsams te/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su song ba'i srog chags srog dang phralanas/ 'di skad ces ji ltar
bdag gis bsad pa de bzhin du srog dang phral ba bu sa/ de ltar bsad pan de legs par bsad pa yin no zhes mi smra zhing ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/
myos par 'gyur ba 'thung la/ 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis 'thus pa de bzhin du myos par 'gyur ba brtung bar bya ste/ de ltar 'thungs pa na legs par 'khrungs pa yin no zhesapa smra ba ste/
'di ni lus dang sems kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin no// lus dang/ ngag dang/ soms kyi ltung ba yin pa gang zhon/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis ched dungs/
ti dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags srog dang phral la/ 'di skad cesaji ltar bdag gis bsad pa dobazhin du srog chags srog dang phral bar bya ste/ de ltar bsad pa ni
legs par bsad ba yin no zhes smra zhing/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/ myos par 'gyur ba'i chang 'thung la/ 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis 'thud
pa de bzhin myos par 'gyur ba btung bar bya sta/ de ltaramyos par 'gyur ba 'thungs pa ni/ legs par 'thus pa yin no zhes smras pa ste/ 'dini'us dang/ ngag dang/ sams kyi

lcang ba yin te/ dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba canayin zhing/ ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni da yin no// dge slong dag bya ba'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig girtsa ba can yin zhing/ bya ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa
ba ni ci yin zhe na/ dge 'dunagyi bya ba gang yin pa gsol ba dang/ gsol ba dang gnyis dang/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yonepa ste/ ga slong dag byaba'i rtsod pa ni do'i rtsa ba can yinazhing/
bya ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa khan de yin no// dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa'i dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge bzhes brjod pabya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ dgab gang zhen/
dge 'dun don sgrub cing donasams la/ dge ba'i don sgrub cing dge ba sems pa'i sna tshogs su sla ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigasam mthun pa'i smra ba gang yin pa de las brten//
'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'drub dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyod pa gapayin pa 'di ni dge ba yin no// mi dge ba gang zhan/ dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing don mi sams la/ dag
ba'i donami sgrub cing dge ba mi sams pa'i sna tshogs su sku ba/ 'gal bar skyab/ rigasami mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de la brten nas/ 'thab pa dang/ mamyong
'dra ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyed po gang yan pa de ni mi dge ba yin no// lung du mabastan ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ donam yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing/ don
sams pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa soms pa yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing/ dge ba soms pa na nga ma yin/
midage ba'i sems pa yang ma yin pa'i sna tshogasasu slab/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigis mimathun bar smra ba gang yin pa de la brten nas/ 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/
'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma bstanapa yin no// gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni/ dgo ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par
ba bya/ dge ba gapazhen/ dga' dun don sgrub cing don son sa la/ dge ba'i don sgrub cing dge bsams pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang/ gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang/ gdams
ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang ) 'gyod pa gang yin pa 'di nidago ba yin no// mi dge ba gang zhen/ dge 'dun
[/]donami sgrub rung don mi sems la/ dge ba'i don mi sgrub cing dge ba ma soms pa'i gdams ngag ma len pa dang/ gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang/ gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa/
de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thabamo dang/ 'gyod pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi dge ba yin no// lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/
don ma yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing/ don sams pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sams pa yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ mi dag pa'idon sgrub pa yungs/
yin zhing/ dgab sems pa yang ma yin/ mi dag la sems pa yang ma yin pa'i gdams ngag ma len pa dang/ gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang/ gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yan pa/
de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang/ 'tshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no// ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni/ mi dge ba zhes
brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ mi dag ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa dang/ dge 'dun gyis khrims su bcas pa las
chad du bsams te 'das pa gang yin pa 'dinam dag ba yin no// lung du ma bstan pa gang zhen/ sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa dang/ dge 'dun gyis khrims su bcas pa
las ched du ma bsams par 'das pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung dum bstan pa yin no// bya ba'i rtsod pa ni// dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ ma dag ba zhes brjod par
bya lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ dgab gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub cing don soms la/ dge ba'i don sgrub cing/ dge bsams pa'i gsol ba dang/ gsol ba dang
gnyis dang/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thabamo nga/ 'gyod pa gang yin pa 'di ni dge ba yin no// mi dag ba gang
tshan dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing ma sems la/ ge ba'i don mi sgrub cing/ dge bami sems pa'i gsol ba dang/ gsol ba dang gnyis dang/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa rel
brten te/ 'khrab pa dang/ 'tshang 'dru ba dang ) 'thab mo dang/ 'gyedapa gang yin pa 'di ni mi dge ba yin no// lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yung ma
yin don ma yin pa bsgrub pa yang ma yin zhing/ don sems pa yang ma yin// don ma yin pa soms pa yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ mi dag ba'i
don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing/ dge bsams pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba sems pa yang ma yin pa'i 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang 'ozab mo dang/ 'gyed pa gang yin
'di ni/ lung du ma bstan pa yin no// 'gyed pa gang yin pa de rtsod pa lags la/ rtsod pa gang lags pa de 'gyed pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ 'gyed pa yin la rtsod pa ma yin
pa yang yod/ rtsod pa yin la 'gyod pa ma yin pa yang yod/ 'gyod pa yang yin rtsod pa yang yin pa yang yod/ 'gyud pa yang ma yin rtsod pa yang ma yin pa yang yodado pazhig 'gyed pa yin/
la rtsod pa ma yin pa// dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar snakha/ rigs mi mthun par sgrub gang yin ba'o// rtsod pa yin la 'gyed pam yin pa ni rtsod pa gsum po// gangs
ngag mad pa'i rtsod pa dang/ bya ba'i rtsod pa dang/ ltungaba'i rtsod pa'o// rtsod pa yang yin la 'gyod pa yang yin pani/ dag 'dun snatshogasasu sgrub/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs ma 'phrod
bar smra ba/ mi mthun pa/ kun tu mi dga' ba/ rgyud gcig tum gyur pa gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyod pa gang yin pa'o/
'gyod pa gang ma yin/ rtsod pa yang ma yin ban rnamapa de dag ma gtogos pa'o// gdams ngagu ma mchis pa gang lags pa de rtsod pa lags l/ rtsod pa gang lags pa de gdams
ngag mamachis pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gdams ngag med pa yin lab rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod/ rtsod pa yin la gdams ngag med pa ma yin pa yang yod ! gdams
ngag yod pa yang yin lartsod pa yin pa yang yod/ gdams ngag med pa yang ma yin la rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod do// re zhig bdams ngag med pa yang yin la rtsod pa/
yang ma ga'i ban/ edun gdams ngag ma len pa dang/ gdams ngag ma sbyin pa dang/ gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa'o// rtsod ba yin la gdams ngag med pa ma yin pa
ni rtsod pa gsum po// 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang ltung ba'i rtsod pa dang/ bya ba'i rtsod pa'o// gdams ngag med pa'ang yin la rtsod pa yang ma yin pa ni/ dge 'dun gdams ngag mi len pa
dang gdams ngag ma sbyon pa dang/ gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de la brten te/ 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dra ba dang/ 'thab modang/ 'gyed pa gang yin pa'o// gdams ngag
mad pa yang ma yin la rtsod pa yang ma yinepani/ rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o// ltung ba gang lags pa de rtsod pa lags la// rtsod pa gang lags pa de ltung ba lags sam/ bka' stsal/
pa ltung ba min la rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod/ rtsodapa yin la ltung ba yin pa yang yodaM/ ltung ba yang yid+d+hin rtsod pa yang yin pa yang yod lcangal yang ma yin rtsod pa yang ma yin pa yang
yod do// re zhig ltung ba yin la rtsod pa ma yin pa ni/ ltung ba'i rigs lnga na ltupaba'i rigs dang lcing ba'i phung po zhes bya sta/ phas pham pa dang/ dge 'dunalhag ma dang/ ltung byed dang/ so sor
bshags par bya ba dang/ nyes byas yin no// rtsod pa yin la ltung ba ma yin pa'i rtsod pa gsum bo/ 'gyod pa'i rtsod pa dang/ gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang/ bya ba'i rtsod pa'o// ltung
ba yang yin la rtsod pa yang yin pa ni/ ltung ba'i rigs lnga po ni ltung ba'i rigs dang/ ltung ba'i phung bo zhes bya ste/ phas pham pa dang/ dge 'dun lhag ma dang/ ltung byed dang/ so sor 'ashagasaM
bar bya bdang/ nyes byas g yin pa de las brten/ wathapa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thabam dang/ 'gyod pa gang yin pa'o// ltung ba yang ma yin la rtsod pa yang ma yin pani rnam
pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o// bya ba gang lags pa de rtsod pa lags l/ rtsod ba gang lags pa de yang bya ba lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ bya ba yin la rtsod pa ma yin pa
yang yod/ rtsod pa yin la bya ba ma yin pa yang yod/ bya ba yang yin la rtsod pa yang yin pa yang yod bya ba yang ma ya na la rtsod pa yang ma yin pa yang yod do// re zhig bya ba yanalartsod
pam yin pa ni/ dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang/ gsol ba dang gnyis dang/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa'o// rtsod pa yid la bya ba ma yin pa ni rtsod pa gsum po/ 'gyung
pa'i rtsod pa dang/ gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang/ ltung ba'i rtsod pa'o// bya ba yang yin la rtsod pa yang yin pa ni/ dge 'dun kyi bya ba gsol ba dang/ gsol ba dang gany+dzis/
[/ ]@#// dang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las brten// 'khrung pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyed pa gang yin pa'o// bya ba yang ma yin lartsod
tha pa yang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o// dge slong dag 'byed pa'i rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi par byed pa'i chos du zhig gis 'dul bar bya/ bzhi bar bya ) 3 bar zhibar bya zhe na/ bka' la
ba gnyis kyis te mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang/ gang yang tshul gang mang po byung bas so// mngon sum du 'dul ba ni ji ltar rtsod pa zhibar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na 'di na kha rug gi rtsod pa rnam
'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 3 'dul ba zhi ba dang lta bar zhi ba yin zhe na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgyal byed
kyi tshal mgon mdabras spyin gyi kun dga' ra bar dpur bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so// de'i tshe dge slong 'ab tu mang po dag ljongs shig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ da rnams dbyar gyi
nang logs su 'thub pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyod pa byung nas/ de rnams kyis rtsod pa de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi ngu la gtad pa dang 3 ngeganyis kyis
ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas so// de nas dge slong ra'o tumang po ljongs su dbyar gnas pa'i dbyar gyi zla bo gsum po dag 'das pa dang/ chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos

gos zin pa dang ldan nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong nas/ rim gyis rgya zhing dong ba dang ma nyan yod du phyin to// de nas dge slong rab tumang pos lhung bgred
dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa bkrus/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig
'dug go/ chos3de kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glo bur ba'i dag slong rnams la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis/ so so yang dgu par dga' bar ma dzad pa ngan pas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pas dge sloparang rtamang po la/ kyi dge slong dag khyed cag gang nas 'di 'ongs/ gang du khyed cag dbyar gnas/ btsun pa bdag cagani
ljongs shig nas 'di mas te/ ljongs na bdag cag dbyar gnas gnas lags so// dge slong dag khyed ga jig ljos su bde ba la ga par dbyar gnas sam//
khyedabasod snyoms kyis 'phongs par ma gyur tam/ btsun pa mad par bdag cag ljongs su bde ba la reg par gnas par dbyar gnas shing/ bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis
kyang 'phos par ma gyur to// de lta lags mod kyi bdag cag dbyar gyi nang logs su 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab modang/ 'gyed pa byung nas
pan @#/ bdag cag gis rtsod pa de tsho dang ldan ba shAre'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu la gtad pa dang/ dganyis kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de
na bar bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos pa/ kyemakho ba nyan thos skum la gnas pa dag gisani/ ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa skyes shing byung
bzhabar nus so snyamanas/ dge slong dag de lta bas na skam la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis/ ston pa'i bstan pachos 'dul bas rtsod pa spyas shing byang ba zhi bar bya'o// dgo
slong rnams kyis skam la gnas pa duyin pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag dge 'dun la mi ltos par rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar nus pa'o// de
yang gsum ste/ skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams pa ma yin zhing/ ngag gis kyang ma yin pa yang yod/ lus kyis bsdamasal/ ngag gis ma yin pa yang yod/ lus dang ngag
gis bsdams pa yang yod do// lus kyis bsdams pa ma yin zhipi/ ngag gis kyang ma yin pagang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ skam la gnas pa dge slong 'thab par 'gyur/ mtshang 'drab r gyur
'thab mo byung/ 'gyod par gyur nas/ phyogs dang phyogs gzhan dag tu gnas pa rnams kyi drung du bdag nyid song nas/ 'di skad ces tsho dang ldan pa dag legs so// rtsod pa 'di ni legasaM par
bzung ba yin kyi nyes par bzung ba ma yin/ legs par sbyar ba yan gyi/ nyes par sbyar ba ma yin/ legs par brtags pa yin gyi nyes pa brtags pa ma yin pas/ 'di dang 'di
ni smi sa shig/ 'di dang 'di ni ma smra zhig/ rmadang ldan pa pha rol po dag chom zhig/ pha rol po dag gisachoms sa re/ bdag ni tshe dang ldan pa dag gi phyogs dang/ dpung dang/ grogs byed
pa yin no zhes smrazhing/ phyogs kyi gshes kyi drung du yang bdag nyid song nas/ 'di skad cesatshe dang ldan pa dag legs so// rtsod pa 'di ni legs par bzung ba yin gyi sa par bzung ba ma
yin/ legs par sbyar ba yan gyi/ nyes par sbyar ba ma yin/ legs par brtags pa yin gyi/ nyes par brtags pam yan pas/ 'di dang 'dan smyos shig/ 'di dang 'di ni ma
sgrazhig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis pha rol po dag chom zhig/ phachol po dag gis choms sa ri/ bdag ni tshe dang ldan pa dag gi phyogs dang/ dpung dang/ grogs yin no zhes smaste/ 'di ni
skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams pa ma yin zhing/ ngag gis kyang ma yin pa'o// skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams la/ ngag gis ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skam
la gnas pa dge slong 'thab par gyur/ mchong 'dru bar gyur/ 'thab mo byung/ 'gyed par gyur nas gnas shing/ phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa rnams kyis phyogs
klu// gcig tu bdag nyid mi 'gro med kyi pho nya btang nas tsho dang ldan pa dag legs so// rtsod pa 'di ni legs ba bzung ba yin gyi/ shes par bzung ba ma yin/ legs
par sbyar ba yin gyi/ sa par sbyar ba ma yin/ legs par brtags pa yin gyi/ nyes par brtags pa ma yin pas/ 'di dang 'di ni smos shig/ 'di dang 'di ni ma smra zhig/ tshodang ldan pa dag gis
pha rol po dag chom zhig/ pha rol po dag gis choms sa re/ bdagan tshe dang ldan pa dag gi phyogs dang 3 dpung dang/ grogs yin no// phyogs rug shosasu yang bdag 'di mi 'gro mod kyi/ bo 2
btang nas tshe dang ldan pa dag legs so// rtsod pa ni legs par bzung ba yin gyi/ nyes par bzung ba ma yin/ legs par sbyar ba yin gyi/ rtas par sbyar ba ma yin/ legs par brtag/
pa yin gyi/ nyes par brtags pa ma yin pas/ 'di dang 'din smos shig/ 'di dang 'di ni ma smra zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis pha rol po ga chom zhig/ pha rol po dag gis choms sa re/
bdag nitshadang ldan pa dag gi phyogs dang/ dpung dang/ grogs yin no zhes zer ba ste/ 'dinaskam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdoms la/ ngag gis ma yin pa yin no// skam laganas
pa dang lus dang ngag gis bsdams pa gang zhen/ 'dilta ste/ skam la gnas pa dge slong 'thab par gyur/ mchong 'dra bar gyur/ 'thab mo byung ( 'gyod par gyur nas gnas shing/
phyogs dang phyogs gzhanan gnas pa rnams kyis phyogs gcig lcabadag nyid ma 'gro zhing/ pho' ya ngagatong bar mi byedal/ phyogs cig shos su yang bdag nyid ma 'gro zhing/ tshig gis/
lo ha gtong bar mi byed pa'o// de skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams pa ma yin zhing/ ngag gis kyang ma yin pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa yang ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o//
bskos pan dbyung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de lta bu'i skum la gnas pa la brten nas/ dge 'dun la rtsod pa ma byung ba rnams ni 'byungal/ byung ba rnams ni ston pa'i bstanapa chos 'dul bas myur
du zhi bar mi 'gyumaro// de la skam la gnas pa lus kyis bsdams la ngag gis ma yin pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i skamal gnas pa nga/ ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o//
bskos pa ni byung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyirazhan/ de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa la brten nas kyang dge 'dunal rtsod pa ma byung ba rnams ni 'byung la/ byung ba rnams ni ston pa'i 'astan pa
chos 'dul bas myur du zhi bar mi 'gyur ro// de la skam la gnas pa lus dang ngag gis bsdams pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos
pa nangebyung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa la brten nas/ dge 'dun la rtsod pa ma byung ba rnams ni mi 'byung la/ byung ba rnams ston pa'i bstan pa
chos 'dul bas myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// drag slong dag de lta bu'i skam la gnas pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yan gyi/ gzhan dag ni ma yin no// de lta bu'i skamal

gnas pa rnams kyis rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar bya sta/ de lta bu'i sam la gnas pa rnams kyis rtsod pa zhi bar byas pa ni mngon sum dag pa ma yin no// de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe na dmangon
sumani gnyis te/ gang zag mngon sum dang/ chos mngon sum mo// gang zagamangon sum gang zhen/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi ba bya ba
de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur cing/ mngon sum du gyur pa ste/ 'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o// chos mngon sum gang zhen 3 ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang chos gang
dang 'dul ba gang gis rtsod pa de zhi bar 'gyur ba/ ston pa'i bstan pa de dang/ chos de dang/ 'dul pa des rtsod pa de zhi bar byad pa 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o//
gal te dge slong skam la gnas pa dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na/ de rnams kyis rtsod pa de dag 'dun la gtad par bya zhing/ dge 'dun gyis ston pa'i bstan pa
chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o// dge 'dun gyis ston pa'i ston pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas pa'o zhes brjod par bya ste/
3/ mngon sum dag par yin no// de la mngon sum ji lta bu yin zhe na/ mngon sum ni gsum ste/ dge 'dunamangon sum dang/ gang zag mngon sum dang/ chos mngon sumalo// dag
'dun mngon sum gang zhe na/ mtshams na gnas pa'i dge slong bya bar 'os pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa dang/ 'dun pa blangs bar 'os pa rnams las
'dunapa blangs pa dang/ dge slong rnams 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur kyang mi btub rung/ gshe ba gang dag gi gshe bar 'os pa rnams mi btub pa med cing mi gnal/ las
dag byed pa 'di ni dge 'dun mngon sum pa zhes bya'o// gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar bya ba de dag
thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa ste/ 'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o// chos mngon sum gang zhen/ ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang/ chos gang dang/ 'dul ba gang
gis rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang/ chos de dang/ 'dul ba das rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o// gal te dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa
de zhi bar bya mi nus na/ de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba bcu 'am/ bcu gnyis bsko bar bya'o// bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la//
gaN+Di brdungasal/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgol ) dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang re zhig thog mar sbyo
bar bya/ sangs rgyas skyong dang/ tshos sbyin dang ) dge 'dun sde khyed ba/sal ba yinan/ mtshamasakyi phyi logs su dong nas dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bya bar spro 'ag/ gal te spro bar gyuren
de rnams kyis sngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sangs rgyas
skyong dang/ chos sbyin dang dge 'dun sda'adims gsal ba lags te/ mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas 3 dge 'dun gyi rtsod pazhi bar bgyi ba spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dug
la kha ba cing bzod na/ dag 'dun kyi gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas skyong dang/ chos sbyin dang dgo'adun sde gsal ba rnams bsos te/ sangs
rgyas skyong dang/ chos sbyin dang ! dge 'dun sde gsal ba mtshams kyi slad rol tumachisanas/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyipar 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol pa'o// las bya ba ni dge
'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol ) sangs rgyas skyong dang/ chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun sde 'di rnams gsal ba lags te/ mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas/ dge
0/'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyi bar sngonas/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas skyong dang/ chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun pa rnams gsal ba rnams bskos taM/ sangs rgyas skyong dang
chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun sde gsal ba rnams mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag sangs rgyas skyong dang/
chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun sde gsal ba rnams bsgos te/ sangs rgyas skyong dang chos sbyin dang ) dge 'dun sde gsal ba mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas/
dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni cung ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungasashig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis
sangs rgyas skyong dang/ chos sbyin dang/ dge 'dun sde gsal ba de rnams mtshams kyis da rol tu mchis nas ) dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyi bar bskos lags te/ 'di ltar
chung mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gsal ba rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zho bar bya'o// gsal ba rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos
'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas n legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya ste/ mngon sum dag pa yin no// de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe na/ mngon sum ni gnyis te gang zug mngon sum dang/
chos mngon sum mo// gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de dag zhi bar bya ba de thams cud 'dus

ts+tshA zhi bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang/ chos de dang/ 'dul ba des rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o// gal te dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis rtsod
pa de zhi bar mi nusan/ de rnams kyis dge slong gsal ba byas kyang gsal ba brgyad dam dgu bsko bar bya sta/ gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chog
'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya/ gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya'o// gal te dge slong gsal ba pas kyang
gsal ba rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar mi nus na/ de rnams kyis rtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtad par bya'o// de nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rtsod pa de sbyad pa bsko bar bya'o// chos lnga
dang ldan pa'i dag slong rtsod paspyad pa ma bskos pa ni bsgo bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang kataM
mug gis 'gro ba dang 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang/ rtsod pa spos pa dang ma spos pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbyad pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o//
bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa spyod pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// la gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang//
zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang/ gti mug gisami 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang/ rtsod pa spos pa dang ma smros pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod
pa spyod pa ma bskos pa ni bsgo bar bya'o// bsgos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// bsgo ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la// gaN+Di brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis
dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsko la// dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang/ pazhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyedudage 'dun gyi rtsod pa srid
par spro 'am/ gal te smon des sgo'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol kha byas te lasabya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
rtsod pa spod pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbyad par spron/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang )
'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbod par bskos te/ rtsod pa sdud pa'i dge slongaming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbyad par 'gyur
bo 'di ni gsol pa'o// las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa sdud pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbyad par spro nas/
de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa spyad par baskos te/ rtsod pa spyod pa'i dag slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa sbyad par bgyid na/ tshe dang ye
pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa de sbad par bskos rtsod pa sbyar pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa spyod par bgyid par brjod pa de dag gi nang ma
tshu gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong rtsod pa sbyod pa snying 'di zhes bgyi ba// dge
'dun gyi rtsod pa sbyad par bskos lags/ 2 'di ltar rang migasung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ngas rtsod pa spyod pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bcu'agar
bya ste/ rtsod pa sbyad pa'i dge slong gis rtsogad pa gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad par bya zhing/ rganarabs ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par
0[bya sta/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa 'di ni gnas ga ge mo zhig tu gzhi 'di las byang nas dus 'di srid cig len te/ rtsod pa de skam la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis
zhi bar bgyi ba rdzom sho gnas/ de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa las/ dge 'dun gyis kyang ma sbyonganas rje gsal ba'i dge slong rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis
rngo ma thoganas ) de rnams kyis kyang dge slong gsal ba bsakyang gasal ba rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal kha bas kyang gsal ba de rnams kyis kyang ngos thog nas/ de rnams kyis

kyang dge 'dun la gtad pa dang/ dge 'dun gyis kyang bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa spyod par bskos nas/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa spyod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan dang
bcas so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la dbul gyi/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis 'di nas bzung sta)rtsod pa 'di zla ba drug gi mtha'i bar gyis zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ gnas brtan dang bcas/

so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o// gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun des ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod

bar byed ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa las/ dge 'dun gyis kyang ma spyod nas/ des kyang dge slong gsal ba rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyi'i

kyis kyang dge 'dun la gtad pa dang/ dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbyad par bskos/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbyad pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas
bton dngabacas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad pa las gnas brtan dang bcas ) so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis ma spyod nas ]bdag dge slong rtsod pa

ba dang/ ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis/ ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o/ mdo sde dang/ 'dul ba dang/ ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge

pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan la 'bul na/ gnas brtan gyis 'di nas bzung ste/ rtsod pa 'di ji tsam gyis mthar phyin kyi bar du zhi bar mdzad du gsol
zhes brjod par bya'o// ngas dge slong gnas brtan gyi kun tu spyod pa'i ros bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong gnas brtan gyis rgol ba dang/ phyir rgol ba'i dge
slong rnams nang stobs nabadrag gir mi bya ste/ ba'i lci ba stobs na ma yin/ bdag chal stobs nam yin zhing/ gdon pa dang 'dri ba yang byedadu mi gzhug ste/ gzhanadu na
mdun rnam rgyab tu 'duganas tshig 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dgam 'thapacig/ mtshang ma 'dra zhig/ 'thabamo ma byed cig/ ma'agyed cig/ daci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
ldan ba dag rtsod pa la gnyis ka rgyal ba med kyi/ 'on kyang gacig rgyal gcig 'pham par 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa la gnyis ka rgyal ba med kyi/ 'on kyang gcig rgyal gag 'pham par 'gyur
ro zhes bya zhing/ dge slong gnas brtan gyis ston pa'i bstanapachos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o// dge slong gnas gaNan gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas
par brjod par bya'o// dge slong dag de ltar na mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing/ de ltar na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum 'dul bar
'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas/ dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ nyabar zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag gang tshulashing ma nga po blang pa ni tshod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na
'di na kha nug gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gang tshul shing mang po thung ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas/ dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang )nye bar zhi ba mun zhe na/ sam la gnas pa nas
bzung/ 2 gnas brtan gyi bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te dge slong gnas brtan gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na/ rtsod pa de rtsod pa spyod pa'i dge slong de nyid la gtad par bya'o/
ngas kyang rtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtad par bya'o// dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi bas zhi bar bya'o// rgyud lta las gang tshul shing mang po len pa'i
rtsod pa zhi ba ni rtsub pa dang gdug pa dang/ dam po dang 1 dbye ba'i bsam pa dang/ sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyurab n+dan yin no// rtsub pa ji lta bu zhe na/ rgol ba dang
phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis rtswa ba po rab tu bzung ba yin te/ de ltar na rtsub po can yin no// 'dug pa ji lta bu zhe na/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams
gdug pa dang rnam par gnon pa yin te/ de ltar na gdug pa can yin no// dam po ji lta bu zhen/ rgol ba dang/ phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis dag
rab tu bzung ba yin te/ de ltar na dag lo can nano// dbye pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'bye bar byed pa'i bzhi bcu bzhi las 'bya bar byed pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig legs par
shin tu rab tu bzung ba yin te/ de ltar na 'bye ba'i bsam pa can lan no// sbyor ba gzhanadu mi 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na 3 skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas/ gnas brtan
gyi bar gyis/ delta na sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin te/ tshos 'di lnga dang ldan pas na/ gang tshulashing mang bo blang ba'i zhi ba ni rtswa ba pa dang/ gdug pa
dang dam po dang/ 'byo ba'i bsam pa/ sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin no// des na tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste ! chos lnga dang ldan pa'i
dwag slong tshul shing 'dris par ma bskos pa nikaskobarami bya'o// bskos ni dbyung par bya'o// lcakang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang/ gtinug
gas 'grol dang ) 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang tshul shing brims pa dang ma brims pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'dris par ma bskos pa ni bsgo bar/
mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshulashing 'drim par mkhaskos ba ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lta gang zhe na/
'dun pasami 'gro ba dang zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang/ gti mug gisami 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang tshulashing khrims pa dang ma bris par bs pa ste//
chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slotshul shing 'drim par ma bskos pa'i bsko bar bya'o/ bskos pa ni 'byung bar mi bya'o/ tshulashing brims pa ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ sdu ba dang/
mngon pa dang/ rna drung du bshub pa dang bcas pa dang/ dag 'dun thams cad pa'o// skye ba'i tshul shing bris pa kang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul shing 'drim pa'idage slong 'je sAmadu
soms te ) gnas 'di na dge slong gnas brtan gnas ban rab tu mngabo dgan [$]sam lin ba sA la/ dge slong gsarabu nyung zad rnyog ni chos sa bas/ gal te bdag gis tshul yong
mngon par brims na ) drag slong gsur budwagaslong gnas brtan rnams kyi rjes su byed pa rnams chos ma yin par tshulashing rab tumang po len par 'gyurab 'i gnas gang ri/na pa de yod kyis
ma la bdag gis tshul shing sbas te bris mosAm nas/ de tshul shadze sbas nas 'drim pa ste/ 'di ni sa ba'i tshul shing 'drim pa zhes bya'o// mngon pa'i tshul shing
'drim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas brtan rab tu mang po ni tshes glu la///'bram pa gang zhan/ na
dge slong gsar bu nyung zad cig ni chos ma yin pa smra bas/ gal te bdag gis tshul shing sbas te khrims na/ dge slong gsar bu rnams chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len par 'gyur/
ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod kyis 3 ma la bdag gis tshul shing mngon par brimamo// bdag gis tshul shing bsam par brims nA/ dge slong gsar bu dge slong gnas
brtan rnams kyi rjes su byed pa rnams chos kyi tshulashing rab tu mang po len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do snyam nas/ da tshulashing mngon par 'drim pa ste/ 'di ni
mngon pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa zhes bya'o// rna drung du bshub pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing 'dri pa gabazhi na ) 'di lta ste/ tshul shing 'dris pa'i dge slong gis rna drung du gtugs te
bshubs la/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan pos chos kyi tshulashing blangs kyis/ khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing 'ong zhig/ khyod kyi slob dpon dang mkhan po gcig pa dang/ slob
dpon gcig pa dang/ gtam 'dres pa dang/ phabs par smra ba dang/ smos 'drin dang/ 'grogs bshes kyis chos kyilashing slongs kyis/ khyod kyisakyang chos kyi tshul
00 shang long zhigaces sna ba ste/ 'di ni rna drung du bshub pa dang bcas pa tshul shing 'drim pa zhe bya'o// dge 'dun thams cad pa'i tshu'ashang 'jim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
tshul shing 'dris pa'i dag srong 'disnyam dusams te/ gnas 'di na dge slong nad pa rab tu mang bas/ gal te bdag gis dge 'dunam 'tshogs shing ma 'dus cad r tshul sheng phrimasan/
da ba slong rab tu mang pos chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing li na bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod kyis/ mal bdag gis dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang tshul shing
bram par bya'o snyam nas/ de dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang tshul shing 'dris pa lta/ 'di ni dge 'dun thams cad pa'i tshul sheng 'drim pa zhes bya'o//
chos ma yin pa'i tshul4shing len pa bcu dang chos kyi bcu'o// chosam yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu gang zhe na/ chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa dang/ mimathun
pa'i tshul shing len pa dang/ chung ba bas kyang chung bsatshul shing len pa dang/ 'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa dang/ sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur bas tshul
shing len pa dang/ rten kha lo sgyur ba dang mi stun pas tshul shong len pa dang ) tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bya yang ci ma rung snyam pas tshulashing len pa dang/ tshul shing
blangs pas dge slong rab tus mang bo chos ma yin pa smabar gyur kyang kaMm rung snyam nas tshul shing lan pa dang/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bu bar 'gyur shes bzhi
du tshul shing len pa dang/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po dgachos ma yin ba slu bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len po'o/// 'dul ba gzhi/
ba' po bodagu pa/ ka chosum yin pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhen 'dul ba dang 'dul ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu'i chos
'gro ma yin pas tshul shing len pa lim// mi mthun pas tshul shing lan pa ji lta bu zhi na/ ga 'dun mi mthun par tshulashang len pa sta/ de lta bu ni mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa yin no//
rung ba bas kyang chung bas tshul shing lan pa ji lta bu zhe na/ bsdam par bya ba dang bshags par bya ba yin no snyam nas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni rlung ba bas kyang chung bus tshul
shang len pa yin no// 'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'bye bar byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi las 'bya bar byed pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig shulegs
ts+tshA par shin tu rab tu bzung ba bzung ba de lta bu ni/ dge 'dun 'bya ba'i bsam pas tshulangashing len pa yin no// sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul dang len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ snyam
la gnas pas yin ba nas bzung nas/ gnas brtan gyis ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar du sta/ de lta bu'i sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa yin no// rten kha lo/
sgyur ba dang mi stun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ) ma mo 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la chen dang
TaM laskyar bzhes bya ste/ de rnams la ma brtags par tshul shang len pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ rtenakha lo sgyur ba dang mi ston pas tshul shongalen pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge
'dun bya bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dag 'don bya bar gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes de snyam du bsams nas tshul shing len pa ste/
de lta bu'i tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang tshig rung bas tshul shing len pa yin no/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin bar gyur kyang rung
snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs bar dge slong rab tu gung po chos ma yin pa blangs nas 'jug par 'gyur yang rimarung snyam pas tshulashing len pa ste/
da lta bu n tshulashing blangs bas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pasadage 'dun dbye bar 'gyur ram//
shes bzhin dutshul shing len pa dzilta bu zhin/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'bye bar gyur bar shes shing/ de ltar bsams nas tshul shing
len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dag 'dun 'phye bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing lan pa yin no/ tshul shing blangs pas dag slong rab tu mang po chos ma
yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shang len ba jolta bu zhan/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs nas 'jug par 'gyur bar shes shing
de ltar bsams nas tshul shang lenAb sta/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shong len pa ste//
'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu yin no// chos kyi tshul shing 'an pa banu gang zhen/ chos kyis tshul shing len pa dang/ mthun pas tshul shing len
ba dang/ chung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa dang/ mi 'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa dang/ sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pas tshul shing len
ba dang/ rton kha lo sgyur ba dang stun pas tshul shing len pa dang/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'phye bar ma gyur kyang rtsim rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang/ tshul shing
[blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin par smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung sAm pas tshul shinganal dang/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun 'phye bar 'gyur par mi shes pas tshul
'ashang len pa dang/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang bo tshosan yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba'ami shes pas tshul shing len pa yin no// chos kyis tshul shang len pa ji lta bu zhen/
'dul ba dang mthun pas tshul shing len pa sku/ de lta bu ni chos kyis tshul shang len pa yin no// mthun pas tshul yang len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge 'dun mthun pasatshul
shing len pa ste/ de lta bu mthun pas tshulashing len ba yin no// chung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shang len pa ji lta bu zhan/ bsdam par bya ba ma yin pa dang/
bshags par bya bam yin no snyam bsams nas tshul gangalen pa ste/ de lta bu ni chung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin bas tshul shang len pa yin no// mi 'bye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing
len pa ji lta bu zhin/ 'bye bar byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi las/ 'bye bar byed pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba legs par shin tu rab tu ma bzung ba sta/ lta bu ni mi 'byed ba'i bsam pas
tshulagang lan pa yin no// sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas/ gnas brtan gyi bar gyis te/ de lta bu ni sbyor ba gzhan du gyur
pas tshul gang len ba yin no// rten la lo gyur pa dang skyon bas tshul shang len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang/ 'dul ba 'dzan pa dang/ ma mo'adzin

ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la rten dang kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ste/ de rnams la brtags nas tshul shing len ba de lta bu ni rtan kha lo sgyur ba dang stun pas tshul shung len pa yin no//
tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar chu gyur kyang rimarung snyam pas tshul shang len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshulangashing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes de ltar mi sems/
pas tshul dang len pa sa/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu
mang po tshos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing lan pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shang blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma lon pa blangs te 'jug par ma gyur kyang
ni ma rung snyam pas tshulareshing len pas ) de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no/ )
tshul shing blangs pos dge 'dun 'phye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blanges pas dag 'dun 'bye bar 'gyur bar mi shes shing/ de ltar mi
sams pas tshu la garje len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs bas dge 'dun 'byi bar 'gyur bar mnyes pas tshulangashing len pa yin no// tshuhang blangs pas dge slong rab tu
mang po tshos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba mi shes pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po tshes ma yin pa blangs nas rtsod par mi shes shing/
de ltar mi sams pas tshul shing len pa sta/ dalta bu ni tshul shang blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba mi shes pas tshulashing len pa sgyu/ 'di chos
kyi tshul shing len ma bcu yin no// ngas dge slong tshul shing 'drim pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya sta dge slong tshul shing 'drig pas tshul shing rnam pa gnyis
bshams par bya ste/ chos kyi tshul shing dang/ chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing ngo// chos kyi tshul shing rnams na ya yo med pa/ kyag kyog mad pa/ ) kyar sbyor
mad pa/ kha dog bzang ba// rig na bde bar bya'o// chos ma yin pa'i tshulashang rnams ni ya lo dang kyag kyog dang/ kyar khyor dang/ kha dog ngan pa dang/
regan mi bde bar bya'o// de nas dge slong tshul shing 'dreg pas lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi tshul shing rnams blangs la/ g.yon pas chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams blangs nas/
[r/ ]u/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ chos kyi tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa dang/ chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams kyi bsdams pa ma yin pa
brjod par bya ste/ gnas brtan 'di dag ni chos kyi tshul gang lags te/ ya lo mamachis pa/ kyag kyog ma mchis pa// kyis skyor ma mchis pa/ kha dog bzung ba
reg na bde ba lags kyis bzhes shig/ 'di dugan chosam len pa'i tshul shing lags te/ ya yo dang kyag kyog dang kyang kyor dang kha dog ngan la reg na mi bde
ba lags n bzhes shig/ gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na ba de logs su lag pa bzed na/ tsheg dang bo la yang sbyin par mi bya/ gnyis pa la yang sbyin par
mi bya gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung pa bshegs bar bya'o// de bzhi du dge 'dun gsar
bu'i bar gyi mdun du 'duganas/ chos kyi tshul shing rnams kyi bsngags pa dang/ chos ma yin pa'i tshul shuTems kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ste/ 'di
dkani chos kyi tshul shangalags te/ ma gom mchis pa/ kyag kyog ma mchis la/ kyag kyon ma mchis pa/ kha dog bzang kha reg na bde ba lags kyis bzhes shig/ 'di dag ni tshes
ma yin pa'i tshul shange lags te/ a lo dang/ kyag kyog dang/ kyar skyor dang/ kha dogangan pa regan mi bde ba lags n bzhes shig/ gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na ba de
log su lag pa bzed na/ tshig dang po la sbyin par mi bya/ gnyis pa la sbyin par mi bya/ gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/ de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bus 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes
byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o// gal te chos kyi tshul shing ltung bar gyur nA/ kun shes ko'u di rgya'i tshulashing blang bar bya'o// gal te chos kyi tshul shing gcig gis lhag par gyur na yang/

de ltar na 'di lta sta/ chos kyi rtsod pa de nye b.razhi ba yin no// de ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa la gal te 'gal zhig skyo rdzogs byed na ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gal te chos ma yin
pa'i tshul shing gcig gis lhag par gyur na yang/ de ltagan 'di la sta/ chos ma yin pas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa yin no// de ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa la 'ga' zhig skyo sngogs byed

nyes byas su 'gyur ro// de lta grang tshul shing mang po blang ba rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing/ de ltaran 'di ni kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta sta/ gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa zhi
bar byed pas dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ nye bar zhi pa yin no// dge slong dga' gyed ba'i rtsod pa la zhi bar byed pa gnyis kyis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/
mngon sum du 'dul ba 'os pa dang/ gang tshul shing mang po blung bsaso/// dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i
chos gsum gyis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya'o// gsum gang zhe na/ mngon sum du 'dul ba dang/ dran pas 'dul ba dang/ ma chos pas 'dul ba'o// dge slong
dug ji ltar na mngon sum gyis 'dul ba ni rtsod pa zhi ba'abyed pa yin/ ji ltar na ni 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul ba'i rtsod pazhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/
zhi ba dang/ nye bar zhi ba yin zhen/ skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas/ gnas brtan gyi bar gyis gongam bzhin du lta/ dag slong dag de ltar na mngon sum du 'dul ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed ba yin/
zhing/ de ltar na 'di na khacig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ chu bur zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag ji ltaran dran/
bas 'dul ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ jiltaran 'di na kha cig rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ dran pas 'dul ba'i rtsod pa rnams zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ nya bar zhi
b.lin zhe na/ dpan tshe dang ldan pa spyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bdan pas skur ba btab pa de la dge slong rnams gleng bar byadad/ gzhi dus gleng ba na ngo 'o zha bya ba'i skams re dag
wa/ slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis gyad bu nor dang gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la dran/
bas 'dul bar 'os pa byin nug/ sbyin pa ni 'di ltar sbyin par bya sa/ gnas mal bshams la/ gats+tshagadungs nas/ dris pa'i tshig gis dag slong rnams lo mang rdeg par bsgo la/
dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang/ rgyud bu nor gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig la gal ti/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gdud pa byas la/ rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog
bur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad ces/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag rgyud bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' chos mi bden pas skur pa btab pas/ bdag la dge
slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/ bdag la gzhi des gling bar bgyid pa dge 'dun la dran pas 'dul ba gsol na ) dge 'dul btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse bas nye bar bcu
ste/bdag khyadabunor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/ de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o//
dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol ) gyad bu 'dis dge slong ma mdzo mos mi bden bas skur pa btab pas/ 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi dus gleng bar bgyid te/ 'dil
a/ gzhi des gleng bar brgyad pa dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzodan/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/
'di ltar dge 'dun kyis rgyud bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad do/ 'di ni gsol ba'o/ las bya bani dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gyad bu nor 'di la dag/
slong ma mdza' chos mi bden pas skur pa btab pas/ 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/ 'di la gzhi des gling bar bgyid pa no/ dge 'dun pas dran pas 'dul
ba gsol to/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis rgyud bunor la dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzod nA 3 tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar bzod pa de dag ni chung mA
gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis pa dang gsum kyi bar du brjod par bya'o// dag 'dun kyis
bzed cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'ani to// chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul
ts+tso ba sbyin pa gsum dang chos kyi gsum mo// chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong bas pham pa'i ltung ba byung ba de la dag slong rnams gzhi des
gleng bar byed cing/ de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun la dran bas 'dul ba gsol te/ de la dge 'dun la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin ba'i dran pas 'dul ba
spyin pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ni bsil bar 'os pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta sbyo/ dge slong dge 'dun lhagam dang ) ltung byed dang/ so sor bshags pa dang/ nyes byas
kyi ltung ba byung ba de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gling bar byud cing/ del gzhi des gleng ba'akhyed pa na/ dge 'dun las dran bsaM 'dul ba gsolate/ dag 'dun gyis de la dran pas
'dulaM ba sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te da ni'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bshags par 'os pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ dge slong bye ma skyes smyos sangs
'khrugs/ tshor bas nyen te sgron tshor byung nas/ dag sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes sumathun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad/ sgras brtsa lanas/ khargyug zags/ mig bgra/ bzhin gyur te/
gnyid kyis ma phog par gnyid kyis log go snyamadu shes/ pha rol gyisam smras bar smas so samadu shes so/ dus gzhan zhig na des rang gi g.yas slar sor chud pa dang/ rdol gzhi des
dag slong rnams gleng bar khyadatsang/ de la gzhi des slong bar byed pa ni de dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chosan/
yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nam myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ dge slong gzhi ldan dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba nyid
shes pa las brjod nas phyis dran te/ zhes pa las nang brjed pa dang/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin pas dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ de ni de'i ngo bo nyo de tshol du gzhug par 'os pa'i phyir te/ 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum yin no// chos kyi dran pa sa'adul bsnyen pa gsum gang zhe na/
'di lta sta/ gyad bu nor la dag slongam mdza' mos mo bden pas skur pa btab pa de la/ dge slong rnams gzhi des glang bar byad zhing/ de'ang gzhi des gleng bar byed pa ni/ dge 'dun
la dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pasaM 'dul ba sbyin pa'i/ chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no/ 'di lta sta/ dge slong zhig la ltung ba gzhan
kho na zhig byung bar gyur pa de la// dge slong rnams kyis gzhi gzhan gyis gleng bar byed cing/ da lagazhi das gleng bar khyad pani/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba
gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no// 'di ltasta/ dge slong zhig ltung ba byung bar gyur la/ des de dge
tsa 4/ slong gi mdun du bshags pa 'am byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa de la/ dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cung/ de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul
ba gsol to/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pani/ chos kyi dran pas 'jul ba sbyin pa yin te/ gsum po 'di dag ni chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no// dge slong dag de lta na dran

bas 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing/ de ltar 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang zhe bar zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag ji ltar nam rgyus pas 'dul ba

'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsodra ba zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang 3 nye bar zhi ba yon zhe na/
bdi lta ste/ dge slong bye ma skyas smos ) sogs 'khrugs 3 tshor bsanyan nas smramatshor byung ste: dag slong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad/ sgras brtsi la nas/
kha chu zags/ mig gyur/ bzhin gyur/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis leg go snyam du shus/ pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du shes so// dus gzhan zhig na des rang gi sem
sor chud pa dang/ de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed de/ de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na ) dge 'dun la ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol ba'i skabs de dug slong rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong bya ma skyes dang/ gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung/
ba lam myos pas 'dul ba byin cig/ sbyin pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal nga mas la/ gaN+Di brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la nga dag nga ra bsgo la/ dag
'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur ba dang dge slong bye ma skyes kyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tshu gzar te/ rgan pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdud pa byas la/ rgan pa'i mthar tsogatsog
pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar la tshig 'di skad ces/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong bya ma skyas smos ! sems 'khrugs tshor bas 'an nas smran mor
( phyung ste/ dge slong gi tshul yin pa/ rjes sumathun pa ma yin pa mang du spyod/ smras brtsi la nas/ kha chu khrags[”]mig gyur/ bzhin gyur te/ gnyid kyisam ltog par
gnyid kyis log gosAm du 'tshol/ pha rol kyis ma smasu par sgras so sAm du 'tshol ba las/ dus gzhan zhig na bdagasems sor chud pa dang/ bdag la dge slong rnams gzhi des
gleng bar bgyidang ) bdag la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/ dge 'dun la ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs rtswa bas nye bar
[78 ]bzung ste/ bdag dge slong bya ga skyes la ma myos pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/ de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las
bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol ) dge slong bye ma skyes 'di smyos/ sams 'khrugs/ tshor bas nyenanas smanamor byung// dag sbyong gi tshul ma
logs pa/ rjes sumathun pa ma lags pa mang du spyad/ smras brtsal nas/ kha chu zags/ mig gyur/ bzhin gyur ti/ gnyidakyisam log par gnyid kyis log go snyam du'atshal/
pha rol gyis ma smras bar snas so snyam du 'tshal ba las/ dus gzhan zhig na 'dis rang gi sums sor chud pa dang/ 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid cing/ 'di la gzhi//
des gleng bar 'gyur pa dge 'dun la ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang/ de'i slad
du dge 'dun gyis dge slong bya ma skyes la ma myos pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzod do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol ) dge slong bye
ma skyes 'di smos/ sems 'khrugs/ tshor bas nyin nas smanamor byung/ 2 dag sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/ rjes sumathun pa ma lags pa mang du spyod/ smras brtsal nas
kha chu zags/ mig gyur/ bzhin gyur te/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid gyis log go snyam du 'tshal/ pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du 'tshal ba las/ dus
gzhan zhigan 'dis rang gi sams sor chud pa dang/ 'di la dag slong rnams gzhi res gleng bar bgyid cing ) 'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/ dge 'dun las ma myos pas 'dul ba
ts+tsA gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong byem skyes lam mos pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dgaslong bye ma byas la ) ma myos pas 'dul ba stsol bar
mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni ngag gsung zhig/ gang dgami bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis pa drang gsum gyi bar du brjod
par bya'o// dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong bya sa skyil ma myos pas 'dul bstsa la lags ti/ 'di ltar na mi gdung bas de de bzhin du 'dzan to/
sam yin pa'i ma mos pas 'dul bas 'os pa sbyin pa gcig dang/ chos kyi gcig go/ chos ma yin pa'i gcig gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dag slong ma smos par bdag ni smyos so//
N+NaM sems ma 'khrugs par sems 'khrugs so snyam du shes pa dang/ dge 'dul gyis de la ma myos pas 'dul par 'os pa sbyin pa ni/ chos ma gzhi pa'i ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa
[r]3 yin te/ 'di ni chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin no// chos kyi gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong bye ma skyes smos sems 'khrugs/ tshor bas nyin 'us sbyin mor byung ste/ dge sbyong gi
ts+tsalam yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin ma mang du spud/ sgras brtsalan/ kha chu khrugs/ mig gyur/ bzhi gyur to/ de gnyid kyis su log par gnyidakyis logasAm du shes pha rol
gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du shes pa las/ gnus gzhan zhig na des rang gi sems sor chud pa dang/ de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing/ de la gzhi des gleng bar
byed pa na/ dga' dun la ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin ba ni/ chos kyi ma mos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ste/
'di'i chos kyi gcig yin no// dge slong dag de ltar nam myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing/ de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams dul ba dang/ zhi bdang/
nye bar zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag gdams ngag mad pa'i rtsod pa la/ rtsod pa'i bar bya ba'i chos 'di gsum gyis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya ) nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ mngon
sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang/ dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa dang/ ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pas so// dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa la// tsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i ]
gla@#// chos bzhis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya// nye bar zhi bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ khas blang bar 'os pa dang/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang/ de'i ngo bo 'di tshol du/
gzhug par 'os pa dang/ rtswa bkram pa lta bu r 'os pas so// dge slong dag ji ltar khas blang bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta//

khas blang 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta sta/ dge slong ltung ba byung bar gyur pa de la gzhi des glengs kyang rung/ ma glengs kyang rub/
dran par byas kyang rung/ dran par ma byas kyang rung/ dge slong zhig gi mdun du 'duganas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan M pa dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ltung
ba 'di lta bu zhig byung ba de/ bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du mthol zhing bshags par bgyi'o// bdag gis mthong zhing bshags na bde ba la reg par gnas der 'gyur gyi/
ma mthol ma bshags na ni ma lags so// des ltung ba mthong dam zhes brjod par bya'o// des kyang ltung ba mthong ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// snga mashos kyis phyis sdom par byed
dam zhes brjod par bya'o// phyi mashos kyis bgyid do zhes brjod par bya sta/ 'di ni khas blang ba'o// chos ma yin pa'i khas blang ba sbyin pa bcu dang/ chos kyi bcu'o//
chos ma yin pa'i khas blang ba sbyin pa bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba byungal/ bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la/ dag 'dun gyis khas len du 'dzug/
pa ni/ chosam yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa yin no// dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed dang/ so sor bshags pa dang/ nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba la bdag la ma byung ngo snyam/
du shes pa dang/ dge 'dun gyis de la khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i las len pa sbyin pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong phas pham ba'i ltung ba ma byung laM//
bdagal byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la 3 dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len spyin pa yin no// draga'adun lhag ma dang/ ltung byed dang/
so sor bshigs pa dang/ nyes byas kyi ltung ba ma byung la bdag la byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/ u0f8bchos ma yin pa'i khas len pa
pa ste/ 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa bcu yin no// chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa b.ru gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong las pham pa'i ltung ba byungal/
bdag la byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la ) dga' dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yin no// 'di lta sta/ rag slong phas pham pa'i ltung bo ma byungo la/
bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la/ bdag 'kham byung ro snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos kyi khas len pa'i sbyin pa yin no//
dge 'dun lhag ma dang/ ltung byed dang/ so sor bshags pa dang/ zhes byas kyis ltung ba ma byung la 3 bdag las byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni/
chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa ste/ 'di dag ni chos kyis khas len pa'i sbyin pa bcu yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na khas blang 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa min zhing/ de lta na 'di na bzhug
yaM rtsod pa rnams 'di lta skyo/ khas blang 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ nye bar zhi ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
mgon med brus sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so// de'i tshe dang ldan pa ra dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po yangs pa'i gra'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsi gas pa'i gnas na 'dug go 'di la brtams
yangs pa can gyi lo tsa byi rnams ) sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang ) dge 'dun la lhag par bya ba byed pa dang/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin

gyi bu nag po 'digazhan nyid du btsas la ) gzhan du tshen bor gyur pa ste ) mnyan yod du skyes pa de la yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams lhag par dad par byed kyis/ de la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya ste

[z/]des na de la langs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ma dang pa skye bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas// de la glags tshol bar gyur to// jitsam na khyim bdagatsug gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag srong gi dge

'dun bsro khang gi khrus la spyan drangs pa dang 2 dge slong rnams kyis kabrar thag la chos gos rnams bkal te khrus bya bar brtsams so// tshe dang ldan pari dgas 'dzan gyi bu nag pos kyang/ shes bzhin gyis mdza'

gcig tu tshogs bzhag nas khro bya bar brtsams so// dge slong gzhan zhig gis kyang phyogs de nyid du chos gos bzhag go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa re dgas 'dran gyi bu nag pos khrus byas nas// 'di nyid bdag gi tshes go ga yin

sgosnyam nas dge slong de'i chos gos bgos te song ngo// jitsaman ngag slong de langs na rang gi chos gos de mi snang nas/ des dge slong rnams la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i tshes gos sus brkus/ jig phyogs

de tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug pa des thos nas/ des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa mkhan pos phyogs 'dir chos gos bzhag na/ des nor te khyer bar ma gyur kyang/ re zhig kho/

bos song la mkhan po la dri'i zhi ba dkar po'i drung du song g+ha g+ha pa/ mkhan po khyod kyis su zhig gi chos gos blangs/ des smras pa/ bu kho bo'i 'od mkhan po ngag slob ge go nag gi tshos gos phyogs de da

dubazhag ba de kho na mchilal sa so/ bu gal te de lta na chos gos gos de dag myur dushogatsug blta'o// des de khyer te 'ongs na/mkhan po chos gos 'di ngo mkhyen par mdzodatsug 'des ngo shesan bu ngas nor ba
ta'ongs kyis// dge slong de 'i 'di dag yan gyis skyolatsug/ des khyer te dag song de'i drung du song nas smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa chos gos 'di dag mkhan pos nor te khyer ro// des smras pa/
