za des rku sams kyis blangs pas phas pham pa'i ltung ba byung ngo// de nas thugs tshol ba'i dge slong de rnams kyis de la gleng bam byas/ dran par m byas par ) mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas
wA/ so// tsho dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag pos bsamaMs pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dud pa bskyed pa ni dkalal/ ma dad pa skya bar ni sla bas/ gal te 'dugan gdon mi za bar yangs pa can
gyi li tsa byi rnamasam dad pa skye bar 'gyur gyis/ mdoranamanyan yod kho nar 'gro'o snyam nas/ des yangs pa can gyi 'ali tsa byi rnams la ma bltas par/ des lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas mchan

bod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song sta/ rims kyis rgyu zhing song ba na mnyan yod du phyin pa dang de dag song rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nag po 'ongs pa legs so// 'ongs pa legs

so khyod mthong ba ni kho bo cag dga' ba 'ongs pa nim yin no// ci'i phyir 'di ltar khyod la brten nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/ ngos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad
pas/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la lhag par bya ba byed do// des smras pa/ da nimad mod kyi yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis bdag la gleng bar ma byas/ dran pa ma byas
dpar/ mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba gang la pa// dag slong 'dug
nyig khyed ngas chos kyis bslang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyis bslang ngod yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams bdagatug gis/ dge slonganag po stonamad la gnod pa
ma byas pa la ma byus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa gang yin pa ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas/ de rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs kyi mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu
zhing song ba las/ de rnams kyis las kar dge slong zhig byung nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod gang nas 'ongs// mnyan yod nas so// khyod kyis ri dgas 'dzan gyi bu nag po mashong/
ma/ mthong ngo// de rtse bya/ kho bo cag gis da skyon med pa gnod pa ma byas pa la gleng ba ma byas/ dran par ma byas par mthus gnas nas dbyung pa'i las byas so//
bslang zin no// sus bcom ldan 'das kyis so// de na kha cig gis 'di skad ces smras so// bsrung ba ni ma yin gyi brag bsring bar boslang ba yin te/ 'di ltar
de bdag cag gis gna' nas dbyung ba'i las byas la// bdag cag gi mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i de bslang ba ni rigs pa ma yin no// nga rigs smos pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das
dngos kyi rje/ bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rjes bslang na legs par bsrung ba yin no// de rnams rims kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang/ lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos
su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa drang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs
gdugaM tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la// yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag phyag bus pa/ blun pa// mi gsal ba/ mi mkhas pa
rnams kyis ri dgos 'dzin gyi bu nag posnyon ma mchis pa gnod pa ma bgyis pa la// gleng ba ma bgyis dran pa ma bgyis par/ mthus gnas nas dbyung pa'i sa bgyis pa bdag drug 'gyod
pa skyes nas 3ri dgas 'dzin gyi du nag po la bgrod pa gsol du 'dir mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag rtsod pa de de bzhin gshags pa 'di lta ste/
chos kyis bslang zin no/ btsun pa bdag cag gis shul kar dag slong zhig las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsod pa de 'di lta sta/ chos kyis bsrung lags so zhus thos te/ de lta lags mod
kyi bdag cag gi nang na kha shug gi mchid nas 'di skad ces/ bsrung ba ma lags kyi/ bag bsring bar bslang ba lags te/[“]di ltar des bdagabag mngonasum du ma gyur to zhes 4 chi'o//
[As] ]gzhan dag ni gal te bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje/ bde bar gshegs pa chos kyirjes bslang ba ni legs par bslang ba lags so zhesumachi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ kya ra
nga'i nyan thos rnams ni 'dilta sta/ ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar bya bar 'dod do sAm du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag
ji ltar na mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/
zhi ba dang/ nyi bkazhi ba yin zhen/ dge slong dag 'di la chos 'dul bas gang khrag gis gang zag la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang/ chos 'dul bas gnyis dang/ mang po dang/
dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang/ chos 'dul bas gang khrag gnyis kyis gang zag lamig bzhi mngonasum du gleng ba dang/ chos 'dul bas/gang zag gnyis kyi gnyen
dang mang po dang/ dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba dang/ chos 'dul bas gang zag mang pos gang zag la mig bzhi mngon sum gleng ba dang/ rnyog 'dul bas gang zag
mang pos gnyis dang mang po dang 3 dpe 'dun la mig nga'i mngon sum du gleng ba dang/ chos 'du' pas dge 'dun gyis gang zag la mi ga ba'i mngomo bum du[︽]bang chos 'a
bas dge 'dun gyi gnyis dang/ mang po dang/ dge 'dun la mig bzhi mngon sum du gleng ba'o// chos ma yin pa'i mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pasbyin pa
za/ bcu drug dang/ chos kyi ba ru drug go/ chos ma yin pa'i bcu drug gang zhe na/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis//
[“ ]kyis/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang/ gang khrag chos dang mthun pa mang pos/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang/ dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa[】 ]gang zag chos dang mthun
pa dang/ gang brag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyi sa ) gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang ) gang brag rdzong dang yimathun pa gnyis kyis ) gang bragachos dang mthun pa gnyis dang gang zug
chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis kyis/ dge 'dun chos dang mthun pa dang/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun/
pa mang pos/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos/ gang brag chos dang mthun pa gnyis dang/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos/
[ ]gang zagachos dang mthun pa mang po dang/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang pos/ dga' dun chos dang mthunapa dang/ dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas ) gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang/
dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis dang/ dge 'dun chos ngangayi mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mthun paang po dang/ dge 'dun chos dang mims pas/
dge 'dun chos dang mthun pa ste/ 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'imangon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug yin no// chos kyis mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyor pa bcu drug/
gang zhe na/ gang zag chos dang mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang/ gang zag chos dngamathun pas/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang/ gang drug
sa dang mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang/ gang thog chos dang mthun pas/ dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa dang/ gang khrag ngos dang mthun
pa gnyis kyis )gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa dang/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis kyis/ gang zlogachos drang mi mthun pa gnyis dang/ gang zag chod pa dang mthun pa gnyis
kyis gang zug chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa gnyis kyis/ dge 'dun tsho dang mi mthun po dang/ gang zag ngos dang mthun pa mang pos
gang khrag chos dang mi mthun pa dang/ gang bragachos dang mthun pa mang pos/ gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang/ gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang pos ) gang zag
chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang gang zag chos dang mthun pa mang pos/ dga' dunatshos dang mi mthun pa dang/ dge 'dun chos dang mthun pas/ gang zag
! chos dang mi mthun pa dang ) dge 'dun chos dang mthun pas/ gang zag chos dang mamathun pa gnyis dang/ dag 'dun chos dang mthun pas/ gang brag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang/
dge 'dun chos dang mthun pas// dge 'dun chos dang mi mthun pa ste/ 'di dgan chos kyis mngonasum du 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug yin// dag slong dag de ltar na mngon
sum du 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing/ de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/
zhi ba dang 3 nye bar zhi ba yin no// dug slong dag ji ltar na de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du gzhug par 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na 'di na kha zhig rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ de'i
ngo bo nyidi tshol du gzhug par 'os pa'i rdo da pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang 3 nye bar zhi ba yin zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma bzhi dag 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba brjod pa
ny+tsalas brjod pa slar dran te/ shes pa las yang brjed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ) dge
0 slong dag khyed kyis dge slongs bzhi dang gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la/ de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin cig/ sbyin pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnasaAl
bshams la// gaN+Di brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par sgo la// dge 'dun thams cad tshogasashing mthun par byung pa dang/ dge slong ma
bzhis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog pur 'dug la thal mo sbyar te/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol ba byas te/ dge
'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// bdag dag slong ma bzhi dag 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bsgyur pa las/ bskyud pa slar dun ti'atshal ba khayang bskyang nas/ dga' dun
la bdag de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol na dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtsa ba can thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slongs bzhi 'a de'i
ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsal du gsol/ de skadalan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dag slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/
dge 'dun btsunapa rnams gsan du gsol// dge slong ma bzhi 'di dag 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bskyad pa lasA) bskyod pa slar dran tu 'tshol ba dang/ yang
bskyod nas dge slong bzhi 'di dge 'dun la da'i ngo bo 'di tshol du gzhug par 'os pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab nga babodan/ dge 'dun kyis gnang
ngar mdzod cig dang/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyide tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsal bar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol pa'o// lasani 'diltar bya ste/ dge
'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ma bzhi 'di dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bskyed pa las/ bskyed pa slar dran te 'tshol ba dang/ yang bskyod nas 'di ltar dag 'dun gyis dge

slong ma bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa dog dag slong ma bzhi la de'i ngo ngo 'ditsholadu gzhug par 'os pastsol bar bzod pa de dag nitsang ma gsung
zhig/ gang dgami bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ) de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o// dge 'dun gyis bzod cing/
gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma bzhi la de'i ngo bo nyid tsho'i du gzhug par 'os pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ngas de'i ngo
hU~M bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byin pa'i dag slongagis rab tu dbyung bar mi bya//
bsan par rdzogs par mi bya/ gnas mi srin/ dge tshul gzhag par mi bya/ 'dzeg la sa mi bya/ las byed par bsgo bar mi bya/ 'di dge slongs la gdams ngag
sbyin par mi bya ) dge slong ma'i gdams ngag ston par bsko bar mi bya/ sngon bskos na yang dge slong ma la gdams ngag sbyin par mi bya/ 'dis dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang/
lta ba nyams pa dang/ srodapa nyams pa dang/ 'tsho ba nyams pas gleng bar mi bya/ dran par mi byas) 'jis gdams ngag dbog par mi bya/ gso sbyong
la ma yin 3 dgag dbye la ma yon/ gsol bal ma yin/ gsol ba dang gnyis 'ad ma yin/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las la ma yin zhing/ gang dag 'dul ba
'dzin pa gzhan yod na// dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dul ba gdon par yang mi bya'o// de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa byon pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar
thanus pa bzhin/ yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ ga sal yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid tsho' du gzhug paNa'os pa sbyin pa chos ma
yin pa'i gcig dang chos kyi gcig go/ chos ma yin pa'i gcig gang zhe na/ 'di ltasta/ dge slong gzhi ldan dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba dran te shes pa la brjed pa de brjod/
@#@#/ ]nas yang dran pa de la dge 'dun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa spenapa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i de'i ngo bo nyiditshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa sta/ 'di/
ni chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin no// chos kyi gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gzhi can dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba brjod pa las brjed par slar dran te/ shes pa de yang
brjod pa de la dge 'dun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa na pa byin pa ni/ chos kyis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa sbyin pa ste/ 'dini chos kyi gcig yin no//

dge slong dag de ltar na de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du gzhug par 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing/ de ltar na 'din kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du gzhug par 'os
pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar bar byed pas dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang 3 nye bar zhi ba yin no/ dge slong dag ji ltarAn rtswa bkram pa lta bu 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na 'di
na khartsig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ rtswa bkram pa lta bu r 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang ) nye bar zhi ba yin na nA ) 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams 'thabs par
gyur nang mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang ) 'gyed par gyur nas gnas shing/ phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du rnam par gnas na/ phyogs gcig na dge slong gnas brtan gnas khan gang yang

rung ba/ shes nyen shes nyenatsan gang yang rung ba gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba lod pa gang 'dun pa des rang gi phyogs kyi drung du song sta tshig 'di skad ces[. ]tshe dang ljang pa dag bdag cag legs/
par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/ 'thubasapar gyur nang mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyed par gyur pa na bdag cag gis rnyed pa red pa ma yin te/ nyis
pa red kyi yogs pa ma red pas/ tshe dang ljon pa dag gzhi 'di la kho bo dang khyod kyi ltang ba byung ba gang 'a na pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po 'am/ khyim na gnas pa las baNan pa ma gtogs pa )

kho bos bdag dang khyed kyi ched du tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi drung dum btsab par mthol zhing bo shags par spre'u zhes smra bar bya'o// gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs nas dge slong gcig gis kyang
smras pa/ ma bzlog cing mi gshe na/ de nas dge slong des phyogs cig shos kyi drung du song nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gatrar te/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gdud pa byas la/ tsog tsog
bur 'dug statshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thabs par gyur cing ) mchong 'dra bo dang/ 'thab mo dang/
'gyed par gyur pa ni/ kho bo cag gis rnyed pa red pa ma yin te/ nyes pa red kyi legs pa ma red pas ) gzhi 'di la kho bo dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kho nam
'gro ba sbom po 'am// khyim na gnas pa las brten pa ma gtogs pa// kho bo bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ched du khyed kyi drung du ma btsub par mthol zhing bshags par sbolo zhes
smra bar bya'o// phyogs gcig shos nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang sa dang ba/ shis rten can shis nyican gang yang rung ba/ gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa gang yin pa des
kyang rang gi phyogs kyi drung du song statshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byunganag/ 'thabs par gyur cing/ mtshang 'dru
ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'byed par gyurapa ni/ bdag cag gis red pa rad pa ma yon taM/ nyes pa rod kyi legs pa ma red pas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di la kho bo dang
khyad kyi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po 'am khyim na gnas pa las brtan pa ma gtogs pa// kho bos bdag dang khyad kyi rmad du tsha dang ldan pa de dag gi drung
du mi brgyab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o zhes sma mar bya'o// gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs nas dge slong gcig gis kyang spus pa/ ma bzlog ning mi she na/ donas dug
slong de phyogs cig shos kyi drung du song nas bla gos phrag pa garIg tu gzar te/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gdud pa byas la ) gtsogatso pur 'dug ste tshoga'adi skadabus 3 tsho dang
ldan pa dag kho bo cig legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/ 'thabs par gyuranying/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyed par gyur pa ni da kho bo cag gis
red pa red pa ma yin te/ nyes pa red kyi legs pa ma red pas/ gzhi 'di la kho bo dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po 'am/ khyim na
gnas pa 'gas brten pa ma gtogs po/ kho bos bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis ched du khyod kyi drung du me'achab par mthol zhing bshags par sbyo'o zhes smra bar bya'o// gang gi tshe phyogs
gcig gis rig shos la 'am/ cig shos kyis nug shos la snga sa la ltung ba lta bu r byed/ 'byung bar spyod/ mtshangs par nya bar ston par mdzad kyi phan tshun du ltung ba sgrog
bas gling bar mi byed na/ da lta na rtsod pa de 'di lta ste/ rtswa bkram pa lta bu r 'os pas zhi ba yin te/ dge slong dag de ltaran rtswa 'gram pa lta bu r 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin
zhing de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'dilta ste/ rtswa bkram pa lta bu r 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ nye bar zhi ba yin no// dge slong
dag ltung ba'i cod panirtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhi po 'dis dul bar bya 3 zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni 'diwAste/ khas blang bar 'os pa dang/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os
pa dang/ de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du gzhug par 'os pa dang/ rtswa bkram pa lta bu r 'os pas so// dge slong bya ba'i rtsod pa ni dge 'dun mthun pas zhi bar bya'o// dag
slong dag gnas gang na dge slong gcig gnas pa don 'thab pa mad ]mtshang 'dru ba mad/ 'thab mo med ) 'gyad pamed do// gang na gnyis yod pa de na yang 'thab pa med/ mtshang 'dru ba
man 'thab mo yod/ 'gyod pa med do// gang na gsum yod pa de na yang 'thab pa med/ mtshang 'dru ba med/ 'thab mo mang/ 'gyod pa mad do// gang na dge slong/
bzhi 'am lhag pa gnas pa de na ni/ 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyed pa yod do// dge slong dag/ tshangs pa ji bzhin gcig de bzhin )
brgya byin ji bzhin gnyis de bzhin// rgyal po ji bzhin gsum de bzhin/ de las lhagapa 'khrug par 'gyur// dge slong dag de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ tshig bzhi ba'i tshugs su
bcad pa gcig 'dzin pa gang yin pa de la yang 3 chos kyird pa sbyin par bya zhing/ des kyang longs spyod par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod khar ni mi bya'o// rtsod pa'i gzhi rtogs so//
'dul ba gzhi//
00 ris dang bzang po dang// 'khor dang ko'u don rdzu 'phrul dang// ko'u shi kas zos pang pa dang// mnar med lhagagyur phyis 'o// sdom ni/ mang pos bkur dang seng ge 'gram//
legs par rab sad de bzhin du// dga' ldan 'dod pa'irigs dang ni// 'dun pas 'dug dang gzhong pa dang// srin bu go spobs bzang len dang// lhag bcas pa dang de banu'o// yangs
pa can du bstan pa dang// rab sbyin dang ni grags 'dzanadang// ngang pa dang ni mkhas ma dang// sa 'tshogani bstan pa dang// 'dzam bu ri dgas nang skyes dang// rigs bdun ngan
sdong bu dang ni// rgyal po khab dang dka' shubadang// yang 'bur dka' spyod dga' bo dang// nag po'akra shis de bzhin du/ bdud gzhom pa ni byas pa dang// 'khor ni
mdo ru bsdus pa'o// gru 'dzin du dgra 'dul dang brgya tham pa'o// dmag gis mi tshugs su ma rgyal ba las rgyal dang lnga khri bzhi stongango// wA rA NA sir bzod dkab dang

drug khri sum stong ngo// kim pa lar tshangs sbyin dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo// glang portsa'i grong du glang pos sbyin dung sum khri nyis stong ngo// rdo'ajog tu bal bu can dang lnga stong ngo// brang

gis nyal du chin po che 'dul dang sum khri nyis stong ngo// ma rgyal ba las rgyal du brgya byin dang sum khri nyis stong ngo/ ka na kub dzar rgyal sde dang sum khri nyis stong ngo// tsam par klu'i lha dang
khri brgyud sbyong ngo// ta la'i 'phrang duma'i lha dang nyi khri lnga stong ngo// tam lar rgya mtsho'i lha dang khri nyis stong ngo// ba so'i klong du blo gros bzang po dang khri brgyad stong ngo//

rgyal po'i khab tu mun sal dang nyi khri lnga stong ngo// wArA NA sir dbang phyug chen po'i lta dang brgya tham pa'o// rtswa can du rgya mtsho sde dang brgyud khri bzhi stong ngo// gru 'dzin du dka' thub spyod dang
stong ngo/ rtswa can du sa'i gdong dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo// wA rA t+tasar sa'i bdag po dang 'bum mo// dmag gis mi tshugs par sa 'dzin dang 'bum mo/ mi thi lar
lca po dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo// yang mi hrilar lcachen po nas bzung sta/ mu khyud nas shing rta su ba'i bar brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo// kun tu snying bar nam mkha'i 'dug po
dang klu mnyam skyong dang bdun khri bas stong ngo// wArA NA sa'i kri ka dang lag rgyas dang brgya tham pa'o// gru 'dzin du sna bu can dang bu ram shing parung brgya tham pa'o/ gru 'dzin du 'phags

smyos dang bu ram shing pa la sogs pas khyim gyi bar brgya tham pa'o// so skye'i gzhir shing rta bcu pa nas bzung ste/ lnga khri lnga stong byung ba la sang ga'i 'gram lasala'i sku/ bzhi po de rnams las
gnyis gnyis so/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi na gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de na sar skya'ogazhin gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang bo 'dun khang du tshogs/
[/ ]shing 'dunas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnamasani gang las skyes// thogasani gang yin/ rgyun ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
brgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri sta/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams gang las skyes/ thog ma'i gang yun/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya mas
kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'di na/ bdag cag gis shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes pa dang/ thog ma gang yin pa dang/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang/ shAkya rnams kyi
sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ nga bdagu nug bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyidazhusany+tsas )
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du bzung bar bya'o// de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po ! bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste
lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'duganas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ sor sbya'i
gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dir bdag cag ser skya'i gzhi'ishAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas/ bar skabs bka'
mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng sta/ shAkya rnams gang las skyas/ thogam ni gang yin rgyuni'i zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang na/ gal te badragacug
gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thogam ni gang yin/ rgyuni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang yin zhes
de skad 'drin/ bdagacag gis kyang shAkya rnamasani gang las skyes/ thogam ni gang yin/ rgyun ni zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad lung
bstan/ tshur bdag nug bcom ldan 'das gang na der dong la lhags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin
du gzung bar bgyi'o snyam nas de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes lags/ thogam ni gang lags//
rgyu ni ci zhigalags/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud las brtsams
saMchos kyi btam glengs na/ mu stegs can dang kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong go'u ta mni mi 'dod pa de lung ston pas/ bdag nyid la bstod par byed do zhes smra ba gang
[z]yin pa'i gnas 'di yod pas/ nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud las brtsams nas/ chos kyi gtam gleng bar nus pa su yod snyam mo/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa
mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pacho'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsalal/ mo'u 'gal
gyi bu nga rgyab srung bas re zhig de bsal gyis/ khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud las btsums nas/ dge slong rnams u0f8bskyos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis
shig tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das lanang mi smra bas khas blongs so// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos
cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nas/ snam sbyar bltab ste sngase phangs su bcug nas glo g.yas pa phab ste/ zhabs kyi snying du zhabasabazhaganas snang ba'i 'du shes
dang/ dran pa dang/ shis 'azhin dang/ ldang ba'i 'du shes kho na yid lamadzad pas mnal lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sams te/
ma la bdag gis sams ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud/ shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang/ thog ma gang yin pa dang/ rgyu rtse
[me]// zhig yin pa dang/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud gang yin pa mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o sAm nas/ de nas tsha dang ldan
tha pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chan pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhagan/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyis rigs brgyud mthong b.ra'agyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ tshadang
ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi buchen pos[“]shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud/ shAkya rnams gang las spyas pa dang/ thog ma gang yin pa dang/ rgyud nici zhig yin pa dang/ shAkya rnams
kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni gang yin pa mthong ngo// mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs/ dag slong gi dga' dun gyi gung bstan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ 'dug nas tshe dang
ldanupa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ gar skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la gas pa/ go'u tam dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig rung/ 'jig zhig na sems can phal chen 'od gsal gyi lha'as/
su skye bar 'gyur te/ da rnams dan yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa 3 dbang khom nyamagashangam tshang ba mad pa 2 yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ khra dog
bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od cananamamakha'al 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i las kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de'i tsha sa chen po 'di chu 'bar zhig tu 'gyur zhing/
mtsho gcig tu 'gyur ro// sa chen po 'di chu 'balazhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang/ mkhregs pa dang/ khebs par byed do// dper na 'o ma
bskol ba grangs par gyur pa'i stang du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang/ 'khrags pa dang/ khebs pa de bzhin du/ sachen po'adi chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcigatu gyur pa'i stong du
rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang/ 'khregs pa dang/ khebs par byed do// sa'i bcud da ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa yin
zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dpar na mar sa ra lta bu 'o/ rogi'adi lta bu yin te/ dpar na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do// go'u ta ma dag
'jig rten gang yin pa 'di 'chags shing 'jig rten chagasan 3 drenus sams can kha cig tshe bad ( las zad/ bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di
lta bu r mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam bar 'ong zhing de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyamasanganang ma tshangs pa med pa// yan lag dang nying lag
thams rud dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i bras kyis tsha ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i:
nyim dang zla ba yang 'jig rten dumi 'byung ste/ rgyu skar rnams kyang mad/ skadatsig dang/ thang cig dang/ udatsam yang shad/ mtshan mo dang nyin mo yang yod/
zla ba dang 1 zla ba phyed dang/ dus tshigs dang/ lo rnams kyang 'jig rtenadu 'byung ba mad do// smras pa dang bud mdadu mngon pa yang mad kyi/ gzhanadun sems can
sams can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro// de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis mdzub mo rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar myangs pa
de lta de ltar srid do// ji lta ji ltar srad pa de ltade ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis khra'o// sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzubamo'i rtsa mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed de/
jilta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar srod la/ ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas ga gyis zla ba mthong ngo// mthong nas de rnams kyis kyang 'dzubamo'i lta chos sa'i bcud
myang bar rtsom skya/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar srid do// ji lta ji ltar srid pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis khra'o// gang gi tshe sams can de rnams kyis sa'i
bcud la kham gyi zas rim kyis zos pa de'i tsha de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang ba dang lci ba zhugs pa gyur to// de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po gsol ba gang yin pa de yang nub par gyur pas//
[/ ]'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rten dumun pa byung na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rgyu skar dang/ skadazhig dang/ thang
cig dang/ yud tsam dang/ mtshan mo dang/ nyin mo dang/ zla bo dang ) zla ba phyad dang/ dus tshigs dang/ le 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de rnams de za zhing zas su zu bal
tsha ring zhing yun ring du gnasaso// de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung zad suwa pa gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de la/
dog ngan par gyur te/ kha brasakyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kyi sems na kho bo ni kha dog dang ldano//
khyodan kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis semA can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus
sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to// go'u ta ma dag sa'i bcud de nub pa na samasacan de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro brakyi bud bro ba zhes smra zhing :
sngags 'dodo la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dbar na da ltar mi rnams kyis zas zhim po cung zad tsag zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang/ tshogi dang/ tshoga'abu de nyid rdzogasu
dram nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du/ sams na de rnams sa'i bcud de nub pa na tshogs shang 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi//

chung bro ba kyi cud bro ba zhes smra zhing smra sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes de'i don ni mi shes so// go'u ta
ma dag sams na de rnams kyi sa'i bcud de nub pa na/ sa zhog kha rdog 'un sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kha dog ni 'di lta
bu yin te 3 dparan dong ka'i ma tog lta bu 'o// ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dparan sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsur ba lta bu 'o// de rnams de bzhing brasaM su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas
zla so// de rnams las kha zas las ches nyung du zla ba gang yin de ni kha dog dgodang ldan par gyur to// kha bras la ches mang du bya ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dran par gyur to// khrus kyitshad
gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas ) kyi sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan pa khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis
sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sazhag nub par gyur to// go'u ta ma dag sa zhag
de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi bu bro ba zhes smra zheng sma sngags 'don la mngan gyi sdug bsngal bar byed do// dper na da ltar
mi rnams sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba 'ga' zhig gis reg pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang/ tshig dang/ tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces/ e ma'o gyi hud e ma'o kyi
hud ces sna ngo de bzhin du sams can de rnams sa zhag de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smra sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngalabar
gyur kyang/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so// go'u tam dag gams can de rnams kyi sa zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i/
tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro bun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na shing ka dam pa ka'i mi tog
lta bu 'o// ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbranga'i btsung ba lta bu 'o// de rnams de za zhing de zas su khra ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las kha
zas la ches nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur ro// kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to// zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam
pa gnyisamangonano// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kyisams can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad/

du gsod par byed do// kha dog gimangon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pami dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyasamyu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to// go'u ta ma dgamyu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na/
sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ gnyanas phar song mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smra sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ dpar na da ltar mi
rnams 'ga' zhig la tshig drag po'i tshar bcud pas/ tshar gcad par 'dod pa na sngon gyi yi ga dang/ tshig dang/ tshig 'bru de dag nyid rjes su zlos shing 'di skad ces/ mdun nas
phar song mdun nas phar song zhes sgra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ mdunanas phar song mdun nas phar song zhes smra 'ang smra
sngags 'donal mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don mi shes so// go'u tu ma dag sems can de rnams /
kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas 3marmos ma btab pa'i 'brasas 'a 'i 'bras bu tshon bzhi pa thubam dang spun pa med pa/ shun pa yod pa dag gtsang ma skyas te/ ri nub brdzas nanang skyo zhing smin par 'gyur/

[/]nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur pas/ brngasangashing brngas kyang slar skye bas brdasapar yang yigangon no// de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// gang nas
sams can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras bu la lam gyi gras su rim gyis zos pa de nas de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad pa byung ba gyur te/ khacig la ni skyes pa'i dbang
po'o// kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o// de na budamad kyi dbang po nun gang yin pa rnams dang/ skyas pa'i dbang po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mig
tshugs su lta'o// ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lta ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so// ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar zhen no// jilta ji ltar zhen pa
de ltare ltar log par zhugs so// sams can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems nun la logapar zhugs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang su dang/ bong ba dang/ gsog
ma dang gyi mos gtor nas 'di skad ces/ sams canangan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do// sems can ngan pa thatshad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa an gyis/ kwa yasams
na khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o// dpar na da ltar mi rnams bag ma blangs pan phyam dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ gos dang/ 'bras mos kyis gtor
nas 'di skad ces// bag ma bde bar gyur cigs zer ba de bzhin du sams can rnams kyis// thamasacan gyis sams can la log par zhugs pa mthong ba na sus gtor rung/
bod ba dang/ gsag mo dang/ gyo ma rnams kyis kyang gtor nas 'di skad ces// sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do// sams na ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma
yin pa byed pa yan gyis ) kwa ya sems can khyod khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod do// go'u tan dag de ltar na sngon rjes ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin
pa dang/ sngon gyi 'dul ba ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar chos su 'dod/ 'dul bar 'dod do// sngon spyad par bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar bsngagasu par bya bar
'dod do// de rnams kyis de zhag gcig cig spangs pa nas/ zhag gnyis dang/ gsum dang bdun yang sbyangs so// gang nas sems can da rnams sdig pa can
dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la lhag par sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de nas/ de rnams khang du brtsi ga la brtson par byed de 'deng bdag nug bya ba ma yin pa spang do// 'dir bdaka

N+NaM cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do zhes zer bas khyig khyim zhes bya bar gragos te/ go'u ta ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du khang pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no// de yang chos
[z/ ]kyis yin gyis/ chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni gtso bo yin te/ de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs ka dang bza'/
ba don du gnyer ba yunganang par sa lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do// de nas sems chun snyom las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang par gyi sa lu nub blangs so// de nas sems can zhig gis
sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyod tshul sa lu'i phyir 'dong ngo// de nas sams can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kyi sems na khyod
rang gis lu lasoms shig/ kho bos ni nang par gyi sa lu nub blangs so// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs so// kyag de ni shin tu
legs kyis ma la bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang zhag gsum gyi dang/ zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sa lu blang ngo snyam nas 3 des zhagaganyis kyi dwang ) zhag
gsum gyi dang zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sa lu blangs so// de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ kye sems na khyod tshur sa lu'i phyir 'dong/
de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sams can khyod rang gi sa lu la soms shig/ kho bos ni zhag gnyis kyi nang/ gsum gyi dang/ zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sa lu blangs
zon no// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs so// ma de ni shin tu legs kyis// ma la bdag gis zla ba phyad dang zla ba gcig gi sa la blang ngo snyam/
nas/ des zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig gis lu blangs so// gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma mos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru gsog 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas thos
pa de nas sa 'bu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang/ sbyin pa dang/ shun pas log par gyur to// brdzasangashing brjes na yang phyir mi skya bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sa lu yang sbyangs sam yalaga'i
sbyabs 'a yod par gyur to// de nas sams can de rnams tshegs shing 'dus nas// shes ldan dag bdag cag sngon yid las byung nga 'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams shing la tshang ba/
zla mad la/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa// kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od dang ldan pa// rnam mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i bras kyis tshe ring
zhing yun medu gnas la/ bdag rgyug sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sumatshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur to// bdag cag sa'i bcud la kham/
gyi bus kyi rim gyis bros te/ gang gi tshe bdag gis sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi 'am gyis zos pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag gi lus la rtsub pa rnyed dang lci ba nyid zhugs par gyur te/ kha dog
[I«]bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur pas/ 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to// bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to/ bdag
chags kho khrus ches nyung du bya ba gang yin pa da ni kha dog bzang por gyur ) kha zas kyis ang du khrab gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur kha zas kyi tshod gnyis la brtems/
kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon ti/ 'dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kA la sams can kho bo ni kha dog dang lda la:/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis soms snyan la
khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag nyag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dug nyid blangs pa'i rgyas sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to// sa'i bcud de nub pa na
sa zhig kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ 'o na sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur to// bdag go de za zhing de zas su za bu latshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so//
bdag cag las kha khras ches nyung du zla ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du bya ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la
khan nas/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kA la soms na kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan lo/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes
soms can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyu sa
zhag de nub par gyur to/ sazhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri ngun sum tshogs pa/ ngo phun sumatshogs pa byung bar gyur te bdug cig de
sra zhing de dras su b+ho pa la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// bdogatsag rnams las kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha cus ches mang du bra ba/
tsati gang yin pa de ni dog na par gyur te// zas kyi tshod gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis ma no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kA lasomasumun kho bo ni
kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan payin no zhes sems can gyis sams can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dag ba'i
chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshul de nub par gyur to// myu gu'i tshal de nub pa nam rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru tshon bzhib zubam mad pa// sbyin pa mad pa// shunang

sh+tsa mad pa// dag pa gtsang ma skyes te/ de nub brngas na nang skye zhing sminaMpar 'gyur )nang brdzasan nub skyo zhing smin par 'gyur bas/ brngas shing brjes kyang slar yang skye bas brngas par yang mi
mngon te/ bdag cag de za zhing zas su gra ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// gang nas bdag cag gis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru gsog 'jog gi longs su longs spyod pas/
zlos pa de nas sa lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang sbyin pa dang/ shun pas g.yogs par gyur to// brngas shing brngas pa yang slar mi rgyu bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sa lu yang sbubs sam
yulag 'i sgrubs la yod par gyur pas/ mal bdag nag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams bcud la 'di ni khyed kyi'o// 'di ni nga'i 'o zhes mu thug bre gang bya'o zhes de rnams tshogs shing
'dus nas zhing bgos te mtshoms bcad u thug bresaso// go'u ta ma dag 'din 'jig rten du mu thug 'dri ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no// de yang chos kyis yin gyi sa
ma yin pas ma yin pa de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni chos kyi gtso bo an no// de nas sams can zhig gis rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa la ma byin par blangs so// semasucan
gzhan zhig gis sems can des rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyis 'u la ma byin par blangs pa mthong ngo// mthong nasayems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kA yasams can khyod rang gi sa
lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lu la ma byin par ci'i phyir rlung/ kwa sems nyan song la khyod phyin chad de ltar ma byed nug/ sams can des len gnyis lan gsum du nga rang gi sa lu
sum brgya nga dgu'ajul ba
[Ir ]/ yo da bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lum byin par blangs so// sems can des sems can de lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rang gi sa lu lod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lu ma byin par

len pa mthong ngo// mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kwa yi sems can khyod rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lu ma byin par ni'i phyir blangs zhes deb de par drangs tshur drangs
nas/ ci tsaman 'khor gyi nang du yang khrid de/ shes ldan dag sems can 'di rang gis lu yod bzhin du lan gnyis[”]sum lan gsum gyi bar du gzhan gyi sa lu ma byin par len bo zhes smyos so//
de nas sems can de rnams kyis soms na de la 'di skad ces smras so// kA ya sems can khyod rang gi sa la yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sa lu mkhyen par ci'i phyir blang/ kA ye sams can song
la khyod phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ de nas sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dgasams can 'dis bdag sa lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs te//
rtsisaMm na 'khor gyin du yang phyung nas rgyus so// de nas sams can de rnams kyis sams can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kA la sams can khyod kyis sams can las lu'i phyir par drangs
shes ldan dag sa lu'i phyir par 'dres tshur 'dren cing/ ji tsaman 'khor gyi nang du spro ba yang snang bas/ ma la bduganag tshogs shing 'dusal/ bdag cag gi nang na sams can lhag par
gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ ]lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de/ bdag dug gi zhing rnams kyi bdag por
bskos dang/ des bdag cag chad pas gcod par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur te// bdag cag gi zhing
dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de la chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus te/ de rnams kyi nang nas sums can lhag par gzugs bzang ba ) lhag/
par bltan sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa// lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te ) 'di skad ces kyi sams can khyod tshur shog/
kho bo cag las chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod cig/ phan gdugs par bya ba la ni phan thogs shig/ kho bo cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las khyodal kho bo
tshig gis chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin no// de de rnams la chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas gcod/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams ni phan 'dogs par byed cing/ de la de rnams
dkyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang ban pa de las chos bzhin du thog shas 'bul te/ skya bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur cing/ skya bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur bas/ mang pos
bkur ba mang bos bkur ba zhes grags so// zhing rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na nyags pa las skyob par byed pas/ rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so// chos kyis skyod dgu
bar byed chung tshul khrims nyams su blangs te gnas ) shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas gas/ rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi tshogi
rnams kyi ming sams can sems can zhes bya bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes zhes bya sta/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po 'od mdzes kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming tshur shog

tshur shog ces bya bar gyur to// 'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba zhes bya ste/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po dag ba'i tsho mi rnams kyi ming smra ba can smra ba can zhes bya bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dag dge ba'i bu
dgemchog ces bya ste/ go'u tu ma dag rgyal bo dag mchog gi tshe mi rnams kyi ming namagrin sprinamagrin zhes bya bar gyur to// dgamchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ste/ go'u tachu dag

rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming ta la'i rkang ta la'i rkang zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi borasha rman zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shan tuanyin te/ dpar na
0shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyodado// da smin nas brtol ba dang/ khyabu gzugs bkru ba/ bltan spu go pa mdzes pa/ skyes bu

chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung sta/ spyi bolas skyes pas spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyib+hAraMmo drug

khri'inang dubakri ba dang/ de thams cad kyi nu ma las 'o ma sbags nas re res nga las nu nga lasazhu zhes smras pas/ nga las nga las nu zhes bya bar grags so// go'u t+ta ma dag rgyal po nga lasazhu gang gi tshe
rgyal srid byed pa de'i tshe mi rnams gams par byed/ 'jal bar byed/ nya ba rtog par byed do// de yes bsams gzhul nyo bar brtags nas bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa dag byed du 'jug pas/
dusan de rnams yid las skyes yid las smyos zhes bya bar grags so// go'u tam dag rgyal po drug 'di dag ni tsha tshad med cing tshe dpag tumed pa yin no// bar sdomal/ sems can tshur shog
smra ba na/[7 ]/sprinamagrin dang ni de bzhin du/// ta la'i rkang dang yid las skyes// sngon gyi de drug bsdus pa yin/ 'go'u tam dag rgyal po nga las nu'i brla g.yas par sharman zhig smras
ba'ajam zhing shin tu mnyenate/ dporan shing bal gyi 'dabs 'garas bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyod do// de smin nas brtol ba dang/ khya'agazugs bzang
ka/ zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes pa mdzes

[a]pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ gzhon nu da rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas/ da dung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal pomadzes pa'i bar
g.yon par sha rjen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing u0f00na tu mnyen te/ dpar shing bal gyi 'dabag 'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyod do// desmin nas brtol ba dang/ wu'u
gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kumanas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nyamadzes nye mdzes

zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas ) da dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po nyi mdzes kyi sku'i
pa g.yas par sha rmasazhigasas pa 'odram zhingapahan tu mnyen te// dper na sharje bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyod do// da smin nas brtol ba
dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba// blta na sdug pa// mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhi byung ste/ rkang pa g.yas pa
las skyes pas ming mdzes ldan madzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phru'achu zhing mthumache ba yin pas/ da dung yang gling gnyis la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du
'jug go/ go'u tam dag rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rman zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu gnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'dabam bzhin
du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// da smin nas brtol ba dang/ khye'u gzugs bzung shu blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nyamadzes ldan nyi mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhingamathu che ba yin pas da dung yang
gling gtsug la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ go'u tan dag de ltar na rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi bu 'od madzes so// 'od mdzes kyi dge ba'o// dge ba'i
dgayachog go/ dag mchog gi gso sbyong 'phags so// gso sbyong 'phags kying las nu'o// ngalasanu'i mdzes pa'o/ mdzes pa'i nye mdzas so// na mdzes kyi mdzes ldan dang/
nye mdzes ldan dang/ bzang po dang/ lags bzang dang/ btang ba dang/ btang zungadang/ yan lag dang/ yan lagashing rta dang/ ngan song dang/ skal ldashing
rta dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ rgya mtsho'i bu dang/ rgya mtsho chen po dang/ sha ku ni dang/ sha kun chen po dang/ kusha dang/ nye ba'i ku sha dang ) kusha chan po dang/
legs mthong dang/ legs mthong chen po dang ) rab thob dang/ rab thoban po dang/ rab tu sgra bsgrags dang/ rab tu sgra bsgrags chen po dang ) 'od byed dang/ rtul phod dang/ lhun po ldan/
dang/ lhun po yod dang/ 'od gzer dang/ 'od gzer ldan dang ) 'od gzar yod dang/ kun nas 'od gzer ro/ go'u ta ma dag kun nas 'od gzer gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang
dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yul gru 'dzin du byung sta/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyalapo dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung sta/ dgra 'dul bar byed pas/ dgra 'dul dgra 'dul zhes bya bar

gyur to// go'u ta mdag rgyal po dgra 'dul gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i brgyud rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong yul dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ngo// de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal
po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung// ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byed pas na/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya bar grags so// go'u tam dag rgyal po ma rgyal ba

las rgyal ba'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sug tsha'i brgyud rgyal bo drug khri sum stong yul wAwArA t+tA sir byung ste de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bzod bka' zhes bya ba byung ngo/ go 'u tam

dag rgyal po bzod dka'i bu dang tsha bo dang/ ang tsha dang ) sum tsha'i brgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong kam pi la'i grong khyer du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba byung ngo//

go'u ta ma dag rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi bu dang/ rma bo dang mang tshadang ) sumatsha'i brgyud rgyal bo sum khri nyis stong glang po che'i grong khyer du byung// de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po glang pos sbyin zhes

bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po glang bos sbyin gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang ) yang tshe dang/ sum tsho'i brgyud rgyal po lnga stong yul rdo'i jog tu byung// de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyul lo bal bu can

zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u tam dag rgyal po la bu can gyi bu dang/ rma bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i brgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stoThaklong khyer brag gis nyal du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/

rgyal po tshan bo che 'dul zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po tshan po che 'dul gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i brgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyeraa rkyal ba las rgyal

bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal byin zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal byin gyi bu dang/ tsho bo dang/ ang tshadang sumatsha'i brgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ka:

kub dzar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal sta zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma ngag rgyal po rgyal sde'i bu dang/ tshe bo dang/ lang tshadang/ sum tsha'i brgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer
tsam par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha mni rgyal po klu'i lcazhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyalapo klu'i lha'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ lang tshadang/ sumatsha'i brgyud rgyal po nyi khri

za lnga stong grong khyer ta la'i 'phreng du byung ste/ de rnams kyi bla ma ni rgyal po mi'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u tan dag rgyal po mi'i lha'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i brgyud

rgyal bo khri nyis stong grong khyer ta ma lir byung ste/ de rnams kyi thamani rgyal po rgyamatsho'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha'i bu dang/ tsho bo dang/ yang tshe dang/ sumatsho'i

brgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer ba so'o grong du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha mni rgyal po blo gros bzang bo zhes bya ba byungango// go'u ta ma dag rgyal kho blo gros bzang po'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/

zla yang tsha dang/ sumatsha'i brgyud rgyal ponyi khri lnga stong grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu byung sta/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mun sul zhes bya ba byung ngo/ go'u tan dag rgyal po mun sel gyi bu dang/ tsha bo dang//

yang tshadang/ bum tsha'i brgyud rkyal bo brgya tham pa yang grong khyer wArAN+Nasar byung ste/ de rnams kyi bam ni rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i snga zhes bya ba byung ngo // go'ata ma dag rgyal bo dbang phyug chen po'i sde'i bu dang/

tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i brgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong grongakhyer rtswa can du byung ste/ rigs kyi tha mni rgyal bo rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde'i bu dang tsha bo dang/ yang/

tsha dang/ sum tsho'i brgyud rgyal po stong lang grobacar gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal bo dka' thub spyod ces bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal bod ka' thub spyod kyi bu dang tsha bo dang/ yang tshadang/

su tsho'i brgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer rtswa can du byung// de rnams kyi tham ni rgyal po sa'i gdong zhes bya babyung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i gdong gi bu dang/ tsha bo dang yang

tsha dang/ sum tshe'i brgyud rgyal bo 'bum yang grong khyer wA rA NA sir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha mni rgyal po sa'i bdag kho zhes bya ba byung// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i bdag po'i bu dang 3 tsha

bo dang/ yang tsho dang/ sum tsha'i brgyud rgyal po 'bum yang grong khyer dmag gi sa mi tshugs par byung gi/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa 'dzin zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa

'dzin gyi bu dang 2 tsho bo dang ) latsha dang/ sum tsho'i brgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong grong khyer mi thi lar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha mni rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta

ma dag rgyal po lha chen po'i bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tshadang sum tsha'i brgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer mi thi lar drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa la spyad de/ de rnams kyi
tha ma ni rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba phyung ngo// mu khyud la 'bying ba'i dang/ sra ba'i mu khyud dang/ rko ba dang/ nye bar rko ba dang/ rgo ba yod dang/ kun nas rko dang/
dgya nom snang dang/ mnyam snang dang/ thos pa'i sde dang/ chos kyi sde dang/ rtogs pa dang/ rtogs pa chen po dang/ rtogs pa'i sde dang/ mya ngan mad dang/ myu/
ngan bral dang/ brtan pa'i sa dang/ dga' bas sbyar dang/ thun bsal dang/ skyangs dang/ phyogs kyi bdag po dang/ rdul can dang/ bde byed dang/ kun dgar ba dang/
ma long gdong dang/ skyed pa dang/ kun nas skyod pa dang/ sku bo'i khyu mchog dang/ bza' btung can dang/ bza' btung mang po can dang/ mi thub pa dang/ gzhan gyis mi khug pa
dang/ gnas pa dang/ shin tu gnas pa dang/ stobs chen dang/ stobs chen zhon dang/ legs pa'i blo gros drang/ brtan pa'i zhon dang/ gzhu kun pa dang/ gzhu brgya pa/
dang gzhu dgu bcu pa dang/ gzhu bkra dang/ gzhu su dang/ shing rta bcu pa dang/ shing rta brgya pa dang/ shi tsa dgu bcu pa dang/ shing rta khra bo dang/ shing rta rgyab dang/

shing rta sra ba'o// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po shing rta gro ba'i bu dang/ rma bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ mum tsho'i brgyud rgyal po bdun khri bdun stong grong khyer kun tu snang bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi
tha ma ni rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma bdag rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag por du klu mnyam skyong ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal bo klumanyam skyong gi bu dang/ tsha bo dang/

yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i brgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grongakhyar wArANA sar byung// den+nams kyi tha mni rgyal po kri ka zhes bya ba byung ngo// de'its+tsha ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'isas rgyas rigapa dang shags su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'am 'ongs pa na/ byang chub par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad de//

dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyes so// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po kri kri'i bu legs skyes so/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal bo lags skyes kyi bu dang tsho bo dang 1 yang tsha dang/ gumatsho'i brgyud rgyal bo brgya tham pa

yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rna ba can zhes bya ba byung ngo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal kho rna ba can la bu gnyis te/ go'u ta ma dang pa ra dwa dza'o// de gnyis las go'u tam ni
mngon par 'byung bar dga' 'o// ba ra dwa dza ni rgyal srid la mngon par dga' 'o// des pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag yab 'das nas rgyal lor
'gyur te/ bdagagis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas/ sams can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas/ 'dir ci'i dus la bab tsa na ) khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung
bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ rgyal porna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol babatab pa/ yab mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag ni da

pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo // des smras pa/ bu gang gi phyi'i mchod sbyin machod par byed pa dang/ byinasrog srog par byed pa dang/ dka' thub dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni 'di'i ched
yin te/ nga 'das nas rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ong ste rgyal po byed par 'gyuranatsi'iphyir rab tu 'byung/ des smras pa/ mab bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo mi thog go/
de lta bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo// de nas rgyal po gal gyis bar ba shes nas gnang ngo// de'i tsha bsti gnas shig na drang srong mdog gnag ces bya ba gnas so// de nas gzhon nu
go'u tan rgyal pos gnang nas dga' zhing mgu la/ dga' ba rgya chen po dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong mdog gnag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ spyod lam dul bas rkang gnyis
kha phyag byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis/ bdagar ba tu phyung zhig/ des de rab tu byung ngo// drang srong mdog gnag ni 'bras bu dang 2 rtsa ba dang/
chu 'thung bas/ de yang drang srong go'u ta madrang srong go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rna ba can shi nas/ gzhon nu bar dwa dzapha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang
0 phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig drang srong go'u ta mas mkhan po la smras pa ) mkhan po dgon pa'i zas kyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thog gis/ grong 'dab tu gnas par bgyi'o//
des smras pa// bu rung gis grong ngam mgon pan gnas pa'i drang srog gis ni mdir na dbang po bsrung ba yin gyis/ khyod song la gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil khu byosal 'dug cig mkhan

bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ drang srong go'u tar gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyilabu byas te gnas so// de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na smad tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang/ skyes bu
g.yonatsan pad+ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba zhig gnas te/ des de la dga' dgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag bskur ro// des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las/ yang mi gzhan zhig kam sha
ba Nalnga brgya thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas bzang mo dga' dgur spyad kyis tshur shog/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag song nA kar sha pa Na lnga brgya yang mi thob la/ khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te gzhan
du 'gro grwa 'di ni legs pa ma yin no sAm nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras l/ song la pad+ma'i rtsa lag 'gajomo'i mchidanas re zhig bdag skabs ma mchis te/ slad kyisamachi'o zhes
smos shig/ des de'i gan du song nas smras so// mi de yang bya ba mang po zhig yin pas/ de dang de dga' dgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo// des bsams pa ) nam tshod ring du
yod pas de'i sems bdag gis bsrung bar nus so sAganas/ de yang bumo de la bsgo ba/ pad+ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la jo bo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags n/
sbyadamos tshal gang du mchi zhes smos shig/ des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ khyod kyi jomo skad cig la skabs med/ skadamigs skabs yod ci 'am/ bumo de de dang rigs
mi 'phrod pa zhig pas/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras skabs ma mchis pa ni a lags khod kyi/ de khyod kyi gos dang rgyan dag gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad do// de'i 'dod chags
kyi kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing gnod sems kyi kun nas dkris pa skyes te ) de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ bu mo song la bzangamo la pad+ma'i rtsa lag na ra/ spyodamos/
tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog ces byos shig/ des songanas bzang mo la smras pa dang/ de nas de skyed mos tshal du song ba dang/ skyes bu g.yo can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gis smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i gos
dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod pa rigs sam/ des smras pa/ 'i sras de ni bdag gis nongs te/ 'on kyang bu mad nit+tag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig
de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral grishubs nas phyung nas bsad do// de nas bu mo mngag gzhug mas jo mo bsad do rdzogo bsad ngo zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton pa/ skya bo'i tshogs kun gyis shos/

nas brgyugs pa dang/ de tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong go'u ta ma gnas so// de nas skyes bu g.yon na pad+ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas// ral gri khrag can drang srong go'u ta ma'i mdun du bor nas/ skya bo'i

tshogs chen po de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// skya bo'i tshogs chen pos der ral gri khragacan mthong nas sman ba 1 rab tu byung ba 'dis bzangamo bsad do zhes/ de nas drang srong go'u tam de bskor tami
bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ kU la rab tu byung ba drang srong gi rgyal mtshan thogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/ des smras pa ci byas/ de rnams kyis smras pa bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga'
dgur spyad nas de bsad do// des smras pa/ kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi byed do zhesadesazhi pa smras kyang/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po des lag pa phying ga'og tu dam du brdungs nas rgyal po
la phul te/ lha rab tu byung ba'adis bzangamo dang lhan cig dga' dgur byed nas du bkum lagAs so// rgyal kho rnams ni rtogs pa yin pas/ des smras pa/ gal te de ltar gyur na rab tu
byung ba 'di ngas sngangs kyis gsal shang la gshon cig/ de nas rab tu byung ba de ma toge ka ra pI la'i 'phreng ba mgul du btags shing/ skyas pa gos sngon po gyon pa lag na mtshon thogos pa rnams
kyis yongs su bskor nas/ lam bo dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su bsgrags gas pa'i gor bsgrags te) grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas gson po nyid du
gsal shing la gshonano/ de'i mkhan po mdog gnag de dus dus su de'i bsti gnas su 'gro ba yin pas/ ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthonganas/ des phan tshun

[g ]dubatsal bar brtsams pa dang/ ji tsam na de gsal shing la gshon par mthong nas/ de skad mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying re ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/ kyi hud bu 'di nu zhig/ des kyang gang

mi gsal zhing yi tshad la gnad du bab pa'i gnod pa'i tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/ mkhan po gzhan zi lags/ las lags mod/ des smras pa/ bu rma byung ba 'am gnod pa zhig ma byas grang/ mkhan po
bdag gi lus kyis rma byung gi/ sams kyis ma yin no// 'a ji ltar shes/ mkhan po bden pa gsol gyis gsonatsig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gangagis bdag gi lus kyis rma khyung gi/ sems kyis ni ma yin/

yA bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa de gsar gyi kha dog tu gyur cig/ bdag nyid chen po de lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa yin pas/ tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog nag

gi pags pa nag pomi snang zhing ) gsar gyi kha dog tu gyur to// kun tu drang srong mdokanag kasar gyi kha dog tu gyur to zhes sgra sgrags pas/ de'i ming gsar mdog ces bya bar gyur taM/ de ngomatshal mchog tu gyur

to// de nas drang srong go'u ta mas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni gang/ skya bzhi gang/ phyi ma ni gang zhig lags/ des smras pa/ bram ze rnams na re bu med pa la 'gro ba yod

do zhes zer na/ khyod kyis bu 'ga' bskyed pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po yab kyis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba bskyod pa na/ bdag gzhon nu nyid du rab tu byung bas budamed kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/ bdag gi bu skye ba lta

ga la mchis/ bu gal te de ltar na sngon yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par gyis shig/ mkhan po tshor ba dragapos nyen pas da ni bdag gi gnad rnams chadatsang tshigs rnams bye sta ) 'gum pa gcig pu dran par

ba sa na ji ltar sngon gyi ul la spyad pa rjes su dran bar 'gyur// de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas/ des rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas char pa'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog pa
dang/ de nas chad pa dang rlung grang mos reg pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas/ des sngon gyis yul la spyod pa rjes su dran par bya ba brtsams so// gang gi tshe des 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags rjes su
dran par byas pa las/ khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan cig lhung ngo// bsam gyis mi khyag pa'i gnas ni bzhi sku/ bdagasums pa dang/ 'jig rten sams pa dang/ sams na
rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin par sems pa dang/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o// khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgong gnyis su gyur nas/ nyimashar ba'i dus kyi tshe
nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang khye'u gnyis shig byung nas/ de dang ha cayang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshal gsab der de gnyis zhugs so/// 'dul/
bam po gya gcig pa// je nas nyima'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung sta/ nyima'i 'od gzer gyis drang srong go'u ta ma gdungs

nas shi'o// de nas drang srong gseramadog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas des gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na/ sgo nga rdol nga'i khog pa gnyis shig 'duganas/ de phan tshun rjes gcod tsang bu ya shing gi tshal
gseb tu zhugs pa las/ ji[é]man khye'u gnyis shika mthong ngo// des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang/ drang srong go'u ta ma'i na ra ra gyur nas/ drenus de lhag par sdug pa skyes
'a9 te/ des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnyan bstod de/ de gnyis kyi ming btags pa/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas//
ade bas na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas nyi ma'i rigs nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to// drang srong go'u ta ma'i bu yin bas/ ming gnyis pa go'u ta ma go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ rang gi yan
lag las skyes pas/ ming gsum pa yan lag skyes yan lag skyes zhag bya bar gyur to// bu'am shing gi tshal gsang nas red pas/ mang bzhi ba bu mashang pa bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar
gyur to/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po ba ra dwa dza bu mad par shinas (blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag da su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ gzhan
dag gis smras pa/ 'di'i gcen go'u tam drang srong rnams kyinang du rab tu byung ste/ rgyal srid 'di'i de'i rigs brgyud du 'ongs pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro// de nas de rnams kyis gros byas
nas drang grogasaramadog gi drung du song sta 3 son pa dang rkang pa gnyis lag tugs nas smras pa// drang srong chen bo go'u tan gang du mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag kho nas bsad do//
de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang mi dran na ji ltar bsad/ kho bos khyed cag dran par bya'o// mnongs so// des re rnams dran par byas pa dang/
smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de mang+gatsam smos pa yang bsgrugasapa malin gyis zhog cig/ des sdig pa'i las ni byas/ 'di dang 'di'o// skyon med pa gnod pa mi
byed pa dus sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do// de ltar ci mngon/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang/ de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po
gal te de lta na des ma legs kyi/ bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes de rnams de skad du gtam smra bar byed pa na ) khye'u de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so// thonabo rnams
gyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'ibu'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyas/ 'di gnyis kyi ming lags/ des byung ba dang/
bcas par rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams kyis thos temchog tu ngomatshar skyes nas )de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las ) gzhon nu phu bo shes

rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang nga skar nga las de dang bu med par shi'o// de nas cig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas/ de'i ming rgyal po bu bam shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ )go'u tam dag rgyal po bu ram

wA shang pa'i bu dang/ tsho ba dang/ yang tsha dang/ sum tsha'i brgyud rgyal po bu ram shingab brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung sta/ de rnams kyi tha mni rgyal po bu mngashang pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo//

go'u ta ma dag rgyal po buram shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/ ska mda' gdong dang/ lag rna dang/ glang po che 'dul dang/ rkang gdub na no// dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsunamo dam pa shi nas/ da lag
pa la 'gram pa gtad de sams khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lhaci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs mdagyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ da yi btsunamo dam pa shin

ci'i phyir sa mas khongs su chud cing mi 'dug/ lha gal te de ltar na nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchisan ) lha ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal/
srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di dag yod na/ nga la su zhig bu mo star bar 'gyur ba lta/ dgongs shig dang bdag cag gis btsal lo// ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba//
bstan sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ btsunamo dag par 'tshal pa yod pa de rnams kyis brtags te// rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas de rnams kyis gcig nas garlig tu brgyud de rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang/ rgyal
bos bsgo ba khug cig/ de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs 1 thogamar gtam byas te 'dug go/ gtam gyi skabs dod cing rgyal bo'i zhal mthong nas smras pa/
lha bkra shis par gyurag/ bkra shis par gyuratshig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed gsol/ rgyal po bu mashing pa 'phags skyes po'i btsunamo dam pa gumanas de'i ched du srasamo slob

ngo/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'thab rir bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung ga 'on kyang dam zhig btsal ste/ gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'uzhig yod par gyur na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag pa lta na
sbyin// lha bka' bzhin 'tshol/ mchis la lha la sAmadu gdas par gsol lo zhes/ de rnams dong nas rgyal po khu rag shang pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang/ rgyal bos smras pa/

shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyural rgyalasrid lamangon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'osapa yan no// lha don 'di la nges pa ma mchis te/ reshag patsamo blangs la/
lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang/ dgyes pa dang/ dgyes dgur spyod pamadzod cig dang/ de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te bu mor 'gyur ma/ spyimamachis par 'gyur sus 'tshal/
rgyal pos smras pa shes ldan dag gal te de ldan de nga la long zhig/ de rnams dong nas bsu ste/ ji tsaman rgyal bo'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/ de yang rgyal pos
mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ 'ga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed 1 dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/
wA dus gzhan zhigan btsunamo sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'dus pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ bltan sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas so// btsasanas
da'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i nang ri gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa// lha 'di ltaram skyas pa nyid nas rgyal sridalamangon par
dga' bas/ de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srid dga' zhes bgyi'o// khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas/ rdzi na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyod par//

byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas/ des de la pho nya btang sta tshag rtsu ba po dang rgyas pa'i spring yig spring ba/

khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnod pa gang yin pa des sdod nug/ kho be lon/
'ongs nas yul 'khor phur mar rlog go/ rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pa des thos nas skrag ste/ blon bo rnams bsogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na/
de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal sridal mngon
bar dga' ba rnams sangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ lho rgyal po da ni stobs dang gzhon pa rgya che bas/ gal te 'dir yas na
gdon ma 'tshol bar yul phukar rtog ba gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas/ rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang 'gyod par dbang bskur la/ gzhon nu de rnams ni smyug tu gsol
rgyal pos smras pa// shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar sbyag/ lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/ lha la sman khar bgyi ba lhur lenapa lags pas/ skyon
ma mchis pa dang nongs pa ma mchis pa yang smyug la/ skyonamachis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni gzhog go/ rgyul po btang snyoms su gzhag nas cang mi sgabar 'dugago/ blomo/
rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar btsems pa/ shes ldan dag thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar gyur pa zhig bya'o zhes/ dmas
)de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs bris pa shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ ma rtogasnatshogs

kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go// de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nasamathong nas// gzhom zhu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos
tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo// blon bo rnams kyis sbyad mos tshal byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang/ gzhon nu rnams kyis sa pa/ 'di su'i skyed mos tshal ) de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i
lags so// de rnams slar 'brog par brtsams pa dang/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa// gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig ci'i phyir slar ldog/ de rnamasakyis smras pa/ lha'i skyed mos
tshal ka nan 'dir 'jug tu gal rung 1 blon po rnams kyis smras pa// lha 'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis ) de rnamasanang du zhugs te rtsa bar brtsams so// blon po rnams
kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha skyidamos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis/ lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab lags so// rgyal po chas pa dang/ skyed mos tshal na ku'o'i sgra thos/
so/ thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra grag na 'din su zhig 'dug blon po rnams kyis smras pa// lha gzhon nu rnams so// gal te de lta na
ngas gzhon nu rnams srungs so// blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa// lha bzod par mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams mi spang bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes
gzhon nu de rnams sbyag par chas pa dang/ rgyal po'i rkang ba gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skya bo dang lhan cig mchin/ deci nas kyang mi dgagapa de ltar bka'
stsal bar rigs so// rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na/ de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skya bo'i tshogs chen po dang sems ldan cigs te/ zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzin kyi

sgo phya nas skya bo'i tshogs rgyus so// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkuman ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin skyongs ba'agyur ro// gal te de ltar sgo chod cig/

de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang gnang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams
kyis der le ma'i spyil bu dag byas te gnas btab ste/ ri dgag gsad tsang bsad nas 'tsho bar byed rung/ dus gsum du drang srongasar skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar byed do// latso dang dar
la bab pa'i drags pas zin pas 'dod chagos kyis shin tu nyan te sha bri ngan pa skya bo gsang sang bor gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhigan drang srong ser skya'i do lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ khyed ga
ci'i phyir skya bo bsang bsang por gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srongawen bo bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyan pas so// des smras pa ) rang rang
gi sring mo spongs la mas dben gyi sringamo rnams dang lhan cig 'dugacig/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ma/ shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srung stor b rnams kyis

rung ngo// de'i de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no sAmanas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen bas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes rta mas dban gyi sringamo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga'
bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rnams dang de dag lcan rtsig rtsi bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ duga'adogur spyod par byed pan/ bu pho dang bumo dag btsas te/ de rnams chen por gyur/

pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi tshor ma ni sgra yin pas/ drang srong sa' skya sams rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag shong zin kyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o// drang srong chen po nyi'i

phyir: bsam gal kyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtsag rig pa nyid du mi btub pas so// drang srong blon po khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gzhan du mchin 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag cag la

bog cig/ shes ldan dag rung ngo// drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa yin pas/ des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag byas nas de

) rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so// drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btang bas/ sar skya'i gzhi ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur ro// de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas/ rgyu
bo'i tshogs chen por gyur to// dog pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to// lha rnams kyi sams kyis de rnams kyi sams shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang/ de rnams der dong ste grongakhyer cig shos
brtsigs nas/ lhas bstan lhas bstan zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag spyag pa ni rigs
gnam pa pas na ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis 3 de ltabasan bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa lasachun ma blang bar mi bya ste/ gcig kho nas chos shes par bya'o/[“]nams rigs
mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma len gyi chun ma ni ya'i na no// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran nas ) blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa dag
gzhon nu de rnams da ltar gang na 'dug/ de rnams kyis rgyas par smras pa/ lcas nongs pa 'ba' zhig las spyogs pa las/ de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa

nas/ gangs ri dang nyes pa chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srongasar skya'i bsti gnas dang rgyu nad yang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste/ rang rang gi sring mo blangs te mas dben gyi sring mo
ga rnams dang lhan cig bar bgyid ) dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyid de/ de rnams rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa/
