bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so// grong pa dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod dam/ lha rdo thog lags so// de nas rgyal bo bu gshing pa 'phags skyes bo sa ro stod bsranganas lag
pa g.yas pa brgyang lta chad du brjod pas brjod pa// kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no// kya ma gzhon nu rnams nirib tu 'od pa yin no zhes sogs dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/
'khaM kyam gzhon nu mas bod pa yin no// kyim gzhonan rnams ni shin tu bod pa yin zhus byas pas/ do rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal bo bu ram
gshing la 'phags skyes po shi nas// rgyal srid dga'i rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro// de yang bu med par shinas/ skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/
de yang bu mad par shi nas/ lag na rgyal bor gyur to// de yang bumed pa shi nas/ glang bo che 'dul rgyal por gyur to// de yang bu mad par shi nas/ rkang gdub na rgyal por
gyur to// de'i bu gnas 'jog go/ go'atam dag gnasa'ajog gi bu si ma mo/ dgo'u ta ma dag rgyal bos khyim gyi bu dang/ rmo bo dang/ lang tshadang 3 sum tsho'i brgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga

stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung sta/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang/ shing rta brgya pa dang/ shing rtadagu bcu pa dang/ shing rta khra'o dang ) shing rta rgyal dang/ brtan pa'i shing rta dang
gzhu bcu pa dang 3 gzhu brgya pa dang/ gzhu dgu bcu pa dang/ gzhu rgyal dang/ gzhu bkra dang/ gzhu brtan no// go ta ma dag gzhu brtan 'du gnyis te/ sang ge'agram dang/ seng ge'i sgra'o
go'u ta ma dag 'dzam bu gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyad yod pa de rnams kyi nang na ni/ seng ge'i 'gram mchog tu grags so// go'u ta ma dag seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste kA zlas gnaM nga dang/ zas
dkar dang/ bre bo zas dang/ rmadamadu khrus so// bu mo gtsang pa dang/ dkamo dang/ bremo ma dang/ tshadagad ma'o// zas gtsang la bu gnyis 1 bcom ldan 'dus dang/ tsho
dang ldan pa dga' bo'o// khros dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no/ bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ ming chen dung 3 tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags
pa'o tshad med zas la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ lhas byin no// gtsang ma'i bu ni legs bar rab sad do// dkarago'i bun 'phrang kha nanano/ 'bre bo ma'i ni
bzang len no// tshod med ma'i dge 'phal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sgra gcan zin yin te/ go'u ta ma dag mang pos bkur gyi brgyud/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin du rdzogs/ srid pa'i
bring rgyun chad/ skyo ba'i 'khor ba zad de/ da ni yang srid pa yod do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa tho'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par
mkhyen nus bzhengs te bzhugs so// bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa// mo'u 'gal gyi bu legs so legs so/ mo 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis dag slong rnams kyis/
wA dushAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud pas brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa yang khyod legs so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud las brtsams te chos kyi
gtam rtag tu smos shig dang/ des na de rnams la bun 'ang kho'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcomaldan 'das kyis// dge slong rnams la saMka' sal pa/ dge
zla slong dag khyed kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig/ zung zhig/ lhogs shig/ datsa'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong nag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rags

brgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan chos dang ldan pa nas tshongs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te ) dge slong dag 'gas kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi//
rigs brgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing klog pa'i rigs so// de nas sar skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' starjesaM su yi rangs nas bcom

ldan 'das kyi zha ba sa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te ) bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo// de'i tshe grong khyer sar skya'i gzhi rgyal bo song ba'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa
dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ le lags pa skyo bo dang migang bos gang pa/ 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ chom rkun mad cing nad rab tu zhi bar
gyur pa/ 'bras dang/ bu ram shing gi 'phrang dang/ ba lang dang/ ma ha phun sum tshogs pa na 3 bu gcig pa la sdug pa gzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po
legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lo legs pa skyo bo dang mi mang bos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang/ 'thabamo dang/ rtsod/
ba dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ chos rgyun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang/ bu ram shing gi 'phrang dang/ ba lang dang/ ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug po bzhin/
du skya la srid skyong bar byed do// rgyalapo legs par 'ab sad kyi btsunamo dam gzugs bzang ba/ ltan sdug pa/ mdzos nga/ yul gyi bzang mo lum bi ni zhes bya ba yod do// lhas bstanan
khyim bdag phyugatsang nor mang ba 3 longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba/ yongasashing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnasal de'i kun
0 @#/// dga' r ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang/ chu phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas re'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'du
tha pa der/ rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan g lhags nas// de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do// lus de nas de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ lha ku:
wA dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol// rgyal pos smras pa// kun dga' ra ba 'di khyig bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyed la kun dga' ra ba dgos na/ khyod kyis phyir de bas lcag
par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o// de nas rgyas po lags par rab sad kyis lum bi ni'i ched du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas/ de'i ming lum bi ni'i tshal/
zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po sang ga'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kyi ma'o bdag gi brgyud lasAkhor los sgyur bskya par gyur kyang nim rung snyam pa'i nga sam pa 'di yod do// rgyal po lags

par rab sad la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni lo nga ga 'gram dang lhacigaganyen du gyur kyang 'i ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/
dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod bar byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhigan btsun mo sagasasum dang ldan par gyur nas ) de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ bstan
sdug la/ mdzes/ ) yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsus so// khanus pa de'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal pos legs par rab sad btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ lhas/
bstanan gnas pa'i skya bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te the tshom du gyur nas ri 'di'i yin nam/ 'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo/ de'i btsas pa'i
btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa// lha lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skya
bo'i skya bo'i tshogs lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su gling ga' nug gi mchid nasan 'di bu mo kho na 23gas/ sngon gyi las kyis rnam par smin pas
gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o// gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni 'du bu mo ma lags kyi/ 'o na'i zhin las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so
zhes mchi lags pas/ de bsan bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes gdags so zhes/ de'i yang sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so// bumo sgyu 'phrul mam brgyad la rjes su gotad de zhes bya ba nas/ chen

mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ mtshon phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing/ stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur
ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' par byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba ) bltan sdug pa// mdzes pa/

! kha dog bzang po rgyus pa mchog dung ldan pa zhig btsas so// de btsas pas grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ sbya'aphrul la ji lta ba bzhin du re'igazugs bzang ba rnam pa thams
cad du dpyad par mi nus so/ de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ bumo 'di'i mingaming gdags zhesaming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul bas 'di lhag par
gzugs bzang bas/ de bas na sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi dar gdugs zhes btags so// de yang bskyed bsrings nasachen mor gyur pa dang/ de la mtshon mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i
mtshan sumashu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po song 'gram la pho nya btang ste/
bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dang sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig la ni mtshan than sa rud phun susu tshogs pa'i bu gcig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing ) de ni stobs kyis 'khor
los sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ cig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing/ de ni 'khor los sgyur bas rgyal po
'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/ 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhonazhu zas gtsang gi chung mar snyoms shig/ sang ga'i 'gram gyis slar spring ba/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/

'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas/ gang la rgyas bu chen po'iganaM gsum cu rtsa la/nyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing/ de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur

ro zhes lungabastan pa de re zhig 'dod do// cig shos kyang tshogs la brtags par bya'o// des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o// de'i tshong+gashAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bsang zhesabya bo ri khrod pa dgag de da
nas gshAkya rnams 'dus te rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/ lha skyabasang ri khrod pa bdag cag gnod pa bskyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo rgyas
pas de rnams dang lhan nug g.yul sprad par mi nus so/ lha gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol ma zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa zhing blangs pa de spyin pa lta na
gtang ngo// da rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshol stsal bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos dpung gatshogs yan lag bzhi ba gzhon nu zas gtsang la gtad nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnams
bcomarab tu bcom starmag btang 'o// danas[︽]shAkya rnams mgu nas/ rgyal po sang ge'agram gyi drung du dong// lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rnag bta' lags pas/
bdag cag glo ba dga' na/ gzhon nu'achogaci bzhed gsungs shig dbul lo/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams kyi khrims su bcasapa sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhug par mi
bya'o zhes bcas so// lha ni khrims dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin tu bsdam gyi dral bar mi bya na/ 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa zhig slong ba ni mnyam pa las rgyun ma blangs pa yin no//
lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig/ denas seng ge'i 'gram gyis legs par rab gad la pho nya btang nas/ 'phos tshogs la brtags zin gyis/ thumo cig shos kyang skyi zhel// des de yang 'khor

lnga brgyadang baspyi ste/ gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyis ka blangs so// jitsamadus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge'akram shi nas/ sar skya'i gzhi na rgyal lo sa gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor
ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ le legs pa skyo bo dang/ mi mang pos gang ba ) 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtso da pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang ) chom rkun mad sung nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/

'bras dang/ bu ram shing gi 'phrang dang/ ba lang dang 3 ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang
lhan cig stang gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi rgyas pa med par dong nas/ la mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dkur spyod par byed do// 'di'i chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rdoga' ldan gyi gnas
na bzhugs ban 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa dang/ yul la gzigs pa dang/ dus la gzigs pa dang/ brgyud la gzigs pa dang/ bud med la gzigs pa'o//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzadatse na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nagazhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji ltakhu
zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yinal/ de la res 'ga' ni bram thi'i rigs btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te 3 da ltani rgyal rigs
btsun par bkur ba gzigs nas/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan bar nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes ) gzhi 'ding kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs/
su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs par bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs lagawikas par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu kung gis yul la gzigs pa mdzadan+dan//
byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nyingamatshams sbyor ba lin snyam na/ 'bras dang/ bu mashangadang/
ba lang dang/ ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skyo bo yod pa/ dbus pa'i skya bo gnas pa'i yul gang yin par gzigs nas 'di sAm du dgongs te/
dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram shing gi 'phreng dang/ 'bras dang/ ba lang dang 3 ma he phun sum tshogs pa// slong mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skya bo yod pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyi
ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub srems dpal yul mtha' 'khob rnams su zhing mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes ) gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba
blang bar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma yod pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad/
pa 'bras bumad pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul la gzigs par mdzad de// byang chub sumA dpa' rnam rgyu gang gis dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub
sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus lta bu zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshas spyor ba lan snyam na/ skye dgu'i lo

mar skya ba na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len la/ mi rnams kyi tshe lamar 'grib pa na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no// byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis

mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri shug pa yon chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce nA ) mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa ni yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyobar bya bar dka' la blun zhing dbang po rtul
ba dang/ bgamad cing bde ba mang bas bdenapa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// mar 'grib pa la brgya yan chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di ltas/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang/ nyonayod
pa'i snyigs ma dang/ sems can gyi snyigs ma dang ) lta ba'i snyigs ma dang/ dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che
ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes ) gzhi 'dis ba zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur pa'i las byas shing
gsags pa dang 3 sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no// byang chub
sams dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis brgyud la gzugs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ldan gyi gnasaM na bzhugs pa ni 'di sAm du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgyud
ci 'dra zhig tu nying mtshamaMs sbyor ba lon snyaman rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing/ ma mas dang pa mas zung bdun gyi bar spyod ba la skyonayod pa yin par gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/
shAkya'i rigs brgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing/ mang pos bkur ba nas bzung lta spyod pa skyon med pa yin kyis/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa'/
brgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes/ gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gang gi brgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba byung ngo sAmamo// 'di ltar byang
chub srems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas
rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpar rnams brgyud la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams chu gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzadatse na/ byang chub sems dpa'
dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'disnyamadu dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyaman/ budamadagapa zhig gzugs
bzung mo dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rgod bag canam yin la/ rigs 'phal bar 'gyur zhing sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la/ kye ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi
khum du gyur cigaces smon lam btab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba banur ma du 'dzin nus pa dang/ rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs nas 'disAm du dgos
te/ sgyu 'phrul chenamo 'di ni ma mes dang pha mas byung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyonamad cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang/ tshul dang ldan pa dang/ rgod bag can ma yin pa dang/ rigs 'phel/
bar 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dwapa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzan nus pa dang ) rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la/ 'diltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la/
kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams
sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam no// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur pa'i las byas shing bsags pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams nitshos bshad pa 'bras bu mad pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med la gzigs par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
pa lngas gzigs nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la lan gsum du bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag dga' ldan gyi ris 'di nas nga shi 'khos te/ mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gi chung
ma dam pa'i rum du nying mtshoms sbyor ba blangs la/ de'i bur gyur te bdun rtsi rtogs par byas ) khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus kyi mi rnams su nying mtshams
sbyor ba lang zhig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dga' ldan gyi 'osakyi lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'al 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'/
mkhyen par mdzod cig/ daltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu nyi marungs pa'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu glingani rtog ge ba drug dang/ rjes su sgrogs padrug dang/ snyoms par 'jug
pa drug gis dkrugs pa lags so// de la rtog ge ba drug gang zhen/ 'dil su 'od srungs rdzogs byed dang/ kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang/ skye 'dodakyibu mo'i bu yang dgargyal ba
can dang/ mi pham skra'i la ba canadang/ ka ta'i bu nog can dang/ gcer bu ba gnyen gyi bu'o// rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe no/ 'di lta sta/ bram ze rgyus rgal dang/ bram ze rnas rdeg dang/
bram ze bzung ldan dang/ bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang/ bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang/ bram ze dmar po'o// snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na ) 'di lta ste/ ras byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang/
sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dang kun tu rgyulegs bzang dang/ bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang/ drang srongam btsangs pa dang/ stong rgyas 'od srungs ralapa mno// 'dir ni chos mnyan pa'islad du
byang chub sems dpa'i gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham par bgyi zhing ) bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' gzhugs pas chos bshad de
chos de bdagacag gis thos nas/ cinas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyid par sems lags so// de skad ces smras pa dang/
byang chub sems dpas/ dga' ldan gyi risakyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dga'i phyi'i rol mo'i cha byad thams cad rdungs shig/ drug ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha na
thams cad brdungs pa dang/ byang chub sems dbas kyang dung bus te smras pa/ grogs po dka'adi la lhag par gang tshe ) bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so// grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi
rgyas rol mo'i cha byad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du/ ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang/ rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis

mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par bya sta/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o// mi rtag ba'i dung bud par bya'o// stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung gar bya'o// bdagamadapa'i seng ge'isgra bsgrags par bya'o zhes
smas nas )tshigs su bdud de smras pa/ sang ga gcig gis gcan gzan tshogs ni du ba 'joms// rdo rje gcig gis brag gi lci mo du ma 'jig/ brgya byin gcigagis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'jog/

nyi ma gcig gis mun pa dum rnam par sul// grogs po dag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba lang zhig/ de rnams lha rnams kyi
dbang bo brgya byi'i 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyis ma

la bdag gis de la gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas/ lca rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing lcams kyang gtsang ba
byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/ 'dod pa na sbyor pa'i lhadrug la lan gsum du bsgrags nas/ nam gyi gung thun la glang po
cher bstan te btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su zhugs so// smras pa/ 'gro ba yongs su bskyab phyir dam bzhes nas/ lha rnams la bsgo de nas shi 'phos te/ nang bar sprin rumanyi ma gsar/
'char ltar/ da na bu rim shing pa'i lhums zhugs so// 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rmi lam gzhi rmis pa/ glang po che dam pa dkar po mche ba drug pa zhig bdag gi rum dral nas zhugs pa dang/ stong
gi namamakha' la 'gro ba dang/ ri brag chen po lam[]ga ba dang/ bdag la skya bo'i tshogs chen bo phyag byed pa'o// des rgyas po zas gtsangal smras pa dang/ rgyal pos blon po rnams bsgo/
ba/ shes ldan dag rmi lam gsod mkhan dang mtshan mkhan gyi bram khre rnams khug cig/ de dag gis rmi lam gsod mkhan dang mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams bkugapa dang/ de nas rgyal bos
de rnams la rmi lam bsad pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lha bstan chos las ji ltar g.yar sngar bab pa dang sbyar na/ sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa
zhig bltam par 'gyur sgra/ gal te khyim pa khyiman gnas par gyur nA/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// gal te sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad
ga gang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig skyon du sgyu rnam par grags
bar 'gyur ro// bar stom la/ 'chi 'bolha dang rin po che zung brgyad dub dang bstul zhugs brtan// chos nyid kyis gang gi tsha byang chub sems dpa'
dga' ldan gyi lha'i sa nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i 3 sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyurang/
'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/ gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'diltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag
kyang de'i tshe snang brgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to// der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mo mthong ba las/ de rnams snang ba des sems can/
gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'di'i skyes so// shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba shes so// chos/
nyid kyis gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tsho bar mi 'gyur
wA bar lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srungs mar 'jog pa ni lag na ral gri dang/ lag namadung dang/ lag na mdung thung dang/ lag na mda' bo che'o// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub som
'kho dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa'i/ mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang/ sha ma'i drim dang/ khrag gi dri ma dang/ mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis
ma sngags so// dpar na nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos pa dang/ ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po ches mi gos pa de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na
bzhugs pa na/ mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngol gyi dri ma dang/ sha ma'i dri ma dang/ khrag gi dri ma dang/ mi gtsang pa gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/[” ]/chos nyid
kyis gang gi byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo// dbarananor bu be
0/ shuglu bur brgyad pa bzang po rags dang ldan pa/ dang ba 1 gsal ba 'drim med pa// tshon skud sna lnga sngon po dang/ sor po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang ! la brgan la brgyas la/ da skyas
bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di'i skud pa'o// 'di ni nor bu'o// skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyas nga yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/ byangu bsams dpa' bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe yul gyi
lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshabyang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhug
na bzhugs pa de'i tsho/ de'i yum 'di lta ste/ byang chub semasadapa' 'dzin pas lus nga la ba ma/ lus dub par 'gyur ba mad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom
ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs ba de'i tsho 1 yum de phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod
pa spangs pa las slar ldog go/ ma byin par len pa dang/ mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ brdzun du smab dang/ sbyar ba'i chang dang/ 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba dag med pa'i gnas spongs
sbyar ba'i chang dang/ 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bgamed pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byed do// srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len rung// brdzun dum smra tshang la ma brkus dang/ 'khrig pa'i
mi tshangs spyod pa slong ba 'di// 'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhumasan bzhugs pa de'i/
tsho/ da'i yum 'di lta ste/ skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa mad do// nyon mongs rnams la rgyags par mi 'gyur zhing// de ni 'dod rgyus sams gdungs mi 'gyur la// de
yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi// rgyas pa rnams la sems ni gtod pamad// sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyes pa/ kyam bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo snyamanas/ des rgyal
'tsho po zas gtsang la smras pa dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis 1 mtshan mkhan rnams la smos po/ ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skya/ mtshanamakhan rnams kyis lha btsun mo la gus skyes
bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa zhig bltas par 'gyur te/ de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtshomatha' dag 'thung bar 'gyura'o zhes lung bstan to// rgyal pos smras pa/
gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blud ni cir 'gyur/ sras don lagam tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa ) ngaming zas gtsang zhes bya ba'i bu yan lagayatshang bar bya 'am/

N+NaM de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gan kun M tu rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 'dug pa de rgyal pos bkug nas bsgo ba dang des da stang gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi na 'dug pa la rgya mtsho
po bzhi bstan te chu blud pa dang/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma btson thams cad thar bar bya'o snyam pa dang/ rgyal pos
btson thoms rud thar par byas nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bya'o snyam
pa dang/ rgyal pos sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas na/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang deng 'dod pa skyas pa) kye ma bdag gis skyod mos
tshal blta'o snyam pa dang/ rgyal pos rgyud mos tshal bstan nas/ de'i 'dod pa smras pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma bdag skyed mos tshaladu
'dug par bya'o sAn pa dang/ rgyal po legs par bu sad la lum bi'i tshal zhes bya ba'i skyadamos tshal yod nas/ de la rgyal po dras gtsang gis spong nga/ khyod kyi bumo rgyud mos tshaladu
'gro bar 'dod kyis/ skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byos shig/ des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byos shig/ de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor

byas so// de nas 'khor rnams dang lhan cig 'dong ngo// de nas des lumabi ni'i tshal du 'chag pa shing mya ngan tshang ma tog shin tu rgyas pa zhig mthong ste/ de bltams par 'dod nas de la bzung ste 'dug
dpa dang lca rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum na ngo ts+tshanyis pa dang ldan pas/ rgya bo'i tshogs chen pos bskor na bltams mi phod kyis//

zathabs shig bshams par bya'o snyam nas/ des rlung dang char drag cig smralanas des skye bo'i tshogs de kun tu bros so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid a ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par
wA sprul sa b+hAtsunamo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du bsdad pa dang/ des bltams par brtsams so// byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa dang/ brgya byin gyis pags pa'i slabs mos bzung ngo// de nas
byang chub sems dpo' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ brgya byin 'di bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blangs so zhus tshegs par 'gyur bar mkhyenanas/ bdag nyid rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang/
sgyu lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byin 'dar bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpas bka' sam ba/ ko'u shi ka thong zhig thong zhig khar grong zhig/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tsho byang+ka chub sems dpa' bcom
ldan 'das bltams pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po 'di ga'os bar rgyug ces bya ba nas shis ldan dag sems chun gzhanayang 'dir skyes so// shesaldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes
bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'dul ba gzhi// bam po gya gnyis pa// chos nyid kyis gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' bcomaM

ldan 'dus yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa na ral gri shubs nas phyung ba bzhin dumangal kyi dri ma dang/ shama'i dri ma dang/ khrag gi dri ma dang/ mi gtsang ba gzhan dang/ gzhan sna tshogs kyis ma gos so//
chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa de li[ ]/ de'i yum gi 'dugami nyal te 'greng bzhin du rgya la ragis ma des rgyal rigs bltams par byed do
chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i bod la sum kyang ma zung bor phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun 'dor zhing chig tu yang gsung la/ 'di shar phyogs yin tachungan las
'dus pa'i thog mar 'gro bar bya'o/'di ni lho phyogs yin te 'gro ba mtha' dag gi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o// 'di ni nub phyogs yin te nga'i skya pa gam ru 'di yin par 'gyur ro// 'di ni byang phyogs
yin te srid pa'i mtshos rgyal bar bya'o// de'i dbu'i stanganas lha rnamasu gdugs dkar po dang rdza lob nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to// chos nyid kyis byang chub sums dpa' bltams pa'i mod la bar
snang las chu bsil ba gcig dang chu dron mo gcig ste tshu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing/ des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad do// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams

pa'i mod la/ skrun pang yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 'bab bar gyur ti/ de la de'i yum tshus chu'i khyab byed do// chos nyidakyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la/ lhas bar snang las lha'i t+tha
la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku tshud dang/ pad dkar po dang/ a ka ru'i phyi ma dang/ rgya spos kyi phye ma dang/ tsan danakyi phyi ma dang/ ta ma'ila'i 'dab mas 'ashor ro// lha'i ma rtogs na da ra
bas kyang 'thor ro/ lha'i bolasAn rnams kyang sgra'abyi'o// gos dag kyang 'thor bar khyadado// bar sdom la/ bltams dang bzhengs dang gom pa bdun// chu rgyun gnyis rang nu yigalha/
gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das/ shAkya thub pa bltams pa de nyid kyi tsho/ rgyal po bzhi yang du khatsos te 3 maN+Dal yod du rtsi bas kyis 'phur tshangs sbyin gyi bu btses pa nad
de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsos pa na chu lags la bgasal ba bzhin du snang bas: dri bas na 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
sbyar na rgyal bo pad+ma chen po'i bu ba sa pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas 2 'di'i ming gzugs can
snying bo zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so// ko'u sham bi na rgyal bo dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyamar sems te/ bdag gi bu khatsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur
b+hA: bas/ 'di'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so// grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu/
btsas pa na 'jig rten sgron mas snang ba lta bu r gyur pas ) 'di'igling rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags te/ de ni da ltam yin no// 'on kyang de thams cad ni byang chub samad
dpa'i mthu yin no// ri bo kun 'dzin pa drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba 'jig pa la mkhas 'chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas te/ de'i tsha bo ni mis byin zhes bya'o// des de la dus dus
su 'jig pa'i gtam dang 'chags pa'i gtam smras pas/ de de las rab tu byung ngo// byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltams pan 'jigarten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal
bar gyur to// de'i tshayis byin phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed pa ni/ des snang ba de mthong nas/ nyon mongs tshad la smras ba/ mkhan po/ 'di ni nyi ma thams nyud dag/ cig car
'byung bar gyur tam// 'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa// 'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur// nyon mongs tshad kyis de la smras pa// khyima'i 'od ni rgyun du rno// bu chig snang ba 'di dag ni// yon
lag rig na 'di bsal bas// nges bar thub pa de la 'od// byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ni// dres par lhums nas bltams gyur la// bltams nas sems dpa' chen bo de'i// 'od ga zer
gsar dang 'dra ba ni// dri ma med pa 'di dag gis// 'jig rten gsum ni snang bar byas// mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po bdag byang chub sems dpa' ltaramachi'o// des smras pa/
bu da ltar byang chub sems dpa' dbang che ba dbang che ba'i lha rnams kyis bskor zhing bzhugs las/ gang yang bdag cag gi sa skabasam dpa'iganas 'di yod do// gang gi
thabyang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das sar skya'i gzhir byon pa nas/ de'i ming 'dogs pa de'i bdagadug blta ba'i phyi 'dong ngo// gang gi nyi ma kho nal byang chub sams dpa' bcom ldan 'das
bltams pa de nyid kyi nyi ma kho na la rgyal po khrus gtsang gi rim gro ba rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te lnga brgya dang/ rim gro ma rnams las 'dunam la sogs te lnga brgya btsos so// kha rlungalo lnga

ma'i brgya dang/ rtachodag lnga brgya la yang 'abrangs so// gter lnga brgya'i khayang nye bar snang ngo// khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis kyang dpya phul te blon po rnams kyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang la ji ltar gyur
pa smras pa dang/ rgyal pos bsams pa/ bdag gi bu btsos pa na bdag don thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas/ gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes
gdages so zhes/ don byang chub sems dpa' la ming 'di thogasar btags te/ 'di lta ste/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o// grongakhyer ser skya'i gzhin gnod sbyin shAkya'abal zhes bya ba
k+Sha zhigaganyug mar gnas so// shAkya rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa'i shAkya su yang rung ba la rtsoru'am bumo bcos pa gang yin pa de/ gnod sbyin shAkya'aphal kyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug
pa'i phyir khrid pa yin pas/ rgyal bos blon bo rnams la bsob shes ldan dag deng la gzhonanu gnod sbyin shAkya'aphalakyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug cig/ lta bka' bzhin 'tshAl zhes smon/
rnams kyis rgyal bo zas gtsung la mnyan nas// ri bo che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs kyi stang du byang chub sems dpa' bzhag nas/ grong khyer sar skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa na/ sor
skya'i gzhi'i shAkya gtum po gzu lums can snu ba pa/ btsagi la chad pa de rnams byang chub sams dpa' nang du zhugs pa na/ thub pa bzhin du gnas pa blon po rnams kyis/ rgyal bo la smras pa dang/
rgyal bo zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya 'di rnamasani gtum kho gzu lums can btsam pasad pa yinan/ gzhon nu nang du zhugs par thub pa bzhin du gnas pa/ gzhon
nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes gdags so zhes/ don byang chub srams dang 'i mang gnyis pa btags pa/ 'di lta sta/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin shAkya 'thal kyi
gnas dang nye ba zhig tu byon pa dang/ gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems
dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis rgyalakho zas gtsang la smras pa/ lha gnod sbyin shAkya 'phal nyid kyis byang chub sams dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs lags so// rgyal pos
thos nas smras pa// shes ldan dag lhas kyang gzhon nu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pas 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas/ de bas na gzhon nu'i ming lca'i lang lha zhes gdags so zhes/
don byang chub sams dpa'i ming ming gsum pa gtagasal/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i ming lha zhes bya'o/ byang chub sems da pa' bltams pa'i mod la yab dang yum kyis ma rnams la gtad nas//
ma ma khyod kyis gzhon nu dus dus su sku mnye byos shog/ dus dus sukhrus byos shig/ dus dus suzas byag cig/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsAn bkur byos shig/ yum dga' ba'i lag pa
gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su skul 'a byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ dus dus su zas byin/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsan bkur khyad do/ yang de'i tshe dri shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i

ngo bo gang yin pa de rnams kyis byugs shong/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yabazas gtsang la phul ba dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis blangs te pang du bzhag nas/ yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba 'ded+ma ko/

chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i shod la/ yab dang yum gyis mtshon mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas/ shes ldan dag ji ga gzhon nu gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu

chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du nam yin te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par

'gyur te/ de'i ni lo cha sna bdun 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo ni kho che dang/ glang po ni po che dang/ rta ri bo che dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ bu mar rin po che dang/ khyim bdag rin po che dang/ bdun

pa'i blon po rin po che'o// bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sdarab tu 'joms pa de rgya yatsal thug pa'i sa chen pom lus par gnod par sdob yid cing btsab med pa de
nyid tshad bsad cing mtshon gyis 'da' babadul/ chos dang mthun pas leg par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas

khyim med par rab tu byungan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgyu rnam par grags paro'agyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtswa gnyisadang

ldan m/ shesaldan dag gang dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur zhigazhan du ni ma yin zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sku rnam par grags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyi
stsas bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po ni gang dag yin/ lha gzhon nu'i zhabs han tu gnas pa lags so// zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab sta/ lha 'di ni
gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i gas bu chen kho'imtshan la gsaso// de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis las 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
pa mchis te/ lha 'di'i gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu ni sor mo ring ba dang/ zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang/ de'i phyag dang zhabs/
'dzam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/ phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pani/ dbar nashing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'drab ma bzhin no// lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chan
[– ]bo'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba lags te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba ni/ dpar na ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu'i bzhin no//
lha 'di'i gzhonanu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes buchan po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i na zhabs longamo'i tshigs yimangon pa dang/ byin pa'i dgas a nu ya yi ltabu dang/ sku ma dud pa dang/
sku bzhes bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis slebs shing rig bsta/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// wa gnyin nu'adi gdoms
tsA ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/ de'i mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni/ dpar na glang po chung shes kyi lam/ cha chung shes byung ba dag gi bzhin no// lha 'di ni ba zhon nu'i skyes bu na/

ts+tso po'i skyasaM buchen po'i mtshan lags so/ lha gzhon nu'i sku ji srid par 'dom gang de srid la 'dom ji srid par sku yang de srid pas zhing skya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa lags te/ lku'adi riga'o//
nu'i skyis bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshon lags so// lha gnyenanu ni sku ro stod skya re'e nas rgya zhing/ de'i sa la snga re re nas skya ba yang mathingag la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar skya
lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lta gzhonan namadog gsar 'odra ba dang/ 'ong 'dom gang ba dang/ pags ba srab cing mdog/
gsar 'dra ba lags te/ pags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sgyu lami gos pa lta/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhonanu'i sku/
ni bdun mtho ba lta sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa'i phyag gnyis dang/ zhabs gnyis dang/ dpung mgo gnyis dang ltag pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu
chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhonanu'i ni thal gong rgyas pa dang/ skuro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang/ sku drang zhing kho lags che ba dang/ dbung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang/ tshems bzhi
bshumanga' nga dang/ tshoms mnyam pa dang/ tshoms thags bzang ba dang/ mche ba shAni chu dkar ba dang/ 'gram pa seng ga'i 'dra ba dang/ ro bro ba'i mchogo dang ldan pa lagus te/
lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu ni ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa lags te/ ljags shin tu ring ba nyid dang srab pa nyid kyi phyir//
ljags zhal nas byung bas sa mtshams nas bzung ste/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes

bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i na tshangs pa'i dbyangs drang/ ka la ping ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang/ rnga'i dbyang satsan lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu
wA tshanApo'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu ni spyan mthon mthingal ba'i rdzi malta bu dang/ dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su
pa'i 'khyil ba lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha 'di dag ni gang dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyis/ gzhan du ni ma
lags pa zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du zla rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyas bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so// gal te gzhon nu 'ab tu
ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor 'os sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams nas zhag bdun lon pa
dang da skrunapa'i yumashongs par u0f38gyur te/ nongs ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris gya nom par skye bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dang lagashAkya thub pa nag phrug
bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bltan sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das la/ lha'i kha dog ma thob pa// skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis bltas pas ngoms mi shesangashing dga' ba
thob sta/ dpar na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar la mgar ba mkhas pas rgyan brdungs la/ la ba dkar po sar pa'i steng du bzhagan shin tu gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du
byang chub sams dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs bzung ba/ mdzas pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das shing// lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no// chos nyid kyis
byang chub sems dpar shAkya thub pa skya bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang yid du ngo bar 'gyur te/ skya bo'i tshogs chen pos de phrag pa nas phrag par spyad pa ni/ dper na ston ka'i
pad+ma skya bo'i tshogs chen po'i sIng du sdugatsang yid du 'ongs bas/ skya bo'i tshogs chen pos de lagapanas lag par rgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin no// bar sdom la
mig mi 'dzugs dang rnam smin dang/ gsung snyan 'jebs pa mkhas pa bsdus// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i chod nas spyanami 'dzums par gzugs
rnams la lta sta/ de spyan mi 'dzugs pani par na[“]sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhinano// chos nyid kyis byang chung sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa
las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan dang ldan pas/ desan de nyin mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu gzigs so// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i
mod nas gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang/ gsung snyan dang/ gsung yid du 'ong pa yin te/ dpar na gangs can gyi bya skad snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang/ skad snyan pa dang/ yid du kho
ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i bod nas gsung sAnazhing 'jebs pa dung gsung snyan pa dang/ gsung yad du 'ong ba yin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub
sams dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas mkhar pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa rgyud las 'byung ba'i nyag rab 'byor pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i tshe rgyal po khrus gtsang gi dgos pa'i khyed la
'dug nas/ don zab mo'i tshig dang yige dag shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do// de nasams byin gyis sbas pa/ mkhan po byang chung sams dpa' ser skya'i gzhir byon nas/
de'i mtshan yang gsum brtags kyis/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir bzhud do// des smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes de gnyis chas pa dang/ byang chub samasadapa'i
mthus rdzu 'phrul nyams nas rkang pa kho nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zhugs nas rgyalapo zas gtsang gi khyim gyi sgor son pa dang/ drang srong nyon mongs med kyis/ sgo srungs kyi mi la

pa/ smras pa/ kye dang rdzasong la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong nyon mongasamad lha zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas smon sdodatsang gachib so zhes gsolanug/ de song nas rgyal po la reg par byas pa dang/
rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan nyon mongasamed la su zhig 'gog nang du zhugs shig/ de zhugs pa dang/ rgyal bo zas gtsang gis bkur sti ston du 'gro ba'i mchod yon sbyang bas
mchod nas/ ston bltabs te 'dug pa dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis bshos pa'i gtam gyis kun tu dga' bar byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po dgos pa ni zhig la 'os/
des snas pa/ rgyal chen bdag cag 'dir mchis pa// khyod kyis sras ni mthong bar 'tshal// 'jig rten gtso bo rnams 'dren pa// thug pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal// rgyal pos
smas la/ gal te de ltaran gzhon nu nyal gyis ma sad gyi bar du re zhig skadag sod cig/ des smras pa// lha mnal log pa nyid blta'o// de bzhin gyis shig/ des ji tsam
byang chub sems dpa'atshig ma btsums shing mi 'dzums par gzugs rnams la lta ba mthong nas/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa// rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni/ mtshan mo
bzhi cha nyal ba ltar/ dgos pa don gnyeTa rnams kyi gnyis// mig la yun ring mi gnas so// de nas byang chub sams dpa' bltams pa'i mod kyi ma mas pang du blangs nas drang srong la
byin pa dang/ drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lags pa gnyis blangs nas yud tsamazhig brtags te smras pa/ lha gzhon mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams
tha la bstan lags sam/ rgyal bos smras pa/ bstan to// de rnams kyis ji skad du lung bstan/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du
wA sgra rnam par grags par 'gyura'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas drang srong nyon mongasamad kyis byang chub sems dpo'i mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smas pa 3 sa bdag
rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te// rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung// bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di na// nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur//
mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po// gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur// thub dbang mtshanan shin tu bsal bas na// mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor la
sgyur// zhes smras nas bdag nyid kyitsho'i mtha' dang// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang chub pa la brtag pa la zhugs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes
nasaM khab nas byung nas/ lo drug tu dka'ab spyod par 'gyur te/ de nas bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur par mthong ngo// bdag ni bar skabs der shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur bar
mthong nas/ de mig mchims gang lta'ajug pa rgyal po bras gtsang gis mthong nas sngangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes pa bud mang rnams kyis gang mthong na// ngoms par/
mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba// lus bazung dge byed de ni'adi mthong nas// drusrong chen po ni slad du bzhin gyur// ga las bdag gi gzhon nu 'jigs pa 'am// tshe zad/
'gyur pa rje ba'ami gnas grang// dani myur du legs par bdagal smyos// khyod kyi mchims bdagazhi 'dar bar gyur// drang srong nyon mongs mad kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
gal te 'di yi stang du nam mkha' la// rdo rje'i sar drag 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang// thub pa chen po'i sku la ba ni// nyag ma gcig kyang galos par mi nusalo// ma
chen rlung gi shugs kyis bdas pa dang// mtshon cha rnon po shin tu mi bzad dang// drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi dug rnon yang// gzhon nul bab skad cig 'jig par 'gyur// thugs
rjenyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa// 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol// de ni 'jig ston kun gyi 'jigs 'joms na// mi dbang 'de la 'jigs pa ga la
'byung// 'jig rtam gzhi bdag nyid che rnams kyi// gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la// tshangs bcas lha yang rtag tu srung byed pa// mi dbang de la 'jigs pa ga
la byung// mi dbang bdag gi rgud pa mthonganas ni// gang phyir zhi bam thob bdag tu glod// chos kyis chog mdzod 'di dang phrad nas ni// don ma thob par
za bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur// gang dag smra ba'i dam ba mtshungs med pa// 'di yi chos thob 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang// rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol 'gro de dag/ skyid cing bsod nams ldan la
rims nad bral// drang srong nyon mongasamed rgyud nyon mongs pa can gyis bsam pa/ byang chub sam dpa'i mthus bdag gi rdzu 'phrul nyams te/ gal te bdag rlung gis song na skye ba'i

tshogs chen po dang rgyal po 'phya bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas smras pa/ lha khyod yun ring po nas kyi ma'o drang srong nyon mongasA med rkang kho nas sar skya'i gzhir zhugs par gyur kyang ci ma rung
sAm du dgongs pa skyes pa/ gdag gis rkang gsasar skya'i gzhir zhugs te du ni rkyang kho nas phyir 'byung gis/ khyod kyis lam bstar ba dang grong khyer phyi dor byed du stsol cig/ rgyal
bo zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag dang la grong khyer gyi byi dor dang lam skor du chug la/ lam po che dang/ tshong dus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sumamado/
rnams su drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis grong khyer sar skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gis/ khyad cag gis bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de dag byos shig ces dril sgrogs shig/
lha bka' bzhin ratshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas grong khyer sar skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang/ gsog ma dang/ byamo dang/ sa gsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag
btab/ shinatu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhug/ da gyi chun 'phyang mang bo dbyangs 3 rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsang nas lam po che dang/ tshongadus dang/ bzhi mdo dang/
sumamado rnams su dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ sar skya'i gzhi'i shAkyashes ldan dag nyon cig/ drang srong nyon mongs mad grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gis/ khyed khrag gis
bya ba dung byed pa gang yin pa de byos shig de nas de nyon mongs pa'i blo dang ngan g.yo'i spyod pas rgyal bo zas gtsang blon po'i tshogs kyis longs su bskor ba dang/ sar skya na gnas pa'i/
bram ze dang khyime bdag dum rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'byor pa mchog gis grong khyer gyi dbus nas dbus su byung ste/ grong khyer ser skya'i sgor gyur nas/ rgyalapo slar bzlog sa ji
ltar dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/ rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin gyi drung du phyin pa dang/ de de la 'dzegs nas phan tshun nyul zhing ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas shig btsal nas phyogs
shin tu 'dug go/ de nas de lam gyi dub pa ngal bsos te bsam gtan bskyod nas rdzu 'phrul yang bskyad do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong nyon mongs med nad kyis thebs nas/
de rtsa ba dang/ sdong bu dang/ lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsun bkur byas nas 'on kyang phyir ju bar gyur to/ de nasagis byis
gyis de'i lus kyi gnas rnams brtags nas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag cag rung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad ni bdud rtsi'i chad dang bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir lags na/ gal tramakhan
pos bdud rtsi rtogs par gyur na/ bdud rtsi de las bdag nug sa yang bgos shig/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u 'obo yang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams da bdud rtsi'i rmid
drang bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir yin na/ kho bos kyang bdud rtsi ba rtogs so// de lta mod kyi shAkya rnams kyinang du byung ba'i gzhon nu gang 'byin pa des bdud rtsi 'di rtogs par 'gyur
zhing bdud rtsis kyang 'gro ba tshem par byed par 'gyur gyis/ da'i drung du rab tu byung zhig khyod rab tu byung nas kyang rigs brjod par mi bya ) rus brjod par yaMbya/
bram zwarikhya'u brjod par mi bya sta/ rab tu byung nas kyang tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig spyad par bya zhing/ bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o// de nas khyod kyis
bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras po/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na// shar gyi phyog su khyod 'dug dang// yang dag sangs rgyas
grags ldan pa// red par dka' bamathong bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing// mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/ thad pa'i mtha'
ni'abral blta// gson pa'i mthul ni 'chi ba yin// zhes smras te dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to// de nas mis byin gyis de'i lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas wA rA t+ta sar/
song ste gnas so// de de na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze'i gsangatshig klog tu 'jug go/ mis byin gyi 'us ka ta ya na yin pas/ de'i ming ka t+ya'i bu ka t+ya'i bu zhes bya bar gyur
desas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa ni spyan sngar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ka t+yA'i bu de la gdams ngag phog nas 'khor ba'i dgon gal bsgral te/
shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur te/ de'i ming ni ka t+yA'i bu chen po ka t+ya'i bu chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas dus gzhan zhig na
byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring po ma lon par ) ma ma'i pang du bzhugs nas gsar gyi gzhong par 'bras dang shar bsras pa'i chan gsol ba na// dem mas bkag kyang ma
thub par mang por gsol nas dbrog par brtsoms pa dang/ dbrog ma nusaMnas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang/ rgyal pos btsun mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams/
pa dang/ des kyang nus so// denas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang sar skyan gnas pa'i rgya bo'i tshogs rnams bsgo na/ de nams kyis kyang dbrog par ma nus
so de nas glang po che lnga brgyal btags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams na mi rung gis/ mal bdag mdzub mo bkug bas
gser gyi gzhong pa nas bzung ngo sAm nas/ des mdzub mo bkug pas gsar gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang/ glang po che la brgya po de dag (khaphyir bsgyur te drangs nas/
de dag gis kyang gsar gyi gzhong pa daphrog par ma nus so// rgyal po byas gtsang gis bsams pa// dziltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas klong lo tshe lnga brgya drangs pa/
dang sbyar na/ gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni glang po che stong thub kyis/ de bas na gzhon nu'i ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdugs so zhes btag sa so//
bar sdom la/ khye'u dang rtsedamo dag dadanu// rig pa khang bzangs dag dang ni// ngang pa tshon cha dag ba'i snying// dmag dang btsun mo rnams yin// chosanyid kyis/
byang chub samam dpa'ashAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang yi ge'i slob dpon sring bugo tshal yi ge slob par gtad nas/ mi ga'i slob dpon sring bu go chas/ byang chub sems dpa' la yi ge
bris nas thog pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas sbas pa ) 'di ni ngas shes so// de nas des gi ga gnyis dang gsum nas/ de bzhin du lta brgya'i par bris nas log pa
dang : byang chub sems dpa' smras pa/ 'di dag kyang ngas shes kyis/ gzhan dag sgos bag srin bu go chas smras l/ 'jig rten na niyig 'di tsam spyod kyi//
gzhan ni bdag gisag 'tshal lo/ la/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/ yige 'di'i sang ci yin smos shig/ des smras pa
maratshal lo// byang chub gnas dbas gsungs pa// 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na yig 'di mngon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dang 'dang 'khor los sgyurab 'o///
mamakha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/ srin bu go cha byang chub sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ zhe 'di ni 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na yongon par 'gyur
ti/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o/ byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bklags pa nam mkha'i ngos la gnas po'itshangs pas
[I]dbang byas pas/ tshangs pa'i yi ge tshangs pa'i yig zhes bya bar gyur to// gang gi tshe byang chub sams dpa' yi ga'imatharaphyin pa de'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i zhang po/
bzang len zhes bya ba des glang bo che'i gnya' khazhon pa bslabs nas/ 'phong gi slob dpon ltar bos zhes bya ba des 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa slob pa lazhugs
pan bzang len gyis lhar bcas la sbas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'adang de bzhin du gzhon nu gzhan dag ni snying rjen yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad slobs shig/ lhas byan
wA 'di ni gdug pa'i las byed pa yin gyis/ 'jig rten thams cad la gnod par gyur rung mi rung gis/ 'di la gnad du bsnan pa ma bstan cig gang gi tsho byang glud sems dpa'
tsha bslab pa thams cad lalegasakhar bslabs pas gnas lnga po 'di lta ste/ rkyang nas log pa dang/ sgra grags par phog pa dang/ gnad du 'og pa dang/ mo gtor bar phog pa
dang ! tshabs che ba dag la yang byang bar gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs kun tu sgra grags pa shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu zhes bya ba na/ 'jig na skye rnam par grogs par
'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe yungs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ rgyal po khrus
ny+tsagatseng gi sras mtshanam khon rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i mthus glang po rin po che 'di byung gis dong pa de kho na la dbulal sAm nas/ de rnams
kyis glang po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid du dong ba las/ rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir phyin nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang/ ma stas togadug
pa'i las canalhas byin phyir byung ba des glang bo che dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong nas de des phrag dog chen po skyes te/ de phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes nas/dris pa/
glang po che dam pa 'di su'i yinaM rwa rnams kyis sbas pa/ gzhon nushAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa de la/ yangs pa can gyi
tshogs rnams kyis glang bo rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo// lhas byin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa// re zhig 'khor los sgyur dor ma gyur par nge khyad nug de la klung kho
'gacin 'bul lam zhes smras nas/ thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do// jitsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag glang po
tshe bzang po 'di sus bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa// lhas byin gyis// des bsams pa/ gdon mi zla bar 'di la lhas byin gyis mthu sad kyis/ ma la
bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o sAmanasemajug ma nas bzung ste/ dri mi zhim par gi 'gyur khor bya bar mtha' gcig tu bopa'o// ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya
thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa// glang po che 'di gang nas 'os de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so// sus bsad/ lhas byin gyis/
sa: mgron rnams la mgron gyi mchod pa bya ba yin nam le ga sa pa zhig bya sa so/ phyogs gang du bsad/ 'o ni'i ro// 'di sus 'do'i khyer te 'ongs/ dga' bos so//
dus dgongs pa gdon mi za bar de gnyid kyis 'di la mthu sad kyis// ma la ngas kyang 'di la mthu sar par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ mjug ma nas zung gru rab 'i khar 'phangs/
'tsho nga las/ ra ba rim pa bdun dang/ 'obs bdun las bzlas te po'o// de ltung bas gshong gtod pa/ glang po che'i gshong glang po che'i gshong shes bya bar gyur to//
der bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mchod rten brtsigs pas/ deng sang du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa dag phyag byed do// der snas nga/ lhas byin gyis
glang chen dbang bo bsad// dga' bos da ni gom pa bdun du sbyar// byang chub sems dpas phyag gis bar snang la/ rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/ gzhon nu rnams kyis
smras pa/ mchod pa byed du 'dong ngo zhes de rnams kyis phyir byung ba// byang chub sems dpa' d+hAhAkya thub pas kyang gsan nas 'khor lnga brgya dang mchod pa byed du phyir byung ngo// gzhon
nu rnams 'bras rnga bzhin du gcod par byed red rnams kyis shing bcud tsang bcad pa rnams 'gyel lo// byang chub sems dpa'ani bre'i kha gnon pa bzhinadu gcod par mdzad do// des shing band
cing bcad pa rnams ma 'gyol te de bzhin du 'dug pa dang gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa// shes ldan du byang chub semasadapal shAkya thub pa stobs dang ldan zhing gnas lnga labyang che zhes
thos na)/ 'dri gcod par byed pa yang mi shes pa las na/ 'di bdag cag pas stobs dang ldan pa ni ma yin te/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis shing gang dag bdud pa de thams cad
'gyal la/ 'dis gang dag bcad pa de dag ni de bzhin du 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dmar shAkya thub pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sams te/ shAkya
'di dag ni byang chub sems pa'i mthu dang bgro la byang ba ma shes pas// byang chub sems dpa'al b.rAs shing mkhrul yang smod par 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o
snyam nas/ des de dang mthun pa'i rlung zhig btang bas/ desashing de dag thams cad chem chemazir nas 'gyel te/ shAkya rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshur skyes so//
de rnams tshogs byed pa la zhugs te/ de rnams kyis de na 'ben du lcags kyi ta la bdun dang 2 rdza dang/ bag btsugs so// lhas byin gyis rkang thabs byas te lcags mda'
'phangs pa dang/ lcags kyi shing ta la gcig phegs so// dga' pos ni gnyis la// byang chub sems dpas lcags mdala'aphangs pa dang shang da la//
bdun dang/ rnga dang/ phag la thal nas/ lcags kyi mda' de sa la zug pa klus phyung ba dang/ chu ro phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung nas/ de la skya po'i tshogs chen pos 'thung bar
bsnums so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis der mchod rten brtsigs tA/ deng sang du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dgu phyag byed do// gzhon nu rnams
shang rtar zhugs nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs pa dang/ mtshan mkhan grong khyar nas phyir byung ba de rnams kyis/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa shing rtar zhugs nas nang du zhugs pa la lung
bstan pa/ gal te 'di lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// rgyal po khrus gtsang gis gzhon nu mtshanamakhan rnams
kyis lung bstan te zhes thos so// thos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ shAkya rnams bsogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzhon
nu le bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa kho bos thos so// gzhon nu 'di gal te lo bcu gzhis su rab tu ma byung ste//
'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na bdag caganam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir mchizhing 'dong gis 'di khyim phub cig/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa// lha gzhon nu 'dod pa rnamasangon
du mi gnyer ro// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa ) gzhon nu la bud med thams cad bstan nas 'di gang la dga' bar gyur pa de chungamar blang bar bya'o/ de nas kha cig gis smras
pa : lha gzhon nu ni sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan rnams bud med la stsol du stsal la/ de ga la mgu ba skya bar gyur pa de btsun mor blang bar bgyi'o// rgyalapo zas gtsang gis smras
ba/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ blon po rnams kyis rgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs rin po ches smras pa'i phung po sbyangs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis khyim dang grong khyer phug
dar dang byi dor byed du gtsug nas/ rgyu skar dang ) tshes grangs dang/ yud tsam dag bstun te/ gdon la gshegs su sangaga'i khri bshams pa la gzhon nu shAkya thub
pa bzhag nas sang ga'i khri dang zhi bar rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po phyungs te/ blon po rnams dang gzhan yang sa skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bskyur ba rnams nang du
zhugs so// de nas bud med thams cad rang gi khyim gyi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i cha byad dang 2 rgyun dang/ gos gyon nas zhugs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ba
dal dga' bas rgyun de dag de rnam la byin no// shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyi bumo grags 'dzan ma zhes bya ba gzugs dang lang tshol bab pa de ma song nas/
tha shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyis smras pa// bumo byang chub sems dpa' rgyan sbyin gyis song zhig/ des smras pa// yab ni 'o sol nag la rgyan ma mchis sam/ budamang/
panim yin mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa 'bud mad gang bzhed pa de gdam par mdzad do// yab 'dam yang rung/ mi 'dam yang rung/ de kho na bdag gi snum thabs lags
so 3 bumo gal te de lta na shin tu 'gro dgos pas gong zhag/ de nas grags 'dzin ma na tshod gzhon zhing cha lugs bzang ba/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dang mig 'phrog pa/
budamed thams cad kyi nang na lha'i bu mo bzhin du gzi dang ldan pas nang du zhugs nas spyod lam dul bas/ byang chub sams dpa'i spyan sngar 'dug go/ byang chub sams dpas/
rgyan thams cad byin nas sor gdub rgya kho na lus dang/ byang chub sems dpas de'akhastan pa dang/ de nas thogomamed pa'i dus su mchog tu mnyes pa byas pa des/ sung ge'i
khri'i skas la 'dzegs nas/ byang chub sems dpa 'i phyaganas rang gis phyung ngo// blon po rnams dang sar skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams kyis smras
pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ni bud med thams cad lus khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/ 'di gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus pas 'di byung par bya'o// de nas rgyal po zas
gtsA gi sa grags 'dzan ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa'i btsunamor blangs so// chos nyid kyis gangagi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams /
'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe/ shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba rgyu bar 'gyur tu/ de nyi ma gatrig rnying khrukhargyar skyo bar 'gyur la/ ji tsam nyi ma ma shar ba de srid du nisanamos/
kyang gtsad du rung la/ nyi ma shar nasan mtshon gyis kyang mi chod tsang mas kyang ma tshig pa zhig sar skya'i gzhi dang lhas bstan gyi bar na 'bab chu ro hi ka zhes bya ba'i 'graman skyas te/
dus dus su chu brug pas de'i rtsa ba brus nas rlung gi shugs kyis sa la 'gyel te gags bzhin du chu bcad de 'dug go/ de nas rgyus rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi tshul ni chu yod
ba sa ma rung la/ zas gtsang gi yang chus morung ste/ rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring ba/ shing dge ba'i snying po 'gyel nas 'babachu'o hi
ka'i gags su gyur te mchisan/ gzhon nu mthu dang ldan zhes thos kyis/ de gtang ba'i rigs so// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kho bo gzhon nu la bka' mi
sol la// 'dun pas smras pa/ lha bdag la gnang pa 'ba' zhig stsol cig dang/ rtsi nas kyang gzhon nu la yang bka' ma stsal bzhin du rang nyid gshegs
par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// rgyal po thus gtsang gis khas blangs so// 'dun pas 'babachu ro hi ka'i 'gram du gzhon nu rnams kyi skyed mos tshal re re btsugs nas smras pa
gzhon nu dag skyed mos tshal du 'dong/ de rnams so so'i shing rtar zhugs nas skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba lus/ lhas byin gyi skyed mos tshal gyi stong nas ngang pa zhig 'phur bde lhas
ma rgyun rgyus mdas bsnun nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod chos tshol du lhung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bzunganas mda' phyung ltasman gyis glananas sos so las/
byin gyis byang chub saMms dpa' la spring ba/ ngang pa 'o ni sngar ngas gzung ba yin gyis skur zhig byung chub sa mas dpar/slar spong ba/ ngas gang gi tshe kho nasams chun
thams cud laphan pa'i lhag pa'i bsas pas/ byang chub tu sams bskyed pa de kho na'i tshe ngas sams can thams cad bzung ba yin no// der byang chub sems dpa' dang lhas byin/
lhan cig srid pa tha ma la thog mar sha khon de byung sta/ srid pa gzhan rnams su ni phal mo che zhig kyang byung ngo// legs par rab sad kyis gzhon nu rnams nang dge ba'i snying
po dbyung ba'i phyir lcags so zhes thos nas/ des skya bo'i tshogs chen po mngags te/ den skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po dang sgra mthon po graganas/ byang chub sems dpog
sgras pa/ shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po dang sgromathon po grag pa 'di ni zhig 'dunapas ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa
gol te de lta na 'byin du 'dong ngo zhes 3 byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig dong ba dang/ ji tsam nakhung nas sprul gdug pa zhig byang chub sems dpa'imadun du byung
pa dang/ 'char khas byang chub sems dpa' thal bar rlags su 'gyur du 'ong zhes mtshon rnon pos ched du bond pa las de'i dbugs kyis 'char khal phogs pas/ 'cha'akha nag po
gyur nas )de'i yang 'char kha nag po 'char kha nag po zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas gzhon nu rnams kyis shing dge ba'i sIng po 'byin pa la zhugs pa na/ lhas byin gyis 'bad
pa dang cung zad cig g.yos so// dga' bos ni rlung klad rnyig bteg go/ byang chub sems dpas ni thams cad kyi thams cad du snang gi namamakha' la 'phangs// dum bu gnyis su
chaganas 'bab chu ro hika'i tshul rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig/ pha rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig lhung par gyur to// byang chub rnams dpas skyo bo'i tshogs la gsungs// shes
ba'i smatshapa// ldan dag shing dge ba'i snying po 'di'i bsal kha 'i rang bzhin yin pas mkhris pa'i nad dang/ shu ba dang/ pho yig byung ba la byugs na zhi bar 'gyur gyis/
dum bu dum bur byos la khyer cig/ gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi shang rtar zhugs ta skyad mos tshal gyis nas// sar skya'i gzhir dong nas grong khyer du zhugs pan/ byang chub sems dpa'
shing rtan zhugs pa la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te 'di lo bdun du rab tu ma byung bar gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// shAkya dril bu sgra'i bu mo
sa 'tshom zhes bya ba stong gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug pa byang chub sems dpas gzigs so// gzigs ma thog tu zhabs kyi mthe bos shing rtamanan nas mi g.yo bar gyur pa dang/
byang chub sems dpas sa btso ma la brtag par brtsams so// sa 'tshoms kyang byang chub sums dpa' la'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa'atshom la rtog pa na phyag na lcags kyimada'
bsnams pa de phyi nagasaso// sa 'tsho ma yang byang chub sems dpa' la rtog pa la rkang pa'i mthe bos khang bzangs kyi gzhi brtol lo// skye bo'i tshogs chen pos byang chub san sa dpa'
dang sa 'tsho ma phamatshun du rtog par byed cing lhag pa'i bsam pa skyes par gyur pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang smras pa// bud med 'di 'dra ba 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dang bstun par
00 nus so// gtam de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas des 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa' btsun mos blangs so// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang rgyugasas dpa'
skyang mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ (kha lo sgyur pa la/ kyi kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang/ nga der zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi
gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas )de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la bsgo khaM/ kye kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang mo myur du shoms shig dang/ dar pazhugs
nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o// lha bka' bzhin 'al zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dba' shAkya thub pa'i ltaram35nas/ gzhon pa bzang po myur du bshams te byang chub/
sams dpa'8shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad kyis smras so// lha bcibs pa bzang bo bshems lags kyis/
lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa'4shAkya thub pa gzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas skyed mosatshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang/ byang chub sams ra pa'
shAkya thub pas mi rgas 'khogs/ gtugs pa/ sgur po/ phyam dgu boltar kyar kor can mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba ) de'i sa sa ba jit+tan/
yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba mi rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs//
skulo/ phyam dgu bo ltar kyang skyon mdun nas 'khar ba la rtenatsang lus 'dar zhing 'gro la/ de'i sgra sa ba ji ltar yang mi gzhan dang mi 'dra ba 'di ni yin/ lhami 'di ni rgas pa zhes
bgyi'o// kha lo sgyur ba chags pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yin/ lha mi 'di 'ong po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur ba// de rgyas pa zhes bgyi'o// kha lo sgyur ba nga yang na
pa'i chos dang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha yang na ba'i chos dang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so// kha lo sgyurab de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du/
'dong ngo// 'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas nga rgya ba las ma 'das zhes grag pa 'i donod nyid bsam par bya'o// kha lo sgyur bos shing rta phyir bsgyur nas [“]pho brang nyid du chas te//
der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du byon nas/ nga yang rga ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dbyas Mshing thugs ngan dgongos so// 'dir smras pa//
ts+tshA dar yal rgas shing sgyur la mgo skya ba// lag na mkhar ba thogs pa'i mi gzigs nas// 'di bdag rgas las ma 'das zhes gragaces// de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs
par mdzad// de nas rgyal bo zas gtsang gis/ kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu lId dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung na// skyang mos/
tshal la mngon par dga' 'am/ lha ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe ne/ lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs pa na/ mi rgas/ 'khogs gtugs pa/
sgur po/ phyam dgu bo ltar kyang kyor nyan mdun nas 'khar ba la rtan rung lus 'dar zhing mchi la/ de'i bla sa ba ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so// gzigs/
nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kha lo sgyur ba mi rgyas/ 'khogras/ gcugs pa/ sgur po/ phyam dgubo ltar gyur kor can mdun nas/
'khar ba la rten tsung lus 'dar zhing 'grol/ de'i sgras ba dziltor yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ del bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// lha 'di ni
rgyas pa zhes bgyi'o// de 'di skad ces gsungs so// kha lo sgyur brgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// lha mi 'di yang po
mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas lha de ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o// de 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ de la
bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// lha yong rga ba'i ngos dang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so// de 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba de'i
phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo// 'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas nga rga ba las ma 'das zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o// lha gzhon nu da pho brang gi nang
du ga shalags te/ de nas nga yang rgya ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig cesami dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so// de nas rgyalakho sa gtsang 'di sAm du soms te/ mtshan mkhan
dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang ) gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas
khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/ ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin la ) rinas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab
tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'osAm mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa'ashAkya thubapa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lta las phal mo che zhig byas te ci nas
kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so// 'dir smras ba/ shAkya thub pa'i yab sto zas gtsang des/ kha lo sgyur las tshig de thos nas ni// de tsha
dga' nas bdag 'dor mi gzhug phyir// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngalas yang byin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed//
par gyur ba de'i tshab lo sbyar ba la/ kyi kha lo sgyur b.re zhig bzhon pa bzang pomyur du shoms shig dang/ de la nga zhon nas skyod mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/
deshas byang chub sems dpos kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa// kyi kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang pomyur du shoms shig gdu la nga zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so/
lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' d+d+hishAkya thub pa'i ltar mnan nas gzhon pa bzang po bshams te/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang
na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' phashAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags n/ lha da de'i dus la bab bar dgo/
su gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzhonopa bzung par zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skya bo rbab/
rbab po rid pa/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang bo'i mig gis lam phod pa zhig gzigs so// 'dul ba gzhi/
