du mi bya/ mngag gzhug par mi bya/ rang dbang can gar dga' bar 'gro bar bya// bde ba la reg par gnos shig/ rmon pa rnams kyang bsgrolas gsungs 6/ khyed nug kyang deng/
khan tshad rtsa mchog ma mnyams pa la za zhing/ chum rdul ma b.rogs shing dang chu dag la 'grungapa ba khyen pa phyo gdan bzhin rlung bsil ba ltakha dal gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems
dang 'a yid byung ba de nyid kyis ya/ kyi zas gnaMng gi zhing byas kyimarda' 'gazigs nas/ 'dapepaNAm bu'i grib la gang na ba der gshegs te byon pas shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs te/

'dod pa las dban pa'i sdig pa mi dag pa'i chos rnams las dben pa ! rtogs dang banus dpyod pa dang bcas shing dban pa la sa ga pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba skrag pa dang ra dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan dang po
la snyoms par zhugs so// skye bo'i tshogs chen po la nga byang chub sems dpa' spangs mi 'gro bar shing gzhats+tshanas kyi drung na sdod do// rgyal po zas gnong gis sams pa/ byang chub sems da 'di
zhig thogs te/ 'diltar dro'odus las yol gyis ltar 'gro'o zhes/ de 'di ltar zhugs nas zhing pa'i klong du song ste phan tshun du byang chub gsum dang 'tshol zhaye shange 'dzam bu'i drung du phyin to//
de'i tshe nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bang shan phyogs su bab par gyur to// byang ba gams dpa'i mthusashing 'dzem/
bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi gtong ngo// rgyal bo zas gtsang nyi ma'i gung sol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab[E]

! shar phyogs su bab par gyungan/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i skul gtong ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam dusams te/ gzhon nu'i rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin
te : 'di ltar da ltar nyi ma'i gung yol nasashing gzhan rnams kyi grub mashar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur nas/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma
byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba ngomatshar che'o snyam mo// de nas dga' ba'i bsti stang byas te/ byang chub sams dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa//
ji ltar bltams tshes ni gsos pa ltar// 'dzam bu'i grib ma khyod skumigatong ba// blo chen khyod kyis ma mtshonaganyis 'di ste// kun gzigs khyod kyi zhabs la phyaga'6la go//
de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' skyel mos krung bsdus pas bslang nas/ shing rta zhugs te dur khrod kyi nang nas sar skya'i gzhir gshegs pa na/ byang chub sam
dang 'a dur khrod kyi nang nas mi ro rnam par bsngos pa dang/ rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang/ rnam khar bam pa dag gzigs nas/ shin tu skyo ba skyes te shing rtar zhugs bzhin du/
skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so// de nas yang rgyal pos skyil mo krung bcas pa las bsrung nas/ ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te grong khyer gyi nang du 'jug pa na mtshasamakhan rnams kyis/
gal te gzhon nu zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tum byung na ) 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal por 'gyur bar lung bstan par rig nas 3 de rnams kyis rgyal bo zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras
so gal te de yi bzang po gzigs bzhed na/ de'i slad dgrong b.ru dar du srungs shig dang// mi dbangagadug ni 'dul bar gyur pa na/ lan rman sna bdun 'byung bar the
tshom med/ khyod sras rin chen bdun po yi// dbang phyug gi ni rgyal por 'gyur/ 'tsho la ni thug pa'i sa/ ]chadapa mad pas skyong bar 'gyur// 'on te sa ni spangs nas su//
bsangs mang nags su bzhug na ni// thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur nas// 'gro ba sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur// gshAkya dus legs kyi bu mo re ngags sbyas zhes bya ba du skur
khung na 'dug pas khyang chub sems dad 'amathong nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa ) kyi lha 'di yum bdo zhing// yab de yang ni pAdog 'a na/ kya ma gang gi khyimathapa
'gyur// dud mad de yang mya ngan 'das// skyes mchog bsam gtan pa de yis// mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra thos nas// mya ngan 'das pa zhi nyid du/ mkhyen nas de la thugs dgyes gyug
/ de nas byang chub sems dpas legs par smras pa'i phyir mu tig gi 'phrang pa'aphangs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus skar khung nas song sku/ de'i mgul
du'akhris par gyur to// skye bo'i tshogs kyis nang du song ba de mthong nas/ de rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyas par smras nas/ rgyal bo zas gtsang gis ri dgas skyes 'khor ni
khri dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so// de nas byang chub sams dpa'i btsun mo sa 'tsho ma dang/ ri dwags skyes la sogs pa'i 'khor bud med drug khri yod do/
de nas rgyal po bras gtsang garlung bra bozas dang/ bras dkar dang 3 tshad mad zas gsum dang lhan cig gcig tu tshogs nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes
ldan dag mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'ashAkya thub pa la gal te zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por/
'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/ de lta bas na bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' zhag bdun gyi bar du sgrims te bsrung bar bya zhing/ grong khyer yang legs paro bsrung bar bya'o//
de nas de rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer ra ba rim pa bdun dang 'obasam pa bdun gyis bskor nas/ grong khyer gyi sgo 'ophar lcags las byas shing 2 sgo 'phar rnams la dril
bu shin tu sku gsal da btags te/ sgo phyan de'i sgras dpag tshad ga rig kho ra ror yug tu grwa ka b.ra'agyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ni yang nga blangs kyi gzhin bud song yid 'apo
ba gzugs babrang ba rnams dang ) kar dang/ rgyu dang/ rol mo rnams kyi spyod pas bsAn dang kur byed du bcug go blon po rnams nirayung ka tso ga yan lag bzhi dang lha
gal ba'i phyi rol kho ra khor yuka tu kacan pa byed du bcug go// skas po ra lung ba mi lnga brgya bas tshugs pa yang byas so/ btsunamo'i 'khor gyi skor yang sgomya na/ de'i sgras rgyal/
po zas gtsang gi pho brang du grang ring/ da thos nas patsunamo'i 'khor gyi mi dang spong khyer gyi spyi'i so srungs rnams dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi grong khyer gyi phyi rol nas srung du bcug
ba rnams bag dang chas te 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu btags so// byang chub sems dpa' ni stong gi khang bzangs kyi kazhisnyas pa mjapar zhus na/ pi wang dang/ gling bu/
dang 'khar rnga dang/ sgra snyan la sogs pa rol mo'i rma smad dag nye bar le myor 'byor na pos bzhug na so// mtshonamo 3 tsad ka gats+tsaMng yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag
bzhi dang shar sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go lho phyogs nani bo de brag so// nub phyogs na ni zas dkar rdo/ byang phyogs na ni da yod ra/ kong byang kyi dbus kyi 'dras
po byed pa ning+gashAkya ming chen no// dngashaN sgorasong nas smras pa// su zhig mal tshe byed/ su zhigamel tshe byed/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smyos pa/ kho kho
mel tshe byed do// lha mal tshe mdzodacig/ molatshe ma dzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smas te tshigs su bcar de smos pa// 'jig rtane kanyid log ro/
dang mtshungs// gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song// 'di ni mi zhal rtag tu mkhas/ de bas ma nyal mal tshe byos// lho sgor song nas smras pa/ su/
zhig mel tshe byed// su zhig malatsho byud ! bra bo khrus kyis smas pa/ kho bo mal tshe byed do// lha yal tshemadzodanug/ melatshe mdzod dang khyod la
legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ tshigasasu bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten gnyis log ro dang mtshungs// gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song// gnyid log
'chi bdag dbang du song// de bas ma nyal mal tshe byos/ nub slob song nas smras pa/ su zhig mal tsho byad/ su zhig mol tshe byed/ zas dkar gyis smras pa//
kho bo molatshe byed do// lha mol tshomadzod cig/ mal tshe mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes sbas nas/ tshigs su bcad de smas pa ! gnyid log pa ni rtag tu myos// myos 'gyur
kaM/ bre pos 'thungs pa nyal// dgon pa nags su rtsol pa 'dras// de bsam nya' mal tshe byos// byang skor song nas smras pa/ su zhigamel tshe byed/ su zhigamal tshe byed/ tshang mad zas kyis smas pa

kho bo mal tshe byed do// lha mal tshe mdzod cig/ mel tshe mdzad dang/ khyod la legs pa pa ra ro zhes smras nas/ tshigs su bcud de sbasu pa ) nyal ri sul nyal ba bzhin// rgya mtsho chur nyal ba dang//
ljong shing rtse lanyal ba bzhin// de bas ma nyal mal tshe byos// dbus kyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ su zhigamal tshe byed )srungs ma rnams kyis smras pa/
badrag cag mel tshe bgyid do// malatshe byos shig/ malatsho byas dang/ khyed la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ chos spyod chos ma yin ma spyod// bden pa smos
shig brdzun ma sgra// mun pa chen por 'jug nga ra 'gyur// de bas ma nyal mal tshe byos// de nas namanangs nas shAkya mang chen gyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/ lha dgungasangs legs
te dgung bdun la dgung gcig na thal/ dgung drug ni lus so// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ ) legs kyis zhag drug 'das nas/ gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur bar gyur na/ bdagAnug
nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir phyi bzhin dong ngo// de bzhin du dgung gcig lus so zhes bya ba'i bar du sta/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong pa ni 'og
datu 'jug pa yin pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mi dbang shAkya 'i sras bo thub pa 'di// bdag nyid chen po pha rol phyin drug rdzogs// thub rnams dgyes
nga ramadzad pa dka' thub 'tshol// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su gshegs par bzhed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo dang lhan ga sbas pa med pa na rol mos
dar byed// dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa ni 'disnyam du dgongs te/ bdag la gzhan dug gzhon nu shAkya thub pa ni skyes pa ma yin te/ gang gi
phyir grags 'dzan ma dang/ sa rtsom dang/ ri dgas skyes dang/ bud mad drug khri spangs nas rab tu byung ngo zhes gzhi des kha zor bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/
ma la bdag gis sprugs 'an ma dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad par bya'o snyam nas des grags 'dzan ma dang lhan tsog dga' dgur spyad pa dang/ grags 'dzin ma sems
can dang ldan par gyur nas/ ri 'di sAmadu sangs te nam nangs nas byang chub sems dpa'i snyan du gsol lo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ tan ni 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pas

tshigs su bcad de gsungs ba ) bud med dang bdag khyim nyal ba'i// thamadang gi'adi yin te// phyin chad khyim du bud med dang//ngani lhan cig mi gnas so// de nas bud med de rnams gar dang/ glu dang dngol
mos dub nas/ kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skya zhigal// gos dang lag pa dag lcag par btang nas bar nga'i tshig byang rgyal du brdol zhing gnyid log ge/ byang chub sems dpas bu 'bu de dag thams cad
kha nas kha chu 'jog cung sgra zhig la/ gos dang lag pa dang lcag par btang nasaM barma pa'i tshig byung rgyal du brdol zhing gnyid log pa gzigs so// gzugs nas kyang btsun mo'i 'khor la rur khrod kyi
'du shes skyes nas/ des tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ ! rlung gi shugs kyis padu'i tshalaltaras kazhi 'dir// lag pa dag dang rkang pa brkyang nas 'gye[”] gyur te// sgra rnams zhig nang mdoms dang
rkub kyi phyogs snang ba/ shAkya'i sras kyis gzigs nas rang bzhin skyo bar gyur// chos dang bral ba'i bud med na chung tshogs 'di dag/ dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin 'drar mthong
nas// sems can byis pa'i spyod pa'i yul la deng dga' na/ soms dang blo gros dran dang bral ba yin nan ni// 'dod pa tha tshad 'dam dang mda' mdung dug ma 'dra// rmi lam lta bu yin te tshwa chu'i ro

dang mtshungs// 'dod pa lung ma rtsod dang sdig pa'i rgyur gyur pa// mdza'ayanasmyul gyi dang ngabo lta bu bdag gis sbyang// bar skabs der skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i rmi lam ngu bzhirmis pa/ zla ba sgra
gcan gyis zin pa dang/ nyi ma shar phyogs nas nas de nyid du chub pa dang/ skya bo'i tshogs chen pos bdag la phyag byas pa dang/ bdag nyid dgod cing duba'o// grags 'dzan ma'i rmi lam du brgyad
rmis pa/ bdag nyid kyi khyim gyi gdung chag pa dang/ bkra shis kyi mal khrim+magapa dang/ lag pa'i gdu bu chag pa dang/ mo'i 'bring ba lhags pa dang/ skra'i lan bu zhig pa dang/
dpa' khyim nas byung ba dang/ zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pa dang/ zhigangasharaphyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub pa'o// byang chub sems dpas kyang rmi lamalnga sar/ sa chen po nyid kyi gatrigs mal du
byas shing ri rab ro'i rgyal po dbu smin du bcug/ phyag g.yon pa shar phyogs kyi mtsho chen por 'jug/ phyag g.yas pa nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen bor 'jug/ zhabs gnyis rgyamatsho chen por 'jug
pa dang/ 'greng ba zhes bya ba'i rtswa'i rigs lte ba nas byunganas nam mkha'i bar du 'phags te 'dug pa dang/ bya kun nas dkar la mgo gnag pa rnams kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas pusatsho'i
lha nga la thug gi bar du ldang ba dang/ byasnatshogs phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs nas mdun du kha dog gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ mi gtsang ba'i ri'i steng nas bdag nyid mi gtsang bas ma gos par dag pa'o//
rmis nas kyang thugs dgyes te dgongs pa/ nga'i rmi lama'adi'adra ba rmig pas ring po mi thogs pa kho nar bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo// denas grags 'ani mas byang chub sen
dpalal rmi lam gsol pa lha dgazod bdakagi g.yar lam du brgyad rmis pa/ bdag gi sdum pa'i gdung rgyag pa dang/ bkrashes kyi mal khri chag pa dang/ sug pa'i gdu bu chag pa dang/ so'i 'phrang
ba lhags pa dang/ sku'i lan bu zhig pa dang/ dpal sdum pa nas byung ba dang/ zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pa dang/ gdugs shar phyogs nas bdal nas de nyid dunub ba rmis lags so// byang chub se
dpas grags 'dzin ma'i yid mi bde ba bsalaba'i phyir rmi lam rnams bshad la/ bdag gi khyim gyi gdung rmag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi 'dug gam/ bdag gi bkra shis kyi mal khri chag gnas
smras pa gang yin pa de las ga cu 'dug pa 'o ni yin mod/ lag pa'i gdu bu chag go zhes smras pa gang yin pa ni chag gam ma ga rang nyid rtogs shig/ so'i 'phreng ba lhags so zhes smras pa gang yin
ba de yang so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas ni lhags sam ma lcags rtog shig/ bdag gi lan bu zhig go zhes gang smras pa de yang khyod kyis so so rang gis ga par bya ba yin pas ci zhig gam

ma zhig rtogs shig/ khyim nas dpal byung ngo zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni bud med rnams kyi dpal ni khyo yin la nga ni 'dug pa nyid do// zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin ces smras pa gang yin pa de ni zla
ga 'di mngon sum du 'dug pa ma yin nam/ nyi ma shar phyogs nas shAr nas de nyid du nub bo zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni da dung yang nam phyed yod de/ re zhig shar yang m sharAn nub par lta ga la
'gyur zhes de ltar brda sprad nas/ btsun mo grags 'dzinam cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/ grags 'dzanama'i rmi lam de 'dra ba rmis pas gdon mi
za bar da kho na dug 'gro bar byas/ 'di la tshig zur gyis bstan no snyam nas/ des de la tshig zur gyis bstan pa dang/ grags 'dzin mas gsol pa/ lha khyod gang du
bzhud pa der bdag khrid cig/ byang chub sems dpas mya na las 'das pa las dgongs nas bka' stsa'al/ de bzhin dubya sta gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der khyodabakri'o// de nas brgya byin
ts+tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skadagyes
ma/ gsol to// nags kyi snga' spyod yul rgyu 'dra zhing// yan par 'dug pa'i rte'u dang 'dra'i thugs// gal te 'dod pa'i yon tan las bzlogan// de nas shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba gzigs// blo gros
bzang bo bzhengasashig bzhengs/// sani spangs te bzhur mdzod la// thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes nasani// 'gro ba dgan bsgral bar mdzod// byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa[]ko'u shi ka ma mthong
ngag: bzhi ri dgas bdag po rgyas bskoraltar// yin mthu ldan gzhu mtshon ral gri thogs// rta glang shing rta dpung tshogs mang bo yis// grong khyer ser skya kun nas yongasasu bskor/ zas gtsang la
sogs shAkya'i tshogs 'di dag/ klung chen rta zhon legs par go bgos lus/ mi sdug sna tshogasalags namatshon thog te// khyims dang rta babs khang bzangs gzhi nang gnas// po khrang

dang khyim sgo dang// de bzhin grong khyer lho dag kyang// khacad nas gtan pa dam bcug ste// de bzhin kun nas bsrungs par gyur// ra dung pa Ta ha sgra rnga sgra yis// khyags dang rta babs khang bzangs
nang gnas shag klung chen rta dmag 'bad pa'i skya bo'i tshogs// rgyun du nga mi gtang phyir srung bar byed// brgya byin gyis gsol pa// des pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dang// sdug bsngal gyis
gdungs 'jig rten 'di dang yang// khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs mdzod la// khab dag spongs te nges bar 'byung bar mdzod// ji ltar khyod ni bgegs med pas// deng nyid nags su gshegs
'gyur ba// bdag cag tshangs sogs bcas pa yin/ lha rnams kyisani de bzhin bgyi// byang chub sems dpas legs so zhes gsungs nas thugs dgyes par gyur to// de nas wa rnams
kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnyid kyis myos par byas nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sa dpon chen po lngas brtsan la sgo ba/ grogs pobyang chub sems dpa' stong gi khang bzangs nas 'babs kyis skas
khongazhig/ des skas blangs pa la byang chub sems dpas babs pa dang/ de nas brgya byin gyis brda byas ma thagatu zham 'bring ba bdun pa gang na ba der gshegs na/ jitsam na
'dun ba gnyid stug pos non par gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpas bsgrims te bslang nas/ tshags su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs pa/ 'dun pa longs kyi khyimanas
[s ]// myur du ni// nga yi rta po rin chen bsngags ldan long// sngon gyi rgyal bas longs spyad dka' thub tsho// thub rnams dgyes par mdzad par ng gshags so/ 'dun pa gnyid
log pa'i mig phya nas sbas pa ) lha khyod skyed mos tshal kyis dus ma bab/ des pa khyod dang 'ga' yang bor ma mchis// khyod la dgra bo su yang mamachis na// dgung phyad khyod la bcibs pas ni
lha zhag bgyid/ byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa// 'dun pa khyod kyis lan 'ga' yang/ nga yi tshig ni ma banuka na// nga yi reng dus tha ma la// nga yi tshig 'di ma kacug nug 'an pas/
gsol pa/ gzhon nu mtshan mo 'di ni 'jigs pa dang 'jigs su rung ba mchis pas/ bdag bcibs pa min no// byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa lan dngayang lan gyis gdon mi za
sh+tsa bar skya bo sad par 'gyur gyis 3 bdag nyid song la rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan lta gon bya'o snyam nas/ de nas nyid kyis pho brang gi sgo phyanas/ rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan gzung bar brtsams
pa na/ de khros pa'i garab 'bar bas rkang pa 'phra/ 'dzing kyog byed laphar 'bros tshur 'bros shing 'dug tu mi btub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag bsod nams brgya phug dums bskyed
pa 'khor lo dang/ bkra shis dang/ g.yung drung 'khyil bamanga' ba skag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs nas gsungs pa/ bsngag ldan tha ma yi ni khur
khong ste/ dka' thub nags su ma thogs nga skyol zhig/ byang chub thob nas myur du 'gro ba kun// bsam gtan rnam tharatshar kyis tshim par bya// chos nyid kyis dud 'gro yang
gdams na phyi lang mi byed pas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ltan mi g.yo bar 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' thugs dgyes pa skyes te/ rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan brgyud nas bzhes/
so brgya byin dang tshongs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis// byang chub sems dpa' phyir gshegs pa'i phyis lha'i bu bzhi po bsgo ste bzhag pa/ 'gram dang/ nye 'gram dang/ la/
ma dang/ le ma gyon pa'o// byang nub nyams dpas de rnams la gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag nga sus bkur/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bdag rtog gis bkur lags so/
khyed cag la stobs ji tsam yod/ gtsug gis gsol pa/ gzhon nu bdag gis ni sa'i rdul ji snyed mchisab khur du tho gas ta mchi'o// gnyis pas gsol pa ) bdag
gis ni rgya mtshon po bzhi dang/ mtsho dang/ mtshe'u dang/ lteng ka dang/ chu mag rnams kyi chab ji sar mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o//
gsum pas gsol ba// bdag gis ni sa la ri ji snyad mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o// bzhi pas gsol pa/ bdag gis ni sa la smyu dang/ shing
[s/ ]@#// dang yal ga dang/ lam ji snyadumachis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpas zhabs sa la bzhag pa na/ de rnams
kyis bsgul bar yang yanusanas ngo mtshar skyes te gsol pa// gzhon nu bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la stobs 'di 'dra bo mda' b.ram 'tshal lo// gal te 'tshalan bdag
cagami mtshasalags pa zhig/ gtam de 'dun pa sngar sad pas thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar song ba dang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan la
bcibs/ 'dun pa yang yongs la zhon nas )'di ltar byang chub semasadapa'o rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus rta rin po che bsngags ldan stong gi nam/
mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa dang/ pho brang na gnas pa'i lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' dang bral bas ngu par brtsams so// de rnams ngu ba'i mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams lus dang sa la/
ba ba bo// 'dun pas gsol pa/ gzhon nu ra kyi thigs pa dag 'babazhi ni lhas dgung chub phapa bam/ byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ lhas char phab pa ma yin te/
'on kyang pho brang na gnas pa'i lha rnams nga dang bral bas ngu bar brtsams te/ de rnams kyi mchi ma'i thigs pa rnams lus la bab pa yin no// de nas 'dun pamig mchi mas gang zhing
dngugs dron po'i shugs ra gyis phyang nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' sku thams cad kyis glang bo che'i gzigs stangs kyis g.yas phyogs su gzigs te
dgongs pa/ nga bud med dang lhan cigakhyim na nyal ba'i tha mni 'di yin no sAmamo// yang dgongs po ) gal te nga shar sgo srungs te sgo gzhan nas byung na/ gzhon nus ni bdag la tha ma'i
dus nas yang m bltas so snyam du rgyal po mo dga' bar 'gyur snyam mo// dzitsamanargyal po zas gtsang gnyid stug pos non pa gzigs nas/ des de la bskor ba mdzad de gsungs pa/ yab
gus pa ma mchis pa dang zhe sa ma mchis pas smag nas mchi ba ma lags te/ gzhan du na 'jig rten zla ba dang 'chi bas bcom pa rga ba dang ) 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa
las yongs su'agrol ba'i slad du lags so// ji tsaman shAkya mang chen 'dram bo byed pa skye bo nyul zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gshags par s pa mthong
ngo// de nas skada'adzar ni mig mchi mas gang bas smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di rimadzad/ ming chen 'gro'o// gzhonanu 'diragos pa ma lags so/ ming chen gang gi phyir sa
bskal ba grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stonganamasaM/ sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa des na dang ci khyim na 'dug phod dam ! 'di'i nges te dka'i
rgya glu/ thub kyi tshal du 'gro'o// de nas gsung tshigadrag posashAkya mang chen myos pa dang/ cho nges btab stakyi dud/ deng du rgyal bo zas gtsang dang// shAkyadag ni thams
cad kyis// yang dang yang du bsams pa yi// re ba 'bras bu med par gyur// deng du rgyal po zas gtsang ni// sras kyi mngon gyis gdungs pas// lag bsgreng shin tu sdug bsngal/
zhing mi bzad sgra ni 'byin par gyur// sa 'atso grags 'dzani ri dwags skyes// de bzhin btsun mo'i 'dabor rgyas pa'ang// don grub dang ni bral ba yis// shin tu sdug bsngal
'khaM myong bar 'gyur// zhes smras nas/ de sngangasas grags 'dzin ma bslang ste ny+tsas pa/ don grub 'di ni gshegs gyur kyis// khyim thab sdug bsngal gyis gdungasaM nas//
sdug bsngal nyal thag dur 'ong gis// khyim thab sdug pa de zlog cig/ khyod kyis khyim thab gshogs 'gyur 'din mthong dka' ste// khyod kyis 'di ltos khyim thab mthong ba'i
tha ma yin// kyi dud phongs pas bdag gis mtshan mo khus btab kyang// sus kyang lanam star bas bdag gis ma nyes go// des nidi ltar khus btab kyang// 'di ltar lha rnams
byin rlabs kyis// dgon par 'o dod bos pa bzhin// 'ga' yang sad par ma gyur to// de nas shAkya ming chen sdug bsngal zhing yid mibade bsagadungunas/ de rings par rgyal bo khras
gtsang gi drung du song nas/ rgyal bo zas gtsang bslang ste susal/ don grub 'di'i bzhud lags kyis// sa bdag de ni bzlog par mdzod// sras kyi mya ngan gyis thebs nas//
sdug bsngal kyis gdungs bshums 'gyur mchi/ ma stas de yang gnyid ma sad do// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bsko
nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bskor cing dong ste/ g.yas phyogs nas gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams spyod lam zhi ba dang/
g.yon phyogs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyis rgyal mtshanadang ba dan bsgreng nas/ lha'i rol mo'i khyad par sna tshogs dang/ mdunas brgya byin dang tshangs pa lasogs pa rang rang gi spyod
lam gyis dong ngo// nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i lha brgya stong phrag du mas ni byang chub sems dpa'i stang nas/ lca'i ma tog ut+pal dang/ pad dang/ kumu ta dang/ pad+ma dkar po
rnams kyis gtor ro// a ka ru'i byam dang/ na nAgyi phyam dang/ ta la ya'i 'dabama'i phyu pa dang/ lha'i ma tog man dar bas kyang gtor ro// lha'i rol o'i cha byad tsatshog
kyang brdungs so// gos rnams kyang gtor ro// 'di'i smras pa ) mkhasal lha rnams ga zha'i sgra chen 'byin byed la// dga' ba'i yid kyis gos kyi g.yab mos 'dabs byed cing//
kha cig byang chub sems dpa la ni bstod byed de// nam mkha' la ni sgor mo brgya phrag sbyar bar byed// kha cig dag ni sgo rnams 'byed byed cing// ma tog man da ra bas 'thor b.rakhyed/
kha cig dag ni bcibs pa'i rkang 'dzin cing// bde bar gshags la rtoganAng rjes bzhin 'brang// kha cig dag kyang g.ya sa nas rjes bzhin 'brang// g.yon nas 'gro ba dag kyang rjes bzhin 'brang//
brgya byin de bzhin tshangs par bcas pa dang// lus ngan bdag nyid shulani mtshon par byed// zla ba nya ba rgyu skar tshogs kyis ltar// bdag nyid chen po lha tshogs mdun bdar nas// dka' thubanags
na thub rnams dgyes byed pa/ 'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su thugs dgyes gshegs// de nas dung chub sems dwapa' grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir byung ba dang/ brgya byin dang tshangs
pa la sogs pa lha rnams yid dga' bas spro ba skyed pa/ grogs po khyod yun ring po nas nam zhiganang ba gags las thar te dka' thub kyi nags su 'gro bar 'gyur snyam dudagos
pa skyod pa gang lags pa de deng du yongs su rdzogs pa lags kyis/ nus khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par saMngs rgyas pa
lho/ de'itshe bdag cag la yang dgongs shig/ byang chub sems dpas de bzhin du bya'o zhes dam bcas nas/ sku thams cad kyis g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs/
0 kyis gzigs nas 1 sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa yi// lam gyi mchog ni ma thob par// grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ni slar// nga ni 'jug par mi bya'o//
zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thub gnyis kyis dpag tshad bcu gnyis su byon nas bcibs pa las babs te/ rgyun bkrol nas 'dun pa la bka'
stsal pa/ 'dun pa rgyan dang rta khyer la slar song zhig 'dir sgrus pa/ kha lo sgyur khyod nga yi rta 'di dang// rgyan 'di rnams kyang gnyan ba dgalabani//
nga ni 'dod pa rgya chen spangs nas su/ da lta 'di nyid du ni rab byung bya// de nas 'dun pa gdong la mchi ma char bzhin 'bab pas/ byang chub sems dpal gsol
pa sang ga stag gis bltam pa dang// phyugs rjes bltam pa'anags tshal du 'a ba' zhig sku gnyan dang bral nas// 'phags pa ji ltar spyod
par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ skye dgu'i di ni rgyana'ang gcig pu skya/ de bzhin 'chi na'ang gcig pu 'chi bar 'gyur/ 'di na gcig pus sdug
bsngal myong 'gyur gyi// 'khor ba lani grogs yod ma yin no// 'dun pas gsol pa/ kyi hud gzhon nus sdug bsngal ba gzigs te// zhabs 'dzam glang chen rta la bcibs goms pa/ sa
bya@#// gzhi rtswa dang rdo bas bstan rtsu ba par// ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs shing nags su rgyu// byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa// 'chi bdag 'jigs pa
de ni lan 'ga' yang/ spyod la brnam mdu bde bar goms la min/ mgon bcas la min rigs btsun la ma yin// dpa' dang brtson min skye bo dga' lamin// dga'
bas 'chi bdag 'jigs pa dag/ bskyed nas 'ongs bar 'gyur zhes grag/ don ma byas shing ma brtsams par// 'chi bar lang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dun pasagasol/
ba: lha rgyal po bgres po ni srasakyi mya ngan gyis 'grongs pa 'a 'gyu bo/ khon kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'dun pa'i tshogs thugs la ma bab bo// de nas
byang chub sems dpas ut+pal sngon po 'dra ba'i ral gri shubasanas phyung nas gtsug phud bregs te sbyang ginam mkha' la bor ba dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis blangs nas bkur ste
chan po byas te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyinang du khyo nas gtsug phud kyi mchod pa chen po btsugs so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis phyogs dor dbu
sgra blangs pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba brtsi gas te/ da dung yang mchod rtan la phyag byed pa'i dge slong dag phyag byed do//
